product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Just want to let everyone know that the cerave lotion on the left is one I bought from cvs, and the one on the right is the large one from amazon, and you can clearly see that they put hyaluronic acid lower on the list for the amazon one, vs the cvs one. And just in case you don't know, ingredients for any products go in order from the greatest amounts first, and descend to lower amounts as you go down the list. The cvs one has hyaluronic acid much higher on the list, and the packaging looks completely different too! Like, why?? Does cerave make a cheaper version of their products for amazon, vs other retailers?? And that is just really annoying, aggravating, and upsetting to me. Why water it down to buy it for a cheaper price? No one wants that. Everyone wants to get what they pay for. For sure, the one from cvs was much pricier ($17) for the smaller bottle size, while the amazon one was like, $12 when I got it for the large, 19 oz one. But I just want to say that I KNOW what I'm paying for!! If its a cheaper price for a more watered down product, I'm not going to get it!! Just leave the products the way that they are. And I have to say that yes, the textures between them were NOTICEABLY different! The one from cvs was definitely more opaque and creamier, while as soon as I got the amazon one, I immediately immediately noticed, without a doubt, a more watery consistency. Um, barf. Never going to buy this product from amazon again because of how they're so blatantly cheating! I'll just put my money in something else

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Before i get into my novel of a review, here’s the summary of what i think. I came across this while looking for a lotion that works best for Non-oily skin, a daily lotion, for sensitive-ish skin, i found the PERFECT one with this.I bought this about 2 weeks ago, was shipped in 2 days, & when i received it nothing was wrong with the packaging or bottle. Anyways, I started using this after i decided to switch from my Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture which i had been using for about 6 months. I do not have naturally Oily Skin so it was too drying. But with maaaaany hours spent looking for a FACE lotion with good reviews I came across this and let me just say IT IS WORTH THE MONEY, I am in love! works for face and body which i was skeptical about at first but i do not regret my purchase at all and i highly highly reccomend anyone purchase this. My skin is a little sensitive mainly to perfumes (especially my face) & this is amazing!!! no breakouts, no rash, I will use this forever!

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: My skin is relatively sensitive. Over the years I’ve gone through a number of lotions, searching for one that keeps my skin hydrated without any side effects (breakouts, rashes, etc). I’ve been using this daily moisturizer for a few weeks now and it’s worked out very well so far. I only have to apply once in the morning and my skin feels moisturized throughout the day. I guess that’s the hyaluronic acid doing it’s job.This lotion is lightweight and doesn’t leave me feeling greasy. It also doesn’t have much of a scent which I count as a plus. Best of all my skin isn’t breaking out or changing in any negative way.Although this product is touted as face and body lotion I have yet to use it on my face. That being said, it has worked very well for me as a go-to body lotion.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: I really like this product. When I put on is very comfortable and smoothBut when i received this product are leaking out in the plastic bag.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Love the lotion but am so disappointed in the way it arrived. The pump was busted and broken, the lotion was all over the package.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: This is my absolute favorite moisturizer. It helps so much with dry patches during the winter time and even during the summer time it doesn't clog my pores or make you break out. It's such a great value I end up buying this versus the a.m. and p.m. because it's such a good value for the side and the money. I use this year round on my chest neck and face and I don't have any breakouts from it. I also love this because it's so easy to get and hardly ever out of stock. It's fragrance-free so it's good if you have sensitive skin and also my dermatologist recommended highly

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Despite being open when I received it, I love this lotion. On the body it absorbs very quickly. On hands, less quickly. On face, even less quickly. But it's gentle, and truly not scented at all.  I love this stuff.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: It arrived broken but still usable.It works ok on my skin but after 30 minutes maybe an hr my skin feels dry again. I can tell it’s improved my skin though. I really like gold bond diabetics lotion seems to really keep you moisturized.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: I have super sensitive skin and really bad acne. If you have dry, normal, or combination skin, this moisturizer is the one for you(they have other formulas for oily skin). This moisturizer works like a charm and has actually been helping me clear out my skin. It’s not too heavy and not too light. Highly recommend and I will purchase again.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Item was unprotected , anyone could open it before me , Cant use ... I payed money for nothing , thank you :)For future  use little extra money for protect your product pls <3

review: Love the product and I would’ve given it five stars ⭐️ But I received the package with the lotion spilt all over.The picture shows the residual lotion, I put at least 4oz back in the bottle.

I happy about my purchase.PROLIGHTWEIGHTSKIN SUPER SOFTNO SMELLAFFORDABLE

review: I am from malaysia, when i reach states here my skin condition become super dry. Until one day i saw one youtuber recommend this brand of lotion so i decided to try on. And yeah. Really unexpected that it suits my skin so well. Im loving it so much!

review: This product arrived in the packaging as shown in the picture. First of all, I'm surprised that there isn't a cap for this bottle or any sort of protection throughout the shipping process. More importantly, this wastes some of the product that I paid money for.As far as the product itself goes, the lotion is very good and works as advertised. This is the only reason I'm not rating Cetaphil's wash one out of five stars.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Is a super thin lotion, kind of smells funny almost like Elmer’s glue. Don’t get around eyes bc it burns. Otherwise i haven’t had many problems with the product

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Very disappointed. The cap was not in its original box or the shipping box. It's not what I paid for.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: I am acne prone so I was looking for a new moisturizer BC I was using the basic cetaphil moisturizer for my face. I bought it at Walmart for $15.00. At first it worked ok but as a few months ago my skin began to break out in these small bumps on my cheek areas which I never had, I mean thousands of them that are filled with white stuff that looks like the product. I thought it was bc I got off my birth control and was caused by some sort of hormonal balance. I went to my dermatologist and they prescribed me medication for my face. Something told me to look up reviews and there it was! Many others with the same issue! I thought this would help a person with skin issues like me! I wish I could get a refund and have them refund my copay :/They deserve no stars!!!

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: After another facial sunscreen made my face break out, I’ve been on the hunt for a Non-cosmodegenic facial sunscreen. Not just “oil free” not just “for acne-prone skin” I wanted it to say “Non-cosmodegenic” on the bottle. Well as it turns out only a handful of facial sunscreens for acne prone skin are labeled Non-cosmodegenic and most of the ones that are cost $30 and up, which just doesn’t work for me. The only other budget-friendly one was cerave and it was only SPF 15 and was the same price point as this one. So I bought this one and love it so far. It is super lightweight and rubs in completely matte (see photos). You can’t even tell you’re wearing sunscreen. I only needed about a dime size amount to cover my face and neck. So far, no breakouts! I purchased for daily use so I will update on how that goes over time.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Really Pleased with this.Wears nicely under makeup with no chalky appearance. Purchased it to go along with my morning regimen.Highly suggest it for oily skin.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: I am in disbelief as to how horrible this product has been on my skin. I have oily skin but I haven't had acne issues for years. But three days into using this cream and my face is full of breakouts and acne. I DO NOT see any matte finish, neither do I see any kind of oil control.In conclusion, if you have oily skin, don't get this product. I have used both Olay moisturizer with spf and Aveeno's moisturizer with spf - both of them worked well for me, guess I shouldn't have switched.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: came in with the expiration date and serial number scratched off so i don’t know if the serial number matches the one on the box and if the product is already expired. also it does NOT make your skin matte , it does the same thing any other face moisturizer with sunscreen would do.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: It's not the worst thing I've used and it will work for now, but it really does smell strongly like sunscreen and basically applies the same way. If you didn't know any better you'd think it was just sunscreen, not moisturizer with SPF in it. I was hoping I could use it everyday as my face moisturizer but I have to apply this, wait for it to dry, and put on another layer of normal moisturizer. I don't know if this messes the SPF up or anything but I have to do it in order to be able to apply makeup afterwards. Oh well. If it IS fine to do it that way, then I think it is fine. Just really wanted to replace my other moisturizer all together.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: I haven’t use this one. It came with damaged packaging. I am shocked that there is no seal at all. Make me feel like I bought a very cheap stuff.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: My dermatologist recommended this moisturizer because I have oily skin. This product has worked wonderfully on my face. It actually seems like my face is less oily after using this product.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Best sunscreen I have used on my acne-prone face.  As an African American, I like that it does not leave a white film after application.  It smoothly goes on too, or should I say, into my skin.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: sold expired product

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: The Marlowe No.123 Men's Facial Moisturizer has been my secret to wearing a soft, light and moisturized face. It soothes the face and keeps my face free from being dull & dry. When I step out in the sun, it prevents the sun from damaging my face as it enhances my natural beauty and skin. In the evening, I repeat the routine on my face and my lose wrinkles have slowly faded away. In general, I have regained my confidence and I no longer have to look down when I am communicating with someone at a close proximity.

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: I have been using the Marlowe 102 scrubbing soap and then tried this. A perfect way to clean and moisturize my face after washing up with it. Light scent and goes on without feeling like a mud mask.  I really see the difference after an hour or so where my face feels clean, especially here in the summer where I usually feel dried out from being outdoors a lot. Use with the Marlowe 102 scrubbing soap, it's a great way to get going for the day or night out. High quality and a great manufacturer that seems to stress quality in the products they deliver and that complement each other.

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: Before I bought this, I was using Men's Vasaline Lotion for my face after I shaved because my face would get extremely dry (especially in the fall/winter). Even with lotion, I felt my face getting dry and getting way too oily. So I did my research, and it brought me to this product. I have used it for this week, and I am pretty pleased with the outcome. I use it twice a day. When I go to bed, and before I go to work, it's much lighter than lotion (not as thick). So it does a better job for me, not clogging up my pores, causing acne. It doesn't have a scent to it and smells like nothing. The ingredients on it are great, and they have aloe! My face seems to be doing much better and not getting as oily. Although this doesn't matter, I also love the design of the moisturizer. For me, it's aesthetically pleasing. I keep it on my sink counter because I love the all-white minimalistic look to it, which also works as a reminder for me to apply it to my face. All in all, I would rate it a 9/10. The only reason I dock it one point is there is no like "manly scent" to it.Pros-Moisturizes Skin Nicely-Price-Easy To UseCons-No Scent

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: LOVE this stuff. Applies on easily. Doesn’t have any funky smell. Leaves my face looking clear and non-greasy. I’ve tried other products that make me look like I’m sweating all day. This stuff is well made. I will buy again. Great value, too!

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: I am really impressed with the amount of moisturizer you get for the price, on top of that, it is really nice and light.  It is great for everyday use and won't leave your face feeling oily.  Really great purchase

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: Good stuff . I was using Clinique Men’s Products for the last couple years but decided to try this line and I like it so far . Nice and gentle and does the job . Also more product for your money.

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: I never use  moisturizing lotion and this is the first one that I’ve used that doesn’t leave a slimy residue or feel heavy on my face. It’s perfect for the summer heat.

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: The other moisturizer I use is way to heavy and greasy. This is lightweight and smells amazing.

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: I loved that this men’s facial moisturizer was SUPER lightweight and not greasy. A lot of men’s moisturizers are heavy, greasy and feel tacky after application. I’m so glad No.123 was Hydrating and left my skin feeling smooth through the day. Very slight & pleasing scent as well. Definitely men’s skincare SIMPLIFIED!

product_name: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
review: The cream is decent. The product is good. But the tube I received was damaged. It leaked some and now it is hard to use.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: This is fantastic hydration for 60 & over skin. Neutrogena products have been recommended to me as an effective an affordable alternative to the high priced skin care lines. (I also use rose water mist in combination with this). Very light, goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I went from very dry, flaky angry skin to soft and supple in about 1 week. I noticed a change instantly. My acne has even started clearing up. Keep in mind I also added vitamin E oil serum to my skincare routine at the same time. I highly recommend. The product is a great consistency, is cooling/calming, light, and has a pleasant smell.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I ordered this product due to the ranting and raving of many people saying how great it is. I was looking for a nice moisturizer and thought I would give it a try. Please be aware that i do not suffer with any excessive acne. My skin in combination and i only get the monthly  breakouts on my forehead Around " that time of the month". After using this product the first day, my skin felt nice  and supple, just like what everyone else was saying.after my second day, i noticed a rash. It looked likea heat rash and i figured it was from the recent summer weather. However the following day it broke out into white heads all over my face, in places i have never experienced a break out. I dont have sensitive skin and this has never happened to me before with any other products. I camnot give this product 1 star because it indeed did hydrate my skin, however i now have to find another product to clear up this acne and then find a second one to moisturize( my initial reason for purchase. Be careful!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: So soft and quick absorbance. Smells good. It’s not heavy, greasy or sticky. I like it. It’s like high end products.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: My dermatologist recommended Neutrogena Hydro Boost as a way to slow down wrinkles that were starting to form on my forehead and cheekbones. I'm 57 and wish I had known about this product sooner to help me slow down the eye wrinkles (which came first)... but after using this now for about 6 months, I love what it's doing to add moisture and smooth out my skin on the rest of my face. This absorbs in and isn't a greasy layer sitting on top of my face like a lot of other moisturizers. It feels refreshing too, almost like I've cleaned and moisturized in one swoop and it's my go to blast of coolness for my face on a hot day.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: After reading several rave reviews on cosmo, refinery, youtube, and other beauty websites I just HAD to try this moisturizer. I definitely get why it gets such great reviews. It's very lightweight, the scent isn't overpowering, and it's decently priced. HOWEVER...my one caveat is the packaging. It's 2019!!! Why on earth would I want to spend 20$ on a moisturizer that I have to dunk my fingers into? It's not very eco-friendly or hygienic. While I wash my hands almost excessively it's still just not convenient to be dipping my fingers in the same pot over and over again. But if you are looking for a good moisturizer that's a dupe for Tatcha water cream or Ginzing this is your guy!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I had bought the face mask version of this product and was impressed at the amazing hydration it gave my face. In an attempt to reduce plastic waste, I bought this jar of the moisturizing product instead and I’m so glad I did! I had some sort of rash develop in my face a couple of weeks ago (before using this product) and everything I tried was making it more flaky, itchy, and irritated. This has been the first product to actually help hydrate the area without irritation. This is bringing youth & moisture back to my face.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: Got this product having already bought it once in Walgreens and used it for months, the one the photo shows. The box came damaged with the outer seal broken, with text in what appears to be German, with a printed sticker on the back of box with the english translation, the product did not have description of having hyaluronic acid on the container, i know it is supposed to be color less, this one was blueish, its supposed to be fragrance free and this one has a lot of fragrance. Does not have a serial number or code on bottom as the ones I buy in the store do. Looks like an outdated version of what is now this product. I do love the true product this picture shows, its a great product but for some reason I got a mistaken or outdated version of what the product really is, did not even dare to put it on my face so I asked for a refund and sent it back. As you can see in the pictures, the presentation is not even the same

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: The package was torn and there was no inner seal or cover within the jar which I found odd, was expecting one.This was such a let down! I really wanted to like this product but as soon as I got it and opened the jar, a strong fragrance emerged. I was very wary because I know fragrances aren't good for the skin but because of all the hype I figured it must still be good.I used it for about 4 days now and I'm currently breaking out. When I first put it on I also felt a burning sensation on my skin and I really didn't like it but I tried to give this product a chance.I'll stick to my pure hyaluronic acid which is also cheaper and more for your $. In the past I have used Neutrogena (for sunscreen) and they were decent, but they dropped the ball on this one for me.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: YES x 100!My face is super oily and sensitive, especially to scents. I’ve tried it all! For the past year I use cetaphil face wash and moisturizer, but the moisturizer was just not hydrating my skin enough during these cold months.The texture of this feels a little thicker than cetaphil so I thought oh man this is a bust—I was wrong! I put it on and instantly my face felt so hydrated! Then I thought, I wonder if it’ll leave a sticky or thick feeling—NOPE! I’ll probably have to reapply at some point today—NOOOOPE! Hours later, Is my face shiny yet?? NOPE! AAAAH—MAZING!LEGIT! It’s not like me to spend $10+ on face products—but I am SO HAPPY I did! This stuff is awesome! I apply it after I wash my face/shower, a swipe on my cheek bones, forehead, chin and it lasts me ALL DAY! All day! With this, my face doesn’t get oily throughout the day AND when I wake the next morning, my face is so soft and smooth af! FREAKING love this!If you have an annoyingly oily, sensitive face BUY THIS! My face will freak tf out with scented products—Idk wth people are talking about a scent. There’s non and there’s definitely no negative reaction going on with my super sensitive skin.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: i usually order this product on amazon and for the first time it came in this different package. i want to try it but i’m worried it will break me out. the product it self, from the times i’ve used it before was great helped me out with my oily skin. now i’m just worried if i use it the product something will go wrong.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: This stuff feels sooo good on my skin. It soaks right in and doesn't leave any sticky residue - I can put my makeup on quickly after applying. A little bit goes a long way.It definitely is scented, but the smell isn't too obnoxious. It's also gentle enough to use around my eyes without any irritation.I did notice some improvement in the texture of my skin, but I wouldn't consider this a heavy moisturizer. I've almost used it up and the fine lines around my eyes are the same after consistent use.I've enjoyed using this,  and I might keep some around to use to prep my skin before applying makeup, but it's not enough by itself. I'm 32 and I may just need more from my moisturizer at this age. This would probably be perfect for someone in their teens and 20's.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: My new holy grail product!! This along with the Hydro Boost cleanser and the moisturizing tint foundation makes my skin clear, soft, moisturized and glowing! I’m 41 and I’ve tried a ton of products trying to get my skin back in balance. Ive always had combo skin but I had developed these angry red bumps on my face that would constantly have dried flaky skin on them. Nothing I tried could get the bumps to calm down and go away and get rid of the dry flaky areas. Only been using this combo of products for 5 days now and my skin is so happy and looks flawless! I will continue to buy and recommend! My photo has no filter and all I’m wearing is the Hyro Boost moisturizing tint in natural ivory with my regular highlighter powder, some blush and mascara! I have very little makeup on and my face feels fresh and not cakey at all!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I’d say this makes my skin feel better than my 55 dollar Clinique moisturizer, however, it has a bunch of additives I’m not fond of. Such as coloring for a blind tint, glycerin, and a strong fragrance additive. To sum up my experience with this product, I would say it is a good alternative to a high-end moisturizer on the grounds that it gives amazing results. However, it would not be a good product for those with a green-skin care routine.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: This is the second time I have ordered this product on Amazon and it might be the last. I'm not sure why but what I received looks different from before. Not only does the packaging look different but the gel itself is different. The original one had and off white translucent cream but the new one I received is now a blue translucent cream and it has a strong fragrance that the original did not have as it is suppose to be fragrance free. Idk what Amazon is stocking but I am unpleased and will be asking for a refund

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I loved how refreshing this Neutrogena Hydro Boost moisturizer feels on my face, but once that initial feeling goes away, my skin feels so dry. I started applying larger amounts, but it doesn't seem to help. I tend to apply this product 3-4x a day instead of once with the "all day" hydration this product tends to promote. I've resorted back to using my Jergens lotion instead because that seems to help my skin stay hydrated a bit more.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I’ve only tried the lip treatment and moisturizer and they are great. But you do not get much for the money. This is something I would be more likely to buy for $10-$15 Not $20. Honestly I clearly didn’t read closely because I thought it was a full size moisturizer plus the other items to try out. So for the price is why it gets 4 stars

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I BELIEVE THIS IS A FAKE PRODUCT. Says it’s produced in the USA but it’s all in another language. The product photos also do not match the packaging that I received.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I love how smoothly it glides on. You only need two pea sized drops to cover face and neck. There’s not that much though and I use it up in 2 weeks. So plan on paying $40/mos for it. It gives great evening Coverage and in a very tiny amount is light enough to go on before makeup. I love it. <3Use it in conjunction with Olay regenerist under eyes and on crows feet. This tends to dry me out as it plumps my skin so this neutrogena Works like a charm.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I love this product. I use it every morning first thing after I wash my face. It has a very pleasant and light smell. I also like its consistency. It feels fresh and moistures my skin very well. I’ve been buying and using it since last year and am very satisfied with the results. I totally recommend it.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Moisture Glycerin Face Moisturizer & Neck Cream for Combination Skin, Lightweight, Oil Absorbing Facial Moisturizer Lotion for a Soft Natural Matte, 4 fl. oz
review: There is no smeel. Feels good and light weight. My skin looks glowy and healthy. Very happy with my order.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Moisture Glycerin Face Moisturizer & Neck Cream for Combination Skin, Lightweight, Oil Absorbing Facial Moisturizer Lotion for a Soft Natural Matte, 4 fl. oz
review: I've always had oily skin and hate to wake up to a greasy face after hydratating my face at night, but the next morning after I used this product, was incredible, instantly soft skin and its really oil free.LOVED IT, will use it forever.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Moisture Glycerin Face Moisturizer & Neck Cream for Combination Skin, Lightweight, Oil Absorbing Facial Moisturizer Lotion for a Soft Natural Matte, 4 fl. oz
review: I like the product, but there is no expiration date..

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Moisture Glycerin Face Moisturizer & Neck Cream for Combination Skin, Lightweight, Oil Absorbing Facial Moisturizer Lotion for a Soft Natural Matte, 4 fl. oz
review: I use Nivea Men Sensitive Post Shave Balm, as a face primer and I mix it with this as a moisturizer. It creates an awesome foundation base and I will never use anything else.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Moisture Glycerin Face Moisturizer & Neck Cream for Combination Skin, Lightweight, Oil Absorbing Facial Moisturizer Lotion for a Soft Natural Matte, 4 fl. oz
review: The product I received says nothing about broad spectrum sun protection. ???? This was the reason I ordered it.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Moisture Glycerin Face Moisturizer & Neck Cream for Combination Skin, Lightweight, Oil Absorbing Facial Moisturizer Lotion for a Soft Natural Matte, 4 fl. oz
review: I've been using this product since November 2011, and has since kept using the Combination Skin version of this moisturizer. I've tried many other moisturizers such as Olay Combination Skin Moisturizer (watery consistency, and greasy on my face causing breakouts), to high end products such as Shiseido and Lancome, none of which gave me the same smooth, matte, and oil controled skin as I get with this product. I started using it after digging through my ex-boyfriend's medicine cabinet one day when I ran out of my own moisturizer, and realized that it's the best kept skin secret I've yet to discover. I used to get small to medium-sized pimples weekly and monthly, uneven and red spots, and very oily T-zones. And I used to cover it up with lots of foundation or BB cream, which caused even more breakouts. Ever since using this product, I HAVE NOT FOUND THE NEED TO WEAR FOUNDATION OR BB CREAM FOR MONTHS!!! Yes that's right, I am so proud to tell people that I've stored away my foundation makeup and use less oil-absorbent sheets than before. I use this product everyday, morning and night time, never skipped once, because I would feel the differences right away and run straight to the bathroom to put it on. All of these are just the results that worked on me, and I hope it works for you as well, because having clearer skin has been truly one of the best gifts I've gotten.UPDATE: Still use this product to this day. I even have a new bottle as backup. I also appreciate the packaging because it just twists open and I press down to pump it out, making it minimalistic and sustainable.

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: I had high hopes for Lauda Botanical's oil control moisturizer.  Unfortunately, the product fell flat for me in most aspects.At first, I liked the light consistency of the product.  The strong, rather unappealing scent did not reinforce my good first impression: it smelled like a cinnamon candy blended with something rather putrid.  I honestly held my breath when applying the moisturizer, hoping the smell would dissipate (it did, or I got used to it).The problem began when I applied the product.  My whole face turned light pink and stung a bit.  Because the stinging stopped after a minute or two, I did not remove the product from my face.Upon arriving at work, I glanced at my face in the rear view mirror of my car, and noticed my usual oily sheen appearing on my cheeks.  After teaching my first class, I went to the restroom and discovered my nose and cheeks were very red and inflamed; my nose was especially red and irritated (see photos).  I gently washed my face, but the redness (later accompanied by soreness) on my nose persisted for a couple days.I returned the product, since it caused such a negative reaction on my face.  It may work for you, but I wanted to document my experience.

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: Considering I have extremely oily skin, I decided to give this a try, as most days my face is slick within a couple hours of washing. So I have used this lotion twice so far, and this is what I experienced: I put it on after exfoliating, and it burned a tingled for a few minutes. It has a very strong weird smell, like some funky cheap perfume or something. The smell goes away after awhile, as does the slight burning. My face does not feel very moisturized from it, but still rather tight and dry underneath. The lotion is super lightweight. Well, did it do the job of controlling the shine? I'd give it 3 stars, as it wasn't horrible by the end of the day, but it didn't really live up to it's advertising either. The photo shows my makeup-free skin at the end of the day wearing only this product, and you can still see a decent amount of shine.

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: This moisturizer works so well my skin has really cleared ip since using it and creates a really smooth surface before applying foundation. My skin isn't nearly as oily anymore.

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: It had some ingredients that gave me some skin rash, most probably because I already had a slight infection on the nose area. I think they stopped using those ingredients like yeast extract etc.. I want to like these sort of companies who try to use natural ingredients, but this one was not for me. And it had kind of a bad smell to it too.. it was also not mattifying..

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: I have sensitive and very oily skin, so it's been difficult to find a primer that actually keeps me oil-free all day AND doesn't irritate my face. This photo (unfiltered of course) is about 7 hours after applying my makeup, which is usually around the time that I'd be blotting- but with this primer, it still looks fresh and nice!!

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: Wife review: Overall this stuff is great! I think it works better than most natural makeup primers I've tried. However, the fragrance is pretty strong. Reminds me of what a grandma would wear. But it dissipates pretty soon after you put it on. My face is less oily after work I've noticed when I use this in the morning.

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: I have oily skin on my face. The T area is very bad. This concept skin oil control formula works well to control this overactive oily skin I have. I applied it to my face to help control this problem and the acne breakouts I get. It helped to clarify my skin using the salicylic acid and natural Botanicals. It also helps to moisturize my skin leaving the skin very soft. It helps you look fresh and vibrant much longer. It assists in creating a clear complexion by clarifying and balancing the Skin's pH balance. It's also a lightweight moisturizer that keeps your skin shine free and silky smooth.This product uses natural and organic ingredients to produce the clear skin that is moisturizing as well. The ingredients cinnamon and peptides help control oil production and soften and smooth the skin. It clears acne blemishes, controls oil production, unclog pores, and also prevents future outbreaks on your skin. This can be used on your face, back, chest, or wherever you have breakouts.As a moisturizer it lightly moisturizes using lemon peel oil, witch-hazel, and St. John's wart. These work together to balance the skin's moisture and pH levels.I received this oil control moisturizer for a reduced rate for my review, however, my opinion is my own and unbiased.

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: So whodathunk I would have blackheads at (cough, cough) 50 years old?  Seriously?  I do know that my skin has changed and it is starting to get drier now and wrinkles, or creases, are coming into play.  How am I supposed to combat both at the same time in the same area?  I am giving the  Oil Control - Oily Skin & Acne Moisturizer, Mattifying Oil-Free Moisturizer Prevents Breakouts & Clarifies with Salicylic Acid & Natural Botanicals - by Concept Skin Naturals - a try.  I follow my normal cleansing routine that I have down to a science now.  I am able to limit breakouts but the drying is an issue these days.  If I over moisturize I get pimples and too dry I get pimples.  So far I am pretty impressed and happy with this product.  The first thing you notice is the scent.  I was expecting that medicinal smell tea tree oil has but there was none of that.  It is a really fresh and clean scent with no heavy TTO odor. It tingles a bit when applies and I worried as my skin seems to be sensitive too now!  It dissipated quickly and left me with tightened pores and such a nice soft feeling to my skin.  Under my eyes, I notice a smoothness as the skin is a little crape-paper like there. That is really nice, I am liking that! I am hoping in time the blackheads diminish on my nose.  I like what I am experiencing so far and it is nice to have a product that can help with the acne while easing the signs of wrinkles. ( And I thought my teenage skin was difficult to deal with! )  I purchased the  Oil Control - Oily Skin & Acne Moisturizer, Mattifying Oil-Free Moisturizer Prevents Breakouts & Clarifies with Salicylic Acid & Natural Botanicals - by Concept Skin Naturals at a discount and this is my honest opinion and experience using the product.

product_name: Oily Face Control Mattifying Primer and Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, Anti Shine Facial Primer for Men and Women, 2 Oz by LAUDA BOTANICALS
review: A great moisturizer so light and creamy and dries rather quick so I can put make up on after. Never greasy and has a lite smell so it's nice to use every day. I don't break out with this product either so it's another favorite of mine. It controls my skin from being greasy as well.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: UPDATE: Just wanted to say again, how much I love this green tea and vitamin C cream; I did a video on it to share how much I love it.  As I write this updated review nearly a year later I still love this cream!  I live in Las Vegas and today? It's going to be 113 degress!! Also, do you know how DRY it is here in Vegas? Well? It's dry, I moved here 2 years ago and was used to the humidity in Austin, TX but now? I have to deal with dry skin :-( plus being older.  This cream really helps me stay moistuized AND it looks so natural on - some creams change your skin color (like you're wearing some sunscreen and you look greasy!) You can put this cream on and not look like you're in over a 100 degree heat yet? At the same time? Your skin does not look matte (for me this makes me look like my skin is flat or older) it has a nice slightly glowy look on you.  I  also love that when I'm using this cream, I am putting ALL NATURAL ingredients on - no more chemicals into my skin (remember, your skin is the BIGGEST) organ out ther.  There's also almost no smell to it and for the price? This cream is SO worth it!! It has proven to be my go to cream now and a little goes a long way.  Hope this updated review helped!So, I recently bought this cream because i love the natural ingredients - it smells amazing - especially if you like the smell of citrus!  It goes on smoothly and really hydrates. Note worthy: For those of you that like creams that make your skin look dewy (or greasy - depending on how you look at it) this cream is matte - meaning you do not look like you have cream on or as some would say - oily.  If you're skin is already kind of oily this cream would be really good for you because you do NOT shine when it's on :-) IF you have dry skin and are older (like me) it won't give you that slightly dewy look...but I feel my skin looks and feels amazing with it on. (See picture of me).  I'm turning 50 in November (2018) and I like the way my skin looks with this.I will say that the cream's bottle is not that big but it says clearly that it is 1.7 ounces - I would really like it if the company made the cream in a larger size.  The cream comes in a pump and you don't need a lot (dime to nickle size depending on your skin) for it to have an affect.Overall? Really nice cream, best for oily skin and all natural ingredients - I look forward to using it all up and purchasing more - you cannot beat the natural ingredients, decent price and anti-aging affect it has on your skin.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I'm turning 50 in November (2018) and I've been using this cleanser for a little over a week and I notice that my skin is softer, brighter and (I think) has less lines.  I have always been fairly natural in terms of my make up (mascara, lip balm and maybe some eye liner) but I am a fanatic about moisturizing my face. With this cream cleanser? I don't need as much moisturizer and my skin feels much less tight.I also live in Las Vegas (aka the desert) and after spening 17 years in Texas (humid)- my skin has had to make an adjustment. This cleanser does not dry out my skin.  I also really like the smell - faintly citrus but not overpowering.The bottle is not big but you don't need a lot to wash your face (dime size literally). I like that it has a pump and you can easily remove the pump to make sure you shake out all the last reminants of this cream cleanser.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: This is a fabulous basic eye cream, which I found really gentle on my extremely sensitive skin. I apply about a pea-sized amount total to my eyes (lashline to brows) and the orbital/socket area, undereye and crow's feet. I have been using it morning and night for 4 weeks, and I do notice that my undereye seems more hydrated. No change in wrinkles but that really isn't to be expected with a topical product.I had an allergic reaction to another brand's moisturizer while using this, and this is a gentle enough cream that I could still use it while recovering. It didn't burn or sting my sensitive, peeling eyelids and I really appreciated that.I'm about a third of the way through the container and have been using it consistently for a month. Given that usage, I predict that I would need to replace every 3 months. That's a budget friendly option, though I would also like a larger container as mentioned by another commenter.Really great product. Thank you!Disclaimer: I received free product in exchange for my honest review.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: First of all I have to say I love a good citrus cleanser. I have oily and acne prone skin and I’m always in search of something that’s going to be gentle or oil based so my skin doesn’t ever produce. I was in such a hurry to try when it came in, I read the reviews and they seem to be pretty positive. It smells fantastic and left my skin nice and soft when I was done using  it. I can’t wait to see future results and dark marks faded.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I love this exfoliating cleanser totally!!! It smells good like oranges and it contains glycolic acid, but, it dosn’t give me any skin irritation nor pain and it works really well with small quantities! My skin is softer and brighter and even moisturized now.I will recommend it to my Japanese friends especially, as we all know that green tea really works on skin.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I have been using this vitamin C serum for a few weeks now, I purchased it along with the facewash and eye creme.  have to say absolutely love all of the products! the serum is amazing, it has a light citrus smell, absorbs right into the skin without being sticky or oily.  My face feels hydrated and overall very soothing.  I am satisfied and will be purchasing again!!

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: Ok, so I was going to wait until I finished the cream to write a review and even tho it’s been only a few weeks since I’ve been using it under my sunscreen every morning I gotta say I love it!!!! My main skin concern is acne (I’m 28) and this cream has green tea as the 2and ingredient after water. Green tea is a natural antioxidant and antibacterial which helps reduce acne... well I gotta say it keeps my skin hydrated tru my 10hr shift. Hasn’t irritated my skin or broken it out. Has a pastel green color and the mildest scent (best way I can describe the scent is like a herbal shampoo, but you can barely smell it ).  I’m definitely repurchasing after I’m done with my bottle.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I have been using this green tea eye cream for a couple of weeks now.  so far so good.  the cream feels hydrating and absorbs right into the skin.  does not feel sticky and does not have a weird or strong smell.  if you are looking for an eye cream,  I recommend this one. I also purchased Lily Sado vitamin C serum as well as the Green tea and Vitamin C cleanser and they work great! am completely diggin this trio as part of my daily routine

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: This is the best face wash , it does NOT dry your skin or strip off all the good oils . It's so gentle and it really cleans your skin . I love that it's organic . The scent is mild which is good . I will be ordering again .I recommend getting the vitamin c serum and the eye cream . I ran out and will be ordering again.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: UPDATE: I had totally spaced updating my review, but this stuff is pretty awesome. I love the way it smells and it doesn't dry out my skin. And the customer service was spot on and was surprised with a refund for the pump leak. Thank you so much and I will buy again when I use it all up. And little does go a long way so don't let the small bottle deter you. Its worth it.Just got my order in, the packaging is nice but unfortunately the pump wasn't twisted down and leaked in the package. I'll update after I use it and see some results :)

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I'm very careful about skin care products as I have sensitive skin. I'm so happy that I came across Lily Sado. GREEN TEA + VITAMIN C ANTIOXIDANT MOISTURIZER calms and softens my sensitive skin. I'm very satisfied with the product. Great quality for the affordable price.  I love their concept with simple organic skincare solutions. Thank you, LILY SADO!!

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: This product is amazing. It does wonders for my almost 50 year old skin and smells terrific too. I have always used name brand product from the dermatologist and thought I would give this a try. It is excellent quality for a fraction of the price.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: Scent:Lily Sados face serum Smells like fresh grapefruit. So yummy but it’s not too strong and intenseConsistency:The consistency is very light but not too watery. I dislike it when she rooms are too watery and it basically feels like you are rubbing tap water on your face. It’s hard to explain but this serum is kind of watery but if you take a drop and rub it between your fingers you can feel that there is some oil or something that’s smoothed your Skin.How does your face feel after applying the serum ?The serum soaks quickly into my skin, my skin is very hungry so it is still a little bit tight after the serum soaked into my skin but once I apply moisturizer to support the effect of the serum it works fine for me.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I have been using Lily Sado products for a year now, and I must say "Best solution for sensitive skin/acne". This is coming from someone who has had acne sense 11 years old (now 27) thats tried literally EVERYTHING (from stuff seen on TV, to products stocked on shelves at every store) Lily Sado is like magic in a bottle xoxo if your looking for something this isnt harsh on your skin (all natural) try their stuff out xoxo

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I have been reaching for this moisturizer during the summer time because it’s so humid here in North Carolina and this Moisturizer is so light absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave me feeling greasy at all.Key ingredients are~ Green Tea~ Vitamin C~ LICORICE ROOT EXTRACT soothes and hydrates the skin, protects against environmental stressors, balances oil production (excellent for those with oily or combination skin), and prevents under-eye dark circles and age spots. ~ ALOE VERA~ PRO-VITAMIN B5 & E increases hydration, reduces inflammation, and improves skin softness and elasticity. It also relieves itchiness and redness--ideal for dry, scaly, or rough skin. ~ JOJOBA OilThis moisturizer left my skin hydrated and feeling very nourished.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I love using vitamin C serums, because I suffer from hyperpigmentation. Over the years, I’ve found many that work, but not many that are stable and work well with my skin. This formula is lovely. It’s shelf stable and has beautiful antioxidants in it. I also find this serum to be very moisturizing. I’ve never used a vitamin c serum that is also hydrating. This also wears well under makeup. Great price and great product.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: Once applied I’ve noticed a marked improvement in the dark under my eyes. Has vitamin C and other anti-aging ingredients. I’m using about six drops a day and after I’ve come home my skin is still soft and hydrated. Four Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!!!

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: I use this in the morning under my makeup. It is a medium thickness white eye cream,  I can’t say I have noticed any difference with dark circles or wrinkles but it has definitely helped my dryness which has been an issue for me. It is very lightly scented and I love that you get a good amount (in terms of eye cream) in a bottle with a pump.

product_name: LILY SADO Green Tea and Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Cream - Antioxidant, Anti-Wrinkle Natural Facial Moisturizing Lotion - Softens, Hydrates, Firms & Tones for Amazing, Radiant Skin. For Women & Men
review: This is such a great moisturizer. It's very hydrating for my dry skin. It leaves it feeling soft & not greasy. The Ingredients in this are so amazing as well. This is one of definitely buy again!

product_name: Mario Badescu Control Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Fl Oz
review: This product is completely fake. I purchased a new one from ulta today and it's a complete different color than the one amazon sells. The amazon one is super watered down. What a waste of money

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I absolutely love this product! I have combination skin and wanted a lightweight moisturizer to use in the mornings after washing my face. I live in Louisiana in an extremely humid environment and during the summer months, you can literally sweat all 24 hours of the day. Most moisturizers would leave me feeling sticky and like I was smothering my pores. This Aveeno has worked perfectly. It goes on smooth and leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized without feeling wet or sticky. The smell is also absolutely amazing, especially for the morning. It is a clean fresh scent that adds a nice pep to my morning routine! I will definitely continue to purchase this product!

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I always use this as my face lotion for years. I am mid 30s with dry skin.  I bought it on Amazon because it was way cheaper then at CVS.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: This bottle came fat and full of my favorite facial moisturizer EVER. It reduces redness and breakouts, feels soft, and moisturized my skin without any oiliness. I recommend this lotion to everyone, even if you don't have breakouts, it'll even out your skin like a miracle moisturizer from heaven.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: This is not original product.. the front of the bottle  is different than advertised ..

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: It never leaves my skin dry or irritated. I was once given this product by a friend and after that it feels amazing. Especially after using any mask it makes my face feels so soft and smooth!!!

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Not sure why but this moisturizer I've been using for months now hasn't done much for my acne. I've consistently put this on day and night. It's probably most likely due to my oily skin type. I'd recommend consulting a dermatologist and determining what kind of skin you have before purchasing any lotions. I've attached a couple of photos of the item size.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Aveeno is the most hypo allergenic Inhave tried never Inhad break out for trying the first time

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Have been using this for a while now and have had very little acne and well-moistened skin with no reactions. Its my go-to after showering and I even started using it on my latest tattoo after my A&D ointment was out and it seems to be fine for that purpose as a non-scented and general purpose moisturizer.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: It's a soothing moisturizer that helps fight light breakouts. Not the strongest for serious acne conditions.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I have been using this aveeno for a while, I won't change it for anything. It has been working well for me.Now that I can get it on Amazon-next day deliver, I'm in heaven!UPDATE....Now! March 2019 did not like the way my item was packaged, I hope it was tampered with

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I have been using this stuff for 5 years and I promise that you can't go wrong with AVEENO products. I SWEAR BY THEM! I use this twice a day along with the lifting and firming cream and it keeps me looking amazing I'm 35 and I honestly do not look it. I LOVE THIS STUFF! If you wash your face with Koirajic Acid (think I'm spelling it right) but it's the skin brightening/whitening bar (an orange color bar) ANYWAYS, if you wash your face twice a day and rub the Aveeno Lifting and Firming Cream over your face and then for a finishing touch rub the Aveeno Clear Complexion Daily Moisturizer; you will be great! My mom uses this stuff every eight weeks to keep her skin refreshed and it works AMAZINGLY! We have eczema and psoriasis, so the best thing is this stuff doesn't break out our skin at all and it also has a little sunscreen skin protectant in the product so It creates a flawless touch to SMOOTH HEALTHY AGELESS SKIN! Feel free to try these products and I promise you won't regret it!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: This product is has switched distributors and now is a much lower quality than before. You can see that the distribution was changed from neutrogena to Johnson and Johnson. The lotion is now much more oily and burns my skin near my eyes. Would not reccomend

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: This item came with a torn bottom of the box the product comes in and seems to have been used before. The pump does not work and the lotion does not come out.  Do not buy from this seller!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I received one used, yeah, give 1 star for price.Just like I bought a hamburger with a bite.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I might do an update soon in a month but first impression, im quite pleased with the product. Its white and very liquidy, feels very good and cooling when first applied (no stingy sensation like the Neutrogena water gel even though i loved that during the cold Canadian winter). Its a bit sticky on the skin but thats common with moisturizers. Im really hoping this one wont break me out.Update: This doesn't break me out and soothes my skin despite being kinda sticky. For some reason my skin does get kinda red affer application but it calms down after an hour. I like that it almost doesn't have a scent.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: For my skin I reached badly. the picture is how bad of a rash I got and every time I put it on I felt itchy

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I have always struggled with breaking out with moisturizers. I have been watching Dr.Drey on youtube and she talked about this product. I love it and I havent broken out. Love the price.Plus the pump is amazing and gives the perfect amount of product.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: It came in its box and was wrapped up! I’m really loving this moisturizer, I do have sensitive acne prone skin and I do oil up sometimes. The texture is very light weight and no added scent. Definitely will keep repurchasing.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: Love it. I have MS and I am cautious  about my skin and body products. This has been.my favorite  for years. I am 52 years old...

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: Adoro este producto, le ha dado hidratación a mi piel, cuida mi piel, no es pegajosa, es excelente el producto. Viene bien empacado.
