product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I have oily skin and this is sooo oily. Pore clogging. Throwing the whole bottle away.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: My wife had been buying a facial moisturizer from another brand that I had been using which I liked since it was scent free and seemed to disappear on your face and not leave you with that shiny look. It was not cheap but it did the job. Well they decided to reformulate it and put it in a smaller tube and although they said it was scent free still, It now seemed to have a more flowery oder which I did not care for. So I began searching for a new one and it lead me to this product. Been using it for about 3 months now and I would have to say I really like it. Has no odor, does not leave you with that shiny look and keeps my face nice and hydrated. Love the dispenser with its pump top. 3 pumps and I have the perfect amount for me. This should help the bottle last longer as each use is consistent. Seems to last awhile as well and the price is pretty good when comparing it to what I was using. Also I have had no issues with any kind of skin breakouts so it seems to be pretty friendly to that. Just a really nice gentle all around facial moisturizer. Attached picture gives you idea of the size of this product. Highly recommend this one. If you found this review helpful please clink the button below to let me know as I do my best to write honest reviews of items I actually purchase and use. Thanks.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I have been using this product daily for almost a year. I have sensitive skin combination skin and really can only wash my face with water. I’d like to point out I don’t wear foundation and am not wearing any in this photo. I’ve always had a hard time finding a moisturizer that wasn’t too oily but actually worked and didn’t break my skin out. This does not clog pores, does make my face oily and my skin has never been smoother. I use to get tiny little numbs in my face from irritation due to other products. Haven’t had any issues whatsoever with this product and would definitely recommend!!!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I was using a really expensive face lotion because I was experiencing some really stubborn acne and was recommended that brand by a friend and it made my acne SO MUCH WORSE! My whole forehead broke out in tiny bumps and after a week I was red and blotchy and my face was worse than before! I ordered this and I’ve only been using it for about 5 days and already it is completely cleared up and my face is back to being smooth and almost completely acne free again! This stuff is AWESOME! I have to use sensitive skin stuff in everything from detergent to sunscreen and this definitely makes my list of must have products for my sensitive skin. It has an awesome little pump that locks and unlocks into place and doesn’t feel oily or greasy, and it absorbs into skin fast and leaves it looking healthy and moisturized.Also a bonus! For some reason Snapchat thought the bottle was a face so I was able to face swap with the bottle! 10/10 would reccomend!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I’m a 21 yr old female and have incredibly oily skin and seeing as this product is OIL FREE and CLAIMS to leave your skin matte without ANY OIL OR SHINE, i thought it would be a miracle product! It came quick and the packaging was nice and i love the pump bottle but when it comes down to what it’s supposed to do, it’s garbage. I applied after showering and a half hour later it looked like a dumped a bucket of grease on my face. When i ran my finger over my face there was a line of oil that i picked up on my finger!!! Not kidding! This is trash. The pictures don’t even do justice

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Mattifying Lotion, 1.69 Fl Oz (Vegan)
review: Not shiny after 5 hours of hiking in New Hampshire (very humid there)! This stuff is AMAZING! My face was always very shiny, even when I used a different mattifying moisturizer. I live in an area where the humidity is very high and my face never gets shiny with this stuff. Highly recommend!!

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Mattifying Lotion, 1.69 Fl Oz (Vegan)
review: This is the only Amazon product review I’ve ever written but I had to for this one. This is the only Amazon product review I’ve ever written but I had to for this one at the price of this product I totally did not expect it to work but it literally works the best for oil control lotion I have ever used. I used to use a product that was $60 and didn’t work half as well as this product.I used to use a product that was $60 and didn’t work half as well as this product. It is the right level of modifying while simultaneously allowing your make up to glide on and control the oil.it is the right level of modifying while simultaneously allowing your make up to glide on and control the oil. my make up stays on literally all day until I go to bed with this lotion. I have no ties to this company but it literally is a miracle product.I have no ties to this company but it literally is a miracle product.

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Mattifying Lotion, 1.69 Fl Oz (Vegan)
review: I don't know why they're using this photo, this is not the product that was sent in the mail. I have attached what I received in the mail. This product is made with real Tea Tree oil and made of high quality material. Do I wish they came in larger containers? Yes, but the product itself is worth the investment. I use it everyday two times a day.

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Mattifying Lotion, 1.69 Fl Oz (Vegan)
review: I'm really surprised how well this works. My skin is immediately shine free.

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Mattifying Lotion, 1.69 Fl Oz (Vegan)
review: Works good, it’s pretty small but a little goes a long way!

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Mattifying Lotion, 1.69 Fl Oz (Vegan)
review: Love this moisturizer because it is lightweight. If my face is dryer than usual sometimes I will have to apply two layers, but that actually works out well for me because I can decide daily how much I should use and never have too much. I have acne too and I don't know if this necessarily helps but it definitely doesn't make it worse like some other lotions I have used before.I have been using this since before the new packaging and I have not personally noticed any difference in the actual product.

product_name: Formula Ten O Six Seriously Shine-Free Moisturizers, 2.54 Fluid Ounce
review: I've been using this for a bout a week now.It is moisturizing and leaves my skin soft, but the whole reason I bought it was cuz my oily t-zone. This did nothing to improve that. My skin is still just as oily after using it daily. The scent is horrible.

product_name: Formula Ten O Six Seriously Shine-Free Moisturizers, 2.54 Fluid Ounce
review: I like this product, but the only downside is the smell. It does have a wet towel smell that's unpleasant...buuut on the plus side  it definitely does what it says. I have oily/dry dryyy skin and as soon as I applied this on my face it was matte and it has stayed matte for about 12 hours so far also it doesn't make my skin feel dry it feels moisturized. I have eczema as well and so far it hasn't bugged my skin, and that makes me like this product a lot more.Update: I do apply my no 7 beautifully matte foundation over it and it keeps it in place and helps KEEP it matte. Usually my skin is so oily that some shine does come through my foundation with just that alone, so this product helps me.

product_name: Formula Ten O Six Seriously Shine-Free Moisturizers, 2.54 Fluid Ounce
review: This product is going to have lots of different reviews because of everyone's different types of skin. No ones skin is exactly like another, and it honestly depends on your type of skin. For myself, it worked beautifully. I enjoy the smell, it doesn't bother me. Its all up to each individual. That's the most honest answer. Don't depend 100% on peoples reviews when it comes to any kind of beauty care product. I mean, take it into consideration if you think it pertains to you, but honestly, beauty care products are going to affect different people in different ways.

product_name: Formula Ten O Six Seriously Shine-Free Moisturizers, 2.54 Fluid Ounce
review: Helped my face stay pretty matte. I got greasy and oily about a few hours later, but normally I'm an oil slick 30 minutes after a shower so I'm satisfied.

product_name: Formula Ten O Six Seriously Shine-Free Moisturizers, 2.54 Fluid Ounce
review: This product is bigger than I thought it would be which is excellent. My skin gets very oily and I was looking for a product that I can use instead of pressed powder. So far it has worked as expected and it smells good which is a plus.

product_name: Formula Ten O Six Seriously Shine-Free Moisturizers, 2.54 Fluid Ounce
review: Admittedly, I didn't buy this on Amazon, I got it on impulse at Ulta. But I wasn't hesitant to use it after some of the reviews here, so I thought I'd leave my own.First, the smell isn't bad or like dirty towels or mildew. It smells like slow vera. Not the most pleasant scent but not a bad one.Second, I have very oily combination skin with very dry areas. I used this after my Nuetrogena water gel and Benefit matte rescue. It isn't very moisturizing, but it's definitely mattifying! My make up went on smoothly and looked great. (Side note, don't try to layer tinted moisturizer over it. You'll just end up with a streaky mess. BB cream works fine though.)The first picture is at 8:00 before work. The second picture is at 3:00 when my skin looks most like an oil slick. Aside from my makeup wearing off because I have a cold and have been blowing my nose all day, not too shabby. I did have to blot after taking this picture, but there wasn't near as much oil as there'd usually be.So, it is definitely mattifying, but if you have especially oily skin, don't expect it to stay totally matte.

product_name: Formula Ten O Six Seriously Shine-Free Moisturizers, 2.54 Fluid Ounce
review: When i'm not using rose water, this is basically the only moisturizer that i will use for my combination skin. After years of trial and error, on a magazine's suggestion, i went to my nearest Ulta and bought this baby and i am pleased. For starters, it has a pleasing, fresh scent and has a gel-like formula, as most moisturizers for oily skin, should be. It spreads easily and absorbs quickly into the skin. Just make sure to let it dry for a minute or two if you plan on applying makeup afterward.If you're planning on applying primer on top, make sure that it's one that has ingredients that correspond well with the ones in this moisturizer and your skin type. Pairing these products appropriately effects the longevity of your makeup. And having said that, i think it's important to add that this product DOES have Dimethicone in it, which is not listed in the ingredients list above. I'm not sure if this silicone is something they added recently, altering the product, but makeup users, especially, should be aware of this. Because of this, i do not add a silicone primer with it as i've found that it contributes to me becoming oily faster.One last thing i'll add is that if possible, it's MUCH better to get this in-store at an Ulta or drug-store than on here. It's only $7 at Ulta and is a bit overpriced on here.

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: The package didn't have any protection and it honestly could've slid out of it during transit. It came with the product all over the bottle but the product itself seems to be good so far. The smell of it reminds me of baby wipes or something like that which is a little weird for me personally but if it helps my psoriasis I'm all for it.

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: Nice light scent, keeps skin hydrated for 24+ hours.Good for every day use and good value for money.

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: This is more about the shipping than the product. (Product is great, it works as advertised)This is my first time ordering this product through Amazon and I'm a tad disappointed with the fact that some of the lotion was pumped out of the bottle during shipment. I'm sure the slipping and sliding around in the box is the cause of this and I'm glad the bottle was in a separate bag since I would've had lotion over my other items if that wasn't the case. Overall, I just wish more padding was added to prevent this waste of lotion from occuring. Something to consider when future shipments of this product are being made.

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: The manufacturing I guess was made very poor you cannot use the pump to release the lotion so every time I use it I have to twist it and lotion gets everywhere on the floor. Hate that...

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: I like that the scent doesn’t linger that long. The lotion feels oily, but I suppose because of my sensitive, dry skin the oiliness of the lotion goes away fast.Downside: I have VERY dry skin, so it’s not effective for me, despite me using it multiple times a day, so probably for people who don’t have dry skin like me it works better for them.

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: I love this cream  . Great body moisturizer!

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: I love their body wash and lotion but overall the lotion is like heaven . its applies on my skin so smoothly i really suggest this brand if you have dry skin I always have dry hands so this helps and lock in moisture for all day.

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz

review: Perfect for sensitive skin and big size for great price. Target had this exact size for almost double the price... and this one came with a little body wash sample which smelled amazing and did not irritate my skin. Will be purchasing again 😍👍🏼

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion,Dry to Very Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream by Majestic Pure - Therapeutic Grade, Infused with Ceramides, for Acne Prone Skin Care - Fights breakouts and Fungus - Moisturizing, 8 oz
review: I found this cream to be very moisturizing with a very smooth texture and feel in your hands.I did find the scent to be very strong. I am a fan the Tea Tree smell. However, this one was too strong. It has a petroleum type smell to it.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream by Majestic Pure - Therapeutic Grade, Infused with Ceramides, for Acne Prone Skin Care - Fights breakouts and Fungus - Moisturizing, 8 oz
review: My boys are 18 and they have normal teenage acne.  This has really reduce the amount of breakouts they get, and shorten the time for those they do get.  I would highly recommend this.  If you are not familiar with the smell of tee tree oil, you might find this a negative, but I'm rating based on effectiveness, and not smell.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream by Majestic Pure - Therapeutic Grade, Infused with Ceramides, for Acne Prone Skin Care - Fights breakouts and Fungus - Moisturizing, 8 oz
review: This is a good face cream, if for no other reason than the inclusion of Tea Tree Oil.I've been using Tea Tree Oil in my cycling chamois cream for years. Let me tell you, it absolutely does help keep pores clean, cuts down on bacteria build up, clears skin and helps with inflammation.So, I was fairly certain this cream would at least be serviceable when I chose to review it.In practice, when used on my face, it definitely assists in keeping my skin feeling clean and cutting down on oil build up and bacteria, which is great to cut the chance of face issues.Also, this does a nice job with bags around the eyes. I would assume that's due to the anti inflammatory nature of many of the ingredients.The scent is not amazing, but it's not harsh or bad.Overall, this is a good cream for the face.Recommended4 starsCheers!

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream by Majestic Pure - Therapeutic Grade, Infused with Ceramides, for Acne Prone Skin Care - Fights breakouts and Fungus - Moisturizing, 8 oz
review: Before I start I should mention that on the package there is a comma between the 9th Ingredient Cetearyl Alcohol, and it looks like they straight up used Alcohol as the 10th ingredient, that should be corrected if its a mistake. No one wants that on their face. It also contains Petrolatum which I'm not a huge fan of.Now coming to the actual product, the foiled seal was hard to open, it got everywhere. But glad that part is over. Upon application the tea tree smell hits you hard, but diffuses quickly and absorbs fast into the skin. I like that it doesn't leave any sticky residue feeling on the face.I have also noticed my random breakouts aren't as frequent.Lets see!

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Green Tea, Oily Skin,  6.75 fl. oz.
review: Jar looked like it was scotch taped closed. When I opened it, it is half empty. I'm very disappointed.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Green Tea, Oily Skin,  6.75 fl. oz.
review: It's very moisturising. If you are sensitive to scent I would not purchase. I used it as a mask to see if my skin would react negatively. So far no breakouts. Skin was a tad bit red when I removed the product. Nothing too concerning.The scent is unfortunately my CON for being a bit strong for me. It's a very clean attractive scent. Not chemically,  I guess its like a clean botanical perfume. The price is awesome for the product. The consistency is thick and your skin just sucks it up instantly. Perfect for the fall/winter months ahead.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Green Tea, Oily Skin,  6.75 fl. oz.
review: Muy buen producto, agradable aroma, deja el rostro muy limpio y suave.Le pongo 3 estrellas por el pésimo embalaje ya que llegó regado y se perdió parte del producto.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Green Tea, Oily Skin,  6.75 fl. oz.
review: I used to buy this lotion at Ultra but thought I try it on Amazon this time and not very happy with what i received. Its look like someone been use it already.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Green Tea, Oily Skin,  6.75 fl. oz.
review: This product was obviously used then re-sold. It was sent to me with scotch tape holding the jar shut, and the jar was only half full. Waiting on my replacement jar.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Green Tea, Oily Skin,  6.75 fl. oz.
review: I just received my package and it looks like it’s been used. It was taped. 💀

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Green Tea, Oily Skin,  6.75 fl. oz.
review: I ordered this moisturizer and fell in love with it. It feels great on the skin, my face soaks it right up and no oily residue on the skin. It smells great. I turned right around and ordered 2 more jars. When i received them there was way less product in the jar than the first. There was so much less it looked like the jar had been half used. Not sure if it's been used or if i was just cheated. Other than that it's a wonderful moisturizer.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I bought this because I had previously purchased the neutrogena waterboost hydro gel, and aside from all of the hype about that product I did not like it. I have sensitive and oily skin and everytime I used it my face would burn. I bought this with high hopes it would work for me and it did!!! It is more of a liquid consistency but still a gel at the same time. It gets the job done, it was exactly what I was looking for in a moisturizer!

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I really like this product its not heavy, doesn't feel like sticky. It literally feels like you just put water on your face. It dries istantly which is a plus in my book. And the smell is light, like its not a potent perfume smell. Recommended by Sam.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I love this moisturizer. This is my second bottle and the first lasted 11 months, using two pumps per night every night.I have oily skin so I use a heavy duty cleanser and using this moisturizer after cleansing is so refreshing. It's light weight, not greasy and soaks into my skin quickly.I will continue to use this for the rest of my life lol.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Just enough moisture to not make me Oily

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Bueno

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Recomendado ✨Hidratación , seca rápido, el maquillaje luce perfecto. Es un precio accesible, me encanta, realmente hidrata

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Muy bueno

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Came with a weird black speck or insect inside the bottle.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I purchased this product at Safeway. I really dislike it.. I get an allergic reaction every time I tried using it. I started sneezing, and as soon as I wiped it off, it stopped. Mayne because it smells like a synthetic product. There is nothing natural about it, since it's petrol based, and it just coats your skin with this potent smelling layer, as it doesn't actually moisturize your skin.Also, I've researched that Loreal tests their products on animals, and it's horrible. Not only don they torture animals to make their products, their products still cause a bad reaction. I'd say stay away from this crap, it's bad for you and bad for animals, only good for Loreal pockets.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: So far I really like this product! I received it for free to try, and even though I've only used it a handful of times, it feels so good on my super dry spots and doesn't make my oily spots more shiny. It's super moisturizing and not overly thick like most moisturizers I've used. My skin practically eats it up...and it hasn't broken out! The only thing I didn't like about this was the overly strong scent, but that doesn't make it a deal breaker. Also, it didn't last 72 hours.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: The moisturizer is good but I'm able to use only 90% of the product because there is no way the pump pushes up the 10% of the remaining product. It's a mere waste of the moisturizer so I'm disappointed.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I bought for oily skin and it's fine because when using it on my face, dry the greasy areas immediately. I would not say that it moisturizes because it does not leave any kind of moisture. Its moisturizes with is light. It has a good smell and what I notice on my skin is that it refreshes it. From 1 to 10 would be a 9

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: No where in the short description did it say for OILY SKIN. Yet, when I got it, that's what it was. I have extremely dry skin...Should correct description for others

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: You can never go wrong with Neutrogena products/cosmetics. My acne-prone skin LOVES this light, non-greasy moisturizer that leaves me feeling refreshed. - I use it everyday, even when I'm not suffering any breakouts!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Please check the expiration date before using! I received an expired product!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I have been a Neutrogena user for nearly 11 years and they never seem to disappoint. I have been using this along with the alcohol free toner and a wash from another brand and my skin has been getting so much better. I really think it’s because of the salicylic acid in this product. Photo is after 1.5 weeks of use; used twice a day. Will buy again!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I first purchased this around September/October 2017 and I have to say that I really like this moisturizer. It smells nice (I don’t find the scent too overpowering/sweet like I’ve seen mentioned in other reviews) and it doesn’t feel oily on my skin. The pump is really nice because you can twist it closed, so you don’t have to worry about messes when you store the bottle for travel. I did take off one star though because I find that the formula is a bit weak when it comes to moisturizing on its own, so I usually mix it with a few drops of jojoba oil, and this combination has done a great job with softening and moisturizing my skin. I would definitely recommend this.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I love it, its really humected my face

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: My product arrived with the nozzle broken off

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Oh my god you guys DO NOT PUT THIS ON YOUR FACE IF YOU HAVE COMBINATION SKIN/DRY SKIN!!! I have oily and dry skin sometimes due to Minneapolis weather & this completely dried me out and gave me a horrible rash/break out.  Do not risk it.  I’ve been using products with salicylic acid for years but for some reason THIS product specifically broke me out into a rash that I’ve never had before.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: It’s really small and it smells bad

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Feels amazing& doesn’t leave my skin dry. The cap came broken. Please send over a new cap.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Opened the package to find the top snapped off. There also wasn't any sort of seal on it. Very disappointing.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I love how this absorbs into your skin and becomes so light that you dont even feel it! It does a great job moisturizing & lasts all day! My skin is clearer and brighter than ever! My period makes me get pesky pimples but with this I am clear all month long!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I honestly don't know if it will affect the product, but the bottle I received today (September 2017) has an expiration date of March 2017. Not crazy excited about that.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: llego  con  la tapa totalmente rota, eso me decepciona.  En cuanto al producto definitivamente no es igual,  tiene baja calidad,  este es la crema que acostumbro utilizar para mis problemas de la piel y me funciona excelente con excepción  de este último que compré, woaoo  baja calidad difieren color,  olor,  textura no creo que Original. No me gusta dar malas reseñas pero estoy muy decepcionada

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: It smells really good, it's easy to spread around, but I feel it's just okay. I do have REALLY dry skin and I feel like it could be more moisturizing. This might have been better for me to try out in the summer versus now when it's getting colder and making my skin even drier. I don't like to waste and it's not irritating my skin so far so I will continue using it but I'm unsure yet if I will buy again. I may have just gotten used to my matte lotion and since this doesn't have that effect I'm not used to it yet.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: One of the good moisturizer for acne prone scene.No breakouts no oily feelings, smell nice.Easy to carry size.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I love this must buy I'm so thankful for this and it last me for 4 month by using it ones a day every day

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Facial Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Pink Grapefruit Acne Fighting Face Lotion with Salicylic Acid to Treat Breakouts, Non Comedogenic, 4 fl. oz
review: Wonderful grapefruit smell n feels light on the skin. Not at all sticky. I like switching up acne lotions cuz if I stick w one for too long, it stops being effective. So I rotate acne lotions every few weeks.

product_name: Oil Free Facial Moisturizer for Oily Skin - By Natural Outcome Skincare - Watermelon & Aloe Vera Hydrating Lotion w/Hyaluronic Acid - 1.7 oz
review: Don't mind the smell, smells like watermelon. It's a light moisturizer but had an allergic reaction so def not sensitive skin friendly. My skin isn't usually sensitive, never had a reaction to any active ingredients so it must be the preservatives in it. Didn't actually realize till a couple weeks later since this is the last step in my routine. I often rub the excess on my hands and arms and was developing itchy rashes that would disappear after a few hours. But this has to be it since there's nothing new in my skin routine besides this. Unfortunately not sure if I can get my money back since the bottle is used now.

product_name: Olay Quench Body Lotion Ultra Moisture with Shea Butter and Vitamins E and B3, 20.2 oz (Pack of 2)
review: It wort the long wait. This as being my moisturizer for a while love it.Recommend

product_name: Olay Quench Body Lotion Ultra Moisture with Shea Butter and Vitamins E and B3, 20.2 oz (Pack of 2)
review: Arrived broken! Bag tore open and tops broke off and missing!

product_name: Olay Quench Body Lotion Ultra Moisture with Shea Butter and Vitamins E and B3, 20.2 oz (Pack of 2)
review: This used to be a nice lotion, now it smells really strong. The new strongly scented bottles seem to come with a purple top/pump, where the old extremely light scented one had a white top/pump.

product_name: Olay Quench Body Lotion Ultra Moisture with Shea Butter and Vitamins E and B3, 20.2 oz (Pack of 2)
review: Bottle caps were lose and lotion had leaked from both bottles. Will not order this item again by mail. Product is excellent but delivery by mail is awful.

product_name: Olay Quench Body Lotion Ultra Moisture with Shea Butter and Vitamins E and B3, 20.2 oz (Pack of 2)
review: I am very happy to continue shopping next time.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: The problem is the shape of the nozzle ..it’s not slated r curved down. When u pump it the lotion shoots straight out not in downward direction into ur hand. Because of that lotion shoots out on carpet or whatever is closet to nozzle.unless u cup ur hand around it. I ended up emptying out most of the lotion into another pump container.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: I love this product but it’s too small looks like sample and cost too much

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: Love it so i buy this a lot for my stock the smell so,good and good for my skin

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: Been using this lotion since it was called smooth sensations . It’s a great lotion . Tad greasy but that’s a good thing . Leaves skin soft with a healthy shine .

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: When shipped the bottle was not only broken, the label was completely crooked. Seems odd Nivea would allow a product to be produced and shipped like this.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: I received this lotion bottle and the pump was broken

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: Arrived broken, quite unfortunate since I’ve purchased products similar to this before and never had issues.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: The lotion itself is exactly what I expected, sadly the pump was damaged I assume in shipping

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: When I took the plastic off the the top around the pump was broken. I can't use the pump to pump my lotion out. 🙁

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: Looks like someone refill it.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: I received a open-box product. I recognized it because it come in a green plastic bag which is always for returned products . I cannot imagine what if  this product has been used by others and refill something inside. I am considering to return it.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: It works well at keeping my skin moisturized, especially if I remember to do it daily. It can feel a little slimy at times if you put too much on, but not as much as other lotions. It also has a nice, light scent. The lotion also doesn't irritate my slightly sensitive skin. The bottle is also very nice and it pumps easily and smoothly.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: It does leave my skin noticeably soft but it does have a old grandma smell, at least to me. It is smaller than I thought, but maybe I should have read the size more clearly. One latch on the cap was broken but nothing to worry about as long as I don't break the other.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: Overall one of my favorite go to lotions for this time of year on my skin is dismal dry. Little disappointed this arrived with a small hole. But these things happen as we all know. With the thoughtful packaging that Amazon does all my other items were safe and dry.Will continue to keep buying.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: When I received this lotion I was really excited to try it on. When I first opened the package I saw that the body lotion leaked a little bit. It wasn't much so it's not a real issue.I like that this lotion is slightly scented so you still can use your perfume. I have dry skin and this body lotion helps make my skin soft. I like that this lotion absorbs really fast and is not greasy.I will buy again! My favorite body lotion so far.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: I didn't receive my full order I received 1 lil small bottle 2.5 oz. wheres the rest of my bottles

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: Nivea is the only lotion I use and this specific one, is THE BEST out of their entire line. One, the lotion smells great. It's not a strong overwhelming scent. Two, it hydrates your skin. It smooths your skin and makes it soft, and leaves it hydrated all day. One time I made the mistake of purchasing the dark blue bottle (almond oil) and the formula was way too rich and greasy. This one is perfect. I love it. I use it on my entire body, face included.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 2.5 fl. oz. Bottle (Pack of 6)
review: For years I've used Nivea Smooth Daily Moisture Body Lotion. I don't know what Nivea did but the new product doesn't last for 48 hours. Very disappointed.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: This product burned my face. It is the only new skincare item I've added to my regimen. Went for a walk in the morning, so it wouldn't be hot, and it was 80% covered in shade. 30 mins in and it felt like my face was on fire. My face was swollen and bright red. The picture above is 36hrs later...After multiple cold water compresses, Advil and Benadryl for the reaction and inflammation.I'm not sure how clear it is in the picture, but my under eye /cheek area is still so irritated and swollen that you can see a visible crease/line above that area.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: This cream is not a moisturizer, it has the same texture as any sunscreen cream would have. It is very white and though my skin is super white it still doesn’t work.I compared two moisturizing creams, this one and avene. I like the texture of avene better. This cream does not blend into the skin. Really bad.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I have been liking the product they got but the last one I received from amazon the pump did not work, even though i must have pumped like 100 times and still no lotion coming out. I checked the inside and looks like it only goes up half way and stuck there. Had to use the old lotion’s top to use for the new one.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: First of all, I have tan skin. When I applied this product I was scared that it would leave a white film over my face but it didn’t. I DID HAVE TO WORK WITH IT THOUGH. Applying it initially does leave white streaks. Although, I learned that if I apply it on regularly and let it sit on my face for a few minutes, I could blend out those white streaks. I look crazy at first but it is blend-able. I don’t know if it’s good for a sunscreen to be blended out, so that is up to your interpretation. Also, I have no idea if this technique would work on darker skin than mine.Secondly, I have dry and sensitive skin. On my skin it looks “oily” or “shiny” or maybe even “dewy”, but I don’t mind because I rarely see my skin dewy. Also, my skin just sucks it right up after 15-20 minutes. I don’t mind this product and I would buy it again because it does make my skin feel super moisturized.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I love this moisturizer because it goes on smoothly and doesn’t leave a greasy or oily feeling behind! It made my skin soft and I don’t need to use a separate sunscreen so I’m quite satisfied with it. It came dermatologist recommended and it’s perfect for the winter time when my skin gets dry! The only thing I don’t like is it sometimes peels off when I apply it first under my makeup and I think it’s because of the sunscreen that’s in it. However it does moisturize pretty well and doesn’t burn when applied to dry skin or sensitive under eyes area

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I have been using the daily moisturizing face and body lotion on my face. When I found this product specifically for the face including sunscreen I decided to give it a try. I really wanted to like it. However, it comes out much thicker than the daily moisturizing lotion, took longer to rub it in so you couldn’t see the white, and it made my skin feel tight and itchy. Will be returning this and going back to the daily moisturizing product.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: Product arrived open, out of its individual box, and the lotion was all over the packaging and other items in it too.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: Box was damaged and looked like it was opened.  Worried that it was used. No problems with product itself

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: Box and bottle are not guaranteed !

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: This did not work for me at all. My skin is normally not fussy or sensitive but this gave me a rash on my face and neck after 1 use. It was subtle the first day but on the 2nd day it was so bad my face felt like it was on fire. I had to wash my face at work to get it off. I know all products dont act the same on every person so I'm not trying to discourage anyone from trying it...I just wanted to share my experience incase others had it too.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: This product, while definitely moisturizing, easy on sensitive skin, and a good sunscreen, is a terrible moisturizer for under your makeup. The moisturizer pills even after the product sinks in. Leaves a white residue on the face and peels away in some white gunk.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I have been using the Cerave ultra-light facial moisturizer on a daily basis. I just ran out and made the mistake of ordering this to replace it. It is not the same (my mistake) and made me breakout like crazy after just two days of using it in the AM. I do get occasional cystic acne on my chin or cheeks but I have never had a product make me breakout this way. I will not be using this on my face again. The picture is from Tuesday. I received the product on Sunday and started using it Monday.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: Wowwww!!!For the last year I was using Cetaphil (oil control) moisturizer with spf and it would do a decent job in terms of moisturizing and sun protection it seemed like it only exasperated the oil on my face and come 5pm end of the work day you could see your reflection in my face.I was so blown away by the cereve cleansing water and night cream I figured I needed to ditch the ceraphil day moisturizer with spf and try the am moisturizer with spf. Right away I noticed it’s wayyyyyy less oily and has more of matte finish. It controls oil throughout the day and it’s wonderful. If you have dry skin though you may find it’s a little too lightweight. After using the cleaning water, day cream and night cream I’ve noticed drastic improvements in my skin and with this NC summer heat humidity these are the only products touching my face and I have had zero breakouts or issues.Cereve makes incredible products and is worth every penny seriously! If you have oily or combination skin these products are super lightweight and won’t clog your pores or break you out and if you live in the south you need products like this. Use the entire line though you’ll notice even better results.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I had high hopes for this. I’m starting to use Retin A and needed a good sunblock. I go to work at 5:30 am so I was planning to just use this on the weekends, and use something else for when I leave work. Anyways- first day I felt it was ok. I was rubbing it in nice and good- or so I thought, until i started to feel it balling up under my fingertips. So you can’t really rub it in good. It’s kiie you have to quickly slather it on and that’s it. Now, after only 2 uses I have a rash on my face and neck. You can kinda see in ge picture that there are just bumps all over my face. So my skin is too sensitive for this. This is the only new thing I added to my facecare regimen. I do like the Cera Ve PM lotion.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: I would call this as Magic Potion! It really works to help clear up my stubborn subclinical acne which i had been fighting for over a year now. I’ve tried so many different things from doctors’ prescription, high end skin care, to drug store stuffs but always end with no luck.But Neutralyze moisturizer safe my life!! I still have some smaller acne but at least a lotttt better than before (i’ve attached my before after picts) and my skin tone is a lot more even.Im kinda curious about the 3 steps kit - but maybe i’ll just wait n see if i needed the kit.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: Recently I found out I was allergic to  benzyl peroxide, and it caused me to break out in hives. With that being said, I needed to find an acne cream that didn’t contain that ingredient, which this product didn’t! I have fallen so in love with this product and the results I have gotten from it. Will continue to use and recommend to others!

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: I've had adult acne on my face and my back for yrs once I stopped hormonal birth control and it's been a struggle to find something that would get rid of it..I've tried so many products, but this..this is the one!! It's literally transformed my skin..the redness, breakouts, irritation-all 75% clearer/better within 2.5 wks of use, not only on my face, but my back as well! I will def continue to be a lifetime customer!Attached pics-pink tank top is night #1, yellow tank top is night #17

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: For many years I worked for a moisturizer that did not cause or aggregate acne.  The Neutralyze Renewal Complex is superior on every single level. Does not cause acne, in fact, it prohibits at acne from forming. The skin is so clear - I have not seen my skin this clear in very long time.  Also I am 47 years old and I have wrinkles and this is anti-aging.  Also I put it and it evaporates right away, however my skin feels very moisturized. So my skin feels a little bit brighter. And, you get to much product for only $17.  Sorry, my writing is not very good because I had a stroke.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: I had my doubts because the bottle said its for anti aging but online it said for acne. I usually don't get acne but yesterday i got a big painful one. I applied this cream and the next morning the pimple had reduced in size quite significantly. So far it works great!

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: First, make note that this serum/moisturizer does NOT contain any SPF whatsoever, and in fact advises you to avoid the sun or use your own sunblock in addition to this moisturizer, ugh. I decided no biggie, not a sunbather, suppose to avoid the sun anyway, so I proceeded with use.I mainly purchased this product because of it’s statement regarding acne control and salicylic acid.The first 2 times I used this I liked the consistency and application. You do not need a lot, and it dries quickly, gives your face a nice glow, but not shiny. It felt kinda refreshing putting it on after my face wash freshly washed. I never had any issues with my face drying out. Instead, it seemed to make my face even oilier and it definitely clogged my pores!!  I didn’t believe it was this neutralizer until after applying early one morning last week with a semi clear face, and later that evening my boyfriend came home and asked me if I had a rash!!  I looked in the bathroom mirror and my face was starting to break out all over my lower cheeks!  By the morning, I had little white heads all over my cheeks, forehead, chin, and even spots on my neck. When I washed my face off I could feel a slimy residue left behind from the moisturizer I applied the night before. This happened a few more times before I realized, obviously ITS CLOGGING MY PORES!!!!I do not recommend purchasing this product. At least, not if you are between the ages of 35-50 yrs.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: Very light lotion, and odorless, after 2 week of daily use, 2x per day, acne is sorta in control however I am still not completely clear. but I will continue to use it. I am also using this along with the Neutralyze pad, and it seems like they are working just fine. Pictures are showing result after using the product for 2 weeks.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: Blue goopy stuff comes out frequently while using as you can see in the picture. ALSO the smell is not something I can put up with anymore. It slightly smells like several things: spoiled milk, the inside of an instrument case, the lumber section at lowes, or a mildewed basement. It’s pungent, musty, and sour. The smell was bearable for 2 months of using, but now I’m over it.Also this product is sticky on the face. My pillow sticks to my face well after it has dried. Hours after applying, the face will appear very oily/greasy and not clean... it’s not actually oily, it just appears that way. Deff not a good look if you’re with friends or out somewhere.I’ll up the stars if the seller tells me the smell and blue chunks are normal.. or if the seller says I have a damaged product and offers a refund.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: Made my acne worse?? I bought this because I use salicylic acid every day on my face, but it was getting dried out. I have random spots of acne throughout the month but nothing too major.In 14 days, my acne got significant worse with MANY more breakouts in clusters and the pimples I did have got worse.Included two photos. Day I started and the day I stopped...Pretty sure the excellent  reviews are thanks to the free product they offer 🙃

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: So as we all know, it’s quarantine right now and I decided to give myself bangs lol. And one thing they don’t tell you is how bangs can make you break out on your forehead especially if you workout, regardless of whether or not you washed your face afterwards. After never having this many pimples on my forehead, I panicked and settled and buying this since my usual cream was out of stock, and wow. I DID NOT think it would be this amazing, it got rid of those pesky pimples all over my forehead and face, and it also reduces scarring which was amazing. I used it along with the Nixa Acne Wash and it worked great. I even recommended it to a friend who has chest and back acne, and it works great for her too! Very, very pleased with my purchase.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: I adore this product. I’ve been having acne for  a really long time especially those big ones that appear under the skin and you just can’t squeeze. As soon as I started to use the Neutralyze product I notice that not only my acne was disappearing, but it also prevent it from appearing again. I have combined skin type and sometimes it gets really oily on my T-zone, but when I use the product my skin has that matte effect and also feels light on the face. I highly recommend to be used in the morning and night at the first week (twice a day) and then reduce to once a week ( night ). This is how I use it now and won’t think about replacing it with another product ever.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: I absolutely love this product! It’s super lightweight and non-greasy, which is perfect for my acne prone skin. I’ve been using this product every night, and so far I’ve seen decent improvement on my skin. I haven’t felt any burning sensations or noticed any breakouts so far, which is pretty nice since I do have sensitive skin as well. Overall, I definitely would recommend this product and would possibly buy another one as well.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: I used to feel a little dry with the 3 step, but thismoisturizer cream helps balance my skin. Really a good product.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: After trying multiple products to treat my acne issues, I can assure you that this b is the best product on the market right now. My skin feels better and I look younger. Try it, believe me, you won’t regret it.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: Decided to go on a quarantine skin care glo up and this worked wonders. I have very oily skin that tends to be textured and on the regular has little red bumps and some white heads. I only use this cream at night, it is a little drying and I can feel my skin get tight. I’m careful not to use it under my eyes. After a couple of days with consistent use I saw a great improvement in my skin.

product_name: Neutralyze Renewal Complex | Maximum Strength Anti Acne + Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream With Time-Released 2% Salicylic Acid + 1% Mandelic Acid + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (3.4 oz)
review: HOLY DIFFERENCE! The photo says it all! 30 days of use and my redness is completely gone, acne has decreased, and even scars are starting to fade! When I bought this I had no idea they offered a whole regimen. I’ll definitely be trying everything now! I’m in love with the results so far!

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: 5/5 ALL THE WAY! I have acne-prone VERY oily skin! When i first applied this. It wasn't sticky at all and takes about 1-2 min to completely absorb into my skin! But once it dries down. It is MATTE! Believe me when i say this is GREAT. I have tried over 10 different moisturizer from drugstore to 60 dollars ones and all seems to be too sticky or leave my skin very oily! This is a miracle! Although i wish i would get more products because I can imagine I'd be running out of this in just 1 month. If you have oily skin and is acne prone. This is going a MIRACLE WORKER for you. This is my 1st week of using this moisturizer and it has not broken me out yet which is another plus! TOTALLY RECOMMEND to any of my oily skin gals out there!

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: I ordered this product with several other prime items and when it came the La Roche-Posay moisturizer box was ripped open with no moisturizer inside. Absolutely unacceptable for an expensive beauty product that one would expect to be reliable. Never buying again!!!!!!

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: Absolutely love this! I have oily/combination skin and it’s the only moisturizer I have tried that is perfect for my skin. I love the lightweight feel to it and it leaves the skin feeling good and clean and not clogged.It’s pretty expensive but for me it is worth the money.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: Box came ripped product isn’t sealed like other LaRoche posay products I received with my premium delivery.. How am I supposed to use this in my face with out having the doubt my product has being tampered/ used.  Unacceptable!!!

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: I ordered this product with several other prime items and when it came the La Roche-Posay moisturizer box was ripped open with no moisturizer inside. Absolutely unacceptable for an expensive product that one would expect to be reliable. 🤬

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: It was damaged and opened

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: The product was open and damaged and you can't return it.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Face Moisturizer, 1.35 Fl Oz
review: This is supposed to be at Gel moisturizer this helps with the acne solution but it does not it makes your skin worse

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I bought this product on accident( I meant to get the Cetaphil facial cleanser) but I don't REGRET it My skin has cleared up so much just from this soap,  it makes my face feel sof and doesn't dry it out so when I follow up with my serum or Rose water and my moisturizer my face feels refreshed and clean.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I am a long time prime member and had this on my rather large Subscribe and Save for this month.  I thought it seemed AWFULLY SMALL and so I double checked my order & sure enough I was CHARGED for the my ounce bottle, but only RECEIVED one 8oz container. Also, the whole order was just thrown in a way-too-big box (an increasingly inconvenience, as we only have room for "so much" recyclable material storage and/or garbage as last resort. The tape on this big box was so loose it fell apart as I lifted it from my porch. I feel like Amazon employees are just having a working strike and doing whatever the heck nowadays LOL 😂 The box pickers are definitely choosing oversized boxes! We recently got a medium pouch of dog food & it came in the size box you would get if you bought a brand new PRINTER with all the styrofoam etc.  SUCH A WASTE. And THE KICKER? I can't complain about it rn while thinking abt it cuz it still shows as being in progress in Kentucky (I'm in Arizona & it arrived today!)... Pretty darn inconvenient. It's just lotion. Smh...

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This product seems to be working fine on my face (I haven't had it for very long, will update later) but when I received this along with other purchases from Amazon the bottle was open and had spilled all over inside of the box, everything was sticky and the bottle had already had about a 5th emptied. It seems like an okay product, however, the packaging was not secure.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: After recently getting on a new birth control, I have suddenly been breaking out with terrible, horrible cystic acne. My oily, sensitive, acne-ridden skin needed help - IMMEDIATELY!This product cured my skin and was my complete savior. My skin was red and bumpy and painful. But now, after two months of using this in the morning and at night, my skin has gone back to how it was before.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This facial cleanser was recommended by my dermatologist when I went on accutane a year ago and I haven’t used anything else to wash my face since. It’s super gentle, doesn’t dry out your skin, and you only need a little bit because it foams. I noticed it was quite a bit cheaper on amazon than at Target and have been ordering them from amazon since. The bottle lasts forever.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Not something to buy shipped. The product leaked all over the bag and box.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Love this stuff, just started using it and it makes my skin feel so refreshed!

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary

The CeraVe moisturizer (packaged with the cleanser) had been wrapped securely in a plastic bag.  I like the cleanser and it deserves 5 stars, but my container was partially emptied by the time I received it, so I had to lower the rating.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 16 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I wanna cry!! I can’t even tell u how much this helped me!  I use this and with benzoyl peroxide and a spin brush and it changed my life!!! I have always been looked upon for great skin but when I was hormonal and stressing coz of personal isssurs all his acne started occurring! I tried so many things. Nothing worked in fact it got worse. and I do have cystic acne.. my doc prescribed something and it still didn’t work so I have to give this a go and let me tell u.. I won’t go back!!!!

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I have severe combination skin. My cheeks will look like an oil slick and my forehead will be peeling it's so dry. This product is a life saver! Fair warning it smells like a mosquito candle because of the tea tree oil, but it works. The 4 huge cystic acne zits I had 3 days ago are already dried up and healing! Usually takes them weeks to go away. Cheeks are not oily anymore and my forehead isn't peeling. I used this in combination with the face wash...also stinky.Update: it's been 2 months! AMAZING!!! 2nd photo is update

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I started struggling with breakouts about 2 years ago.  I tried everything, from high end products to homemade masks, clay, korean masks, EVERYTHING! My breakouts were painful, lasted for weeks, full of puss. There were no areas of my face off limits. About 6 months ago I started to get them on my cheeks, leaving scars behind. I gave up and got used to them. With the acne came a permanent redness to my face I could only hide with makeup.  I gave this a try because of the reviews.  My face absolutely loves it. Can't really describe it other than this cream gives my face everything it needs.  My huge pumples are gone. My chin is clear, my redness is gone. Works perfectlywith make up.  It doesn't build up. Twice a day and my skin feels incredible right away.  Seeing my skin like this gives me a huge incentive to work for a better routine. If I get a spot i use the clean and clear corrector. By the next morning it's mostly gone. I am currently using humane acne wash.  But I'm looking to add this brand's wash since humane is too harsh for washing 2x a day.  Plus is mostly medication for acne. But I'm sure I found the cream I will use for the rest of my life.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I bought this for cystic acne from facial candida from long-term antibiotic use. The caprylic triglyceride, among other ingredients, is no doubt the reason this has worked so great for me, bc it kills the candida topically.  Candida acne always has tiny dark (greenish?!👽) bumps that won't budge no matter what, like they're embedded in the skin; but guess what, after applying a thick layer of this product overnight, they came right off when I washed my face!But to back up, I used this product along with the era organics face wash for acne for four weeks and my cystic acne kept getting worse and more painful, but that's because I wasnt using it right!I would wash my face, let it sit for 30 sec, and then put on the moisturizer, gently rubbing it in till there were no more white streaks.  The cysts all over my face were so painful that it hurt to rub the moisturizer in, and i was pretty disappointed that I wasnt getting results like other reviewers.Then I noticed that the face wash was 3/4 gone and the moisturizer was only half gone; and the lightbulb went off, maybe I'm not using enough moisturizer! So I started applying moisturizer generously so that there were still white streaks all over my face. On top of that, I used a cotton swab to completely cover each zit and cyst with the moisturizer, and then just left it, all night and all day (I work from home). Most of it absorbs into the skin, leaving just the extra on each blemish visible, as in pics.On day two of this routine, I was shocked that the biggest cyst was reduced in size by half... Was previously .5in diameter and stuck off face a quarter inch, no joke.Other things I did to help my face during these 4 days wasleave face wash on face longer before washing off, i.e., 1 min instead of 30 sec.cut out almost all sugar and alsoquit using toner that had alcohol...I switched to thayers brand toner which noticeablely improved redness and inflammation from the acne overnight.Apply bentonite clay mask to cysts every other day (cyst busting mask secret is to mix bentonite clay with organic coconut oil, it really does reduce the cyst and calm it down).Wash face once a day, my skin is too sensitive for twice a day.Pics are from day 4 of this routine, I can't believe how nice my skin is in less than a wk. I used to have tiny itchy bumps e.v.e.r.w.h.e.r.e., and big honking cysts that were fire engine red... they're now on the way out, thanks to the generous application of this product!  Also my whole chin area was like one big painful cyst, almost as red as my lips lol, and you can see in the pics it's practically normal.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I am concerned that the product I received has already been used. I received this face cream today and found that it was unsealed, and a large portion of its contents appear to be missing. When compared to other customers' image reviews of the item, the amount of product I received is significantly less. Theirs is brimming to the top, while mine is about half full. (Note: It was on its side, so the contents appear even closer to the top than they actually are, as it has not leveled fully. It should be filled to the top on both sides, but there is a huge gap instead. Even when leveled, it is about an inch from the top.) I was very excited to use this product, but I do not feel comfortable using an unsealed and half empty container, especially since the jar is already tiny.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: This lotion is terrific. I started using it about a year and a half ago when I got hit with terrible adult acne. This is not the only product I use, but it has played a crucial role in the process of clearing my skin.I have combination skin, very oily and very dry. This lotion moisturizes the dry skin while taming the oil. It sits well under foundation and feels so light and airy.I will never use another lotion for my face again! One bottle usually lasts me for about 3-4 months, using it once daily. This is truly an awesome product that I suggest to everyone!The picture is the difference of about 4-5 months of using this product.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: Another try at a moisturizer for my stubborn face. Having both sensitive skin and rosacea, it's difficult to find something that actually works and feels good. So far, I like this product. I don't mind the smell of tee tree oil, but that might be the downside if you do. Personally it's refreshing to me. When I use this product I can tell the difference between a moisturizer made with natural ingredients, and one that is made up of chemicals with names I don't even know. My skin soaks up this moisturizer really well and just a little bit leaves my face feeling smooth, not oily, and not too dry.The downside for me - pricey for a small container. That's how it is buying organic products most of the time, but I think it is worth it. Considering it really only takes a small amount to work, for one person it should last a while. I'm sure I will buy again. Thank you EraOrganics!

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: Day 5 and seeing results have no new breakouts and old ones are clearing up. I am Almost 40 and breakout worse than most teenagers. This stuff is definitely working well for my overly oily skin. Doesn’t smell super strong like some reviews claim. I use it twice a day

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: one jar came  broken jar, and tiny pieces inside the cream. I would like to receive the money backfor one jar

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I have NEVER found a product that works for me quite like this one. My face is so darn dry BUT EXTREMELY OILY. My under eyes flake and my t zone drowns in oil trying to moisturize itself. I have mild acne and sensitive eczema prone skin. After reading all these positive reviews, I decided to give it a shot.The FIRST day I try this bad boy out I immediately saw a difference. Less oil production and my face feels moisturized with absolutely no irritation. I’ve also bought the tea tree oil cleanser and this is the pair you need. If you have oily dehydrated sensitive skin, THIS IS FOR YOU!!

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: Yeah, I like this lotion. It didn’t knock my socks off like I was hoping it would after reading a lot of the reviews. But it is nice. It smells like tea tree oil, which I like. It’s not an overwhelming scent. I like how it feels- kind of luxuriously rich but it goes on so cleanly and light. And I do actually think it might be helping with my very oily complexion problem. I’m not positive about whether or not I’ll buy this again but it is pretty good.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: If I could give this 0 stars, I would. Don't bother wasting your money.Firstly, the outside of the bottle is just gross, there was dried cream on the lid and the outside.The cream came in unsealed. As soon as I twisted the tip off, the seal came loose so I don't trust using it.The inside of the bottle is already half gone so now I have even less for my money but it doesn't matter cause I'm going to get rid of this. No point in having something unsealed and half used.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I have been getting this exact product for about a year, and then this last bottle came and is NOT the same. I had a massive allergic reaction around my eyes and eyelids.Do not to purchase!! Not the real stuff

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
