review: I love this tea tree face cream!☺I have tried so many face creams but honestly this is the first time when I'm 100% satisfied.Even if I don't use it daily,it still helps.The skin looks healthy and clean since I use this face cream.I recommend this product to anyone and specially for those who have issues with acne!

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I use this lotion at night and also under my make up. It tingles a little bit at first but I feel like that indicates it's anti acne properties. Feels like it moisturizers my skin well, and it smells really good. A little smaller than expected but I probably didn't read the description properly. Would order again

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: Small bottle, it feels so good on my skin that I like to put a lot on. I bought this two months ago and not I’m writing a review, making sure I didn’t have a reaction.I have sensitive, acne prone skin and lots of allergies. I love this stuff. It feels great and works beautifully.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I have oily skin and this cream made me breakout  and get small red pimples That i never saw in my life!it’s not even a moisturizer it sets on face like a mask and peel after dry, it’s very irritating and harsh to the skin!

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: Just got this.  Opened it, felt a sharp object pierce my thumb.  A huge chunk of the glass was broken off and a shard cut me.

product_name: Tea Tree Oil Face Cream - For Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care Natural & Organic Facial Moisturizer with 7X Ingredients For Rosacea, Cystic Acne, Blackheads & Redness 2oz Era-Organics
review: I got this product a week ago and it's amazing! My skin looks so much better after using it in the morning before putting on makeup and at night before bed. My redness is starting to go away as well as my acne. My pores are much smaller and I'm seeing less blackheads. Before, I had dry patches and flaky skin and now its smoothed out and no longer dry. I'm in love with this face cream! You wont regret buying this!

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: This is my FAVORITE moisturizer but I must have gotten a bad bottle. I ordered the sensitive skin complete moisturizer (first time buying it online) and was extremely disappointed. The packaging looks like the label was printed at home and the lotion actually smelled like chlorine. I am SUPER UNHAPPY. Will not be buying again online and would really like a refund.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I think they’ve changed the formula and the bottle. I bought it and the label was different and it smelled differently. I bought another bottle from the store thinking i received a bad bottle but it was the same thing. i think the company is changing it up and i do not like the new formula. It messed with my skin and I am no longer going to use Olay for face lotion.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: It has been and will be our to go moisturizer. We have been using this for years now and does a great job. Tried many others but they would be either too oily or won’t keep the skin moisturized for long.This does a balanced job and best part is this is not oily. However, won’t suggest this for sun protection. Sunscreen is mandatory along with this too, especially in phoenix where we live.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I have the bottle I have that I've been buying from the store for years. This doesn't smell like it at all and it goes on and feels horribly on my skin. This is not even the same product. I'm definitely going to start being more cautious when seeing good reviews on Amazon. It doesn't even have the same active ingredients. This should be illegal.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I do not believe this is an actual Olay product. The bottle is not like the bottle I purchased at the store.  There is no smell to the product, the consistency is watery.  I'm throwing it away and going to buy the real product locally.  Product bought from Amazon is on the left.  Notice the label difference.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: This is my Holy Grail moisturizer! My grandmother swears by Olay, and I really can't blame her. I have very sensitive skin and can confidently wear this without worrying about break outs. It works very well under makeup too!

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I love this product. Not greasy and it moisturizer. I love that it has SPF - especially for this Floridian. I have oily skin so I definitely look for a non-greasy product.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I've used Oil of Olay every day since I was in my 20's. I'm now 57. People think I'm at least 15 years younger.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I love this lotion but the option chosen was Older Version Pack of 2. This is a single bottle, not a pack of 2. Love the product but this description is false. You are purchasing a single 4oz bottle.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I've called it "Oil of Old Lady" for ever.....as that's how long I've used it. Unfortunately several years back I found it had sky rocketed in cost, thus diverted to another brand......when the tone of my skin began to reflect the difference...I found better costs and now feel back in condition.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: This is NOT actual Olay Complete. This is a (badly done) knock off. The bottle is a phony imitation - and not even good. Description on the bottle is totally different. Font is not the actual font. The lotion is totally different. So disappointing. Attached is a picture of the bottle I received from Amazon on the RIGHT and the real Olay Complete on the LEFT.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I don’t think this is actually Oil of Olay. Packaging and labeling is different then what I have gotten in the past. I tried googling images to make sure they didn’t change their packaging but couldn’t find images with these labels. I would suggest ordering from some where else. Who knows what is actually in these bottles.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: They changed the print on the bottle and now it looks like a knockoff, but it’s the same lotion as before. Best lotion!

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I dont think this is true Oil of Olay product. My face has been breaking out like crazy this past week even though I've been using this product for years. I just noticed the labeling randomly and it is NOT legit. I requested a refund immediately. DO NOT BUY. I attached a picture of my product and a screenshot of what it SHOULD look like.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: First, I’m a long time user and fan of this product -it is my daily moisturizer- I have combination skin and this works well for me.However I wanted to note that I just received the product from Amazon and the bottle looks different than in the past. I know packages get updated but I don’t think that’s the case bc the old image is on the Olay website and other websites that sell it. I can’t help but wonder if I got scammed by an Amazon 3rd party and didn’t know it. See the photo - the left is the bottle I anticipated getting and the right bottle is what I received.Could be paranoid but wanted to mention it. Again, love the product.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: It is what I was looking for! I'm a man and I always have a hard time in finding suitable daily mousturizer because some of them I bought made my face extremely white like flour. I hate it. BUT! The reason why I love this item is that it makes my face a little bit bright and not so much oily and greasy. I'm assure that I'll buy it again.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: This product appears to be counterfeit. I have bought this product in the past and been very happy, but new bottles have no color graphics, Olay logo, lot number, or expiration date. Arrived in genuine boxes, but bottles do not appear to be genuine product. Do not risk buying.Attached pictures: Bottom with color graphics and logo is genuine product. Right is this product.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I'm a oil of olay fan since I was 15yrs old, I'm 41 now. Oil of olay is the only moistuizer I can use. Love it.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: Product not as advertised and appeared to be a knock off. Bottle and box look different than real product i am familiar with in stores. Sticker label looks hand printed and is off center on both bottles I received.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin, 6.0 fl oz (Pack of 2)
review: I love Olay products but this one doesn't moisturizer as much as some of their creams or lotions. It's a little heavy but when it dries, my skin doesn't feel moisturized. I will probably only use it on days that will be spent in outside since I can use it as a sunblock. Also, it doesn't smell particularly good. Overall, it's not up to play standards.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: This product works well. I have somewhat sensitive skin but have had no issues with reactions or breakouts using it.First time I used it, I was impressed with how well my skin absorbed the lotion/cream and left no greasy shiny look to it. About 10 minutes later I felt a tightening/firming feeling as it dried.I have tried similar men's Neutrogena products but will buy this one again. Its a small container but appears to be quite a bit of product inside and a little goes a long ways.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Love this product! As an Aesthetician I always try new things. So I gave this cream a shot. It had me at go. It really firms the skin and has all the go to ingredients that you want in an anti aging cream. But, does not irritate and is light. It’s my new favorite. I like it so much I may get the eye cream they make. This is a solid 5 star product.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: I wanted to use it a while before reviewing. Love this light cream. Moisturizes and has minimized my laugh and smile lines. Smells great too..

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Great product! Definitely worth it!

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: This does NOT have retinol. It has retynil (Vit. A) which is mush less potent. 2 stars off for false advertising, otherwise it’s fine.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Does just what it says it will, completely hydrates your skin in one application without feeling greasy. It absorbs quickly & is a great basic moisturizer. Definitely a keeper in your skincare regime!  Leaves my face feeling GLOWY. I use it twice daily and will never ever go without this.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: There are many creams like this on the market now, and this one has more ingredients in it than is usual, which is why it's somewhat expensive (though you can get one free bottle after purchase as a promo).  The scent is neutral, and it did not cause me to breakout, which can happen sometimes.  Helps with overall skin "glow".

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: I was pretty surprize how nice it smells, and after washing my face, I put it on and wow this is nice. Now I have to get my husband one before he moves in on mine. The moist feeling I get is undescrible. Thank you.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: I was using this because a friend of mine recommended it and let me try one of his for a months and it has made such an impact on my skin! Love how light the item is and how it truly feel refreshing on your face and isn’t a real thick texture. I have noticed less pronounced wrinkles and my skin has a younger glow to it.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: The plastic seal is still intact but it is leaking! It took long time before I got the product and then i got this leaking! So disappointed

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: These moisturizer is very light. It have a ok scent . I prefer no scent when it come to my face.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Product applied extremely smooth, non greasy,  great for those my age looking to reduce fine lines,  dry facial skin, baggy eyes.Great product.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Veryyy light and non oilyish. I felt firmer after a few days really a couple applications. Small but was worth the money

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Works perfect

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: This is a small jar.  2 oz but it doesn’t take much. Nice clean fragrance and not greasy  Makes your skin feel amazing. Soft and smooth.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: After just a couple days, I love this product. It's a perfect consistency and goes on so smoothly, not sticky or tacky. It just glides on...makes you want to do your whole body. It feels so good, I'm going to order another jar right now!

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: I'm 41, no problems with my age.... Great moisturizer, like I just had a facial. I have that Fitzpatrick skin and this is so calm and soothing. I definitely intend on reordering! Cheap, not over priced and genuine! People think I'm in my late early 30's so this will help! Thanks, if you want to take care of your skin guys go with this!

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Needed a new moisturizer for my face and saw great reviews and decided to try this. I've used it for a little over a month now so I can provide a honest review. The package is small and I thought that it will be gone in no time but I was wrong. The picture you see is how much left after a month (like new). I dab a bit in the morning on both cheeks, forehead and chin and it keeps my face hydrated during the day. It doesn't make my face breakout like some other creams do. This product does what it says it does. It will smooth (not remove) fine lines and I've noticed that on my forehead and around my eyes. My dw says that my face is smooth and not greasy/oily. I really like this cream, it's a bit pricer then your typical Neutrogena but then it's not crazy expensive like my wife's Lancome! Thing is this worked for me. Thank you

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: Have been using this for about a week. I am already getting compliments that there is something different about my face. It gives the appearance that my face is a little younger that it actually is which has really been a confidence booster for me. Getting a few compliments that people think I don’t even look nearly forty bout early thirties. Once girl thought I was in my late twenties. Very light weight product. No smell. I don’t have a greasy face at the end of the day and hasn’t caused any breaking out. Pores appear shrunk and smaller. Also helped with the bagginess around my eyes and appears to help lighten up my circles a little bit. Would recommend to anyone wanting a all in one face product. Have tried other lines but required multiple products to achieve the same results. Great product to look good and the price point makes it an easy sell.

product_name: Men's Anti Aging Face Cream Moisturizer - Premium Skin Care for Men with Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Fast Anti-Age Effect Day & Night - Wrinkle Free Facial Men Moisturizer 2Oz
review: I was given the chance to review this product, but I will be honest in my assessment. I found the cream easy to apply, no scent (which I like) but most of all it seems to work. I've had it for a few days and I can already see a difference.  Because of my profession, looking my best is a requirement and I'm always on the lookout for good quality skin care products, and Wilder's is now a part of that regimen.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: I ordered Brickell Men’s Purifying Face Wash after seeing it pop up on a search. I saw that it was well reviewed so I decided to give it a try. Sometimes products have fake reviews but I saw that the wash is made with quality ingredients so I gave it a go. When I received the face wash I compared it to the face wash I have been using for the last year.I was really happy to see that the Brickell Face Wash has less ingredient and every ingredient is clarified in layman’s terms. For example, the first few ingredients are Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Leaf Juice), Aspalathus Linearis (Rooiboos), and Olea Europaea (Olive Oil). I was also happy to see that most (if not all) of the ingredients are natural.The scent of the face wash is so pleasant—almost tea like—and it does not overwhelm or smell chemical-y like my previous wash. I love that the wash is light and easy to squeeze out so I don’t end up wasting or trying to put it back. It’s nice that they also offer unscented for those who are scent-sensitive.I decided to research Brickell further and I was ecstatic to see that a sample kit of all of the products is offered for free. The kit arrived fairly  quickly and some of the samples ended up lasting a really long time!I am really happy that I discovered Brickell products and I recommend it to my guy friends (and even some of my girl friends that prefer male-branded products). I definitely recommend checking out the website and giving the sample kit a try. Brickell has made me more interested in skin care and being mindful about what I put on my body.I have sensitive skin so not every product works for me. I have definitely noticed that my skin has improved since I started using Brickell and I feel confident that it will stay this way. I’m really satisfied with the Brickell Men’s Purifying Face Wash along with their other skin care products and I think you will be too.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: This is my go to moisturizer every morning.  It's light and non greasy which I love.  The mint and mild eucalyptus scent combination is great because it's not overpowering.  My only complaint is that the bottle is a little small but a little does go a long way.  I use it almost everyday and I'm just now running out from 5 months ago!

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: Ive used many face moisturizers throughout my years. I honestly can say this by far is the best ive wver used. Just a little dab in your palm and rubbed onto your face does the job. Keeps my skin looking healthy without the shine some of the other moisturizers I've used. Im 60yrs old and always gwt compliments about how young i look. Thanks to BRICKELL

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: I have never used any sort of face wash or moisturizer, but I recently turned thirty and decided it might be fine to start taking care of my skin. My wife and I enjoy the smell of the daily moisturizer and my skin feels firmer and less oily. I’ve been enjoyed this product so much that I have also purchased Brickell’s clarifying gel face wash, as well as, taking advantage of their free sample pack (I highly recommend doing the same).

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: Let’s face it (pun intended) 😏... men and women just don’t have the same skin chemistry. I’ve been looking for years for a natural moisturizer that doesn’t clog my pores and is good for sensitive oily skin. This is the one! Great as after shave and daily moisturizer. Keep it up Brickell!!!

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: I received the item today and when I open the package the bottle had been opened and it leaked inside the package. I like the smell and how it feels on the skin, but not happy about losing some of the product inside the package. Giving 3 stars only because of the package.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: Product arrived damaged, box was fine but the lid did not look like it was screwed on all the way. Was looking forward to trying this brand.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: Arrived with cap of product nearly off and much of product leaked into clear wrapper.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: The bottle was open before I even got it out of the package and for $35 a bottle you kinda want every bit of it.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: (1) Soaks in fast(2) No greasy feel(3) Healing, especially after a pool (chlorine) swimRecommend ...!

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: Its a bad shipment. Not even in a proper box for the price you pay for PREMIUM moisturizer.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: In the past whenever I tried using a face moisturizer I would always have acne breakouts and red irritated skin. Brickell has offered me a moisturizer that neutralized my super oily skin and toned down the sheen. I use it twice a day as recommended and have had far less acne breakouts and redness of skin. 1 bottle lasted me 6 months. Well worth the $35.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: I understand that this moisturizer, at 4 oz, is $35 due to the ingredients used. However, to pay $35 and not have the bottle anywhere near filled to the top kind of irks me. The photo attached is the 4oz moisturizer straight out of the amazon box that it came in. I’d say that at the very least a week a half, maybe even two weeks, worth of lotion is omitted from the bottle. Is it a good moisturizer? Sure. I’ve bummed some off of my friend’s bottle and it’s what led to my own purchase. But to pay as much as I did and not feel like I got all I could have really rubs me (no pun intended) the wrong way

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: It's really soft, smells really good, and gives me great results. I might buy more!

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: I'm torn between the Brickell face moisturizer and the "Body Merry" moisturizer. With Brickell, you get 4 oz for the price ($35 as of November, 2018) and it has a nicer scent, one that is consistent with the other Brickell products I use. With Body Merry, you get less product (3.4 oz), but it's much cheaper (just under $12) than the Brickell product. Since I'm a new user of the Brickell moisturizer, time will tell whether the quality of Brickell justifies the higher price.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: Very light but effective! I’ve used several moisturizer solutions for my face in the last year from drug store off the shelf to NYC boutique skincare store and I can say this is my favorite so far. It’s light so I’m not sweating when exposed to a little heat but it’s also long lasting I know my face is moisturized all day from my morning application. I love this stuff and can’t reccomend it enough.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: Hysterical packaging, they deserve six stars just for that.This moisturizer is very different than anything I’m used to, and that’s actually a good thing.  I have oily combo skin. After I wash my face, my skin is so dry and tight for awhile before the oil slick comes in my t-zone areas.When I got this, I noticed it is a little harder to pump out than a normal moisturizer, and it comes out a little thick. The smell is slightly unusual, but it’s just a combo of the natural ingredients without all the chemical perfumes, so you have to get used to the texture and smell, neither are “bad” at all, but they are different.  You also have to be sure you put just the right amount on, too little and it won’t spread out, too thick and it will just stay on top of skin and not absorb.All that being said, I’ve noticed a BIG improvement in my skin since I started using this product. My skin seems less oily, more even toned, less irritated, less red, more calm, and less acne prone. I’m not an all natural hippie chick by any means, but this product is making me re-think that. Maybe it’s about time I started using more natural products like this to improve my skin. I really like this stuff and it has improved my skin a lot. I will be ordering it again.I have NOT gotten any free samples/products from this company, nor have I been paid for this review. I just really like the product, and I agree with all the other good reviews.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I've tried a lot of moisturizers, namely Cetaphil for acne prone skin (too much like a sunscreen for me and I got greasy quick), Clean and Clear's salicylic acid moisturizer (overdrying and tough on my skin), MAC moisture cream (fine, but it seemed to take so much for my skin to feel less dry)... The list goes on. This one seems perfect for me with my combination skin with patchy acne. I tan easily; I never burn unless it's enough sun to cause sun poisoning, so I don't need a strong sunscreen at all. This moisturizer smells super fresh, exactly like cucumber, and it never makes me feel oily or greasy or like my face is melting when I go outside. A little seems to go a long way for me. At first the squeeze top seems tricky, but you just have to get used to applying more pressure to get the moisturizer to come out. It seems to calm down red patches on my skin from acne irritation like a charm. I haven't felt dry, flaky skin on my face since I started using it! It seems like the perfect fit for my skin and I'm really glad I tried this out; I wasn't expecting to love it as much as I do at all.(Just as a note, I use a gentle daily cleanser without acne medication, tea tree oil, a Vitamin C serum, and follow up with this moisturizer twice a day. I can't say how it works with acne-medicated face washes, etc.)

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I received a sample of this product in a  Beauty box (Ipsy) a few months ago and was instantlyIn love with it on the first use. I have combination skin and also tend to brake out if a skin product is too oily or synthetic. This moisturizer was perfect for my skin. It’s so lightweight, feels so natural, and smells sooooo good. I’m very sensitive to unnatural smells, and this stuff makes me feel like I’m running through a field of lavender. I love everything about this product, and to top it off, their packaging is adorable AND they donate a meal to a non-profit called “Feeding America” for every purchase made. This company will continue to receive my support and money.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I ordered this product because of my Ipsy bag. I love it so much. The smell is amazing and my skin feels so much better after using it. Also the bag it came in gave me a good laugh. This company definitely care about its customers. I would highly recommend this product if not this whole company to everyone.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I loved this product so much that I carved out 30 minutes on my Sunday evening AND deliberately saved my packaging for weeks specifically to use in my review. I want everyone on Amazon to know how great this product is! What’s so good about it? Well, I liked literally everything. I was BEYOND pleased when it arrived. Why? For one, the company donates one can of food to a food bank with each product purchase (I didn’t know that when I ordered). Why else did I like it? The container that dispenses the product is a type that does not allow air inside, so the product has a longer shelf life and stays clean and sterile- very important for someone with sensitive skin. The container and lid are good ones for traveling with- it won’t get pushed down inside my luggage and come out inside my bag. There’s more? Yes! The sunscreen smells amazing. The cucumber scent has an earthy, plant-based tinge to it, which I love! My nose can tell that this product is all-natural as the company claims! The product soothes my irritated skin. And?? It doesn’t leave a pasty film on my face. Some mineral sunscreens’ protective barriers have made me appear washed out and pale. Jivi sunscreen doesn’t! I purchased the spf12 sunscreen. It isn’t a high spf, because I wanted this to be the “everyday” sunscreen I use on the days when I’ll be indoors all day. (I use a higher spf when I know I’ll be outdoors.) ANYHOW, this was a long review, I know. That’s only because I want more people to be aware of this fabulous product and ethical company!  I want this company to be going strong years from now, because I will definitely be a lifelong customer. Jivi, you left quite an impression!!! (-Rachael, 35 years old, fair skin, sensitive complexion)

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: Hands down the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. Ipsy brought me here, after using the sample I had to get another, it’s light, breathable and it works so well, my skin is softer, smoother and even. The fact that this product donates to a good cause and Is cruelty  free is awesome. I also enjoyed the humor the package came with, will always purchase again. Try it !

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: 1) Love the size of the product (1.7 oz) for the price2) Super moisturizing and smells super herby ( if you like that)3) Adorable packaging and great delivery4) Visible results in just a few days

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I have been using the lavender moisturizer for about a year now (Thanks to Ipsy for introducing me). It’s honestly the best moisturizer I’ve used in years & you don’t need a lot either.I have dry skin and this has really helped neutralize some of that dryness.Amazing smell for an amazing productMy only complaint - As a Canadian it’s a slightly harder find.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I've been using this product for about a year. I love it. Smells great and keeps face freash. I was having a rash on my face and did research, I found this product online. After using a week my face healed and I've never had a problem again  !

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I am beyond impressed with Jivi! After getting a sample in my Ipsy bag, I was hooked on their moisturizer.  I have fairly oily skin, and it doesn’t make me overly oily or shiny - in fact, I think it helps even out my skin. Also, with every order, they donate a meal to a local-to-you charity that fights hunger in your community. It’s positive things like this that will make me a repeat customer!

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: Just got today. My face still looks just as red with it and I feel like I look shinier too. Not sure about this yet.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I have only used this one time and can tell I am going to love this product it’s light weight it helped with blemishes on my cheek no greasy feel the smell is a tad strong but does not smell bad and goes away

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I love this moisturizer! I have combination skin that tends to get red and irritated easily. It’s quite sensitive and I’m always really happy when I find something that works for me. That’s why I’m so excited about this moisturizer.The packaging for this product is super cute and fun which I enjoy. I also find the pump very easy to use and I like the way the product is dispensed.The product itself is even better. It’s a green color going on and as soon as I put it on the first time I noticed my redness faded away. I feel like I can wear this alone but it also does feel really nice under my makeup. I love the lavender smell. It doesn’t feel oily at all and goes on matte which I like because I want to add moisture but not shine to my face. This is a product that I plan to reorder when it runs out.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: Fabulous packaging/branding.Love the scent, the lotion itself is great and absorbs well, it is really good to my skin and the clever packaging is fun.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I first tried Jivi moisturizer when a sample size came in an Ipsy Bag. After a couple weeks of using it, off & on, I fell in love with it!It's Organic & Cruelty Free, which are things I truly value.It has a beautiful Lavendar scent, not too strong but, enough to notice. The color of the moisturizer is pale green, which I'm assuming has to do with the micro algae.I have combination skin; some areas get oily throughout the day & some areas stay dry. This moisturizer has worked well for me in both areas. No excess oil at the end of the day like some moisturizers do.I apply after I wash my face in the morning & in the evenings. I smooth small dabs all over my face & neck. It's also been a great "primer" before applying my makeup.Unfortunately, in my early 30's, I still get small breakouts here & there. So, I started using a small dab of Jivi on the blemish before bed & in the morning the blemish has calmed down quite a bit where I can smoothly cover it with makeup.My only Con for this moisturizer; it's only an SPF 12.  We all know that's not going to do much of anything. I really hope Jivi can eventually make that a much larger number sometime in the future.All I all, I really enjoy Jivi & I am willing to give their other products a try!Their prices seem very reasonable & I will be repurchasing soon!I think they are a lovely brand & I especially like that with each purchase, they donate a meal to Feeding America!

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I really liked this moisturizer. Got a sample  in my ipsy bag and immediately fell in love with it. Light weight, dries fast. Non greasy and smells good. Had to buy the full size. I think it might be my new go to moisturizer. Can't wait to try more of his products.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: This is a really good, natural and super affordable cream. It's really good for oily complexions. It is not oily or greasy. It absorbs easily into the skin. It does leave a slight color residue if you don't rub it in well enough.Otherwise, I highly recommend this moisturizer.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: I got a small sample of this in my ipsy bag a few months ago, and finally found it available here on Amazon. Very pleased with the product, it works well, and smells great. The green color is not noticeable at all when its rubbed in.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: Super thick moisture from 100% natural ingredients including organic ingredients like aloe vera juice, shea butter, and micro algae.  There are no additives or fragrances added which is awesome because it's being absorbed right into your skin. I love how thick it is and don't be shocked by this but it's green! It actually seems to enhance my skin tone and it seems like I could just wear this moisturizer with a little dusting of bronzer for a natural looking glow. It's not greasy and it makes my skin feel soft.I don't know how to describe the scent. It's a little earthy or herbal. And it's light, not strong or perfumed. Just natural which is great.It also seems like a decent value for the quality of ingredients. Especially when you consider that they donate a meal to Feeding America to fight hunger with your purchase. I also had a couple of fun little stickers included (see photos).I highly recommend.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Cucumber Sage) | Reduces Redness and Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive and Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
review: This moisturizer is a game changer for me.  I have major issues with red tones on my face and this product when applied evens out my skin.  I have used this product 3 times now and I am really liking it in comparison to my high end expensive products.  I love that it has the light scent of fresh cucumber - sounds weird I know but it is actually a refreshing product to apply and smell.  The moisturizer is green - that caught me off guard, but I am pretty sure it helps tone the redness out.  This does not make my face feel greasy - I can only describe it as refreshing.  Love that this has spf in it too - that’s just mandatory with any facial product I use.  Also, kudos to their marketing team - the packaging is on point and interesting.  I would purchase this for myself and as a gift for a gift basket type thing.

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: I have very sensitive skin and often times acne treatments will make me feel like my skin is as dry as the Savannah desert without making any of the problems better. The best ingredient in this is the hyaluronic acid, which attracts a thousand times its size water particles. This ingredient is a wonderful one to help keep my skin moisturized when using a product like this. The ceramides are also useful, because keeping the acid mantle, or the skin barrier, is crucial to maintaining healthy skin. There's very little scent to this product, which I appreciate. I'm not going to need to use this everyday, but for those who do this would be a terrific choice. Update: I just used this with my clarisonic cleansing brush in the shower, and the combination was a little too much. It really created a redness on my skin, so I won't do that combination again.

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: I have allergies and sensitive skin, so I have to be careful about the products I use. This acne face wash didn't have any adverse effects on me. I only use it once per day, though, to reduce the likelihood of a reaction.

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: 21/Jan/2020PROS+ It was not agressive for my skin.+ Scent is very subtle, but it is nice.+ Face feels very clean after use, not dry even when it says that it might create dryness!CONS- After having used several foaming cleansers, I was expecting this to foam as I applied to my face - but it never happened. It's like the cream just gets around the face with zero foaming effect.For this last issue, I am giving this 3/5 recommendation!* I will update this review if something changes as I keep using the product.* If you found this review helpful, please click below! This will help other users like you to make informed decisions before spending their money!

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: I have very sensitive, combination oily skin and this didn't sting my face. It's on the thinner side, and doesn't foam up much, but it does get the job done. Be warned this can stain your towels, so I recommend using one you don't mind ruining. Doesn't have a scent in my opinion. If you are sensitive to fragrences, and want a face wash that won't dry out your skin, this is a great choice. I don't recommend using this everyday though, only when you feel a breakout coming, or when you already have a breakout.

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: This is gentle enough to not dry out the skin and to be used more than once a day.It has almost no scent.  Good product.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo, 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 2)
review: This review is for the Garnier Skinactive Moisturizer Normal/Combo. This is literally my favorite facial moisturizing cream. My face is very sensitive, anything that is too heavy makes me break out and also makes my face sweat excessively. So most everything else I try just is way too heavy for my face. But this is really light and is practically the only moisturizer I can use that doesn't make me break out or make me sweat after applying it. It also does a great job of moisturizing and makes my face feel really soft and fresh. This is not greasy at all. The texture is like a cool gel and a little goes a long way. I rarely use anything else but this. I'm a forever user.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Just want to let everyone know that the cerave lotion on the left is one I bought from cvs, and the one on the right is the large one from amazon, and you can clearly see that they put hyaluronic acid lower on the list for the amazon one, vs the cvs one. And just in case you don't know, ingredients for any products go in order from the greatest amounts first, and descend to lower amounts as you go down the list. The cvs one has hyaluronic acid much higher on the list, and the packaging looks completely different too! Like, why?? Does cerave make a cheaper version of their products for amazon, vs other retailers?? And that is just really annoying, aggravating, and upsetting to me. Why water it down to buy it for a cheaper price? No one wants that. Everyone wants to get what they pay for. For sure, the one from cvs was much pricier ($17) for the smaller bottle size, while the amazon one was like, $12 when I got it for the large, 19 oz one. But I just want to say that I KNOW what I'm paying for!! If its a cheaper price for a more watered down product, I'm not going to get it!! Just leave the products the way that they are. And I have to say that yes, the textures between them were NOTICEABLY different! The one from cvs was definitely more opaque and creamier, while as soon as I got the amazon one, I immediately immediately noticed, without a doubt, a more watery consistency. Um, barf. Never going to buy this product from amazon again because of how they're so blatantly cheating! I'll just put my money in something else

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Before i get into my novel of a review, here’s the summary of what i think. I came across this while looking for a lotion that works best for Non-oily skin, a daily lotion, for sensitive-ish skin, i found the PERFECT one with this.I bought this about 2 weeks ago, was shipped in 2 days, & when i received it nothing was wrong with the packaging or bottle. Anyways, I started using this after i decided to switch from my Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture which i had been using for about 6 months. I do not have naturally Oily Skin so it was too drying. But with maaaaany hours spent looking for a FACE lotion with good reviews I came across this and let me just say IT IS WORTH THE MONEY, I am in love! works for face and body which i was skeptical about at first but i do not regret my purchase at all and i highly highly reccomend anyone purchase this. My skin is a little sensitive mainly to perfumes (especially my face) & this is amazing!!! no breakouts, no rash, I will use this forever!

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: My skin is relatively sensitive. Over the years I’ve gone through a number of lotions, searching for one that keeps my skin hydrated without any side effects (breakouts, rashes, etc). I’ve been using this daily moisturizer for a few weeks now and it’s worked out very well so far. I only have to apply once in the morning and my skin feels moisturized throughout the day. I guess that’s the hyaluronic acid doing it’s job.This lotion is lightweight and doesn’t leave me feeling greasy. It also doesn’t have much of a scent which I count as a plus. Best of all my skin isn’t breaking out or changing in any negative way.Although this product is touted as face and body lotion I have yet to use it on my face. That being said, it has worked very well for me as a go-to body lotion.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: I really like this product. When I put on is very comfortable and smoothBut when i received this product are leaking out in the plastic bag.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Love the lotion but am so disappointed in the way it arrived. The pump was busted and broken, the lotion was all over the package.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: This is my absolute favorite moisturizer. It helps so much with dry patches during the winter time and even during the summer time it doesn't clog my pores or make you break out. It's such a great value I end up buying this versus the a.m. and p.m. because it's such a good value for the side and the money. I use this year round on my chest neck and face and I don't have any breakouts from it. I also love this because it's so easy to get and hardly ever out of stock. It's fragrance-free so it's good if you have sensitive skin and also my dermatologist recommended highly

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Despite being open when I received it, I love this lotion. On the body it absorbs very quickly. On hands, less quickly. On face, even less quickly. But it's gentle, and truly not scented at all.  I love this stuff.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: It arrived broken but still usable.It works ok on my skin but after 30 minutes maybe an hr my skin feels dry again. I can tell it’s improved my skin though. I really like gold bond diabetics lotion seems to really keep you moisturized.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: I have super sensitive skin and really bad acne. If you have dry, normal, or combination skin, this moisturizer is the one for you(they have other formulas for oily skin). This moisturizer works like a charm and has actually been helping me clear out my skin. It’s not too heavy and not too light. Highly recommend and I will purchase again.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Item was unprotected , anyone could open it before me , Cant use ... I payed money for nothing , thank you :)For future  use little extra money for protect your product pls <3

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Love the product and I would’ve given it five stars ⭐️ But I received the package with the lotion spilt all over.The picture shows the residual lotion, I put at least 4oz back in the bottle.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: This is a very good moisturizer , I first bought a small bottle from Walmart and used it.I was surprised , my skin became so soft, as I have sensitive skin this one is the best and its price is also affordable .when the small bottle is over I couldn't get it from Walmart as it is always out of stock.so I purchased from amazon.it is very good.. I happy about my purchase.PROLIGHTWEIGHTSKIN SUPER SOFTNO SMELLAFFORDABLE

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: I am from malaysia, when i reach states here my skin condition become super dry. Until one day i saw one youtuber recommend this brand of lotion so i decided to try on. And yeah. Really unexpected that it suits my skin so well. Im loving it so much!

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: I’m so happy with my order. The package even came COMPLETELY wrapped so the lotion wouldn’t get anywhere if it broke.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Came in box without any wrapping and had scratches and black residue all over the bottles

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Huge!!!! Way bigger than I expected! Works perfectly for sensitive skin, I use it on my face in the morning and nighttime and my fave feels like a newborn baby

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: The pump was damaged when I received it

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: ... where is my pump?! I paid $17 for this!

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: This brand will be always one of the fav drugstores one! I really recommend this one for combo skin! Love it

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: the worst package I've ever receivedI wanna gave  it 0 star if I could

product_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian Oil-Free Moisturizer, Aloe & Green Tea, 3 Fl Oz
review: I have been using this product for years, and this time I ordered it on here. It is not the real stuff. It is oily and and smelly. It normally is light (like whipped) and not super smelly.

product_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian Oil-Free Moisturizer, Aloe & Green Tea, 3 Fl Oz
review: It actually feels clean, and there's no sticky residue since it gets absorbed really well and really quickly. The scent is an added plus too: it's not too strong and doesn't give me a headache as some other products have.

product_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian Oil-Free Moisturizer, Aloe & Green Tea, 3 Fl Oz
review: I have given this 3 stars because my product arrived damaged. This is a non-returnable item and I understand why. It's just disappointing because the product arrived cracked and leaking moisturizer.On to the product: I was looking for something to moisturize my extremely oily skin that often will get dry patches. The product is pretty fragrant. It is not awful but it is not my favorite smell. It has absorbed into my skin well. I am hoping the aloe will be able to soothe my sometimes red and acne prone skin.  Unlike most moisturizers, my skin feels pretty smooth and soft after using this. I will have to update later to say whether or not it has helped with the oiliness throughout the day.

product_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian Oil-Free Moisturizer, Aloe & Green Tea, 3 Fl Oz
review: The cream is light and smells nice. The lid was broken upon arrival so I was upset about that. But the cream itself is nice.

product_name: Eucerin Sensitive Facial Skin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Sensitive Skin Lotion, Broad Spectrum SPF 15, 4 Ounce (Pack of 2)
review: This is not the same product. Beiersdorf Co. no longer makes Q10 Anti-Wrinkle, Sensitive Skin Lotion. I feel this lotion is much thicker + it has some odor (although it states fragrance free!).

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil Pro Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: A light weight lotion with SPF 30 makes makes this a five star product. It is so lightweight, my husband uses it on his face and entire head daily. He is bald, and I am a skin cancer survivor.  We found a product we can agree on.

product_name: All Natural Face Cream for Sensitive Skin – Facial Moisturizer Restores, Protects Skin & Helps Soothe Irritation – Face Lotion for Women & Men Made in USA with Natural & Organic Ingredients
review: 1. This product has no scent, which is perfect if you or others around you are sensitive to smell.2. The product is formulated with wakame brown seaweed (which reminds me of La Mer), rosemary leaf, Tazman pepper for the ultimate lightweight and ultra-rich moisturizing experience.3. I love that it has a matte finish to it. I have oily skin and it leaves my skin with a matte finish after hours of wear.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Oil-free Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin, 4 Fluid Ounce, 1 pack
review: Read the ingredients.  This product is priced at what it's worth.  It feels horrible on my hands alone.  Not moisturizing at all.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Oil-free Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin, 4 Fluid Ounce, 1 pack
review: I’m pretty sensitive and get red if I don’t use the right product. This one worked out good for me.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Oil-free Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin, 4 Fluid Ounce, 1 pack
review: I have sensitive skin and live in a dry environment. My skin is always drying up. At this price point this is the best face moisturizer I have tried. Nonetheless, I will continue using my current moisturizer, as I prefer to pay a bit more for the one I liked better. Nonetheless, I see this one as a viable alternative. Good product; fragrance and alcohol free.If my review helped you in any way, please let me know by clicking the "helpful" button below.  Any questions you may have, feel free to ask… Thank you!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Oil-free Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin, 4 Fluid Ounce, 1 pack
review: I believe this moisturizer strikes the best balance. I've used products that are too much on either spectrum. This doesn't leave a residue or feel like you need to reapply more.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Oil-free Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin, 4 Fluid Ounce, 1 pack
review: This is an excellent moisturizer it's oil free,  alcohol free,  paraben free,  and scent free.  It moisturizes the skin well and it's priced right!

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: This cream is thick but still easy to apply like lotion. My daughter has extreme eczema, and after trying what seems like hundreds of creams, I'm happy to have found one that finally works! I got this on a reccomendation from her newest allergist, and am thrilled with our results! My picture is the difference after a month of using Vanicream instead of the cream we had used previously (both used along with prescription meds).

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Check your bottles regularly — many have been having problems with mold, and with the pump bottles you don’t know about it unless you unscrew the lid. It’s a shame, because it has been great for my toddler’s skin.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Our 6 y/o son has ASD, ADHD and also, it seems, mild eczema.  Especially during dry and cold winter months his legs get really red and rashy.  We had been using Eucerine for eczema before but a dermatologist told me that it can actually make eczema worse!  We switched to Vanicream and the rashy outbreaks have almost completely disappeared!  Hooray!  This keeps his skin moisturized and break out free, plus it's really easy to use in this pump container.  I love saving money by having it on my subscribe and save list.  We're vanicream converts for life!

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Nothing has worked on my baby’s eczema until now! Buy this, you won’t regret it. I included before and after pictureS in my review, cleared up in 3 days!

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: This product is so rich and creamy it started improving my dry skins texture immediately. It’s a large container. A whole pound of cream and it doesn’t feel greasy or wet on my skin. It has no scent and it absorbs very quickly. I’m very happy with this lotion. It’s definitely far better than many others I’ve tried. It took some pushing to get the pump to start dispensing the lotion but what I love is that you can simply unscrew the top to access the lotion the pump doesn’t bring up when you get to the bottom. I use this brand soap for my acne prone skin and it really works to clear up acne on the body although I find it too drying on my face.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Finally a moisturizer that doesn’t burn Sting or irritate my skin. I’ve had supersensitive skin all my life especially on my face and I am 46 years old I have finally found the one lotion that doesn’t irritate my face. The picture I added is a picture of what happens with every other lotion that supposedly is for sensitive skin as you can see those other products did not work those other products did not work. I am day two into using the cleanser and the moisturizer and you have no idea how great it is for my face not to burn and turn bright red just fantastic!!!! The moisturizer is a bit thick so you don’t need a lot even though it’s a little higher priced it’ll last forever and it’s worth it when you have supersensitive skin. FAN FOR LIFE!!!

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: This product is amazing ! Really moisturizing , no scent at all and I really wish I would have known of this product sooner. Have helped me tremendously with my Eczema. Would recommend to anyone wanting that extra moisture in their life. Love it

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: I have monthly subscription for this item as my toddler has severe eczema. But this month’s item seems opened and packed again. A good amount of cream was all over the cover from inside. Also the jar itself was loathed with cream. I am really scared to use it on her as she has sensitive skin. This is really disappointing.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: I have been struggling with flaky forehead and hands for a very long time. I was using lot of product in the market and finally my husband suggested this cream. I was little apprehensive to use it on my face initially , but after seeing the results on my hand, I decided to give it a go! I am on my second bottle right now and couldn’t love it more. It’s odorless, absorbs quickly and stays almost all through the day. I am ready to buy my third bottle now.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: This was recommended to me by my toddler‘s pediatrician for her. So far I like the actually lotion, but only after I spent 10 min cleaning the bottle. I don’t know how so much lotion had come out when the top seemed screwed on relatively tightly and the pump was in the locked position and even had a plug inside the tip. 🤷🏻‍♀️

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Was super excited for this to come in today and when I opened it, it was broken.... luckily I had another cap from my other lotion that happen to fit on this one but I hope this doesn’t happen again.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: I love Vanicream and my issue is not with the product but with the condition it was in when I received it. When I opened the box the cream was everywhere and the blue lid was cracked. Due to the price of the stuff I was hoping to send it back for a replacement but was told there are no returns or replacement for it. Again I love the product just very disappointed in the distributor.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: This is after one use! After one night!!!! It‘a a miracle cream. My LO has had eczema his whole 1 year of life and I’ve tried so many creams! I can’t believe how soft his skin is too!

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: I’m using this cream for my rosacea dry skin. Cream is thick & really moisturizes great. Only thing is that you must let it dry a good 20 minutes before if you’re applying makeup.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Llegó abierta y aparentemente usada. Sólo medio frasco con crema. Y el artículo en una caja abierta y con crema dentro.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: I like the product but it arrived partially out of the container and all over the inside of the box.  Due to the nature of the cream it was really hard to clean up and is still slimy.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: As an extra layer to protect my skin from dryness I applied this lotion. It last the entire day. No irritation whatsoever!!! This will be a great compliment to an ointment. But before you put your clothes let it dry up fully! Apply it and thank me later!

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Shipped super fast and looks like a good quality lotion. It’s really thick.

product_name: Vanicream Moisturizing Cream with Pump | Fragrance and Gluten Free | For Sensitive Skin | Soothes Red, Irritated, Cracked or Itchy Skin | Dermatologist Tested | 16 Ounce
review: Received leaking product.  Love the cream, not impressed with the packaging, disappointing.

product_name: SeboCalm Redness Relief Face Moisturizer - Vegan Hypoallergenic Soothing Rosacea or Acne Prone Anti Itch Skin Care Cream for Facial Sensitive Oily and Combination Skin
review: I don't have a lot of redness, but I do have eczema. It's fairly creamy without being too thick. It soaks in nicely and doesn't leave a sticky residue feeling. It would def be great for those who moisturize before primer.The smell is probably the most off putting part. It doesn't smell like a granny, as others have said, but it smells very pungent like Aveeno oatmeal or spf.Overall results are that I'm satisfied with the product. It doesn't what it claims and hasn't broken me out, but the smell doesn't make me want to reach for it first.

product_name: SeboCalm Redness Relief Face Moisturizer - Vegan Hypoallergenic Soothing Rosacea or Acne Prone Anti Itch Skin Care Cream for Facial Sensitive Oily and Combination Skin
review: Love this product. I suffer from Rosacea and this has helped my redness a lot. I have been using it twice a day and it has done wonders. I recommend it!!

product_name: SeboCalm Redness Relief Face Moisturizer - Vegan Hypoallergenic Soothing Rosacea or Acne Prone Anti Itch Skin Care Cream for Facial Sensitive Oily and Combination Skin
review: I have allergies and sensitive skin, so I have to be careful about the products I use. This lotion did not have any adverse effects on me.This lotion has a floral scent, which I'm not a fan of. Luckily, the scent dissipates fairly quickly. This lotion is very light and massages in easily.

product_name: SeboCalm Redness Relief Face Moisturizer - Vegan Hypoallergenic Soothing Rosacea or Acne Prone Anti Itch Skin Care Cream for Facial Sensitive Oily and Combination Skin
review: I am very disappointed!!!I am using this product for many years and it works really wellBut i saw that it only contains half of the size I expect!!!Look on the pictureThe bottle is half empty

product_name: SeboCalm Redness Relief Face Moisturizer - Vegan Hypoallergenic Soothing Rosacea or Acne Prone Anti Itch Skin Care Cream for Facial Sensitive Oily and Combination Skin
review: I’ve only been using this moisturizer for 4 days now and already seeing a difference. It’s helping my Rosacea, and giving my “combination skin” a Smooth even matte finish. The only negative feedback I would give is that it smells like old lady Perfume, and I have a new cystic zit forming (might not be related to this product tho)Over all a great buy, I’ll take smelling like granny and a zit over my face looking like it’s on fire any day

product_name: SeboCalm Redness Relief Face Moisturizer - Vegan Hypoallergenic Soothing Rosacea or Acne Prone Anti Itch Skin Care Cream for Facial Sensitive Oily and Combination Skin
review: Designed to moisturize and soothe sensitive and red skin this light cream is contained in a manual pump 1.7 ounce bottle. For first use, press down on the pump a few times until the moisturizer is released.  The pump nozzle has a small opening so just the amount desired can be dispensed which avoids product waste. A small amount is all that is needed.In a basic skin routine this moisturizer is step three after cleansing and using a toner to help with the absorption of this light cream. The product is absorbed within a minute or two and there is no sticky or greasy residue. Fragrance is added but it is light and dissipates quickly. The cream is gentle and it temporary hydrates the skin. Cruelty-free. Very nice.

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: Used this for one year before it was taken off the shelves!So happy to find it here.It makes my skin feel dewy and smooth. I LOVE IT..BOUGHT 3

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: I love the product but I hate that it so small I’m not a fan of that it a tiny bottle would be nice if the bottle was bigger

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: This is a really good and fast  absorbing moisturizer, but be aware that it is a bit smaller than you expect

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: I love this product so I decided to order it though amazon! The only thing is it got here but it was smaller than I was expecting but It smells so good!

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
