review: I bought this on a whim to mix up my skincare routine and I wasn't disappointed. I have combination skin so I can't really handle heavy creams/ moisturizers. When I saw that this product is gel-based, I was excited.The product has a gel texture that's feels great on the skin. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling moist but not drenched/oily. It has a lovely watermelon scent. I have sensitive skin and was happy to see that this product didn't break me out.The size was a bit disappointing, but that was the only negative.Overall, a great buy that I will definitely repurchase.

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: I ordered this & a coco butter stick one of those broke me out...so yeah. But my skin feels super soft so i guess it did its job

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: Though it was going to be a bit bigger but no. And even though  it's kinda small it really helps and works 🌻

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: This is definitely a knock off. The bottle has slight differences to the one I bought in store but I figured I’d try it anyway. The consistency is oilier than the real one. It leaves my skin looks dry and shiny. I recommend getting the real version in store! I love the actual product, but this is 100% not it (real on left. Amazons on the right)

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: Okay no joke guys!! I almost never write reviews unless I absolutely hate it or love it and thankfully... I LOVE IT. Look at my skin!! I’ve been dealing with hormonal acne (or what I thought it was) for 10 months and now a week later after switching from CeraVe foaming face wash to this product, my skin is healing! I haven’t had a breakout this entire time... that’s crazy. Plus, it smells friggen amazing and it’s semi moisturizing, I find my face kinda tight afterwards but I just end up putting Biatmin C moisturizer on. If you’re struggling like I was, give it a shot! Nothing to lose :)

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: My absolute favorite moisturizer, great for sensitive skin. A little goes a long way though so don't over pump, it's better to need to get more than to have way too much on your hand or face. The SPF is nice for those days I don't wear makeup but don't plan on staying out on the sun alot. Good for around the house or a quick run to the store or something.Box was alittle dinged but bottle is fine and that's what matters. 😊

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: I have very sensitive skin. This product felt like it burnt my skin and left my cheeks red. The scent is wonderful and the e, foliation is good. I felt it burning almost immediately though. It is most pronounced right at the sides of the bottom of my nose and on the side of my right eye. Be warned.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: Product came in with what looks like a sharp blade cut through it.  All other products came in fine. At first I I thought I might of done it while opening the package but I couldn’t have because it was buried under the other products.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: I love this moisturizer! It absorbs quickly and makes my face feel soft! Really good on a no make up day!

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: Just letting people know that this product has jojoba oil which isn't listed on the ingredients on the seller's page. Oils break me out (I get cystic acne on my jaw) so just watch out if it's the same for you.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz

This should have been brand new. It smells great and I wish I could use it but unfortunately I will not since it is not sealed.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: This product caused me to break out into hives. I had to go to urgent care and get a steroid shot. I would not recommend this product. I've never had this reaction to a lotion before. I do wish I knew what ingredient caused this reaction so I can avoid it.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: This made me break out terribly and I work 12 hour night shifts so it was the WORST to deal with all night long. I got a rash all over my face within 25 min of using it. It still hasn't gone away.  My face was hot, itchy, red and blotchy. Worst I am returning it.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: Cos i love this product....compared to others I've used....i love this....not greasy...doesn't sting under my eyes...no greasy feel.....absorbs quickly....I've decided to try the aveeno line of products for my adult acne....here goes....

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen and Soy Extract, 4 fl. Oz
review: Great product. The shipping was fast. I have used it all ready.

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: Arrived prime shipping, but box was smushed and product INSIDE was tampered with as shown in residue on bottle and inside the cap.

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: The CeraVe Ultra Light Moisturizing Lotion with sunscreen goes on smooth and feels light on my face.  It absorbs in quickly and does not feel greasy.  It has an SPF of 30 and did not clog my pores as some sunscreens do.  I didn’t have any irritation or breakouts.  I will continue to use this lotion as it works well, provides protection from the sun and is affordable.

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: Pump Dispenser stopped working after only 3 uses❗️Aaargh! Return window had already closed I like the light weight feel  of it so I will just cut open the tube and put in a baggie to use the rest but what a hassle!

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: I was looking for a healthy moisturizer with Spf. This one has a great super light weight texture, it's totally transparent and most importantly, doesn't crumble under makeup. The only thing I disagree on is the statement that it has a matte finish - it doesn't make your skin more matte, it just doesn't add extra shine to it.---update---After using it for a few days I've noticed the make up I'm applying on top of it turns a bit darker, than it would on bare skin. That's a shame!Also, it's not very moisturizing.

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: I LOVE this face lotion - it's great for my [very] oily skin because it's so light and mattifying yet provides SPF 30. For anyone with greasy skin who is looking for a great product with spf they can wear under their makeup every day without looking like their face is dripping wet by noon (due to oiliness), PLEASE GIVE THIS LOTION A TRY! You won't regret it. Make sure you purchase the "Ultra Light Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin" in the 1.7 oz bottle. CeraVe makes a myriad of face lotions and this one is absolutely incredible. Living (and aging) in Southern California, I've been on a 10 year-long mission to find the perfect balance of a non-greasy face lotion with great SPF coverage that I can use daily, either alone or under makeup. I was randomly given a sample of this and I cannot put into words how amazed I was after the first day of use. I still need my oil blotters throughout the day, but my face doesn't feel like it has a 1-inch layer of Crisco on its surface after being at work for less than an hour.Also, a heads-up to anyone scrolling through these reviews: I've noticed some 1-star comments, however after seeing the specific bottle size and product name at the top of each comment, I soon came to realize that about half of the comments for this product (the "Ultra Light Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin SPf 30" are erroneously referring to various other CeraVe face lotions - many are referring to the "CeraVe AM face lotion" or the "CeraVe PM face lotion," both of which come in a 3 oz bottle and shouldn't be confused with the "Ultra Light Moisturizer for Normal to Oily skin, 30 SPF - 1.7 oz bottle" lotion. It's kind of a bummer because this product would probably have a much higher star rating if so many folks hadn't written poor reviews for the wrong items on this product's page. So if you're trying to get a good understanding of THIS product, please disregard all of the reviews for the "CeraVe AM (or PM) Lotion, 3-oz," since those are both completely different face moisturizers from what this comment section is supposed to be about. I even saw photos of the wrong lotion type in the section where people are supposed to post pictures of the product being reviewed. I'm including a picture of the CORRECT product; hopefully that will help lessen any confusion. Sorry for the rant but I just wanted to point this problem out - I was surprised to see any poor reviews and then realized the customers writing about bad experiences were often complaining about a totally different lotion than the product at hand.I have tried (and been disappointed by) so many SPF face lotions - expensive brands, inexpensive brands, and everything in between. Once I found this heavenly product, I was truly elated. It's great for oily skin and feels so light and nourishing - my skin always feels smooth and soft after applying it.It's also much less expensive on Amazon - I was at CVS last night and they are charging about $7 more per bottle. I love Amazon and I love this product. Protecting your skin from the sun on a daily basis is very important and should be a priority for everyone. This is a wonderful, high-quality SPF moisturizer and you should definitely give it a try. Your skin will thank you!

product_name: Oil Control Face Moisturizer - Natural & Organic Anti Aging Facial Moisturizer for Men & Women, Best Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin or Acne Moisturizer, Mens Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
review: I thought, from the orange color of the packaging, that this moisturizer would smell like citrus of some sort, however I was pleasantly surprised when I discovered that it smells lightly of peppermint. It goes on my skin smoothly and soaks in quickly. It hydrates my skin nicely without making it oily. It’s perfectly effective and light. And the fact that it is all natural is so great!

product_name: Oil Control Face Moisturizer - Natural & Organic Anti Aging Facial Moisturizer for Men & Women, Best Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin or Acne Moisturizer, Mens Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
review: I love the product. But 2 things. I have extremely sensitive skin. And for some reason, after two days of using this, it broke me out, as you can clearly see. Secondly, I don't know if there is mint or something in it... but there is definitely a light burning sensation on my face after I have cleansed, toned and then applied this. Not enough to definitely give me a McCulley Culkin from Home Alone moment but... enough to give me pause when I first used it.Another thing - I know its organic and all, but it sucks that there is not some kind of natural sun screen in it.All in all, I think this is okay for slightly oily skin. I will still use this on occasion, because I bought it, but will definitely sample it out to family members and friends.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil Free Moisture Daily Hydrating Facial Moisturizer & Neck Cream with Glycerin - Fast Absorbing Ultra Gentle Lightweight Face Lotion & Sensitive Skin Face Moisturizer, 4 fl. oz
review: A little beat up upon arrival lol but I love this stuff

product_name: Collagen Face Moisturizer by L'Oreal Paris Skin Care I Day and Night Cream I Anti-Aging Face Cream to Smooth Wrinkles I Non-Greasy I 3.4 Ounce (Packaging May Vary)

The product is amazing though and very good on the skin. What scares me is I do not know if it has been used. Especially with what’s happening with the pandemic it’s scary!

product_name: Murad Acne Control Skin Perfecting Lotion - Step 3 (1.7 fl oz), Oil-Free Daily Hydrating Face Moisturizer for Acne Prone Skin with Retinol and Allantonin to Reduce Oil, Tighten Pores, and Calm Skin
review: This is NOT “skin perfecting lotion”but “acne clearing solution”. Item arrived unsealed and not in original packaging!!

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming Hydrating Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: This stuff has really surprising results. My skin is noticeably softer and firmer after only a few days of use. My face is brighter, my hands are softer, and my cottage cheesiness is firmer.I have lost quite a bit of weight (50 pounds and counting) so my skin needs some tightening and toning - this stuff does just that. I also have extremely dry skin in the winter over my whole body and this helps with that as well.I use the “stronger” version of this lotion, the gel-cream (on the left in the picture), for my stomach, thighs, and butt. I then use the lotion (on the right) for my chest, arms, hands, and face/neck.It also smells great, not too strong but still a delightful smell. My only complaint, and reason for taking off one star, is that it does leave my skin sticky for an hour or so after application. Other reviewers didn’t seem to have that problem so I’m not sure why I do - I usually apply shortly after showering so I know my skin is clean, but still leaves it sticky. Even so, I would still recommend cuz the results are well worth it. P.S. the gel-cream does not leave any stickiness, it’s great!

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming Hydrating Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)

review: The bottles still function correctly. However,  the caps were all broken during shipping.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming Hydrating Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: One of my favorite lotions. I have never purchased this from Amazon, but I do buy it from local department/grocery stores..I'm in my 30s and need a lil help firming areas around my lower tummy after having kids ten yrs ago....I know I should have done it yrs ago but I just started this yr. Anyhow it works like a charm...not a miracle! But does help alot and smells gently clean. After reading all the other reviews, I do believe they aren't getting the real product somehow because many of the bad reviews mention a bad smell which is soo not true, and they mention looks of the bottle being different which is also very weird to me, the bad reviews mention consistency and that also raises red flags for me, as my lotion is a thick spreadable cream that has a light scent and never caused any rashes or acne. I started using this product a yr ago because of Meghan Markle mentioning it was one of her favorite lotions before she married Prince Harry lol....if it's good enough for her, it's good enough for me! And she was right! It's a great product

review: As always it's the best lotion for dry skin in my opinion

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming Hydrating Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: I have been usin Q10 since years. I have used it in Germany years ago and I have been using it here I the US the last years. Usually buy it in store. Thought I would buy a pack in bulk but upon applying you can tell the difference right away - different consistency and that horrendous smell. Nivea has a very clean and distinctive smell and this is not it!! I mean it has the same smell for almost every product and believe me I have been using their face lotions, Q10 and regular lotions and deodorants as well as the typical lotion in the tin. This is NOT that lotion. It was sticky as heck on my hands and now I wonder which cheap product I applied to my skin and am furious. Returning due to false advertisement. I have also added pictures. The first one is the lotion of Amazon. Note the yellow circle- the Q10 isn't written in it, which i have never seen before. The second picture is the last bottle I bought in store. And no the size doesn't make a doffeeence, they all usually look the same. Don't put this on your skin. Believe the one star reviews.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming Hydrating Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: I’d prefer to give this zero stars because I will never use it again. A few days after I started using this lotion, I got a horrible hive-like very itchy rash all over both arms. It took well over a week after stopping use, to get the rash to go away. I found out there are many other like me that have had this same experience.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: Beware, this lotion is not original. As soon as I pumped it out I noticed that the consistency and color of it was different, and had a tacky feeling when applied to the skin. I always bought mine from Walmart but for months I couldn't get it because it was always sold out so I decided to buy this. After a bottle and 1/2 later  my skin become very dry, itchy and I believe i started getting hives on from it  so I stoppted using it and my skin started healing. The real Amlactin lotion has a thick consistency and off whitish color and when you apply it you skin internally feel moisturized and no after small. I wish I can get my money back but unfortunately I throw out them out because my return window was closed.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: See pic for lactic acid percentage and rank in ingredients line.This is exactly what my winter skin needed.  Honestly, I’m going to use this year round since soft skin isn’t seasonal!! Thank you to you tuber Graceful Beauty for turning me into this!

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: I do like this lotion. I use it on a daily basis....helps alot! With my "chicken skin"There is a very minimal lotion scent, it is NOT greasy. However the packaging of this order did not work out so well, as you can see in the photos.....it seems the lid was not tightly attached and I opened the box to a mess!

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: The product is okay. But I received a broken bottle. Almost a quarter of it was empty when I received.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: Fake! Comes open in the box with no wrapper. I have used amlacin for years and as soon as I saw the broken bottle and the cream coming out of it I knew it was real. Amlactin is much thinner, white and has a very unique smell.Do not buy from these people

It smells worse and has a tan hue to it.  It also seems to be thicker and might sting more, and it seems a bit greasier to me.  Rest assured it isn't fake though.  I bought a bottle at Walmart to compare to my old formula.  Old formula is 5 stars, new is meh.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: Two of the bottles had the lotion squeezed out of the containers due to poor packaging.  The pump dispensers are still usable.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: I’m amazed by how much the size of the bumps on the back of my arm have healed and/or decreased in appearance. I highly recommend

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: Someone poured out the original product and replaced it with something this is evident as the color of yet and this picture is different the right side pure white collar is o someone poured out the original product and replaced it with something this is evident as the color of it in this picture is different the right side pure white color  is a picture of what was a little bit left in a bottle I actually bought at a retail store and it was sealed on top with plastic not just taped with scotch tape like this one was !!

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: Something is very very wrong with this product. I have gotten a sample from my dermatologist and I have also purchased my own from my local pharmacy. This product should be a liquidy white consistency. And I mean it should be very very white. It also has a particular smell like medicine. The texture of it on your skin is also very particular. What Amazon sold to me is yellow and thick and texture and has no smell at all. It doesn’t feel the way it should on the skin. This is just very wrong. I have a chronic skin disease and I cannot use this unknown product on my skin for fear of what it may do. I will be calling for a refund and going to my local pharmacy to purchase the real deal.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
review: Defective bottle and product doesn't work well. For those of you wondering, The smell  of the lotion doesn't last long and no one will notice it.

product_name: Alitura Naturals Daily Face Moisturizer for Men and Women (50ml)
review: I love how this lotion makes my skin look and feel!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: This is the holy grail. This is THE STUFF. I'm in my late 20's and I was diagnosed with "pre-rosacea" - a mild redness to my cheeks and jawline, but none of the other symptoms such as acne. My skin looked and felt chronically dry to the point of itching no matter what I used. My skin was like, perpetually chapped. I tried everything: dandruff shampoo (for the selenium), zinc/sulphur soap (anti-bacterial), sea buckthorn oil, primrose oil, hemp oil, maracuja oil (anti-inflammatory), and azelaic acid (finacea). Nothing worked and if anything they all just exacerbated the problem.Enter niacinamide aka B3 aka the miracle ingredient that not only has anti-aging properties but, as it turns out, the ability to "address skin discolorations". Yeeeeah, you can side-eye that description if you want, I too am tired of reading about how blahblah ingredient calms redness or is an anti-inflammatory (anti-inflammatory for me=run for the hills because you're about to get a big old dose of RED)  But no, niacinamide has bigger plans than that. It is a 'cell communicating' ingredient that basically tells your well-meaning but crappier skin cells "hey, wake up and behave like you care a little". You know how when you first wake up your skin is clear and beautiful and ohmygod I-am-having-the-best-skin day ever, til you actually stand up and start moving around and then BAM it's like you ran hot water on your face except it never goes away? This product actually somehow maintains that morning skin for me, all the time. Additionally the texture has improved and it finally feels hydrated. So yeah, I recommend this product.I plan on adding vit C to my routine soon (for anti-aging) which could go either way with my skin. I have high hopes. I'll update here for any other rosaceans who are determined to find an anti-aging solution!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: This broke me out so badly! Every morning I woke up with new whiteheads! How is this labeled “non pore clogging” when it obviously clogs pores to an extent where I started getting whiteheads? If you’re using this product and experiencing little whiteheads don’t ignore! It’s not your hormones! it’s this lotion!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I almost never review products but this one was so bad that I feel like I need to warn others. I do not have sensitive skin, I've never had this issue before. This lotion made my skin so dry (after only 2-3 uses my skin has been peeling so badly), it had aggravated my acne, and worst of all, it made my eyelids and undereye area swell insanely badly. Moreover, I have tried other products from this brand because it is pretty popular and supposed to be great for dry skin. None of their products have worked for me and usually make my skin dryer, but this is the first time that I've had such a terrible reaction to one of their products.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I want to preface with the fact that I don’t have sensitive skin nor have ever had an allergic reaction to any skin products I’ve used, and wanted to try a moisturizer to help with my oily skin. I’ve heard decent reviews on this one and wanted to try it, and I started using it about a week ago each night. The first day was good, but the second night my skin started to burn. I thought I was exfoliating too much and that’s why my skin was hurting, so I kept using the moisturizer for the next couple of nights. My skin is now peeling off and puffy under my eyes and around my nose, and it BURNS (kind of like a sunburn) whenever I put any kind of face products on it to try and re-moisturize my skin. It might be an allergic reaction, but going through the reviews, I see that a couple of people have had this same reaction to this product. It’s burned my skin, dried it out and completely puffed up and reddened my face (especially around my eyes). I do not recommend this one!! Especially if you have sensitive skin!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I have been using this product for almost 2 years now. I just started using it with my dermatologist recommended the brand to me and I bought the a.m. and the p.m. to start myself off with. After a while I discovered the different face washes and the daily moisturizing lotion. After a while I transitioned to use the daily moisturizing lotion almost all the time instead of the a.m. and p.m. because I can find a cheaper sunscreen then the a.m. and the daily moisturizing works wonderfully with only putting the p.m. in a few Target area spots that I have trouble with.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: 1-star-5 star..It would be nice if you could send me another one. As soon as I went to use it the cap fell off. I really like this brand and product. Unfortunately this item is non returnable. I’d be happy to remove this comment if I could get this replaced.UPDATED: They helped me replace the broken cap lotion so I changed to 5 star. thank you

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: Why it looks like someone already used it??? The box is opened. Nothing is sealed.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I bought both the cleaners and moisturizer. I'm not sure which one is causing me to break outI skipped some days in between uses and same results.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: Product came already opened and used. Pretty disgusted.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I can't even use it. It arrived damaged.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: The product comes with no box package and the content doesn't seem to be full. The label is covered in dust and it is hard to tell whether it is used or not.The usable date is only less than 12 month.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: Immediately after applying Retin-A to my face I applied this night moisturizer.  Instantaneously I broke out in hives all around my neck line.To make sure this was not an aberration I reapplied this moisturizer without any Retin-A two nights later and the exact same thing happened.  See pictures attached.when I contacted Amazon customer service today about this egregious problem I had approximately an hour and a half of my time wasted, being circulated among three different supervisors who were of absolutely no help and asked me all sorts of repetitive, superfluous questions, culminating in one "team leader", a Dalton R, who instead of making this situation right hid behind Amazon's no return policy.when I specifically asked him what my options were besides being screwed over out of $13, he flat-out bluntly said that that was my only option.  This dude needs to be fired ASAP!do not use this product as it may not even be an OEM CeraVe product, as others have noted with its other line of products sold by Amazon such as the night cream.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: i have bought this product several times since i have very oily skin. my dermatologist recommended this product i stopped having acnes now

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I bought this product after reading all of the positive reviews. I put about a dime sized amount on the back of my hand to test it out and within 2 minutes I broke out in an awful burning rash. I instantly washed it off and put my normal lotion on. It’s been about a week and the back of my hand is still irritated and incredibly dry. I would not recommend this product at all, especially for those with sensitive skin. The only positive is that it didn’t have a strong smell.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I do believe the product makes my skin look and feel better in the morning. It has a great cooling feel to it. However it contains parabens and so I will be looking for something else, while I use it in the meantime. If they ever updated their ingredients to not contain them I’d probably stay on it.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: The only reason i give 2 star because top bottle was leaked.Just got it today.I will resubmit the product after in 2 month.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: when i open the package it's a mess！I am so sad that most of lotion was leaking！anyway， lotion is good~

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: 1. No scent at all.2. Not grease at all.3. Absorbed by skin right away. Not sticky.4. No problem doing make up after applying cerave.5. Good for people with oily skin.6. Effective and suggest for long term use.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: What has Cerave done?! I have probably used 100s of this product over MANY years. all of the sudden it smells like chemicals.... What gives?! All previous lots were fine but new lots (two different lot #s) I have received in October 2019 and November 2019 have the smell. I have noted ingredients changed (without warning) see attached picture. I havent yet evaluated what these ingredients are and whether the changes were positive (health/safety/benefits) or negative (i.e. cost savings) and I dont know which new ingredient might be the culprit for the smell or whether its not an ingredient issue but production issue. I have reached out to Cerave and all they offered me was a coupon which is a joke.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: The ABSOLUTE BEST moisturizer on the planet.  I found this thanks to Paula Begoun, cosmetic / skincare guru (CHECK HER OUT!) when I needed a moisturizer for my acne-prone yet dry, sensitive skin.  I also needed something I could purchase locally without spending an arm and a leg (I am NOT the dept. store / whole entire skincare line/ fancy product type).  It's not as cheap as some options but I'll tell you what, it's money VERY well spent.  This, along with clean and clear's foaming wash for sens. skin and a washcloth (don't underestimate it's power) comprises my entire skincare routine and I couldn't be happier.  I have hardly had a blemish since and I don't suffer from dryness like I used to.  Need I say more?I use it once a day, when I wash my face at night (either in the shower or at the sink) and it goes on super smooth and absorbs well.  Sometimes, esp. when the weather's really dry, I use it in the morning too (so go ahead and disregard that PM in the title - I think it's just because it doesn't have a sunscreen component).  I also appreciate that it works so well that my skin no longer feels 'tight' and painful after a shower pre-moisturizer - that to me is a sign it's working at a deeper level.  No stinging, no residue, just healthy skin.  Plus, while the best price is usually thru Subscribe and Save I like that if I'm ever in a pickle (ie -out of town) I can find it at a local drugstore and remain on a regimen that works so well for me.

product_name: Best Facial Moisturizer for Oily, Combination, Acne Prone, and Sensitive Skin - Light, Unscented, Grease Free, and Mattifying - Calms Inflammation - Great Under Makeup Day Cream - for Men and Women
review: This stuff is amazing.  I have acne-prone, oily skin.  I started using this along with their cleanser, and my skin has never felt so good or healthy.  Highly recommended.

product_name: Best Facial Moisturizer for Oily, Combination, Acne Prone, and Sensitive Skin - Light, Unscented, Grease Free, and Mattifying - Calms Inflammation - Great Under Makeup Day Cream - for Men and Women
review: I Love, Love, Love this product! Very excellent moisturizer I would suggest to anyone and everyone!:))

product_name: Best Facial Moisturizer for Oily, Combination, Acne Prone, and Sensitive Skin - Light, Unscented, Grease Free, and Mattifying - Calms Inflammation - Great Under Makeup Day Cream - for Men and Women
review: I was excited to try this facial moisturizer. Blue is my favorite color and I am always looking for quality lotions. When I applied the moisturizer, I detected a slight hint of a pleasant scent. It says that it is odorless, but I have a very strong sense of smell. I noticed that it feels light and airy, almost like a whipped lotion. I was disappointed when I first applied the lotion because my skin immediately looked oily. However, within 10 minutes, the oily appearance went away leaving my skin looking well hydrated. The moisturizer leaves my skin feeling very soft. It absorbs well into my skin, I don't feel like I have lotion on and I only need to apply it once a day, which I really like.DISCLAIMER: I received this item at a discount/free in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

product_name: Best Facial Moisturizer for Oily, Combination, Acne Prone, and Sensitive Skin - Light, Unscented, Grease Free, and Mattifying - Calms Inflammation - Great Under Makeup Day Cream - for Men and Women
review: Im very happy with this deal. The brush is nice for face, great peeling. There are two changeable brushes - hard and soft. Cream is light and moisturizing. Good for combination skin. It arrived in 4 days after ordered. So I got another set for a Christmas gift.

product_name: Best Facial Moisturizer for Oily, Combination, Acne Prone, and Sensitive Skin - Light, Unscented, Grease Free, and Mattifying - Calms Inflammation - Great Under Makeup Day Cream - for Men and Women
review: The first thing I want to mention is the packaging. I LOVE the design on the box this cream came in. I love the logo, it's so cool and chic. I just love everything about the way it looks.The fact that this cream is blue kind of left me a little hesitant. In my experience, but products tend to not work out well for me. They either don't deliver or they smell like granny perfume. I am so happy this was not the case this time.The cream is light and luxurious. I actually used it after using a Salicylic Acid peel and it provided my face with more than enough moisture to make up for the dryness the peel had caused. I've never used a matte moisturizer before because I love that fresh and dewey look, so I was kind of nervous about that. Needless to say, I LOVE how it made my skin look! I think I may now prefer the matte look over the dewey look! My pores are minimized, my pink rosacea cheeks are not as noticeable and my skin looks flawless... well, apart from a few acne marks that won't go away. (grrrr!)All in all, this is a fantastic product and I am so glad that I tried it!***DISCLAIMER*** I received this item discounted in exchange for my honest opinion

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: BECAREFUL OF BURNS AND RASH. Had to take my daughter to the ER. She had some dry skin so I put this all over her legs before bed. She woke up hysterical in the night with this bad break out!! Oozing pus, burns, and bleeding! I’m so upset I put this all over her :(I recommend testing this on a small area before applying.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: I love this lotion, I've used it for the last 17 years and have never had any problems with it. I even used it on all of my children as newborns.... But recently they've made a new bottle with a new "smart pump" , the one to the right. With this new "smart pump" you can NO LONGER TAKE THE CAP OFF OF THE BOTTLE. I am not happy about this. There is about an inch of lotion in the bottom of the bottle that the new "smart pump" is not pumping out of the bottle!!! I now have to resort to cutting the bottle open to get ALL of the lotion out of the bottle. Please take the new "smart pump" back and give original bottle back, to the left.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: Lotion is great but the new pump dispenser is horrible. The previous design made it really clear which side of the pump the lotion was dispensed from. With the new design I have to pick up the bottle and look for which end the lotion is coming from. It’s impossible to tell looking at it from above where the lotion comes out - I’ve dispensed its w my hand under the wrong end many times.  Really, really bad design.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: Love the lotion...  hate the blue pump.  The photo shows I was buying the white pump.  Squirts out in a blob instead of narrow stream.  Also makes it impossible to refill my small purse bottle.  Very Disappointed 😔

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: This is not the real Vaseline cocoa radiant. I know that for fact because it’s the only thing I use as my skin is very sensitive.  As soon as I used it I got an allergic reaction and the smell is too perfumey Not cocoa butter at all. You should be ashamed of yourselves selling fake things! People can really get hurt with this kind of stuff!

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: I  dislike that one was broke and it have difficulty open

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: The lotions were open and poured into the box. So I guess I just wasted my money.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: Arrived perfectly in tact! Great price and product!

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: Mfd date is 01/2010 bought this online in oct 2019 gave this as gift to friend who said its very old manufactured in 2010...was a shocker and put me in a spot

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: Broken and they won’t let me return it or exchange it

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: So my boyfriend bought me this, in a 3 pack, because i was running out of the one i normally get from CVS. We bought this with the intent of getting Vaseline Aloe Soothe. This is not it. I noticed it instantly when i opened it. 1. it smells like melon, the real one, does not, at least not nearly as strong as this one. 2. It's labeled as "Vaseline soothing hydration", Vaseline does not have a product called soothing hydration.Now, knowing this was a fake, I decided to try it, when i started, my skin was perfect because of the real one i was getting from CVS. i saw some reviews saying that it worked for some people, so figured maybe it might for me too. I was wrong. i've been using it for 3 days and my skin feels awful, there is nothing hydrated feeling about it. My skin feels dry, and honestly hurts. I in no way recommend this product, just go to your closest Walmart or CVS and buy it there, don't even risk it.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: Now company changes the bottle with " new smart pump".  i tried for once but this new product is not good. The original bottle is great and I used for many years. I requested return but they send again this new bottle.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: when does it expired or MFD?

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: This 3 pack of Vaseline brand cocoa butter body lotion is a great deal, and my go-to body lotion. Apply after showering and feel baby soft for days! It has a mildly sweet scent I love, typical to cocoa or shea butter. And I'm paying much less for it here than I was at the drug or grocery store. I go through this stuff pretty quickly and will buy again. 20.3 fl oz per bottle for a total of 60.9 fl oz.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: I've used this product for years, and I love it. I get occasional psoriasis on my legs and nothing I've found works better than Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Lotion. It's just a great product.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz

review: This product is probably fake bc/ it has stickers on the jar and the real one, as a friend showed me on his jar, is embossed on the jar!?!https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0012J30LY/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_1

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: This is a fake product.Below are the feedback I got from P&G:Beka: Our US products will not say "Made in Thailand". They will also state, "Distributed by P&G out of Cincinnati Ohio".

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: My pictures show the before and after effects of using this Olay Regenerist. The time frame was about a year. Keep in mind too, I've had one heck of a year. It has tried to age me even more, but I think the results are in favor of Olay. I think my entire neck, especially the area at the base has had the biggest improvement. Also, the wrinkles around my mouth have improved.I apply this in the morning and before bedtime (to be honest, sometimes I don't get to it at night. I also don't wear any makeup). Every day I also use a 2.5% Retinol serum and 100SPF sunscreen. I have found that just smoothing in the Olay cream doesn't allow it to fully absorb into my skin. It'll also "ball up" if I rub my face. I started wetting my fingertips a couple of times to smooth it in. Possibly that's why it has worked so well for me???I would wholeheartedly recommend to everyone trying to diminish wrinkles to try this out. I will continue to use it until it stops working for me.

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: almost 42 years and love this product have been using for 3 years, found the bigger size on amazon and save  about $15 on price and free shipping with my prime.

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: So, this is what I received. I have been using Olay Regenerist since a long time, but the packaging itself looked so different than what I had been using. I am just not convinced that its authentic Olay product.

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: I was exceedingly skeptical about purchasing a face product not made organically. I use only edible grade oils as everything else makes my rosacea go out-of-control. But I am in my mid-thirties now, it's cold, and my oils were not cutting it. This is my 4th product, Eclos being the first (works well but difficult to find), No. & (rosacea did NOT like), and Boot's Botanics (horrid smelling and rosacea irritating), then this stuff. The Regenerist system is wonderful. I use oil to remove my makeup, the cream cleanser to deep clean, then the serum and the cream. The latter I use in the morning and evening. My skin is silky and moisturized, and my fine lines have disappeared (I do not have any deep lines yet, so I can't speak to those). Most exciting (and unanticipated) is that my rosacea has improved after 1 week's use, the redness and sensitivity is nearly gone, which is a miracle during the winter months. It is much pricier than making all my own stuff, but well worth it for the fantastic results. I have two photos, one is a typical my-face shot, and the other (the one that insists on being effing sideways, sorry) is after a week's use. The difference in redness on my face and the texture of my skin is pretty cool, and both pictures are without filters/makeup. I hope this review helps someone! I am a for-life user!I added another picture as an update (short hair). I'm 37 year's old now and still using the product. :-)

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: This is a Mircle cream for me, I have been using this product for about month now. The results are amazing, my skin is a lot smoother, and younger looking. I get complements all the time about how go my skin looks, and I will be 47 in a couple months

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: Apparently, I was the only one who didn't know about this stuff. I moisturize my face with Jergens everyday since I have dry, sensitive skin but it wasn't doing anything for my wrinkles. I can notice a difference after 7 days. It smells amazing too! I even noticed my makeup lasts longer and looks better. I even bought the facial cleanser to go along with it. I'm going to use these forever :)

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: I got the real thing.  I read a lot of reviews saying it’s fake and that’s a bummer for those that were scammed. I can see the difference in packaging.  Gratefully my purchase wasn’t a scam.  If it is they did one heck of a job making it believable! There are no sticker labels and it says it’s made in OH (USA). Can’t wait to see what it does in a week. The cream isn’t missing but a significant amount comes off with the lid... like creams do.

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: Like other reviewers have said, this is a fake product. I wish I would’ve read the reviews before buying. Why does amazon allow this to happen? Clearly they are scamming ppl through Amazon and hurting their reputation. I won’t buy face products through amazon anymore.

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: I didn't  appreciate it. It's sticky. The problem was the perfume. It felt like a took a perfume page out of magazine and rubbed it on my face.I've been using Skinn cosmetics and Prai for 10 yrs.Don't bother. Waste of money.

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: There is a hologram seal on the opening of the box , this is the only way i can trust the product is unopened. The box I received, did not have the seal & there were nail marks on the box that shows the seal was tampered & the box was opened.I cannot trust this product for its genuineness or if someone has used this before it was given to me. Really bad !

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: Disappointed to open the cream to find a gaping hole where product should be. I’m aware that sometimes there can be air gaps however, a big blob missing equates to about a week less of using this which means more cost and less value. On the upside it arrived quickly.

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: My skin feels so soft and clean after using this moisturizer only once a day with the additional micro sculpting serum. I love it!

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: I love the face cream, and I use it to improve my skin and keep it young looking longer.
