product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: Have used it for years & at 81 I still get compliments!!!!!Love it.....

product_name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin B3+, 1.7 oz
review: This product is great, but arrived mangled and torn.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I really love this product. When i first purchased a Seoul Ceuticals i bought the moisturizer and the vitamin C serum and i loved it! . The moisturizer is so light that you wont feel that you put moisturizer in your face because i’ve tried so many moisturizer already and i can say that the seoul ceuticals moisturizer is the best moisturizer i tried and so i decided to stick to this product and use this forever.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I heard many good thinks about snail creams and I was very eager to try it out. The packaging was cool and the product smelled nice, but the product has so many additional things in it.I only used a little bit of the product on the cap to test it out. I used probably one dip of product. I don't know what exactly caused my face to become inflamed, but after using it I have rashes all over my face. Being that I've never used snail cream before, I don't t know if that is what caused my reaction. However, I do know that this "repair" cream had the opposite effect on me. It damaged my smooth skin and left it bumpy and acne-like. I have attached photos of my skin. You can call it acne or what ever, but that is what my skin looks like after the product. It is so damaged right now and so raised. I also developed lip "pimples" after using this product for a while.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: Here’s my deal. Started using it all over my face since it’s dry after washing (but I’m usually oily the rust of the day). Now it does make the skin softer, like way softer. Even took away the purple under my eyes, but I did break out some as you can see. I don’t think you should use it all over if you have really oily skin like I do, cause you’re doubling up on oil. But I’m gonna keep using it under my eyes cause I love the results.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: This is the first time I’ve ever written a review,& I hope the last. I’m usually way too lazy to review any product whether it’s good or bad.But MAN...Was this product a hoax.I saw many positive reviews on this moisturizer, so I thought I’d give it a try. I’m a “10-step Korean skin care” advocate, so the marketing on this product really manipulated  me into purchasing.I have rather sensitive skin, and occasionally get a pimple or two around that time of the month (which is not right now FYI). I slowly tested this on my face..& 4 days later and I have had an allergic, acne-filled reaction,Mostly on my chin. I have also had a lot of my pores on my cheeks get clogged up, which has NEVER happened in my 21 years of life.I am beyond frustrated and a bit upset that this product didn’t live up to its expectations.If you have sensitive or acne prone skin, PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS. Save your time, money, and energy and find an organic or less chemical filled moisturizer.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: Idk if I got a bad one or a fake one but this cream looks light weightless but when i applied it to my face it felt like my skin was being suffocated it was really a uncomfortable feeling!! It was almost like I was applying a thick cream on my face and also I think it caused some little break outs. I’m really disappointed with this product bc everyone who reviewed had a lot of good things to say about. I really had high hopes this was of waste of money!! Btw I do have oliy/acne prone skin

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I’m not sure how the product works just yet because I have to send it back. The tamper evident seal was clearly broken when I took it out of the bubble wrap, and when I opened it to see if it had been tampered with there was lotion all over the rim and it was just a mess. I’m going to reorder because of the other positive reviews and I really want to try it, but I hope it’s new this time.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: Seoul Ceuticals Snail Repair could have first been off-putting because the Western world is still averse to snails, starfish, and other K-Beauty advanced beauty concepts, but having a bit of knowledge in the Korean world and its top-of-the-line Skincare Science, I was ultimately excited to try it!The container was filled to the lip, which was surprising, but I'm ultimately glad than it was overfull, instead of 2/3 product as a lot of companies try to market.I used Seoul Ceuticals Snail Repair as my moisturizer/lotion step in my 10-step regimen. It glides on smooth, effortless, and maintains a beautiful consistency. It has a lightweight formula that doesn't overpower the senses, leave my sensitive skin feeling stripped, inflamed or irritated. It's a product that I felt, on my 'quick days' to smooth on without fear of it causing a rash, or not hold-up in one of the rushed days where you're barely getting out of the door. Perfumed formulas immediately break me out, but this has nothing of the sort, and it's a pleasant experience over all.I am noticing weekly improvements and skin softening overtime, that hadn't been there before. I have not broken out, or felt skin conditions of acne, or developed any side-effects during its usage. Overall, I think it's an excellent moisturizer, and I look forward to more Seoul Ceutical products in the future!

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: To start, I have dry, ridiculously picky skin that does not take to many moisturizers.  Most moisturizers will sit on the top of my thirsty skin and dry to gross, leftover flakes.  This was a completely different experience for me, and I've been thoroughly impressed with this whole skin care line so far.Back to the product... The smell when you open the jar is delicious.  It hit my nose right away; citrusy, and fresh.  The consistency of this cream is also just right.  This is not thick and cakey, and applies smooth without burning or irritation.  It goes on a little greasy looking, which was unexpected for me, but weirdly enough I like.  Applying it also leaves a shine finish on the skin for a while.  That said, the moisturizer did absorb for me, and I love the way it leaves my skin dewy and actually, for once, moisturized!If you are prone to perspiration in the summer months, as I am, this will melt off a bit. Even when it does, my skin feels hydrated and protected.  I've never had that before.I feel like this is a pretty standard sized glass tub and looks enough product to last for a few months.  Right now, it's working well with an essence and serum.  This is my new holy grail moisturizer!I have a few pictures attached so you can see the size of the jar in comparison to some normal tweezers, as well as the color and consistency of the product.  My glass jar came with a seal that said don't use if broken. The label states this cream is cruelty free, and the canister is recyclable. Additionally, in case anyone needs, there's a picture of the directions to apply and ingredients list.  I hope you have the luck I did!

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: This product helps with my dark eye bags and also gives instant brightening on my skin. The cream itself has a bit of a 'bouncy' texture. It has a very light smell of tangerines that doesn't linger for too long. The cream seems dense at first but after application it quickly gets absorbed into the skin!  I use it mainly as a night cream. In the mornings when I use the snail cream the night before, my face is so well moisturized and bright that I don't even need to apply anything else to start the day!

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I was eyeballing this cream for a while before purchasing. I use it as my daytime moisturizer in my Korean beauty routine. At first, the size surprised me. However, it really hold up well!Tbh, I was grieving and I went to wash my face. After applying the moisturizer again, 80% of the redness left my face. It didn't change my circumstances but it did give me momentary peace to see my skin return nearly to normal.Not to leave this review on a sad note, I will say that I am glad I've tried this cream. I put my recommendation behind it.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I was skeptical but this has reduced redness and smoothed out my skin . Left is before right is after about 30 days of using daily. I use as a serum not a moisturizer, I have very dry somewhat sensitive skin. Experienced no breakouts.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: Works fine, issue was with the packaging/defect. Mine came with it half empty, like it got spun out of it.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: Update: It has been working well! I'm using this and another product and haven't broken out or had any negative reactions. I use it on my whole face during the night, but that's a bit too heavy during the day, so I only use it on only my really troublesome areas.There's outer and inner tamper seals, hooray! I've only used it twice, so I can't say what it does in the long run. However, I've been using Retin-A and this has already made my skin feel better (plus it has a nice citrus scent)! My last moisturizer worked incredibly well, but I wanted to try some new things. This seems promising so far! I'll update my results in a couple weeks.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I am very particular about what I put on my face because I struggled with adult acne for years only to realize my acne was being caused by dry skin (I live in a dry climate). This is a very moisturizing, non-oily moisturizer. I use it all over my face and neck at night. Don’t let the snail stuff gross you out. You can’t smell anything funky from it. I use sunless tanning drops in my nightly skin-care routine and this moisturizer gave me the most even tan. Very happy with it.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: It came damaged with a huge crack in the lid. I tried to tape it but the product got dry so I only used it once. The smell is a bit off-putting. Trying a different brand.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I have been using this moisturizer every morning and night for two weeks now and it has become a quick holy grail product for me! My skin has become noticeably more firm and bright and very well hydrated. It is a wonderful lightweight moisturizer that absorbs quickly into the skin. The scent is pleasant and not overwhelming. It is a great base before applying my makeup, it helps my foundation look beautiful! It gives a great glow to the skin. It is now a permanent staple in my skincare routine.

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I am always looking for a good moisturizer without feeling oily. This has a great scent, it smells like fresh peeled oranges or zest of the orange. It feels creamy and I put it all over my face and neck at night. Its not heavy or thick. Plus super affordable.  Thanks!!

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I use this 2x a day, I love it! I use it afer cleanse, tone and vitamin c serum in the morning and after I cleanse and tone at night. Since switching to this and their vitamin c serum my skin tone and acne has improved so much!

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I wanted to like it but my face broke out (i have dry sensitive skin) after using. It smells nice though and works well as a hand cream. Fast shipment with a sealed sticker on the side to prevent tampering

product_name: Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream - Korean Moisturizer Night Cream 97.5% Snail Mucin Extract - All In One Recovery Power For The Most Effective Korean Beauty Routine - 2oz
review: I purchase this January 2020,The top started cracking in small pieces and fall inside the cream.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I feel a little awkward posting a picture of myself after spending the day in hot and humid 75degree weather, mowing, gardening, and having a busy day of taking care of my grandfather... But, because I rely on people’s reviews, I have to give credit when credit is due...❤️I LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER❤️I’ve NEVER been able to find a lotion that can moisturize my skin without it looking greasy, or a  “non greasy” lotion that I have to apply 1000 times a day..🔸I have severely sundamaged skin🔸I have deep visible pores🔸I have very oily and very “shiny” skin🔸I have acne prone skin🔸I have patches around my nose and eyelids that are always dryI HAVE SOME AWFUL SKIN and yea it sucks!🔹This moisturizer has made my face feel so soft, gives it a GLOW🔹the amount I use is 2-4 finger tips of moisturizer on my face after I wake up and before I go to sleep🌟For those who want to know my skin care routine:💥1st I clean my face with 2% Salicylic Acid acne wash💥2nd I use witch hazel for a toner to remove any left over residue (instead of astringent)💥3rd I make my own sugar scrubs (they are random concoctions usually consisting of raw honey, aloe Vera jel, sugar, fresh squeezed ginger from a garlic squisher, baking soda, and/or oatmeal)💥4th twice a week I use bentonite clay for a mask mixed with raw apple cider vinegar, honey, and activated charcoal💥5th again use witch hazel toner to remove any clay residue💥6th I use Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid serum for hydration💥7th I apply this moisturizer💥8th I put rosehip or jojoba oil and tamanu oil over the moisturizerIt SOUNDS like a pain in the butt and a long process but it’s not!🌟I started using this lotion early May 2018 and it is now May 19, 2018 and I already see a difference🌟I would definitely recommend CeraVe, seeing as how I’ve been disappointed with so many products in the past and this is the 1st time in my life I’ve ever seen my skin’s appearance improve

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I was suffering from itchy legs, a wintertime horrid problem, I mean a month of this was just too much. This stuff healed my dry skin in 2 days! Seriously, I haven't itched since, amazing, and not too much impresses me. Nor do I write many reviews. I now use it on my face, ears, elbows and feet. And if you wanted to compliment me on my legs, thanks, I know I've got good looking ones LOL. FYI it comes in a nice 19 Oz size, plenty without worrying about running out soon.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: there are 2 before and 2 after photos. I had started a new acne medicine and it was causing me so much texture and redness and overall drying my face out so I read the reviews and bought this. These photos were taken about a month apart, using this moisturizer 2-3 times a week, I find that I do not need to use it as often as a daily moisturizer, only when I am doing heavy exfoliants or after deep cleansing my skin. as you can see the texture is gone and the redness has gone down drastically, my face is no longer itchy and craving moisture. it is very thick so use sparingly. it is a very large container of it so it will last a long time! there is no scent and has not broken my skin out at all. it soothes my face, and will sink into your skin but no so much that your pores are clogged. no oily residue left on the skin once it absorbs either. I have incredibly sensitive skin as well and this has NEVER caused me any problems, only solved them

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This is one of my two most favorite body moisturizers!I am a huge fan of Cerave and this product is truly off the charts in quality. With 3 ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid (HA), Petrolatum, and Dimethicone, my skin has never been so soft and healthy. And there are NO perfumes/fragrances for my sensitive skin!This is definitely a cream, versus a lotion. But it is not too thick. It applies easily to the skin and soaks in quickly, there is no cast.  It does briefly leave a rather slippery feel to the skin but that fades. I attribute that to the HA, which if you have used pure HA serum you know that feeling.I love this tub, 19 ounces of wonderful skin softening Cerave! You can not go wrong trying this product. I use it daily, it is even gentle enough to use on your face and neck.I recommend this product, can I give more than 5 stars?!If you find this review helpful please give it a 'yes' so I know!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I’m sure it’s a great product however there was apparently an explosion on the way to my house.Update: After dropping off the explosion at the UPS store, I picked some up from Walgreens. It really DOES feel good and the moisture does stay on for a long time. I’m have acne prone skin, and it feels pretty good so far. It’s a little heavier than I’d like, but I haven’t found any light feeling moisturizers that actually do their job.Update #2: Ok so after a week or so worth’s of use...y’all. Apparently most moisturizers don’t work. I have acne prone combination skin and on other moisturizers, I would have oily and dry patches. Y’all! I have NORMAL SKIN NOW!!! Granted I am using other stuff as well, but I have not oily and not dry anymore!! AND my skin looks SO healthy now. I don’t think I could ever really say that before. Again, I’m using other stuff but wow. I am the world’s biggest skeptic when it comes to face stuff as having struggled most of my life with skin issues. Hopefully they’ll package a little better but the actual product has worked amazingly well in only about a week and a half. The only reason it’s not given more stars is because it came damaged and I had to get it from somewhere else. I didn’t want to risk another potential explosion.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I use this on my face as a moisturizer and it’s incredibly lightweight. Dries quickly and I can apply makeup over it within minutes.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Ive heard good things about CeraVe, but I haven't tried it until now it and I love it. I didn't expect the container to be this big, I can already tell you that it's money well spent. This moisturizer isn't exactly scentless, it's smells like milk on your face, but it's very light so it's not bad. What I love about this cream is how soft it makes my skin feel the next morning, and I have dry skin so most of the time my skin would be peeling off my face which is extremely uncomfortable. They also last pretty much the entire day. So I don't have to worry about my skin drying anymore when I'm outside. Definitely the best moisturizer I've used!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: There are moisturizing creams and there are lotions. I was looking for a cream, but I’m one of those people who read everything and check it out first. At first I thought I was looking at a popular product, but the ingredients convinced me this was a much better product.The selling point for me was “hydration”, which is a big issue for skin health. Bought the jar, tried it out, and very happy with it. The cream is very smooth, non-greasy, and obviously formulated to deliver a better-than usual experience for general use. Surprisingly nice fragrance, too, rather than the iffy, chemical smells you get from some products. I have really dry skin and this cream has helped my skin quite a bit.I would seriously advise anyone looking for a better moisturizing cream to try this product.Pros:- Great for dry skin- Not greasy- Neutral/gentle smell- HydrationCons:- None so far

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This is the best cream i have ever used! My skin has been so dried out due to hypo thyroid and this is the only thing i could find to ease it! Baby lotion didnt even help! My face is smooth again! And it works fast! This is a definate must have!!! And the jar is huge! My husband has even started getting into it! Lol he has psoriasis on his hands and he says it really helps with that! Definitely worth the price!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: If I could give this 50 ⭐️ stars I would. My husband and my son had extremely bad eczema. So bad that his pediatrician scheduled to meet with the dermatologist in July. We tried every product on the market literally. All the other products kept making his skin worse. My husband seen a commercial for this and told me to order it for our son. We have been using it for almost a week now and his skin has cleared up amazing. I wish I had before pictures but they weren’t really that clear so we attached pictures since using it. He does still try to itch but we stop him. This product is amazing!!!! We use it 2 times a day on him. If you haven’t you should try this product.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: The product is good but this time when I got it, it’s open because of shipping or?!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I'm not sure what I expected, afterall this lotion is hyped up in the skincare community, but it exceeds all expectations. It's seriously the most amazing lotion ever. I use it at night, after a double wash and serums. My bf uses it after shaving. I even used it on my feet.  It soaks in so well, has almost no scent, doesn't clog my pores. It's seriously a holy grail product.  I barely use any and it covers my entire face. About a tsp size drop covers my body! Seriously. To put it on my face, I use my middle 3 fingers and just tap them parallel into the lotion (see image). I do that twice and it covers my entire face with a little left over for my hands. I will never wear another lotion.  Ever.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: this stuff is amazing. I've been using it since early 2017 and I'll never use another face moisturizer again. it absorbs easily and isn't greasy, has no fragrance, provides long lasting moisture, and keeps your skin in great shape. plus I use it twice a day and a tub still lasts for a year!!! can't say enough good things about CeraVe!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Although it's a good product, received A USED cream.  Utterly disgusted and will be removing from my subscribe and save.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Different labeling from my last container. And cream is not as thick. So my thoughts are, is this container authentic. I have my concerns. But, because I did not need to open this right away, it has passed the return date.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I have a hormonal disorder that wreaks havoc on my skin. I struggle with a dry and red patchy face. I've tried countless creams, lotions, butters, etc. and nothing works. I've had this product for 2 days and already see results. I love that is is fragrance free too! Highly recommend this moisturizer!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This moisturizer burned my face! And I'm not saying it felt like it was burning, it seriously caused burn marks on my face! I am incredibly angry! Initially it seemed as though it might be causing me acne, but this is definitely not acne. I'm glad I stopped using this when I did because aside from the bigger burns I have various smaller burn marks all around my face that could have resulted a lot worse. This area around my nose is what suffered the most. I'm really hoping this doesn't scar.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: The tub’s quite dirty and there is no manufacturing date so I’m not sure how long it’s been sitting around for. However it is sealed. Quite like the product, have only used it for a day so I can’t vouch for its long-term effectiveness. I have very oily skin but have eczema and rosacea so it seems to be gentle enough for my skin, and it absorbs quite quickly! Doesn’t feel too heavy.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Had this product for 6 months it's still hydrating. Only use it as a face moisturizer and its past halfway. Still have months of use left and I use this product everyday.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Haven't tried it as yet but it arrived early, bigger than I thought, excellent package didn't spilled and it absolutely worth the money. Will give further reviews once I tried it

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter SPF 30 Face Moisturizer with Vitamin C, 2.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I really wanted a cream that moisturize and not turn up with white little things on my skin when i touch it. Even when I apply minimal amount i still get these white stuff like dead skin on my face everytime I touch it.  I added a photo to show what I mean. I had this problem with Olay and this product and will continue to search for better options

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter SPF 30 Face Moisturizer with Vitamin C, 2.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Fresh and soft.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter SPF 30 Face Moisturizer with Vitamin C, 2.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Nice, light, creamy texture! Love it!

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter SPF 30 Face Moisturizer with Vitamin C, 2.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Just got delivered, opened it and this is what I see! Not pleased. Why is it out of the box???

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter SPF 30 Face Moisturizer with Vitamin C, 2.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I think I am going to love this (thus the four stars), but haven't tried it yet. The ingredients and price are just what I was looking for. However, the wording on the bottle itself was different than the wording on the box. Should I be concerned? I would love to hear comments from others. Thank you.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter SPF 30 Face Moisturizer with Vitamin C, 2.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I really enjoyed using this Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter Anti-Sun Damage Daily Moisturizer Spf 30 , the product is very light going on and absorbs very quickly without leaving an oily feel to my skin. The scent of this moisturizing sun screen is light and I really enjoyed wearing it. This post was sponsored by Garnier SkinActive as part of a sampling activation for Crowdtap. I received complimentary products to facilitate my review.

product_name: Neutrogena Visibly Even Daily Facial Moisturizer With Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Face Lotion with Soy for Skin Discoloration, Dark Spots & Even Skin Tone, Hypoallergenic, 1.7 fl. Oz
review: I’ve just started using it but so far it’s been a good moisturizer. It absorbs into the skin very well, not greasy at all. I have a bad dry skin under my nose (winter runny nose) so I did use more there than the rest of my face but it’s working well there too. It does has a light smell of sunscreen but it’s not overwhelming. I also just used this after using my Aztec clay mask today and it doesn’t burn at all. I consider myself a person with normal skin but usually moisturizers  would burn or irritate my face after my mask but all I felt was a slight warm sensation and that was about it, imagine steam from a cup of hot cocoa rising up to your face.

product_name: Neutrogena Visibly Even Daily Facial Moisturizer With Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Face Lotion with Soy for Skin Discoloration, Dark Spots & Even Skin Tone, Hypoallergenic, 1.7 fl. Oz
review: One of the products were open

product_name: Neutrogena Visibly Even Daily Facial Moisturizer With Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Face Lotion with Soy for Skin Discoloration, Dark Spots & Even Skin Tone, Hypoallergenic, 1.7 fl. Oz
review: Holds up to Florida heat,humidity,and rain. Genuinely not sticky,not oily,absorbs super fast,leaves my skin very soft. Has a light sunscreen scent. I would highly recommend this one for sun protection. Haven’t used it long enough to see if it evens skin tone.

product_name: Neutrogena Visibly Even Daily Facial Moisturizer With Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Face Lotion with Soy for Skin Discoloration, Dark Spots & Even Skin Tone, Hypoallergenic, 1.7 fl. Oz
review: I haven't even tried it yet but fortunately for me, I did not try it on my sensitive face yet because they sold me an EXPIRED product. I bought it two weeks ago and did not even check the item because I read customer reviews for this seller and it seemed there was no problem. so I did not touch it until today (I have a lot of skincare products so I was thinking about saving it until I finished my current one. I decided to try it today to see how it feels, and I saw the expiration date was May 2014. I was so surprised at first, thinking I saw it wrong. I turned my light on, just so I can make sure I saw everything right, I checked with my bf as well. YET the item is expired, it is said EXP 2015/04. I do not know if it is a mistake to send me an expired item or not, but either way, it is unethical and irresponsible. It is a skincare product, it could totally ruin my face. Lucky for me, I checked it before using, and I checked it just 2 weeks after I bought it, not months after.

product_name: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel - Combination Oily To Oily Skin Clinique 6.7 oz Moisturizer For Unisex
review: Please save your money and look at the pictures. Very clearly a fake replica from China. SAD!

product_name: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel - Combination Oily To Oily Skin Clinique 6.7 oz Moisturizer For Unisex
review: No original copia replica pruducto  chino

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Thankfully, I squeeze the lotion out onto my hand first because I keep finding these glass like particles throughout my lotion. Pictures attached.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I used to use Physiogel lotion and cream both typesAnd recently was looking for a replacement just bc I wanted to try something new.Then found this! I heard a lot of good things about this brand already so it was an easy decision.I have acne-prone, sensitive, oily (but extremly dry on some areas on my face) skin, so it is hard to find products that are just right for me.This cream was delivered in a decent condition, the box was clean and with no damage, but one thing not really satisfying is the tube was not sealed.It has very creamy texture, not watery at all, as you can see in the pictures I’ve attached.And the size of the product is actually bigger than I thought it would be-attached a picture of it next to Aveeno hand cream to compare the size.When I tried it on my face, there was no irritation at all, no burning or stinging feelings.It is not greasy at all, but still moisturizing enough that I can feel it right after one application.I am very satisfied with this purchase, and willing to buy another one after this.I’m so happy that I ordered it to use for the cold and dry weather we are having.I highly recommend this facial moisturizer for anybody who is looking for one that is not too overwhelming but still moisturizing enough :)

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I bought this because I have Rosacea subtype 2 (papular/pustule - so basically tiny, painful pimple-like bumps that DO NOT respond to any type of acne treatment). I still can't figure out if I have triggers & nothing seems to help when I have flares.  During these flares, my moisture barrier is non-existent and my skin becomes so dry that it peels & scales.  I bought this on a whim & cannot believe the difference in just a few days.  My cheeks are still a little rosy, but I have ZERO pustules & the broken capillaries seem to be gone as well.  It even got rid of the blackheads on my nose that I can NEVER get rid of.  If this continues to help then I'm a customer for life. The 1st pic is from a week ago & the 2nd is right now.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: There I was.It was a Tuesday, mid October, 2018. I’m pacing Walgreens skin care aisle, reading labels up & down. Sweaty & hormonal, pregnant & confused.There she was; the esthetician angel hired by Walgreens. She approaches me.“How can I help you?” I look at her, she looks at me. She must be in her 60s? But her skin looks flawless. (Seriously do pores just disappear at her age?) She doesn’t even have wrinkles, except for some beautifully placed smile lines.“Sure,” I mumble; clearly disheartened. “My face is freaking out. I’ve spent $100+ these last few months trying to fix it. I’ve never had an issue-before this pregnancy- & I don’t know what’s wrong with my skin!” I continue to vent hormonally, “Breaking out, greasy one moment & dry & flaky the next-“She nods her head up & down as I speak, eyes shimmering in understanding behind her rimless glasses. She’s been here before.“Have you tried La Roche moisturizer? It’s probiotic thermal water works miracles.”I haven’t of course.My fairy godmother (for who else could this angel be?) hands me the unsuspecting bottle. $20 dollars? I scoff inwardly at the high price tag, not fully understanding yet what a gift this is.SPF or no spf? (It doesn’t matter I later find out, they both were made by the beautiful witches of the west & represent it.)It worked that very night. My face literally healed in 24 hours. (Read the back of the bottle. It does what it says)18 months later, I’m on my 5th bottle. My face is supple, even, and I barely wear makeup. (cc cream by it, & that’s it.)It’s magical. Whats in this bottle? Sorcery perhaps?“ANY SUFFICIENTLY ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY IS INDISTINGUISHABLE FROM MAGIC”My only wish is it came in a bigger bottle.*ive added a photo with myself wearing it cc cream, but you can see my face looks lovely. Thank you fairy god mother of science. THANK YOU

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I broke out immediately after using this product. I had white heads and red bumps all across my face.It claims to be for ”sensitive” skin but I guess that's not true. This product is no better than something from a drug store. Disgusting.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I wanted a moisturizer to use after the La Roche Posay cleanser because I really love that cleanser.This item is lighter than regular facial cream and a little thicker than a lotion and I think the texture and the light  scent are perfect for me.My face is easy  to get irritated If I start using a new facial product and recently I am using the Claims double serum so I need something to calm my skin down.And I think this moisturizer is a good choice.Mine came in a good condition .without the seal which I have seen them at Kohl's the same way.Just hope there will be less and less people that just order things then use them for a while then return .that might be how it happened that there were customers received almost empty bottles.I have experienced that .Received boots that have been worn with dirty soles...

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Since I moved to another type of climate, my face is pink and dry. Typically my face would be nice and oily, so I would never need moisturizer, but I guess that all changes, too, since I have been getting older. The problem is, and just like my 66-year-old mother, she gets oily skin. And there have been times where I have accumulated a couple pimples here and there, every so often from using this moisturizer.I mean, my skin looks a lot more radiant, but just watch out, because if you don’t have extremely dry skin, then it could pose problems on the pimple level.Edit:June 2019 I have been using this now for the past couple months, and I can say, I love the fact that it protects me from the sun, it also gives me a glow, during times when my skin is completely dry from using soaps to clean my face. However, I still have to avoid answering areas, as it has been giving me pimples. So I can definitely say if you are pimples or acne prone, you may want to find something else.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I am very happy that I found this product. I have been on the hunt for an oil free sunscreen that doubles as a moisturizer for a good portion of 5 years- and I am so happy that I landed on this one. It’s lightweight, no dominating smell, and truly moisturizes. It’s an exceptional product for the price. I have 30 year old, acne prone skin and this does not clog pores or cause breakouts- major plus. This bottle will definitely last the summer and probably longer.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I only used it for 3 days and it repaired my skin. The redness and pimples caused by another moisturizer are gone! I've never seen a product so efficient! Highly recommended!The only thing I hope the brand does is to seal their products, so the customers will feel safer using them.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Just received this item. It was either sold before and used or they are ripping people off by not filling the tube. There was barely any lotion in the tube. Very disappointed. Probably can’t tell from picture but  there is no way there is 2.5 ounces of lotion in this tube

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I decided to try this sunscreen after reading good reviews. I normally use Boots No 7 day cream with SPF 30, but it is pricey and can make me look shiny so I wanted to try something else. When I received the Double Repair Face Moisturizer, the packaging was really beat up/janky looking (see photos) and I couldn't tell if someone had opened the tube already. I decided to give it a go anyway. The lotion itself was pleasant and absorbed nicely, but was not as moisturizing as Boots and just didn't impress me too much.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I’m on day two. My face burns slightly & I got a little rash on my face with pimples. Am sure it was the oxybenzone (I looked up the ingredient). I will return it and try the one that says oxybenzone free... simply because I really liked the moisturizing aspect of it.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I REALLY wanted to love this product but I kept finding with glass or plastic slivers in it, I even thought maybe I had something on my hands prior to applying but it happened several times when trying it again (picture For reference )

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Please do not buy this product. This product contains glass shards in it. Other people have mentioned it as well, and I found it in my Order as well. I didn’t read the reviews until I was curious if others had the glass issue as well. Save your money don’t buy it. Other people on Reddit said the same thing. The product should not be sold.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: El producto llegó abierto y destruido el empaque

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: The box arrived smashed and the moisturizer was unsealed - without any metallic protection on the tube. Pretty disappointing...

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Best moisturizer I have ever had. Light feeling, not greasy.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Just got it , and it’s almost empty!! I even removed the lid to double-check and it’s really almost empty! Very disappointed 😞

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Every night. So far so good

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Great product BUT kept finding small glass shards every time I used it. Would not order again after cutting my face from the glass shards

product_name: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: This is a good product for Body, but didn't seem to work for face. It was recommended by our dermatologist. It does what it says, it is okay for sensitive. But it doesn't keep the skin moisturized for longer, you'll have to reapply. I think that's becaue of the lotion formula. I'll give the cream a try and see how that works.Pros:☆ Non-comedogenic (doesn't cause blackheads by blocking the pores of the skin).☆ Fragrance free.☆ Good base for makeup.☆ Works good for eczema, dry skin.☆ Good base lotion for diy makeup (tinted moisturiser, creamy eyeshadow,etc.)☆ Comes in a small bottle of 2 oz, perfect for travel, to keep in car.☆ Keeps hands and legs well moisturized.Cons:¤ Not really for every skin type. Didn't really work for oily skin.¤ Too many ingredients.¤ Doesn't say paraben free.Overall it is a decent product for the price.

product_name: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types is a good, general purpose moisturizer that will work well for most people. I have to pull out "the big guns" at certain times of the year because my skin goes beyond dry. Even so, this lotion brings me welcome relief on a daily basis. I have attached photos of before and after. The before shot shows the lotion in my hand. You can also see rough patches on the skin of my hand in the before shot.  In the after shot, the rough areas have smoothed out and the appearance of dry lines have minimized. That is pretty impressive for skin as rough as mine using such a light lotion as this. The skin cleanser is also a pleasure to use and conditions my skin just before I go to bed which then rejuvenates overnight the skin of my face.  This lotion should work out well for most people.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Pore-Refining Serum with Glycolic Acid, 1 Fl. oz.
review: I have a lot of irritation on the face, a lot of itching, redness and peeling, a kind of lump in each area where I applied and deep wrinkles were marked. I am using the kit for 3 days, what do I do? Has something similar happened to someone?

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Daily Long Lasting Facial Moisturizer & Neck Cream with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Glycerin, Non-Greasy, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Face Moisturizer, 4 fl. oz
review: I don't use yep but I like Neutrogena I use other products from them thanks.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Daily Long Lasting Facial Moisturizer & Neck Cream with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Glycerin, Non-Greasy, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Face Moisturizer, 4 fl. oz
review: Hey everybody! Do you like the feeling of burning your eyeballs out of your head with acid? Do you want to scream in agony for 30 minutes straight? Do you like the feeling of looking into the sun and needing to sneeze but can't? Do you want to know what it feels like to boil your eyeballs in grease? Well then buy this product! Rub it on your face and when you accidentally rub your eyes 30 minutes after, you will get to experience all of the horror that exists on this earth, plus more! #Neutrogena

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Daily Long Lasting Facial Moisturizer & Neck Cream with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Glycerin, Non-Greasy, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Face Moisturizer, 4 fl. oz
review: I PLAN ON RETURNING IT NOT SURE IF I EVEN WANT TO USE IT DO TO OPEN BOX

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: After having tried both Cerave and Amlactin, which are not identical products, but seem like they're basically built to do the same thing, I can say that Cerave is the hand's down winner for a variety of reasons.  Despite the fact that it takes longer to see results, Cerave wins due to texture, scent, and overall feel.  I tried really hard to like Amlactin for over a year, but it feels and smells gross compared to Cerave.SKIN SMOOTHING POWER:  Cerave takes a little longer to see results, but there is less irritation.  With Amlactin, I would frequently get itchy, and sometimes get tiny irritated bumps, which were not acne, but could resemble bad skin if scratched.  If you have severe KP, you might want to try both, and even alternate them, but I could not be happier to ditch the Amlactin, so I'll take slow progress over gross feel and smell.SCENT:  Cerave is truly odorless.  In comparison, Amlactin smells sour, and the bad smell lingers for at least an hour or two depending on how much you use.  Not great if you need to use it on your face!  But Cerave has no scent whatsoever.  I can use it on my face and under makeup without issues.TEXTURE:  Cerave and Amlactin appear to have the same pudding-like texture, but Cerave is easier to apply, because it sinks in quicker.  Amlactin leaves skin greasy.  If you applied Amlactin to your feet, you wouldnt be able to walk across a hardwood floor for at least 15-20 minutes unless you put socks/slippers on.MOISTURIZING POWER:  Amlactin in the winner if you are looking for heavy moisture.  But Cerave is the winner if you want clean-feeling moisture.  After applying Cerave, my skin feels lightly hydrated, but then again I don't have extremely dry skin, just skin that fails to slough off nicely.  Since I am oily on my face, I prefer Cerave, because it doesnt make my face feel unpleasantly greasy.PRICE:  Both Amlactin and Cerave work out to be about the same price for the same amount of product.  They both range from $12-15 for an 8oz bottle, so if you can get either one for under $13, you are getting a decent price.BOTTOM LINE:  If moisture is your top priority, and you can stand the gross smell and feel, Amlactin is still worth checking out for KP sufferers.  But if you value clean moisture and a light feeling on the skin, and are willing to wait a little longer for results, Cerave is much, much easier to bear, in my opinion.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: Tried for 1 week, the redness and bumps on my arms came worse.It's greasy and sticks onto clothes.Tried everything from drinking a gallon of water a day to eating a good diet, seems there's no getting rid of this stubborn KP.Just wondering, if there are 700+ positive reviews on this product, why isn't there a before and after picture for most of them?

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I have deep, horrible cystic acne as well as terrible skin texture as you can see in the second photo. I've used it for five days and while it isn't really helping the cystic acne, it is absolutely improving my skin texture after the first use. I have noticeably fewer bumps, and my face feels calmer and looks less irritated. I use it once a day at night, and use sun protection in the morning. Would recommend!

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: BEST moisturizer I’ve EVER used! Cetaphil comes as a close second. For a long time, I suffered from tiny bumps all over my skin that caused a rough texture. It made me lose confidence. But when I tell you I saw results after the first night! Seriously, I have yet to find a comparable moisturizer. If texture or breakouts is your concern, this is for you! I wanted smooth skin, and I got it! lol. Very affordable. Quick results. Highly recommended. Periodt.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I've been using this product to help with my bumpy skin and it has shown some improvement. The lotion is not greasy and it doesn't have a weird smell to it. The bottle is small and I wish it was bigger but it really is great product to get.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I used it up after couple months on and off. It keeps my skin soft and moisture after bath and apply. The smell is ok, not noticeable.  But that is all. The redness and bumpy skin is just still there.Update: my sister said she used it as hand cream and it worked amazing to her dry hands. So maybe it just not work for me

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: This product came already opened. The envelope is really soft. I’m gonna have to return it.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: Awesome lotion, one day in and my dry hands are getting better. I am a barista so my hands are in water all day and my fingers were suffering. I've also used it on my legs and arms , the eczema and it has already helped the bumps.Horrible shipping job though. The bottle arrived and 1/4 of it was leaked out into the package and the pump on the bottom doesn't work

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: My skin has cleared from this! Not the discoloration but the bumps are most definitely gone! I would put another video of my before but there’s a limit of videos.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: Works great for me. My skin has some acne issue . It smooth my skin , feels a lot better.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I used the product for 3 weeks and I did not have a good experience.. I used it with the Cerave moisturizer and for the first 2-3 days, it was great but then it completely switched on me.. my acne has gotten worse and I would not recommend this product if you have sensitive skin. I can’t even see a dermatologist because of coronavirus and I’m soooo upset!

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I use The #7 Face Cream regularly, I happen to try Cerave on my face just a little since it is so GREAT on my body skin I'm a (former model) It brings the face skin to a place of brightness and smoothness. Try it on the face Ladies

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: Just as advertised.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: My product cane damage

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: Lotion everywhere

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: The product is fine I’ve used it before. However,  the bottle appeared to be used. Missing approx 1/4 of the contents. It’s 10$ I would like an unused bottle. Kind of disappointed.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I opened the package and the lotion was everywhere… haven't tired the product yet, but this is truly annoying

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: My toddler suddenly had a KP explosion all over his back, chest, belly and thighs. Enough where picking him up he felt gross. And wow does it make a person feel terrible to have that thought about their baby! Really he had some for quite a while but I was really shocked it just got so much worse over night. I got this CeraVe SA lotion after debating getting a cheaper version because those brands come with more, but decided to just shell out the extra few dollars. So glad I did!!! I am putting it on him once a day (before bed) and doing nothing else. We are on day 3 and he's back to how he was before. Just amazing what a difference after 3 applications.  Will definitely continue to use.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I’ve had keratosis pilaris on my arms and upper legs since high school (many years ago). Never knew what KP was until I started researching it a few months ago. Came across this on special and decided to try. Today is the third day of usage and my ams and legs are 95% cleared. What a nice feeling to have smooth skin!

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: I love all of the Cerave products! This lotion is a must-have for anyone with keratosis pilaris. I've tried everything and this is the only thing that helps smooth my arms and lessen the ugly "chicken skin".  My dermatologist recommended this and I'm so grateful.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Normally love CeraVe products, and maybe the other products in the line are good retinoids, but the sunscreen (mineral and chemical) based cause this to be really hard to blend into skin and comes off sometimes looking like dandruff! Other comments have said similar things, so I don't think it's something I'm doing incorrectly. Definitely don't use if you have facial hair. I'll go back to hado labo for sure. Might use the night cream for the evening though

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Don’t buy ..I purchased this cream I only used 3time and it was gone! They probably sent me a bottle that was returned by another costumer ..I wasted my money

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I used it 3 times and had the same issue with the pump that others have described. The neck of the pump is not connected with the tube inside so the product can not come up. I love other CeraVe products but I could not use this one because of the packaging.I contacted Amazon and they issued a refund with no problem.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: CeraVe Skin Renewing day cream is a nice, easy to apply face cream that also includes sunscreen rated SPF 30. Even if you dare to worship the sun, you still need to protect your skin from the damaging rays and this will help with your face and moisturize your face all at one time. The bottle is nice looking, not just a tube you squeeze stuff from. It glides on your skin and hours later, you can still feel it protecting your skin and moisturizing. It is almost like a barrier on my face. It doesn't feel greasy but you can feel it on your face. I like that it is non-irritating for sensitive skin which I have. This cream has ceramides, which is all the rage today. I always use products on my face and this may end up being my go to skin care product for daytime.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I was really looking forward to this product because of anti wrinkle, retinol, and SPF. I typically have combination/oily skin. 1. This product left my skin feeling super dry. 2. It leaves a horrible white, flaky residue on your face!!! WTH.  Very disappointed. Will not buy again

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Awesome product. Horrible pump. See pictures... not sure if maybe mine is defective but there is no way to get the cream out of the container. The pump does nothing. I have a full container and have to smash it on my hand to get the cream out and it’s so thick it barely moves.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I am a huge CeraVe fan.  I have been using their products for quite awhile.  Last fall I purchased two other CeraVe face creams, one with hydrolic acid and Vitamin C serum.  I should have stuck with those.  I needed a good day cream with Retinol.  If you look at the product (see pictures) you can see it is super thick.  Hard to spread evenly over your face.  Next, after it drys it looks like your skin is flaking or peeling.  I have to wipe it all off in order to put on my makeup.  What is the point in using this when I want a moisterizer to use under my makeup.  I think the only time I will really use this now is at nightime.  Would not recommend for a day cream.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Open opening this product, I found I wasn't able to get any of the lotion to come out of the pump.  Taking off the top didn't help either.  The lotion is thick/creamy and doesn't flow out of the hard container.  Banging it on the counter yielded very small amounts to come out.  Poor product design, and complete inability to actually use product warrants a single star.  I will contact them and hope for a return.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: The CeraVe came without the tube that attaches to the pumper.  Therefore, I am unable to dispense the product.  I thought it may have come off and was down in the bottle.  It was not.  Please advise.......return product or send me the tube.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I am a big fan of CeraVe and have been for several years now. I hate to say I didn’t love this product. To be fair, I have never found a face lotion with sunscreen that I have liked. This one can just be added to the list. I feel like these products end up being more sunscreen than lotion and I am not getting any moisturizing benefit from them.  This lotion did not leave my skin shiny, I really like the pump, but overall it left my skin feeling dry.I have combination oily/flaky skin that is prone to breakouts. I need something that moisturizes well so that my skin doesn’t produce as much oil to clog my pores. So these fairly dry sunscreen products don’t tend to work well for me. I use CeraVe Moisturizing Facial Lotion PM, 3 Ounce day and night and have had better results with that. Obviously I am missing out on the sunscreen benefits, but a girl can only do so much!I attached a picture of the back of the box for anyone looking for inactive ingredients.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: I love this cream. My face skin so soft after few weeks using this product! I bought it twice.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
