product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: This creme is an absolute must! I've been on the hunt for a good creme for a while and this layer with Weleda Skin Food is by far the most amazing thing ever. If you're hesitant on buying- dont be! You wont regret this purchase. I'm on my second pot 😊 I'm wearing no makeup in the picture attached and my skin is extremely hydrated!

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: My absolute favorite Antiwrinkle Face cream. It leaves my face quenched,hydrated,and  smooth without an oily residue. I am 52yrs old but my skin feels 25! My cream is always shipped in sturdy packaging and the pricing is better with the Amazon subscribe and save than at local drugstores.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: No scent I have an extremely dry face and this has literally saved my sensitive skin. I wear it in the morning and night my skin feels so soft and no problems or breakouts thank you so much.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: I had an immediate allergic reaction to this lotion. I was really excited to try it and I'm not only disappointed, but also very red and itchy.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: I believe it’s fragrance free. Trying it out excited to see how this helps my 35 year old skin out. Hello pack of hotdogs under the ol’ eyes! The struggle is now real.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: What I ordered, what the box says, and what the actual container of cream says are all different? 🙁Once I use it I will update what's inside. Whether or not this is actually for sensitive skin your guess is as good as mine because that's not what the container says.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: I had shingles and they were on my face of all places. They are fading but my skin is so sensitive to everything now. I love Eucerin body lotion and saw this cream with a promotional coupon on the page so I got it. (If this review comes up as an unverified purchase, it is because I used the coupon on the product page.) I have so many creams but this one says it is for sensitive skin and I do like the brand.I like it! It really softens my skin, doesn't pill or roll off, and is nice and thick. It is a yellow color (which isn't necessary but whatever) and it has no scent that I can discern. Very rich, a little goes a long way. My doctor said it is fine to use this cream on the areas where my shingles were since they are a month old and not open wounds. They look like they may scar so I am hoping the hydration helps them to lighten up. I also use Pacific Resources International Manuka Honey 10+ on the spots because it is antibacterial and heals wounds.I have very high end creams but I like this quite well. Enough to purchase again. It was only about $5.00 with the coupon but it is still very inexpressive full price. Definitely good for sensitive skin and for those who have really dry skin and like thicker creams. I remove a star only because I have no idea if I will get long term benefits of anti aging from the cream. I haven't used it long enough to know. Hydration though is the best anti ager out there and this does hydrate very well.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: I've been looking for a face cream that is really hydrating to wear before bed and under my makeup, but is also reasonably priced. I go through face cream really fast because I apply very generously, and Eucerin has been great for the value.It's only 1.7 oz but the container makes it look like there is a lot more product than there is, but I still think this face cream lasts longer than some other brands I've tried since it's so hydrating and I don't need to use as much as I'd normally would. It applies really thick and creamy, but smooth and not greasy. There isn't a real scent to it, it just smells like really generic lotion. I've noticed that some non-scented products for sensitive skin smell like Elmer's glue but this isn't one of them. It's pleasant and not really noticeable. This leaves my skin feeling really lush and plump, and I've also noticed that my skin feels firmer and not so thin/dry.It's so good that it is now a part of my skincare routine. I just started Subscribe & Save for this product since I now use it so religiously.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Cream - Fragrance Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 1.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)
review: It seems like this is just regular lotion. It doesn't help wrinkles or spots... trying something different now.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I LOVE this product. I have noticed a huge difference in my face. It is much softer and moisturized. For best results, put this product on after the shower or after washing your face with water to slow down transepidermal water loss and hydrate your skin.What is great about this product is that it contains hyaluronic acid in the form of sodium hyaluronate. Hyaluronate is a glycosaminoglycan, which means it is a carbohydrate composed of repeating disaccharide units and contains an amino sugar (a sugar with a nitrogen). Hyaluronic acid is found all over the body in various tissues and serves as an important part of lubrication for tissues. In the skin, it is involved in tissue repair. Along with ceramides, which belong to the lipid family, hyaluronate is a great ingredient for hydrating your skin.I am a normal to oily skin type and find that this product is good for me as well. This product and products similar to it are definitely not only for dry skin types (or extra-dry skin types, as the label advertises), they are great for all skin types. For people with normal to oily skin, hydrating your face properly can actually contribute to less oily skin because your face is not producing oil in response to dryness. Keep in mind it is also important to use good sunscreen every day to protect your skin.This product is also great because it is unscented, which is best for skin care. It also non-comedogenic meaning it will not clog pores (good for oily skin types as well). Though the jar appears small, I have found it lasts quite along time,  because you only need a small amount to really hydrate your face. So, use length will really only depend on how many times a day you use it because you do not need much every time. I am totally converted and will continue to use this product or other products containing hyaluronic acid.Feb 10 2020 ***Updated to add***: I still enjoy this product. If you are using this as a moisturizer after getting your face wet (like after the shower or washing your face with water), I also recommend putting on a more occlusive (blocking, sealing) moisturizer on after this one, to seal in the water and hyaluronic good stuff. It depends on what works for your skin type but in the way of occlusive moisturizers I have enjoyed Aveeno's daily with oatmeal (they have several types), CeraVe daily, and LRP Lipikar baume AP+.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I like this product. I feel like its what I needed in my skin care routine.I'm a puertorican guy(hairstylist) living in Florida. Im don't put just anything on my face because I know how I want my face to look and what I want from a face product. My skin care routine consists of: cleansing, serum, eye cream, moisturizer. I always felt like my face is dry with texture even though is oily and I use gentle products. I started using a glycolic acid serum which has helped with my texture. But this gel cream, along with the hydra booster mixed, and aplied before my moisturizer is exactly what I needed. Always felt my face tight even after using any rich moisturizer but what I needed is the water or wetness(hydration that this provides) I love it.I personally bought it because it was blue.The only thing I didn't like is that it didnt come with a second cap inside to protect the product.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I'm not really sure whats in this that gave me a bad reaction everytime I would use it. I got it June 27th and started using it that night. I like to do my daily routine which is cleaning my face and then moisturizing. This is the only product I changed too, I saw the good reviews and decided to give it a try.. But when using it I noticed it stung I wasn't sure why, I started to get clogged pores, break out slightly, and my skin turned red. I first thought I had to get used to it but I cannot. I was using the Garnier moister rescue before and liked it but didn't like the sticky feeling or how my skin felt like it had a layer on it. I did like how after i would put this on no sticky feeling or sitting on the skin. I'm now switching to Garnier moister bomb hopefully will find better results.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: This doesn't look like the original product, doesn't even smell like it, and the container looks damaged and it has a white label covering most of the jar, it doesn't have the protective mastic inside.  Very fake!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I have been trying so many moisturizers for years. I must have spent hundreds trying to find that one spring to summer skincare product that doesn't make me look like an oil slick, leave a white cast, or break me out. I think this one might just be the holy grail product I've needed. Sometimes you can't trust Allure or other beauty websites because you know they're getting paid to promote it. I can honestly say this is a dupe for Tatcha Water Cream. The -only- issue is that for the price point it does have silicone in it as a "filler". I'm not sensitive to it but I am sensitive to mineral oils and heavier creams. So if that is an issue I would be careful before buying. I'm one of those fair skinned gals who seems to break out if I so much as turn my head towards the wind wrong and I haven't had a single breakout with this moisturizer. It layers nicely as well with my spf and foundation (I use Nars or Armani), as well as dries quickly so you don't have to sit there fanning yourself for ten minutes before you apply your foundation. All in all, I will stay with this ridiculously highly rated moisturizer all spring and summer long.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I have always had easily irritated,  sensitive skin. Allergies make everything worse, and so does a diet previously based on fast food. Now diabetic, I noticed my skin becoming reddened, dry, rough in spots with flaking. I've used Neutrogena Rainbath gel for it's moisturizing and gentle cleansing, but needed something else for my face.I found this. Absolutely love it. It's not just for what it says it is - the hydrophilic hyaluronic acid that absorbs up to 1000x its weight.It's what it does.It's the way my skin feels after I put it on. I wash, blot but leave a touch of water on my face, then take a little on my finger - let it mix with that residual moisture. All over my face, eyelids (close them tight) and neck.I know I did it right when I get that enjoyable tingle - and an indescribable feeling that my skin feels pleasantly tighter - supple - like it's refreshed and awake. Like it's been given a healing balm.I use it nightly. Within a couple of days the difference was visible. That redness and flaking was gone. My face and neck felt - healthy. Good. I could see and feel the difference.It is a mix of gel and cream. Spreads easily. Absorbs quickly. No mess. No problem. In the jar it has a slightly bluish cast but a translucent white on my finger.For those interested in packaging it comes in a small box, with a plastic ring holding it securely within.No oil. No fragrance which is lasting or that I've noticed. No dyes. Nothing that would block the pores of my skin.I've gone through at least 5 jars. And will keep going. It does change the way my skin looks and feels. It's noticeable. To me. And when it's you using Neutrogena Hydroboost for extra dry skin, you are the only one who matters. How you feel.I can't recommend this more highly.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I usually never write reviews but I've decided to write this one purely out of anger and disappointment.WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. i was REALLY excited to give this moisturizer a try as i've heard amazing reviews, but was beyond disappointed to receive it with the top of the box completely ripped apart with no protective sealing of the moisturizer and half of the actual moisturizer gone...After reading multiple reviews I see that maybe 20% of buyers have received damaged products as well. i was tempted to still use it because i'm admittedly lazy and hate having to return things/rebuy it at the actual store but God knows who used this before me and what chemicals are actually in it. when it comes to skincare using knockoff items could seriously harm your health so if you're thinking about buying this, go to CVS instead.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I bought this because not only do I have very sensitive skin, I also need oil free moisturizer! I have to say, I love this gel. It goes on so smooth, it has a very light, refreshing scent, and my skin is so hydrated without being oily or irritated.The only thing I'm sad about is how fast it goes! I ran out of my first tub today after 14 days. Using it mostly at night but 50% of the time in the morning as well. But because it works so well with no catches, I think it's worth it.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: This product is not the same as the original one. The original one is smoother, silkier, and has a blue tint to it. Please don't be swayed away if you bought this from Amazon and didn't like it. I encourage you to return this bottle and go get the real one which you can find in stores and it should have a sanitary lid on it, unlike this product.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I purchased this item after noticing its overall great reviews (plus discounted price), and wanted a new moisturizer. I had received a facial a few days, before purchasing this moisturizer, that peeled my skin, so when I applied the product it burned my on contact and I figured it was just a because of my facial, but I was wrong. The product I had received has to be fake because within days my skin reacted with with a rash covering all over. Beware purchasing beauty products online, it’s always a gamble. I’ve obviously quit using the product and my face is healing, but the marks will be visible for quite some time.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: Easily the best skincare container I have used. If that kind of thing makes you happy, I would recommend buying it.The cream itself is great. I have the dryest of dry facial skin, so this is the match.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: Buyer beware! I have bought this product multiple times on amazon, it is usually scentless ir has a very mild scent, pearly white in appearance. I recently got a batch in a plastic not packaging, I thought it was weird, had a scent, and was bluish in appearance. I applied it, naively hole I didn't poison myself... it had a slight burn on application, not like the regular product... I have had success purchasing on amazon in the past however there do seem to be bad vendors!!!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I usually love this stuff, but it looks like the seller sold me a product that was previously used and returned. The package I received was ripped open and the protective seal that’s usually on top of the jar was not there. The actual cream doesn’t even look the right color so I’m not even sure if this jar has legit neutrogena cream in it or if it was refilled with something else. Definitely returning.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I used the cream twice, after each application I felt a sort of burning sensation. Twice was enough to damage my skin, leave red marks, and cause my skin to almost dehydrate completely, turning it extremely thin, dry, and wrinkly. I will have to use very neutral creams now to repair, even for creams for burning accidents, and it will surely take a while to regain its natural elasticity. My face hurts constantly. I am returning  this product, it is clearly not for everyone.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: So basically I heard a ton of reviews about this product and I heard that it has done wonders for most people. Haven’t gotten the chance to use it yet because I’m skeptical it’s even the correct product. I received this in the mail today and the package itself was opened and the actual container of the moisturizer was opened. So be careful when ordering this I’m not sure if it’s even the correct product there were scratches around the moisturizer jar inside of the box it came in? Which is just all pretty questionable to begin with. Disappointed

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I got an opened/ ripped apart/ wet box. Smells so weird I don’t even know if what’s in the jar is the correct product. When they delivered it they just got out of their car and threw it towards my door.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I moved to Colorado from New York a few years ago and my skin immediately became very thirsty! This moisturizer works super well to keep my skin hydrated but without a heavy feel. I tried another hyaluronic acid product that you can only buy from salons and I think this one works even better! Picture taken next to bobby pin for scale.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: This stuff is amazing! I will always buy this lotion for my face as it doesn’t make me break out and is very nourishing and doesn’t feel heavy to apply. Plus it is a good amount and came packaged nicely.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I've tried several face moisturizers and decided to stick with Neutrogena's Hydro Boost Face Gel. My face tends to get very dry especially during the colder months. Compared to other moisturizers that seemed to dry out quickly, Hydro Boost kept my face moisturized for longer and I liked the smooth silky feel of it. It also has a nice, mild scent. It didn't irritate my sensitive skin at all. I make sure to use it before bed and every time after washing my face. I'll stick with this one for a while!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: Wow. This product doesn’t have any seal on it. I’m not gonna our that on my face! The box is opened too. WTH.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: First off, I read nearly all the reviews on this product before settling to purchase.  I myself suffer from severe eczema which doesn't have a calendar; it's like a volcano (only wakes when it wants to and is extremely grouchy when it does).  Having said that, this product was  selected because it has  ingredients which are nature derived and really, I wanted to try something that would help alleviate the symptoms, badly. The product is moisturizing when applied to my healthy skin; however, when I tried it on the eczematic skin (which didn't have broken skin, just raised, angry bumps) it actually made that area more angry.  I tried it 2x a day, for two weeks to see if the burning sensation would subside but each time, it burned and so I had to stop using it for my eczematic skin.  I don't blame the product, it's just that it didn't work for me, hence, the 4 stars.  I am glad it worked for others who suffer from eczema too; I just have to keep searching for my "miracle cream."

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: My son is 15 & has mild acne but zero redness in his skin. Within 1 minute of putting this on his skin it flared up & started to burn.  Took several hours for the redness to go away.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I got the 2oz size of this nourishing Face and Body Cream Moisturizer for my middle aged skin. I’m on a medication that dries up the skin on my face and hands-  with winter approaching I needed something strong and natural. My partner also has roseca and I’ve encouraged him to try this on the problem areas on his face.I usually use BOOM which has 3-4 ingredients but it’s too expensive. I was hoping this could be a cheaper alternative. Can’t compare the two because they are so different- honey skin has way more ingredients - pictured above.honey skin is very thick- warm it up on your fingers before you use it - it will sink into your skin a little faster. Super rich and unscented. Some creams make me break out- luckily this has not clogged my pores! Happy with the results on my dry skin- would purchase again.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: Bought this once before, and as others had stated in their reviews, it had a funky scent to it. I just assumed it was due to oxidization and decided I didn’t really mind it all that much and continued to use it. To my surprise, the moisturizer worked incredibly well with my skin, and the scent wasn’t as much of a concern to me. Fast forward a couple months and I’ve just gotten my next bottle since I liked it so much and wanted another. It was wrapped in plastic which had some funky texture on it. Already I could smell something strong and I hadn’t even opened the lid. Once unwrapping and opening, I saw what looked like old cream cheese and a putrid smell that could almost be described as alcohol-like. The dated expiration date was June 2021 but this must be false. I like the product and will be getting an exchange in hopes I get a fresh and clean order, but I think it’s really disgusting that the brand shows no care in the product they’re sending out to their consumers and its quality.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I have normal to oily skin, and the first 3 days were great. I felt better without makeup and started wearing less. Then BOOM! Massive breakouts!! Horrible, pulsating, how am I going to leave the house like this, breakouts. I'm so sad, I was very hopeful for this product. Now I just hope that this mine field on my face will go away as quickly as possible.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: So I just received my second order of Honeyskin and I am a little worried. The first order I received it was in a nice glass jar. This order its in a plastic container and even the label looks cheaply printed and blurry. As I recall I paid $12 before and this one is now up to $14. I hope they didn't make any changes in their actual formula. Otherwise this returning customer may be moving on to greener pastures.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This used to be the most wonderful, soothing moisturizer. It calmed down redness and rosacea and made my skin soft and smooth. I used this moisturizer morning and night and absolutely loved it.  Well, they changed the formula as some other people have mentioned and now it just sits on the top of my skin like a white film and doesn't sink in. The cream is a completely different smell, texture, and color. If you compare the ingredient list now and before, you can clearly see that now the very second ingredient is emulsifying wax where it used to be coconut oil. If it's the second ingredient, it means there's a lot in there and it feels like it. It feels like you're putting wax on  your skin now. I am extremely disappointed. And now I have to search for a cream that actually works again...

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This stuff is seriously awesome! I had red scaly skin on my cheeks. I don't know what it was but it was sore and unsightly. Everything else I tried made it worse or had no effect at all. Honeyskin felt instantly soothing and I could see a difference almost right away! I used it 3 times a day for the first few days and now I'm applying twice a day. I've only been using it a week and my problem is almost completely solved! My photos were taken the day I started and one week later.I love this stuff!! It feels really nice and has a mild but pleasant smell. It even feels good under makeup and doesn't effect your foundation's staying power. I highly recommend this stuff!

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This stuff WORKS! I randomly get eczema on my eye when autumn/winter comes around! I have tried so many things and nothing helped! I read reviews on this and thought, why not? I woke up with my eye red, swollen, itching, dry, and flaky... I kept rubbing it in my sleep, it looked horrible when I woke up! I applied this a couple times a day, (should have applied more but my baby keeps me so busy) and by day three it was almost completely gone!! If you have eczema you HAVE to try this!!

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I was so excited when this arrived. The package looks a bit dirty.  looks like it has been sitting for awhile.  When I open it , I saw small brown dots in it. I don’t think I will be putting this on my face.  Will be returning this cream.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: Deceptive advertisement. The ingredients list pictured on Amazon is not the same as what you get on the package. Second most utilized ingredient is emulsifying wax (not coconut oil), which clogs poors. Probably the reason why so many of you are having breakouts on your face. My patch tests on hands and arms are ok, so far, but I'm worried about using it on my face still. The amount you get is not worth almost 15 dollars (placed beside a lip scrub for comparison). Maybe 7 or 8, but not 15. You're probably better off making your own with coconut oil, aloe, shea butter, cocoa butter, etc. You'll get more without some of the harsher ingredients. On the bright side, the formula is thick and moist, so a little goes a long way.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: So it took me a while to try this product because I still had some of a different moisturizer left over.... but man... this lotion smells like rotten milk... it’s quiet disgusting actually... it doesn’t go on easily. It doesn’t feel like it’s very moisturizing... I won’t be putting this on again. The smell is vomit inducing..

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I used this to heal my 2 year old son's scratched-raw eczema flair up. In 2 applications it was healing. It did leave his skin flaky but I alternated with an Aveeno Eczema moisturizer and the combo seems to be working so far. My son, unprompted, said, "New lotion foot feel better" after his first application. The pictures show his results after 2 applications of Honey Skin (alone, not combined with any other products)

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I love how it calmed my rosacea redness within one use I saw the reduction!!! But it is super thick

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I bought this for my face and for my daughters eczema and unfortunately as soon as I put a thin layer on my face it turn extremely red and irritated and is not going away...so it sadly didn’t help my issues but my daughter has very bad eczema so I’m praying she gets some help from this product.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This lotion is fabulous. I love the smell, the texture, and the fact that it makes my skin so soft. I’m also pregnant and have been using this on my belly which has been helping with the itchiness!

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This stuff feels AMAZING. It’s almost whipped and it makes you instantly soft. I have keratosis and eczema all over my body and my skin has never felt this soft. The only negative is the smell. It has a musty off putting smell but it does dissipate quickly. Definitely will be buying more. Usually my arms are bright red and cracked and after two days it’s healed down to a few red spots/ bumps

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I think cream it's too thick and my face is allergic to it and dry.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I read about some people receiving it with the yellow spots in it and lucky me I got the yellow spots. I don't think that this is supposed to be like this. Really irritated

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: Got this for our little girl who has some “hot spots” on her legs. This is after only 5 days of use!!!

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This item doesn’t have a lot number or expiration date. My face has broken out ever since using this. I didn’t put two and two together until I got a new one from my dermotologist. See photo. The one that is from my dermotologist has a lot # and expiration date.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I bought this per my dermatologist’s recommendation to work as a sunscreen and moisturizer for my rosacea, and it made me break out horribly. I used it 1-2 times per day for a week or two and felt it might be making me break out, so stopped with the hope I could at least use it on vacation as a sunblock. When I did this, applying multiple times per day, I thought I had gotten sunburned, when in actuality my face was just red, swollen, and pimply from this lotion - it all subsided a day or two after I stopped using it. I switched to normal Coppertone and had no problems with burn or breakouts after that. I have never had a reaction to any product as severe as I did this one, which is odd considering it is supposedly designed for sensitive skin types, so beware!

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I really like this SPF cream. First of all it doesn't smell 'perfumey' - it might have a hint of suntan lotion smell, but it's really faint. Second this cream is NOT GREASY and disappears fast - even though it has 9% zinc oxide. Third it has 46+ SPF with 7.5 Octinoxate to slow burning. I've finally had to admit that I need a strong SPF; given past brushes with melanoma and the sincere desire to not have the hide of an alligator. And while not inexpensive, this is far less than the cost of a lot of the better-quality moisturizers for men. You usually get exactly what you pay for and this is worth every penny. Finally, my better half tells me that this company doesn't test on animals. I believe that's a good thing. ;-)WARNING:  Many buyers have received fake products from other sellers.  Buy only when sold and shipped by Amazon!  The authentic product will have a flat sloping pump top that is shown in the attached photo.  The fake products have a rounded top.Pros:• Non greasy formula that easily absorbs into skin• Odorless and transparent• 9% Zinc Oxide provides long lasting protection• 7+% Octinoxate to reduce burning by dispersing UVB rays• Tested reliable 30+ SPF• UVA/UVB sun protectionCons:• More expensive than drug-store brands

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I emailed EltaMD regarding the validity of the product, here is their response as of yesterday, 9/22/15I give it 3 stars because of my skepticism, but I love the product I have received, assuming it's legitimate.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This is 2nd time that the pump does not work.I had to break the top to get to the cream and use my fingers to get the cream.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I can't attest to the efficacy of the product, just posting to say, I had negative reactions to it. I have just crested the high side of mid-40s and really wanted to find a good daily sun protectant to guard against [further] aging. This was so well-reviewed, I chose it over the next closest contenders, Roche-Posay products (which I usually love).Unfortunately, the first week of using it, I began to get tiny bumps on my face (not visible to the naked eye, but easily perceived with fingertips when washing or applying moisturizer). I had also been using a new 'flavor' of body lotion, so I went back to my basic tried-and-true products to let everything calm down for a bit, and try to definitively eliminate the culprit.After two weeks, I again applied this on two successive days when I'd be out in the sun for an extended period. On Day 1, once I'd gotten outside and had started perspiring, my neck began burning, then itching maddeningly -- I was only outside in my yard gardening, so ran inside and I washed it thoroughly off my neck.  My face seemed okay, so I left it there, and applied the product again to my ears and face (no neck) on Day 2 when heading out for a long weekend walk.This time, again once I'd gotten outside and started perspiring, the product started burning and itching around my eyebrows and general eye area.  I washed it off as best I could at the next public water fountain.The next day, I began to show itchy, painful swollen patches on my face, ears, and throat (the latter pictured as best I could, but it was difficult to shoot an area I couldn't see!)  This time, there had been no other 'new to me' product used, nor was there anything else that I carefully applied to ears/face/throat, all areas that then became rashy....So alas, not a product I can use, and alas for the waste of a significant amount of money. >:/  I've used other physical sunscreens in the past (eg Badger) without any issues, so it must be some substance in the cream besides that causing the problem.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: After reading all the previous previews, I wanted to leave my experience. The packaging cake well sealed. I have purchased EltaMD products before from my dermatologist so I’m familiar with the packaging. My order came in and as you can see from the pictures it is well sealed. The batch number from the box is the same batch number in the bottle. Today is my first day using this specific product so I will come back and give an update on my review. I order the non-tinted version since I was worried about it being to thick and clogging my pours. I’m excited to use this. I have rosacea and hormonal acne.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: Used once. Caused reaction on face and  broke out in hives. (See picture) Im unsure what ingredient would have caused such a severe reaction. Discontinued use and swelling and hives went away within 24 hours. Be careful.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I honestly really liked this stuff because it’s not oily at all and made my face feel great but after only 2 days of usage I broke out in a rash all over my face. I originally thought the sunscreen just didn’t work very well because my face was red, but I did not get sunburnt, just a rash. I don’t have sensitive skin whatsoever and have NEVER gotten any type of rash on my face nor my body. Hoping I’ll somehow be able to get my money back since I only used twice and broke out. :(

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I used this every day for about 2 months on my face and neck. I put it on under my skincare and under my makeup. It comes in a small plastic bottle with a pump. It comes out as a thick white liquid, about the consistency of a moisturizer.This is what I can share about the product.Pros:- Does what it is made to do.- Light scent, not overpowering sunscreen smell. Still scented though.- Does not leave skin oily.- Does not cause breakouts for acne-prone skin.- Does not cause makeup to come off, as it does not dry down to be oily.Cons:- The amount of product you get versus the amount of product you get. The bottle is quite small.- It does have a very very slight white cast to it. So if you have darker skin, and you will not be wearing makeup, it may be noticeable.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This item came already opened. I could tell as soon as I looked at the bottle, as it had a little bit of the product around the opening (see phot). When I pumped it, the product immediately came out - with a new product, it would require several pumps before anything came out. From now on I'm only getting from Costco or my dermatologist. It's such a bummer to return this, as I know the product will just go in the bin, but I can't believe they thought they could sell me opened goods.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I ordered my second EltaMd sun screen and the first time I got the genuine article the second time I wasn't so lucky, I was sent what I can assume is a fake product as the color of the recipient had bright red stripes (original is a darker shade) and the lettering are smaller and less pronounced compared with the original, the pump wasn't working very well and the product was bright white with practically no smell (original the product is more cream like in color and has a very distinct sun block sent). Not purchasing this product from Amazon again. That was 50 plus dollars down the drain if I include shipping costs.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This product is excellent, and my favorite, hands-down, which is why I continue to purchase it despite the flawed dispenser. I have purchased this three times on Amazon, and each time there comes a point when the sunscreen begins to leak out of a(n initially sealed) hole in the bottom. I simply store the dispenser upside down, and hold it upside down when I pump it out. It's still more convenient than dealing with driving to my very busy dermatologist's office to buy it there, but may be a dealbreaker for some of you.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I have purchased this product three times and each time i have made sure it says it is CLEAR facial sunscreen. When it arrives it is tinted a light tan color!!  We want to use it for the entire family on their faces but many do not want to use a tan tinted face sunscreen. It is deceptive when it says clear face sunscreen and it comes with a color. This is my one big issue.I like the product. Just not the beige tinting.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: The item arrived in a state shown in the pictures. I have ordered this product several times, and this is the 2nd time that the it arrives like this.Would like to be issued a refund.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I picked it up from an amazon store so it wasn't tossed or anything. Then to open it and find that the box had been crushed or mishandled led to further suspicion. Upon further investigation, I found that some of the sunscreen had been pumped inside the lid. I no longer feel comfortable with applying this to my face as it seems to have been tampered with. Unfortunate, since it was 33$ that I probably won't get back.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I have been using this product for years with no problems.  I use the tinted version, which evens my skin tone but makes my skin look very oily.  This oiliness is new. It has happened with the last two bottles purchased here.  Gives a moderate sunscreen...I have to apply it frequently, especially outdoors.  The new bottles made my eyes burn terribly.  I couldn't figure out what was going on until I saw my eye doctor and he said I was having an allergic reaction to something getting into my eyes,  not a seasonal allergy problem.  I live in the south and love the outdoors, so I sweat a lot. My dermatologist recommended this sunscreen, but I think I'm going to ask about an alternative.  Something has changed in the formulation, and it is not an improvement.  You can see my red eyes and increased bags from the reaction.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I love this product and give the lotion all the stars! BUT my issue is with the packaging. I would say, every other time I use a new bottle - the pump/applicator breaks shortly after opening and it no longer pumps out lotion which leaves me with a useless bottle that I can't get lotion out of. This has happened multiple times and is so frustrating. I usually have to remove the entire pump applicator and resort to accessing the lotion that way which sucks. Again, i love the content but wish the bottle and applicator were more efficient and useful.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: When I received this product it had exploded all over the cap. The product itself works with my skin just fine but receiving the product in this shape left a bad taste in my mouth. I will no longer purchase from this seller.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: Delivery:I gave this product three stars because some of the contents of the bottle were inside of the cap. Product is either used or damaged during shipment, although I believe it can't be the latter since the cap is undamaged. I would return it if i didnt need this sunscreen today.Product:Now let's talk about the fun part: Elta MD's clear sunscreen with niacinamide! If you're acne-prone or have acne marks/hyperpigmentation you want niacinamide on your face. Unless of course your face doesn't like it (patch test just in case).Acne marks/hyperpigmentation on your skin grow darker in the sun. This product protects you from the sun AND lightens the mark as you wear it! Niacinamide is MAGIC.Application:If you have very oily/normal skin, I suggest applying this on a bare face. If you have any dry patches or your skin is tight (like me) moisturize first and let that sink in. Now you can put EltaMD clear on. Wait 15 mins before applying your makeup. Be gentler than usual when you apply your makeup so the sunscreen stays in place.*2hrs later*As you've probably read before, sunscreen needs to be reapplied throughout the day. With this sunscreen it's easy to reapply with your makeup on. When it's time to reapply I first press drops of grapeseed oil on dry patches on my skin and let that sink in. Then you apply the sunscreen with small tapping motions rather than rubbing it in to keep your makeup in place. I spritz myself with some hydration tonic by blissoma and I'm good to go!

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: Really good smelling and not too strong. Skin feels soft and not slimy or greasy. Really like it. Only con would be it's a small container so will need to buy often but feel like it's great results.

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: Gave me pimples and they were appearing more and more erveryday after I started using this. It did not work for me. It smells good. If it suits your skin, go for it.

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: Package damaged totally

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: I was directed to this product promising a FPS 15 and the box doesn't say a thing about FPS. There is another version with FPS in a very similar box.

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: I've been using it since my girlfriend have it to me.  Now I'm 124 y.o. but I look like I'm 25 again. Thx.

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: I’ve been using this face moisturize for a while now. Discovered it when looking for a moisturizer with retinol in it. This one seemed about cheapest by far for the quantity.I’ve noticed overall improvement in my skin from the retinol. I highly recommend finding a moisturizer with retinol - it’s a proven ingredient. Anyhow, awesome moisturizer and cheap.

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: The product does an okay job on moisturizing. The scent is a little to  citrusy for me personally and it leaves my face feeling oily all day.

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, Beard and Skincare for Men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: This is a good produce that absorbs fast and does not leave a greasy feel.The amount provided could be more for the cost but expect to get a few months out of a jar when used once daily.The product is think and if applied too heavily it may result in a visible layer. It drys to clear but if heavy and rubbed it will pull or be otherwise visible.This issue is not present when applied as directed.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: This is my first time leaving a review and, It worked so well on my skin. I have been using this for a while now and I loved it so much that I wanted to update my review It hydrates my skin so so good. I also loved how lightweight and easy it was on my sensitive skin. Like this product and would recommend.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: I need this product in my life FOREVER. Such a soft feel like real cream. I would tell everyone to try simplified skin retinol. It absorbs quickly. I just started using and see some improvements, I’m sure to see more in future!!

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: Me encantó, el aroma y lo bien que se siente en la piel, lo que no me gustó es que a pesar de que me ayudó mucho con las manchas me causó algunas espinillas, si tendencia acneica te recomiendo usarla un día si o otro no, así te evitas brotes futuros, pero definitivamente volvería a comprar esta crema, sus ingredientes son realmente buenos... 💯 (lo que puedes apreciar en la foto son resultados que pude obtener en menos de un mes)

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: I finally found a cream that actually has retinol in it! I’ve been using retinol for about 15 years, used to get a prescription for it. But insurance doesn’t cover anymore , and it would cost $500 to refill. This product is inexpensive and really works. You only need to apply a small amount to areas where there are fine lines. If you apply every day all over face, it will get red and dry out! I know it works because I applied to my fine lines around lips/eyes/forehead and could see it disappear. I mix it with my face moisturizer. I just turned 50 this month and have very few wrinkles from using retinol. I love this product and will buy again and again! It works just like the prescription I used to buy. Already recommended to friends.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: Ok. Ok. Ok.  I genetically have a good complexion. But, after hitting my 50s even that couldn’t save me. Lots of fine line, wrinkles and discoloring on my face.  I accidentally ended up on a YouTube tutorial about retinol.  And thought, I have to try that!  I’m on my 2nd bottle now and SHOCKED how much it has changed my appearance.  It didn’t get rid of all the issues (yet) but MY GOD.  It has taken years off me!  Here’s the kicker...the last thing i do before going to bed is put my retinol on, then (without washing them) I moisturizer my hands.  Didn’t realize till about a month later, SAME EFFECT ON MY HANDS!  We are over 2 months into COVID and all my friends and sisters are complaining about how dry their hands and cuticles are from washing their hands so much.  NOT MINE!!  Smooth as silk!No laughing at my pic. This is in the sunlight with no makeup and no touch ups on the pic.  Not bad for 54.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: I'm loving it so Far!! I have been using it for a week now (and to be honest I don't usit as the instructions says because I'm lazy) and is working my skin looks way better than before and is getting lighter and everything I just love it, and has been just a week. Mi piel luce muchisimo mejor para lo que estaba! Mi piel estaba super manchada y llena de espinillas y literal esta crema hace que se me desaparezcan en unos 2 días sin dejar una marca tan negra me sorprende mucho. A mi cuando me sale acne me deja la marca super negra y ese día de la foto no llevo maquillaje solo corrector en las ojeras pero nada de base.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: I have a full set of product and I totally love it. I believe that things work in a complex and they do for me.I like the texture of the lotion and its moisturizing effect.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz

review: At the time that i got this CeraVe was out of their retinol and this had good reviews. I put it in my routine in the exact same spot. With CeraVe i can feel it because their product is much more occlusive. This does not do that. It is light weight but it doesn't seal in the moiturizer or do anything. I went without it one day and skipped it in my routine, i actually think my moisturizer absorbed better.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: This cream contains 2.5% active Retinol and also Hyaluronic Acid.  It feels lightweight on one's skin and hydrates well.  It can be used under makeup.  A great quality cream for a good price.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: This is perfect with winter coming and it getting so dry. Smells nice but not strong or like they pumped it full of fragrances. It's not watery but it doesn't feel oily on your face either.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face & Eye Area with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid for Anti Aging, Wrinkles & Acne - Best Night & Day Facial Cream by Simplified Skin 1.7 oz
review: Very light weight, scent free product! One pump of this was able to moisturize my whole face and neck. It makes my skin feel so soft! I will definitely continue to use this product.

review: It's definitely doing it's job! Just started using it 12 hours ago and it has significantly reduced the redness in my acne. Also, it smells very faintly like mint: a nice clean smell.

product_name: Intensive Acne Treatment - with Tea Tree Oil - Acne Spot Pimple Cream - Made in USA - Natural & Safe Cystic Acne Removal - For Normal, Dry & Oily Skin - Best Spot Treatment & Scar Removal - 2 fl.oz
review: This cream is amazing  to treat breakouts on the face, it unclog pores, reduces redness, and inflammation it starts working immediately after application. I can see and feel how it clears acne and pimples, within a few daysIt helped me to  remove acne and related inflammatory spots. It does penetrate deeply and seems to eliminate current breakouts and prevent future acne from forming.the tree oil seems to be a most effective solution for clearing hydrated skin. It calms my skin and is very  gentle on my skin, I love that it is  Fragrance free, paraben free, non-comedogenic to avoid further irritation of sensitive skin.  Not oily and does not leave a film - my skin just loves it - definitely happy I tried

product_name: Intensive Acne Treatment - with Tea Tree Oil - Acne Spot Pimple Cream - Made in USA - Natural & Safe Cystic Acne Removal - For Normal, Dry & Oily Skin - Best Spot Treatment & Scar Removal - 2 fl.oz
review: I’ve tried a lot of face creams and so far I can honestly say this is one of the best. I’ve only used it a few times but some blemishes I had shrunk in a serious way within a day. I love that this is made in the USA and the ingredients are good. It doesn’t make my skin feel dried out or oily. So far so good!!

product_name: Intensive Acne Treatment - with Tea Tree Oil - Acne Spot Pimple Cream - Made in USA - Natural & Safe Cystic Acne Removal - For Normal, Dry & Oily Skin - Best Spot Treatment & Scar Removal - 2 fl.oz
review: I'm so glad I found this! I've been dealing with embarrassing adult acne for the past few months and the other products only seemed to be making it worse. I dont know if it's the essential oils or what but after just a couple days of using it the redness started going down.

product_name: Intensive Acne Treatment - with Tea Tree Oil - Acne Spot Pimple Cream - Made in USA - Natural & Safe Cystic Acne Removal - For Normal, Dry & Oily Skin - Best Spot Treatment & Scar Removal - 2 fl.oz
review: I ordered this with my twins in mind, because at 20 years old they are going through acne. I'm so impressed! The jar looks small, but the cream inside is so light and spreads so smoothly, both my boys are using it and it's still full. They will have some left over for the occasional flair up in the future once they clear up their faces with a couple of more applications. As a mother that went through this very same problem at their age, considered "adult acne", clear skin during the teenage years and then, bam!, acne for the rest of your life with the scars to prove it, I truly wish this product was on the market then, so I wouldn't have spent so much money on ineffective dark spot removers and bleaching creams after I got my acne under control. This product will crush their acne now, tackle future breakouts, and help give them clear complexions as they become adults. I've enclosed before and after pictures of my boys' cheeks to show how the product works in 48 hrs. Very pleased with this product. Worth the money.

product_name: Intensive Acne Treatment - with Tea Tree Oil - Acne Spot Pimple Cream - Made in USA - Natural & Safe Cystic Acne Removal - For Normal, Dry & Oily Skin - Best Spot Treatment & Scar Removal - 2 fl.oz
review: This works! I've used it everyday on my face, neck, chest and back where I've been breaking out badly with cystic acne. I noticed a difference immediately after the first application, and after almost 3 weeks my acne has significantly decreased. I've ordered a second container and plan to keep this in my daily routine because it actually works. Great for older skin, very moisturizing and feels like a thick cream, soothing and cooling.

product_name: Intensive Acne Treatment - with Tea Tree Oil - Acne Spot Pimple Cream - Made in USA - Natural & Safe Cystic Acne Removal - For Normal, Dry & Oily Skin - Best Spot Treatment & Scar Removal - 2 fl.oz
review: I’m loving it so far. Smells natural but not scented. I saw a great reduction in breakouts overnight so I’m excited to start using it everyday. Update: this stuff is like a dream. I used to get prescription topicals for my cystic acne but can’t afford it anymore. This stuff works better than the prescriptions did. It’s powerful enough to show a major difference overnight but gentle enough to use everyday. I’m in love!

product_name: Intensive Acne Treatment - with Tea Tree Oil - Acne Spot Pimple Cream - Made in USA - Natural & Safe Cystic Acne Removal - For Normal, Dry & Oily Skin - Best Spot Treatment & Scar Removal - 2 fl.oz
review: This will be my go-to moisturizer from here on out. It doesn’t dry my skin out, it doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, it smells nice AND I see overnight results. I’m able to use whatever face wash I have and the results still don’t change. Highly recommend!

review: I have had cystic hormonal acne since I was 12 and honestly this helped so much in only a matter of 2 weeks. It dries out any bumps you may have picked at and reduced any redness i had in a matter of hours.  Couldn’t be happier with this product.

Happy with this purchase!!

And ive read like two lists of best night creams out there and this is the one I went with and man I’m so glad that I did because it’s simple and quite the best. Just look at the photo that I did and an acne scar that I had (that I almost thought was now gonna be forever there) is slowly fading away. Love this night cream so much!

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: This CeraVe night cream is a wonderful product.  I've purchased two jars and use it nightly on my skin wake up feeling nice and hydrated even after a long night's sleep.  It's rich texture coats nicely while not clogging my pores or causing breakouts.  I also love that it contains no fragrance.An aesthetician recommended CeraVe products to me several years ago when I was struggling with breakouts, dryness, dull-looking skin.  I also use the CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser (also available here on Amazon) which also contains Niacinamides.  I truly feel these products have step-changed my skin care while still being affordable.

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: I have been using this for a few months at night and my skin has never looked better. When I wake up my skin is super soft. I have not had a single break out or reaction and I have very sensitive skin with eczema.

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: I have been using this miracle pot since last year.Let's start off with the moisturizing quality of CeRave  Night Cream; the pictures I uploaded show me facing the front of my living room window with natural lighting. There is a little bit of "shine" on the sides of my forehead (where I tend to apply some highlighting makeup anyway), but to wake up to this kind of glow on my face first thing in the morning? You BET I took a selfie and sent it to any friend who cared! When I smiled, there is no resistance on my face, meaning my skin is WELL-moisturized! I mention this because for some of my other regular face cream (even when it isn't for night time) the moisture would be gone by morning. And that's another thing I wanted to mention to you all: THIS CREAM goes a long way even with a very small amount that you apply on your fingers-- all the better, too, because the formula works to keep your face moisturized and healing all through the night. And what I mean by "healing" is restoring the balance of the moisture on your face to a supple condition. Because CeRave night cream has Hyaluronic acid which gives it that precise effect since hyaluronic acid pulls in moisture from your environment.For sensitive skin, I have no true review for it because my skin is not sensitive. I have oily skin but tend to suffer from overdrying. For me this occurs because I like to wash my face in the morning as well as in the night time (which is regular for many people, especially those that wear makeup). For my skin type, I've found that CeRave works very well with it. I really appreciate their AM moisturizer with the SPF because it has no oil in it, so it goes on without the "greasy" feel.The reason why I'm giving this product  A 5-STAR rating for its scent is because THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SCENT! WHAT? YES, PLEASE! It is not always okay to rely on a moisturizer that is scented because it takes other formulas to be added into it, which may then irritate the skin. CeRave did a great job leaving this unscented, I love it. The only things I could wish for when it comes to this product is a bigger size, maybe, since this pot DOES feel a little small when holding it in your hand. But for the amount of benefits your skin will get from this, and like I said, a little goes a long way-- it can actually last a long time. For me it lasts a good 3-4 months.And you know what? If you use it regularly (if you have skin like mine), you'll start to notice that your skin is "happy". You'll notice by the way it is supple and has a subtle glow.

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: When I opened the container it was missing practically half of the product.

review: This moisturizer ticks all the boxes. No scent that I can tell, very moisturizing for my sensitive combination skin that gets dry and flakey in spots ( i am 26 years old) I have only been using a week, so haven't noticed much of a difference besides  moisturizing when I apply it.My issue here is the amount. I saw tons of reviews from customers with half full containers and I thought “It can’t be all of them!” Sure enough mine came in the mail literally half empty.It was a good price but for half the amount I do not think I will purchase again.

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: I just received this and the box is damaged. The container has no seal. When I’m able to try this product I will leave an updated review. I’m disappointed in the low quality shipment and quantity given.

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: This is the BEST night cream or heavier moisturizer I've ever used. It doesn't clog pores, I wake up with my skin feeling still super moisturized but not greasy, basically glowing. I have very sensitive skin and I have no reactions at all. It's very gentle and a little goes a long way!

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: The only reason why I am returning it or why I rated it low is because when I got my package it looked like it had been seating in the sun for too long and it melted.  I think I will just brave it (due to covid) and go to the store and pick one up.  I use CeraVe because of my sensitive skin and it doesn't have that stinging sensation when I apply it on my face after washing.  I also love the fact that it is scent free not that I am sensitive with scents but it does not mix with my perfume or cologne.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Moisturizer Lotion with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Alpha Hydroxy Acid, Anti Wrinkle Cream with Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Alpha Hydroxy, Vitamin C, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5, 2.5 fl.oz
review: This packaging is almost identical to another Neutrogena face cream I have been buying for years, but this product on right - see photo, is a DIfFERENT PRODUCT with an awful perfume scent. The product on the left is the one that is lovely, goes on easily, you never feel it on your skin, no scent.  Are they too cheap to bother with new packaging for a different product?  Are we supposed to read thru every label to find the difference? Returning it.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Moisturizer Lotion with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Alpha Hydroxy Acid, Anti Wrinkle Cream with Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Alpha Hydroxy, Vitamin C, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5, 2.5 fl.oz
review: I first purchased this at Walgreens, and fell in love with it. My skin has noticable changed, in combination I'm sure with my own home made "night" cream (coconut oil, Shea butter, Lavender oil and Frankincense oil) my skin is smoother, less breakouts, fine lines have been improving and it has SPF! This is my second bottle, the first I'm still using, just scrapping out the bit that's still left. I'd say it's lasted me a couple months and that's using it daily sometimes twice daily.
