product_name: Paula's Choice SKIN BALANCING Invisible Finish Gel Moisturizer with Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid, Large Pores & Oily Skin, 2 Ounce. PACKAGING MAY VARY.
review: It seems to me that this is way different than the other bottle I have that i ordered directly from PC website.  I have been using this moisturizer for 2 years now and at the time I was running low, PC website was out of stock so I was desperate (this is why I purchased from here).  When the bottle arrived, I noticed that the bottle looked different, the cap was larger and the lettering on the back didn't match up with my previous bottle.  Also, the consistency was way different than I was used to.  (See pictures - on the left is from Amazon, on the right is from PC).  Not happy about this at all.

product_name: Paula's Choice SKIN BALANCING Invisible Finish Gel Moisturizer with Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid, Large Pores & Oily Skin, 2 Ounce. PACKAGING MAY VARY.
review: This is my HG moisturizer. I have complicated sensitive/oily/breakout-prone skin, and have tried all sorts of products from high-end brands like Elizabeth Arden and Clinique, to more affordable ones like Cerave. I apply this day and night to damp skin after cleansing, massage it lightly until it's fully absorbed, and follow it up with organic jojoba oil. My skin feels so supple and baby soft afterwards! I honestly love Paula's Choice products, and will continue to re-purchase. I also order it in bulk, as I'm scared to ever run out of this gem! The tube looks small, but one has personally lasted me 4 months (as mentioned, I apply on damp skin, so it helps on the spreadability, and you really just need a small amount, about the size of your pinky nail). Please don't ever discontinue this product, as I don't know how to even begin to find a replacement for it after such a long and painful search!

product_name: Humane Oil-Free Daily Lightweight Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Soothing Antioxidants, 3 oz
review: A friend suggested Humane’s toner last year when I suddenly started breaking out. It’s now my go-to, so I wanted to give their new product a try. I love it this moisturizer. It’s light and absorbs quickly but also leaves my skin really soft even a few hours later. And not greasy at all. I’ve used it at night and under makeup. Really happy I bought this.

product_name: Humane Oil-Free Daily Lightweight Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Soothing Antioxidants, 3 oz
review: Received the package like this and it was half empty. Smelled exactly like sunscreen

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: It's been about two years of loyal use of this product and I though it deserved a positive review.At 21 years old I had the absolute worst acne. I had cystic acne to begin with and on top of that I am on some pretty powerful mood stabilizers that just piled on the acne. I tried Proactive, Oral Medications (I can't use many medical grade topical solutions as I have extremely sensitive skin and a ton of topical allergies to may medical grade cream bases), I tried several other acne washes too but I am allergic to pine sterols which end up in a lot of OC products. My dad, did some research for me one day when I called home crying because my face hurt too much to even put my face on my pillow to sleep. He found a few blog post about this product helping other young adults with medication caused acne and sent this to me overnight. I shit you not it cleared up ALL my acne, cystic included, almost completely in 6 weeks, and in 2 months my face was completely clear.I've been using this for 2 years now, and it has honestly saved me. I now just use the gel cleanser 1-2 times a day, plus a bi-weekly facial scrub (not Burt's Bees product) and my face is soft and blemish free as a flipping barbie doll.Before photos with a full face of make up (I didn't take a lot of pictures without a full face), 2 months after photos bb cream and bronzer (grey shirt), 2 years later with no make up (green shirt)

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: I used this system for 3 months, and it has definitely made my acne worse. Before using, I would normally have about 1-2 pimples on my chin all the time, but now I’ve been using the product 3 months and I have around 10 pimples on my jawline at all times. I’ve heard in the past that acne can get worse before getting better, but I feel like 3 months is long enough. I’m really disappointed it didn’t work because the lotion made the rest of the skin on my face feel great. Photo is from today.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: First of all it has a strong perfume smell for an acne product so that’s the first warning sign. This product gave me the worst acne I’ve ever deal  with, I’ve had acne for years now and it’s been somewhat maintainable except for times and this cleanser gave the worst acne I’ve experienced, much harder acne and very uncomfortable dry skin with acne coming in daily. I used the product for 6 months.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: I ordered these in bulk (aka 2) to save a little, but as you can imagine, it’s not something you burn through too quickly. Regardless, the second vial was just opened and although the seal wasn’t broken and it had sat comfortably, upright in the bathroom cabinet; the vial is completely evaporated. Expiration isn’t until 2020. I saw a few reviews with similar low volume issues, so maybe there’s an issue with packaging? I just recommend caution when buying this. 2 stars because the product does work well.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: I’m very disappointed in Amazon. This is an amazing product and clears my skin up very well. But on arrival the bottle came open and all of the contents spilled out everything crusted over and the fact that amazon has nothing to compensate for it. Just highly disappointed. Please work better on your shipping job!

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: Order this item of a regular basis. It came with a leaky bottle. The cap of the lotion pump  is loose. Leak badly. Quality is getting worse.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: PIECE OF JUNK. FAKE GARBAGE. PERIOD. Don’t waste your money on this thing. Received it like this in the mail and after looking further into reviews I found out the product is also COUNTERFEIT. Plus you can’t return. Scammers.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: Damaged on arrival. Product leaked out, top and container are crusty and there is almost no product in it.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: This is what I got today. The package is fine but seems like lots of lotion was leaking and get dry. I was suspect someone ever used it but when I checked the bottom of bottle, instead of fresh one last for 3 years, this one is going to expire around 6 months.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: The bottle was completely empty upon arrival, the lid was covered in the product. It is not able to be returned. This is not worth your money or the star it received.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: A lot of the product spilled. The lid looked like it had already been opened and it was just glued back together.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: DISAPPOINTEDJust received my package today and was very disappointed to open it and see that it wasn't tightly sealed and it was almost empty.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: This is my go to product when a pimple appears. It zaps it every time! The best thing about this product is that it is effective at treating the pimple without drying the skin around it. I much prefer it over Burt's Bees blemish stick. I find that one to be less effective and more drying. However, I do like the little roll on bottle better for easy application. The bottle that this acne treatment comes in has a really fast flow when you're dispensing it, making it kind of wasteful. I kept one of the blemish stick roller bottles and refill it with this acne treatment. It's the perfect combination! Hopefully someday they'll change their packaging.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: I love Burt bees, but this is a poor reflection of the product.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: The product arrived open and spilled.  The security seal is defective.  I require the return of money or replacement of the product.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces
review: I LOVE this product, but can’t find it in retail stores. No idea if this is an Amazon facility issue or product issue, but it’s half empty and crusty as if the product was leaking and then dried. Shame.

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces

product_name: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin, 2 Ounces

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I want to give Era Organics my sincerest thanks for the wonderful products and stellar customer service. Customer service is the best of all in my whole life, honestly.Few months ago, I ordered this face cream...loved it, so I ordered era organics face wash. They did make a huge difference on my face. I was battling with horrible acne for awhile, I cried so hard because it was so frustrating for me to find a good face product for sensitive skin. I literally lost my hope in face products even high end ones, til era organics came into my life.I attached my face pics. Big difference. Still healing.Now, I don't have to worry about putting makeup on before going out of the house every time anymore. You have no idea how happy I am. I am a loyal customer right here for good.Many thanks

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I’ve been using and loving this moisturizer for over a year along with the cleanser. I just opened the one I received yesterday and it’s a completely different formula, scent, color is yellow versus bright white it used to be. I compared the packaging and the ingredients to my old one and it’s exactly the same. Clearly it’s a scam. I can’t believe it. Amazon do something about this fake product.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: (Before/After are 3 weeks apart.)I am so thankful for this product. I am 23 yr old female suffering from adult acne. I would get large red and painful bumps. I started to get concerned when I saw scars. This was truly a godsend. I wasn't expecting for this to work (I've tried EVERYTHING including the dermalogica adult acne kit). The other reviews are true, it is a wonderful moisturizer. And when used with the face wash 1x at night, I've seen a huge difference in my normally very oily, acne ridden skin. It is gentle and smells nice. PS: this is an unpaid review- I did not receive anything in return for this. I just want to spread the word.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: As other recent reviews have commented, the manufacturer has changed the product formula. I loved the original formula, but the new formula smells like it has a rancid oil in it, is yellowish instead of white, and is sticky and waxy instead of creamy and fluffy like the orginal formula. The picture shows the old formula on top and the new formula on the bottom. I am returning it.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I’ve bought this product several times and the last time I noticed the texture and smell are different. I compared the ingredients to the last product I bought and noticed it has changed and is no longer ORGANIC. Instead of the organic label to the right it now says cruelty free. It now causes my sensitive skin to become extremely red and has caused break outs.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: This product so far works well on my oily face and evening out my complexion. Going to continue to use and post progress!Update 8-04-19This product is working miracles on my sensitive skin. I would have never found if it weren't for amazon! Exactly what my face and neck needed! Blotches are fading on both areas and my skin tone is evening out!!! It also keeps area smooth even when I sweat no peeling or irritation. I will be ordering more once this jar gets low! Have posted on all my social media accounts (see photo)

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: The product make my face full of redness and it pop out like pimple kinda thing after using it for only 3-4 days!!!I have stopped using the product and now it’s the 2nd day my face still have a lot of redness popping out from my face and it’s itchy!!!I thought the product is legit from all these reviews but i was wrong...The worst product ever, give me my money back!!!!!

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I have been purchasing this product for a year and the most recent version has a significantly different formula. The ingredients used to be organic but they are not anymore. The scent is awful (almost menthol-like). I’m hoping I just got a bad batch but am super disappointed in the lack of transparency from the company; this product should not be labeled “organic.”

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I thought I had found  the best face lotion for me, but I unfortunately was wrong. I have purchased this product several times in a glass container, however the last time I purchased it, it  was in plastic which I was not to happy about. I have applied this product 2 different times, as you will see by the picture, that llittle particles of the product remain all over my face. The first time, I just over looked it, but then it happened again. Sorry, to say, I am done with this product.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: Aug 6 update. Just got my replacement cream and it has the same characteristics as the prior order. This new order has smells worse than the first order. What is going on with this product. Will not be buying from this line of products again.I usually don’t have a problem with this line of product. I think it works great for my skin. But, this particular order has brown spots on the moisturizer suggestive of bacterial growth. It also has a foul odor to it which, further confirms that this batch has been contaminated.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: This is my second time ordering this "4" oz moisturizer.  I love the product, and the ingredients, HOWEVER, when I opened the lid, and took the protective seal off, it didn't look like 4 oz. so I weighed it.  I have a scale that allows you to tare, meaning, you weigh the empty product, see how much that weighs, then set the tare (which subtracts the container weight) and weigh again, and that gives you the ACTUAL product weight - low and behold 3.5 oz.  I didn't pay attention the first time I ordered, so I didn't check the weight.  Not cool for such an expensive product!  I'll give them the benefit of the doubt and order one more time, this could have been an error, if not 4 oz. I'll look elsewhere.  Check out the photos.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: Received my order today. After reading some reviews I am not somewhat concerned. The cream has a yellow tint and doesn’t have the organic symbol. Read several bad reviews about this happening to them. I’m not sure if I’ll keep it or send it back. I work in the beauty industry and definitely don’t need my skin to have a reaction.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I only have one complaint about the cream and that is, when I rub it into my face, it temporarily feels like a thin mask. And I really do mean temporarily, like 30 seconds. My guess is until it really soaks in. Otherwise, I'm pretty impressed with this. My skin has been super smooth lately and actually looks brighter and healthier in the morning (I put it on at night). The cream is a little bit thicker and has next to no scent.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I found it open and there is nothing between the plastic cover and the product and looks like someone used some of it

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I've only been using this product for a few days, but my face feels very moisturized and stays that way throughout the entire day. The texture is different than other moisturizers I've tried-it has kind of a buttery texture which is interesting (I can't decide if I like it or not). Something else I like about this product is that you can moisturize your entire face with the smallest amount! A little goes a long way.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I was so hopeful after reading all of these reviews that this was the perfect cream for my dry, sensitive skin.  It is very thick and would never fully absorb- a few seconds after rubbing it on my face, it would ball up and be gritty in my fingers.  If I rubbed my face at all it would produce little oily residue bits.  Hard to explain, but I tried it over a serum, on clean dry skin, on my unwashed face, on my damp face... all the same- it would just start rubbing off.  I'm sending it back. Boo.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: Let me start off by saying, I love this face cream. It feels so nice on my skin and provides great moisture. That being said, I'm only giving it 3 stars now. I just ordered a new one and for the same price I paid before I got a 2oz container instead of the 4oz container I used to get. Super shady of them to do that... I'm not sure I can afford this anymore if $18 gets me only 2oz!!

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I've ordered this product before, and I was very disappointed to find these brown spots on the top this last time. Its past the return date, and now because of a product defect I have to toss this. I'm wondering what this is, because I hear other people have had it also. I've ordered this two or three times before with no problems and I've no idea what's going on now and wish I can get a replacement one without any mysterious spots inside.

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: After couple of months of use, the cream has started giving pungent foul smell &  turned blackish color. Picture attached  Does it have an expiry or what ? Completely dissatisfied

product_name: Natural & Organic Face Moisturizer Cream - Extra Nourishing & Hydrating 10-In-1 Daily Facial Cream with Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter For Oily, Dry, Sensitive Skin Era-Organics
review: I haven't tried this on my face yet just a little on the back of my hand... but I'd agree with the other reviews in that you can tell the ingredients are extremely high quality and no fillers meaning no additional fragrances or  ingredients to make it sticky; this is pure heaven - nice and silky and smooth.However, like another review I was missing a good chunk of product out of mine when it arrived. When you pay good money for 4 oz and only get 3 that's not okay.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: I was kind of hesitant at first because the texture is like lotion, but don’t let it fool you! It’s such a great face wash! I have struggled with my acne for years and have tried a billion different products and none of them worked like this one. It took about a month of consistent use but it made my skin look almost flawless. I’m not wearing makeup in either pictures.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: I don't know what I got from Amazon, but it is not CeraVe. I have been using this product for 6 years, and thought I'd save some money by ordering from Amazon instead of purchasing at my local Ulta.1. It smells different. 2. It burned like hell (CeraVe has NEVER burned my skin). 3. It left my face squeaky clean (CeraVe never dries out my skin). 4. The packaging does not match my last bottle, which I purchased from a local pharmacy. 5. The font on the Amazon bottle is different from the CeraVe logo, and is missing the trademark icon, which they put on EVERY instance where their name is used.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: The sole purpose of me buying this was for makeup and oil removal without stripping my skin of moisture. It actually doesn’t strip anything not even what it’s supposed to strip away. Makeup was still left on my face even after washing it twice with this cleanser. This would be good for someone that doesn’t wear makeup, but I would still not recommend using it then because it seems like it will leave buildup on your face with time. That will then cause allergies in the long run. Might be better just to pick another cleanser that actually cleans instead of sitting on your face like a moisturizer.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: I specifically bought this product to replace my Cetaphil, after learning parabens are a no no, and this product is advertised as "fragrance-free and PARABEN FREE". It in fact has both Methylparaben and Propylparaben!! I'm assuming this must be an older product, and Cerave changed their formulation but this seller has old product. Regardless, this is false advertising, no good! Wish I could have given 0 stars.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: bought this from Amazon a few weeks ago, I had used Aveeno face wash before this, my skin isn’t oily & sometimes “oil free” face washes make my skin extra dry so I decided to give this a try and it has not dried, or made me breakout at all. I usually use between half a pump or a full pump (picture shown of one FULL pump) and it’s plenty, very gentle on my sensitive skin. I reccomend this to all of my family & friends. I won’t ever use another facewash again. I also use Cerave body wash & lotion!Con: feels like conditioner is on my face texture wise

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: I was excited to try this. As I’m always looking for affordable skin care, and this was recommended. But this DOES NOT take off makeup well. I washed my face twice, for at least 60 seconds both times, and once I put toner on you can see there was still makeup present. I’m definitely disappointed and I thought I was going to find a new holy grail face wash.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: I liked this until I looked into the ingredients and found several ingredients which were high in toxicity. See pic of ingredients or go on the Think Dirty app.Threw it out due to untrustworthy ingredients.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: This doesnt appear to be the real brand. The one I've already purchased from Walmart has the trademark symbol after the brand name. Will be returning. Bummer.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: I absolutely love this product! I spent so much money on expensive facewash and face creams and nothing worked like this. I always had breakouts on my chin and redness. No matter what products I used, it didn't fix my problem.  I bought this cleanse 2 weeks ago and use every day. I noticed my redness and pimples clearing up in 3 days! It leaves my skin smooth, healthy and clear. I just order another bottle in case they sell out. Cerave please never discontinue this product. I cant thank you enough for making me have confidence again 💕💕💕

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: The container looked used and dirty. I won't be using it for my own safety.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: I would not recommend. I have extremely dry sensitive fair skin and this wash made my skin very irritated and red. I don’t know what exactly caused it, if there’s a specific chemical or just a general reaction from the face wash, but the redness took a few hours to clear up. Will discontinue use! Wish I could get a refund.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: This is the best face wash for me. It has almost no scent to it. Also it doesn’t foam up and get all bubbly. Leaves my skin so soft and smooth! This is now gonna be my permanent face wash.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: Bottle was WIDE OPEN when i received it. Product is ALL OVER THE box. None left for me to use :( DONT buy this!! They won’t give me my money back

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: Bottle is damaged .... Has a hole at the bottom.... Product all over the box

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: Haven’t used it yet. It arrived with the top part of the pump missing. See attached photograph. Three stars because I like most Cerave products.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: product was not sealed came pouring.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: Delivered with a broken cap

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: ESTO MEDA MUCHA DISCOFIANSA 😨🤢

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: Me llegó abierta y por la mitad

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: Worked wonders for me! My skin started breaking out like crazy and almost everything was irritating my skin more. Was told I needed to use a very basic cleanser so I tried cerave. Cannot believe the different I've seen since I started using in may. I also use with a witch hazel toner and rose face oil.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: When I saw that this was a Retinol serum, I was expecting that Retinol would be featured as one of the top ingredients.  It's not.  Instead it is hidden way down in the middle  of the list of chemical ingredients.The fact that I can't find a percentage of Retinol for this product likely means there isn't enough to warrant such a measurement, which then in turn means that it is likely ineffective for resurfacing and brightening.  I haven't seen a difference.  Spend the money on a product that truly is Retinol based, and you will see results.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: i really wanna try this product i’ve read so much good reviews  but i got it with a damaged box. not sure if it matters because now i don't know if this product is used or not being returned by somebody else and delivered to me . idk not a big deal but not so happy about it.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: Ya lo probé y la verdad desde que lo usé me gusto mucho porque no es algo que enrojecerá tu rostro, el frasco es un poco pequeño pero lo demás todo bien !

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: I have a few acne scars on my face that looked noticeable with and without makeup on. My skin texture at the scar sites is uneven, causing my foundation makeup to look caked on and unflattering in those spots. This serum has helped to smooth out and fade my scars. The discolored spots look lighter and less noticeable. My skin texture has actually improved, and my foundation makeup applies more evenly now.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: Product exactly as described in original packaging. Very happy with my purchase thank you

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: This is a very small one ounce bottle which seems to be the norm for retinol creams. The base lotion that the encapsulated retinol, ceramides, licorice root and niacinamide is the stand out here when comparing it to similar products. I find CeraVe products to be so smooth and non irritating. I never have break outs or reactions. As I am getting older I am not healing as quickly after a pimple and this is nice and not greasy but leaves my face feeling hydrated. I have been using this when I have redness I want to go away more quickly and I still love the CeraVe hyaluranic acid serum as my go to face lotion for dewy looking skin.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I like it very much.  At my age it may not help so much.  I have good skin.  Don't even wear any makeup, with the exception of face powder and a little eye makeup.  I will be 80 the 12th of January.  I feel blessed with my skin.My daughter, who is 54, says 'Mom, let me know how you like it'.I really like the feel of it on my skin.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I never write reviews but I don’t want anyone else to fall for these reviews. I’ve used retinol creams before and this one smells like plastic, similar to how my other creams smell when they’ve gone bad (kindof like a 10 yr old lipgloss or chapstick). It rubs in like old sun block or half dried Elmer’s glue. I don’t know what’s up with these good reviews because my bottle is sooo bad.Unfortunately my mom threw away the box it came in so I can’t even return it :/

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: This is the absolute worst face product I or my mom ever used it caused our faces to break out extremely bad and got really red and irritated cystic acne all over. We have never broken out like this before it was always a zit here or there, never have I experienced anything like this in my life. Our faces look as if we are teenagers.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: Product is really old, the cream is already yellow, not smooth, weird texture with really bad smell.The label holding the box was dirty and not closed meaning the box was open before sent to me.I have two pictures while opening the product, will attach them here so you can see yourself the yellow color and weird texture.I checked other reviews including videos, the product should be white with smooth texture. This is not what I got.I really cannot use the product. Very disappointed.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: This product has been amazing for me! Great for my product sensitive skin. Provides moisture and leaves my skin super soft! Just remember that retinol makes your skin more sensitive to sun. Vitamin C helps with pesky spots, and hyaluronic acid gives your skin a dose of moisture! A lot goes a long way.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: GUYSTHIS LITERALLY CURED MY ACNE OVERNIGHTI’m serious, I had started the return process on this because I didn’t like the smell (kind of dusty), but I thought “hey, I’ll just use it one more time.” I woke up to AMAZING skin. And then I did it again, and in TWO DAYS my acne was already clearing up. I have been using this, the Vitamin C cleanser, and the Rose Water, and haven’t had a zit in 2 months! Praises be! Please try this!!!Pic 1: Progress over 3 daysPic 2: Progress from the FIRST NIGHTPic 3: my skin after 2 weeks daily useMA-GI-CAL!!

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: Love this moisturizer so far! I've been using it for a couple of weeks now. My skin is pretty sensitive and I haven't had any issues with reactivity at all. The scent is quite pleasant, it's hardly discernable which I love! The cream feels silky on my face and absorbs pretty quickly, it's not heavy or sticky and I can put my makeup on after a minute or two with no problems. I can't attest to any anti-aging benefits just yet but I do love the way it makes my skin feel. 🙂Also, I gave it five stars because the product is so great but almost knocked it down a star because the packaging is AWFUL! I included a pic of the cock-eyed top. It won't stay on at all and product spooges out where it doesn't belong. I don't know if I got a faulty bottle or what but it's definitely a pain.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I am often hesitant to buy skin care products without advice first as I have super sensitive and rough skin. After reading the ingredients and reviews I decided to give this one a try and so far I am impressed! All of the ingredients are all natural and the consistency is creamy and smooth. My skin doesn't feel like I am wearing anything and the smell is very subtle. So far my face hasn't dried out as it has in the past. So far so good! Recommended for anyone looking to try something new.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I love this moisturizer. It smells good an my face is so soft.Update, the first one I bought was wonderful, goes on light and smells good. Soon after, I had a coupon so I bought another one, i barely opened it today and it's not the same. This second one has a stronger unpleasant smell, it's even a different color than the first. It's almost like it's old. I regret not opening it sooner so I could have returned it.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I think I underestimated the importance of using an SPF with this product. Normally if my face doesn’t like something, I just break out, but with this I developed SUPER dry, chapped, painful area on my chin. Aesthetician friend said I basically gave myself a chemical peel, has taken a couple of days of hardcore skincare products to calm down.Attributing most of the blame to myself here, just wanted to share my experience

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: This product does have side effectsI got severe cold and flu after using this for a week.Would not recommend it if you’re allergic to retinol

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: This lotion is a dark tan in color and has a horrible old oily smell to it.  I am guessing it is either old or spoiled.  Not something I would ever put on my face.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: There is virtually no smell in this! It leaves my face moisturized up to the morning. I will update as I keep using it.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I got this for my wife and she really loves it!! She recommends it to everyone and will be trying more of Insta Naturals products.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: Nice feel on the skin.  Very moisturizing. Almost no scent. Use at night and don't forget to wear sunscreen daily.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I liked the price point, and was willing to give it a try. It's more like lotion than cream and it doesn't smell flowery. I like how small amount I had to use really covered my whole face and I didn't need to re apply for moisturizing. I think it's helping prevent aging in my skin!

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: Lightweight and moisturizing. Smell is okay

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: I like the way it makes my skin feel. I was Actually able to stop using foundation.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: This is a great product. I’ve noticed improvements in my facial skin lines after about a month using it. I’d highly recommend it to anyone who’s looking to have better looking skin. I also use the eye serum as a compliment to the skin cream.

product_name: InstaNatural Retinol Moisturizer Anti Aging Night Face Cream - Face & Neck Wrinkle Lotion - Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Acne - Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Complex - 3.4 oz
review: After and before love this product

product_name: Face Moisturizer for Men, Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for men, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Men Expert Vitalift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Face Moisturizer with SPF 15 Sunscreen and Pro-Retinol, 1.6 oz
review: After applying, no sticky feeling.Has a nice fragance to it.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: --- and titanium dioxide is no angel either!! What horrible things to put in an acne fighting productSulphur products normally work Great on acneWHAT HAPPENEDI started using this as I was coming down from a bad breakout, I was going to a wedding in a few days which with my normal acne cycles and healing should've been gone by the wedding (with my normal sulphur drying lotion).  I ran out and saw this on sale.  It was my mistake to just assume they were essentially the same. They were except a few major ingredients! My skin kept getting more and more inflammed, deeper painful knobs were coming up.  I was wondering if I had eaten something.  It just wasn't stopping.  One night I was actually in hives down my chin to my neck!  Later I noticed that I was getting what looked to be just plain cysts..pure inflammation no whitehead or anything.  I was pulling my hair out like what is happening.  I decided to take a look at the ingredients in this imposter. Talc and titanium dioxide... Really!? Who does that? I quick washed it off and ordered Eradikate my normal drying lotion, express shipping.  I will NEVER do that again.  I haven't had breakouts this bad since I started using sulphur in my skincare routine.  This has been the worst in YEARS.  I had so much makeup on at that wedding.  I am going to have scars too.  So mad about this

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: All of the reviews on this product were SO mixed it seriously made me hesitate getting it because of how many things can apparently go wrong. So I flipped a coin lol and decided to purchase this item that I had high hopes for and I don’t regret it. Shipping was fast and came within 4-5 days. My lil jar came in a small bubble wrapped zip lock bag and was also surrounded by bubble wrap in the box it was shipped in, so it did not come broken like I feared. It did come shaken of course but just leaving it for a good hour or two did the trick :). When I finally tried the product it was amazing! I feared the results of some people where their acne or breakouts got worse but thankfully this did not happen to me. This product definitely reduced redness and helped push up the impurity to take it out effortlessly. Many were frustrated that this product came off in the night on their pillow but I will admit this product takes self control haha especially for a wiggly worm like myself. Depending on where I have the product I will only let myself sleep on one side or if I have it on varying spots I just stay on my back. When I did forget and moved everywhere causing it to come off the results weren’t as good as when I stayed still and allowed the product to do its thing. Overall I’m in love with this product and definitely will repurchase!! I’m glad I took the risk and if your someone wanting to get this product but aren’t sure,I recommend physically buying it to spend less if you get different results. With shipping this product is about 24 dollars sooo I’m also considering finding it at a local store haha.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Seriously do not waste your money. This is  by far the worst product I've bought on amazon. it's been 2 weeks and the pimple I got this product for has not improved and I got 2 more, right next to them which is not usual on my skin. I'm 35 years and I only get one pimple a month and goes away very fast. This has just burned my skin but not improved AT ALL!!Luckily I bought this on an amazon lighting deal and only spent 11 plus tax. However, this is no magic as I read in some reviews.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: My second bottle I LOVE THIS PRODUCT I’ve already used this a little bit and thought I’d write a review (it won’t work well for cystic acne and stuff but simple pimples works wonders)

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: This product did wonders for my  hormonal chin acne.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: I had seen a few of my favorite youtubers use this and they all have pretty clear skin so I gave it a shot. It came mixed up which it 100% will because it moved around in the package. I let it sit overnight and in the morning the pink and clear had separated. I use it at night and put it on my acne and where I feel I usually break out. I put it on and go to sleep. When I wake up a lot of the times it’s been rubbed off. No staining on bed. I wash my face using a cleanser and my acne is settlers down in the morning and gone in 3 days.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Me encanta este producto, vale la pena. En las imágenes pueden apreciar su tamaño, muy rápida la entrega al cabo de 2 días ya lo tenía conmigo y súper empacado para no romperse.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: This is a good product and I use it whenever I have a breakout. This does not "dry" it up quickly but I believe it helps. I have used this product for some time and will continue until I find something better.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: I really like this product and the brand, it is good for acne . But! When I receive it! It has a little bit broken!!!! I hope next time it will has a good box.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Came in perfectly. It came in all pink but you have to let sit for 15 min until it's all the way down.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: I love it! I can feel the soothing and healing power of this little bottle as soon as I start putting it on. Reasonable price too. Thx Amazon

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Honestly I was expecting so much from this product. It smells like medication so I was expecting it to get rid of my pimples. It just isn’t strong enough for my skin. Doesn’t really dry out and get rid of my pimple.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: As you can see the amount of the pink ( active ingredient) is 1/2 what it is in the other bottle. These are both new. rip off for the 1. please refund or let me know how to return the 1 bottle.thank you

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: This product arrived and didn’t look new. Upon inspection, I noticed no security seal. There was product crust all along the top and sides of opening. It appears as though I received a used or returned product. Totally disappointed, will look into a different brand.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Love this product works on getting any unwanted pimples dryed up and gone .

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: The product inside is chunky and looks like raw pink milk that was left overnight. The bottle was also very cold.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: I’ve never had this product so I didn’t expect it to be such a watery consistency but I’ll check out video reviews later to make sure that’s how it’s suposed to be. But looks legit

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Product open in the bag and can’t be returned. Bought once before and loved it, but really disappointed.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Works well, I can tell the difference in one night’s use. Just a bummer that the cap was broken because now I cannot take it when I travel.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Product arrived with a piece of the screw top lid broken off.  Liquid spilled and I could smell it as soon as I  got it without having to open it

product_name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Solution Acne Toner with Salicylic Acid, 6.76 Fl Oz
review: Been using This toner along with other LRP products since October 2019. Nothing else was working for me.

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: As I get older, it's been difficult to find a good overall clean makeup product that really stays in place without drying out my face!! I've stayed with this since the first day I purchased one, and it's now my go to makeup full coverage matte makeup.  The photo is of me (on the left) and my oldest daughter on the right.

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: Hard to achieve full coverage without using twice the amount. I normally use the Colorstay liquid foundation because it is very full coverage without having to use much. This creme texture is a dream it really does feel so amazing going on the skin. It is a soft smooth silky gliding formula. It reminds me a ton of the Maybelline Mousse foundation, only better. It's very "whipped". Really wanted to love it and it's fun to try because it's new but it's just too lightweight for me. Feels like you get a much smaller amount of product because, like whipped butter they add air and that takes space of the product. It feels amazing but the amount needed daily will use it up quickly. Comparing size to the liquid, they are the same in ounces but the liquid goes so much further.

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I got this foundation as I was looking for a full coverage foundation. I originally bought it in the store and got lucky with my color match.  I am not a fan of the tube with such a thick foundation. Sometimes I squeeze too much out so I got a little tub which I put the excess in and use the next day. However, I do like the coverage. I use a moisturizer with primer first to make this go on a bit smoother.  I do get a full days worth of coverage. In fact, if I'm not careful about washing my face at night and using a toner, I'll end up with some on my sheets!

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I got the “natural beige” color cause the ivory was too pale, made me look like a ghost.. Anyways, I love this color and it blends on my skin so easily and looks natural.

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: Everything is fine but it's not full coverage !  But It's still good!!

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: The bottle had a hole in it and the foundation was everywhere inside of the package !

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: No es cobertura total ....

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I just tried the product for the first time and i must say i think i found a fav thank you

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: My favorite foundation over all others (even high end brands). I’ve been using it for years and will until they discontinue. I have very sensitive skin (allergic to most ingredients in makeups and face washes) along with superficial and cystic acne and redness. This foundation does go on fairly thick but blended out with a damp beauty blender or RT sponge it feels pretty lightweight in comparison to other full coverage foundations. It is buildable as well (though I don’t recommend that if you set with powder or bake your face). It does have a natural finish if you don’t overdo it. And it will last 12 hours or longer!

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I am now 40 (shhh), and love quality makeup, so I’ve tried sooo many brands over the years, including foundation brands trying to find the just right fit. I’ve tried many high end department store brands, one of my faves is Lancôme. Then I saw the reviews on revlon colorstay from makeup experts, and decided it was worth a try At the price. And I’m so glad I did. I was super impressed right away, I love the whip type texture, incredible coverage, goes on so smooth Like velvet (I use just my fingers or a beauty blender), and long lasting. It’s my new go to, and I prefer it over all the high end ones I’ve tried. Only thing I’d change is I wish it had SPF.

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: Tiny!!

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I am passionate about beauty care products and was excited to try Revlon's Colorstay Full Cover Foundation.  I used the shade medium beige and it came in a 1.0 fluid ounce tube.  I wish the tube was at least twice the size because 1.0 fluid oz of a foundation is not very much product.  I would not say this is a "full coverage" product by definition but it is really buildable and works well with dry areas.  Some full coverage foundations do not have enough hydration and make my skin look dry and cakey.  Though this is not full coverage it gives a very natural cover that is buildable and does not settle strangely on imperfections.  It has a slight mousse-like consistency and glides really well.  I actually like that it is not completely matte because it makes my skin look natural and hydrated. If you are looking for a very matte foundation this may not be for you.  A lot of matte products can make my skin look dry and they settle.  This does not settle poorly and almost absorbs like a lotion into the skin making it look like skin which is really unique.  It feels really nice on my face and I like that it does not draw out imperfections.  There are two things about this foundation that I would like changed.  One is that it does not contain an SPF and this is almost a necessity with a product even if I put SPF on my face first. This is one of the most important things to combat skin damage.  The second is that 1 oz is a little bit small and this will not last me long.  I like at least twice the amount of product.  Overall,  this is a really pretty foundation.  It is also super easy to work with and does not take a ton of time.  It has consistent results whether I am in a hurry or not.

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I received the color Nude which was slightly lighter than my natural skin tone, which is fair with olive-yellow tones.  The foundation went on smoothly without any significant absorption.  It stayed on the top of my skin and seemed to have a slight sheen to it.I don't think this would be a good choice for women who have skin issues like acne or wrinkles they don't want to be viewed as more pronounced.  This foundation didn't feel dry, but it did feel sticky and not moisturizing.Coverage was easy to attain with very little product.  The foundation 'set' after approximately 60 seconds, so users will need to work quickly and spread the foundation expecting it to be in place and not 'blendable' after that time.The 'up to 24-hr' coverage is probably accurate.  I had to break out the cold cream to remove it from my face instead of using a light facial cleanser as I usually would do.I'm not a huge fan of this product, but if you have skin that's healthy, moisturized and under 30 and you want your make-up locked on for a full day, this one might be for you.----------------------------------------------

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: If you’re looking to match your shade with the colorstay line, read this first.....Revlon colorstay “buff” is a perfect match for my skin (fair with yellow tones). I bought the new revlon Full Cover foundation in “buff” thinking it would be similar shade wise but it is not even close (see photo). It’s much darker and pink/orange toned. So if you’re looking to match “Buff” with the color stay line, just save your money....this shade won’t work for you. I don’t know about the other shades though. Will be returning.

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I really like the Revlon Color Stay Full Cover Foundation!  It is long lasting and does not leave your skin feeling oily. It goes on smooth. You do not need a lot at all. This particular color, Early Tan,  will work better for my skin tone in the Spring and Summer. I would like one shade lighter for my skin now. I have taken a couple pictures to show you the color. Overall, a nice value for a nice product!

product_name: Revlon ColorStay Full Cover Foundation, Toast, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
review: My wife really likes this powdered foundation. It lasts all day. It doesn't fade that much, it's lightweight, and it blends easily. It doesn't have a caking residue.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: Great lotion. But it arrived with the broken cap.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: Arrive damage. The lid was broken. Very disappoinment.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: The product was delivered without a pump. I cannot even use the lotion. Dissapointing experience.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: It was delivered without the pump! How am I even supposed to use this? It's not even worth returning.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: It came tottaly damaged and hams of the cream is gone (

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: I gave this kit over a month for a chance to see results. I have adult onset hormonal acne very badly on my cheeks and chin. I gave up proactiv a while back and went natural, and my skin actually cleared up. Then out of nowhere my acne just went full on terrible. This kit made my skin red, itchy and dry for the first week, then it was normal. Since using the kit I have not seen clear skin. I actually see more pimples coming in, and it made my cystic acne worse. I'd get 5 cysts all at once. This kit also makes my skin more oily and makes my fine lines for defined. It's a cheap kit, nicely packaged, so I gave it a shot. I'm giving my results from the product 2 stars, but the bottles and everything were nicely put together.Update: I decided to give this product another go, and I woke up with a red, puffy face and eyelids drooping. I kept with it for 3 days to see if it would subside. My face became dry and rough in areas like sandpaper and the itching and burning was unreal. Will not be trying again.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: Product is just as I remember from my late teens. I use this product once a day (in the evening) because it dries out my skin. I use Aveeno moisturizer to combat that. This product will bleach out any colored fabric it comes into contact with so I make sure I use a towel to dry my face with and a pillowcase to sleep with that I don’t care about. But I went from having large groups of acne on both sides of my forehead by my eyes, large groups in the middle of my forehead, and a bunch covering my chin to now having just a few scattered on my face.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: Would not recommend this product. It caused me to break out more and bleached my pillow case. I don't want something on my skin that can cause my sheets to become bleached.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: I love this line. My skin has a healthy glow, and I no longer get breakouts. I have recently bought it for two of my children who have experienced breakouts.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!! As far as treating the acne it works. if you want a fine rash and swollen face then go ahead! It has eating my sons face and caused him to be so swollen that we are seeking medical attention! Even antihistamines are not working on the swelling!!! He only used this product 2x!!! PLEASE DO NOT BUY!!!

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: This item came spilled all over and damaged. You also cannot return it.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: Package is open, seal is broken!Can’t let my daughter use this.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: Received different than displaying in picture

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: The products are a decent size for the price, and they should all last awhile.  The cleanser only takes a small amount, suds well, and leaves my face feeling clean.  The toner is a refreshing scent and seems to do its job.  The lotion is moisturizing but doesn’t feel heavy; I usually have dry skin in appearance and with the moisturizer my skin is definitely looking not so dry.  As for acne, I don’t have terrible skin but the occasional break outs around my temples and sometimes on my jaw line.  I have noticed the acne I had at my temple has cleared up quite a bit.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: So the photos that I posted are almost a month apart I’m sure that I would’ve gotten results faster if I hadn’t used it the way that I did. I stress pick at my face. That delayed results and caused scaring. Once I stopped doing that the acne disappeared but my face hurts and is numb every time I use this. I have been using sunscreen and doing facial massages also. I slowed down using this system to about once a day instead of washing twice. I wash with this at night because it makes my skin so sensitive. I use a gentle cleanser in the morning. The 3rd step, the lotion, is only used once every other day or so because everyday was too much. In the future I plan on purchasing the wash only and using other products to complete my routine.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: I struggled a lot with deep acne, blackheads, white heads, and scarring. Once I started this product, I had immediate results. For me, I had to start off with using it once a day because it is drying. I eventually moved up to twice daily and had great results. If you struggle with blackheads and scarring, I suggest you use a spin brush as well. Also, my skin is not completely clear. As pictured, I have a few marks and blackheads, but I no longer feel the need to cover up with makeup. It progressively gets better with each use. I am not disappointed. I 100% reccomend.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: So I have PCOS which means I’m “blessed” with hormonal acne as an adult. I have tried everything from homemade remedies to high dollar serums and nothing has really worked. Enter, AcneFree.I was pretty skeptical at first because ya know it’s only $16 and if water intake, diets, and expensive skin care can’t fix this mess then why the heck would this?Best deisicon ever. I’ve only been using it for a few days but look at how much has cleared from just those three days! This is the first time I’ve actually shown real improvement in my skin since being diagnosed with PCOS.The three step system is straightforward, use twice a day. I have oily skin and this product really helps control that. It does leave a sticky feeling at first but that goes away after a few minutes.I will update as I continue to use it but for now I’m in love!!

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: I discovered this by accident a few weeks before my 34th bday. I had already experimented with many products, including prescription topical medication and high end producs like REN, Clinique, Fresh, etc. Nothing worked. I have really oily skin and had many small but inflamed pimples as well as whiteheads and blackheads all over my face. I started using this twice a a day, and my skin improved dramatically. I used to have terrible texture on my forehead, and even that’s gone now. The kit lasts me about 2 months, and I’ve paid about $20 at most for it, so that’s extremely cost effective. That’s less for all 3 steps than one step of Clinique’s.I’m 34 so I need to take care of my skin and not dry ot out too much to keep wrinkles at bay, so I’ll rub on a bit of a tea tree oil blend before bed. If my face feels dry, I’ll skip the lotion before bed too. You can see the difference in the pictures. The ones to the left were taken in March 2017 and the ones to the right on October 2017.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: I just started using this product. It was recommended by a friend and i love it. My skin has never looked better in my life

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: "I received a free product for the purpose of my review. Opinions are 100% my own." My son was able to try this free product on his back where he is prone to get acne. He also used it on his face. We saw a difference early on and we are proud to say that his back and face looks more clearer now.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: Products have expired in 2014, expired in November. Product packaging has been opened before.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: When I use this twice a day, I have beautiful skin. When I don't use it twice a day.... My skin is a disaster zone.I have been using it for about 5 years now. I have gone through phases where I've tried fancier stuff (e.g., Clinique) or more natural stuff (e.g., tea tree oil/vitamin e oil) but I always regret it. While I occasionally will add extra moisturizer or a touch of vitamin E oil, I have the best results when I don't stray too much from the recommended twice daily routine.The pictures are unretouched/ unenhanced. The terrible skin is when I was going through one of my aforementioned phases where I was trying to use a more natural cleanser/moisturizer in conjunction with some extremely expensive toner ($30 for 1.7 ounce). The picture with the basically flawless skin? About 10 days later. Using Acne Free twice a day. (Don't ask me why I feel the need to try other stuff bc I have no idea!! I'm a sucker for pretty packaging I guess?) Moral of the story? Give it a try and if it works, stick with it!

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: My tween daughter, was given the opportunity to review Acne Free 24 hour Acne Clearing System. Puberty has hit, and that means breakouts. She especially gets acne around her hairline and forehead. It was hard at first to get into the routine of doing the 3 steps every day. I think being able to brag to her friends about results helped her to continue using Acne Free. I received a free product for the purpose of my review. Opinions are 100% my own.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: I was so happy with this product! I have two teenagers and we all break out. We saw a major difference in smoothness, texture, scarring from old acne and the acne itself was GONE! My daughter is in high school and was in a theater production. She received so many compliments how she was glowing!I included a photo of her because her skin is GLOWING!  My skin looks radiant! I 100% recommend this product and tell everyone about it! I received a free product for the purpose of my review. Opinions are 100% my own.

product_name: Acne Free 3 Step 24 Hour Acne Treatment Kit - Clearing System w Oil Free Acne Cleanser, Witch Hazel Toner, & Oil Free Acne Lotion - Acne Solution w/ Benzoyl Peroxide for Teens and Adults - Original
review: I don't believe in slamming products, but if I can help someone I am willing to do so..this product WRECKED my skin. i had very minor acne prior to using this 3 step system. I would get 1 or 2 cystic pimples on my chin every once in a while. when I started using this product, i noticed improvements in my skin after 1 week of use. however.. after that first week, my skin spiraled out of control. i tried to push through this product because many times it will get worse before it gets better. however, my skin just continued to get worse and worse and worse. it has been over 2 months now since I decided to stop using this system and my skin is completely wrecked. it is not only still severely broken out from the product, the product had caused severe scarring. I am now on TWO acne perscriptions praying that I can reverse this nightmare.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I’m a busy fair skinned lifeguard, so my job has exposed me to a fair amount of different types of SPFs. Asian sunscreens, expensive sunscreen, all kinds of chemical and mineral sunscreens you name it, but nothing has ever beat this stuff. After an 8hr shift, I still look the same as I did before it.The finish is matte, not sticky, so my hair doesn’t stick to my face when the wind blows. It also doesn’t smell too strong or transfer onto anything. It holds up really well against sweat and doesn’t break down in the light so it lasts so much longer. In the winter, it’s thick enough to protect me from wind burn without being uncomfortable. My skin is dry, and my eyes sensitive, but this sunscreen doesn't give me any trouble.When it’s hot and I’m sweating a lot, I’ll re-apply about every hour, but regular conditions, I can get away with touching up every two to three. The two sun screens I always wear at work are “this” for my face, neck, and upper body, and the beach defense SPF 70 for my legs. I find that these two have the same strength but each have a different finish on the skin.Here’s a picture of me a few years ago on July 18th to show you how well this works for me! Keep in mind that my genetics play apart in this as well:)

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I spent a total of 90 min outside after applying this product. As you can see from the picture it did not protect me from the sun.  Previous years I have used Neutrogena age shield for faces with awesome results.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I absolutely love this product so I decided to order it to bring my total up to get free shipping. I was finishing an old bottle so I let my new one sit on my dresser for a week. As soon as I tried to uses it, it had a yellow liquid with black speck come out. The expiration is 2020/08. This is not the same quality product as in stores.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Was out on the river for 12 hours. Reapplied 9 times. Was still very burnt. Also wore a wide brimmed hat.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Micro mini but I guess it serves its purpose.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Didn’t worked so well on my dad’s dark skin...

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I have ordered two ,but just received one. Please check it and deliever one for me as soon as possible. Thanks!

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I have sensitive skin and felt I needed to review this product, which caused a severe rash on my neck and face that lasted 5 days. Not worth it.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: It took me a few times to figure out what was happening, but I realized after i last went to the pool and used this sunblock, that it gives me massive dry, red, and painful patches on my face, mostly around my mouth and on my chin and makes me look like I have a bright red goatee.
