It happened right before I had my license renewed last time, so I have this lovely picture of me with a bright red circle with open scabs around my mouth for the next ten years until time to renew again. I have used various sunblocks before, and have never had this problem with anything other than Neutrogena. Their facewashes do similar things, but not nearly as bad, and i have never in my life had problems with sensitive skin. But this stuff is just so harsh. It is terrible.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I LOVED THIS SUNSCREEN...but...I had an allergic reaction to it. I put it on my face and neck in the morning and after sweating (where it did run into my eyes) my neck broke out in a rash and the skin around my eyes started to itch. I was so excited to use it and the feel of it felt great when applying it. But unfortunately my somewhat sensitive skin didn’t agree.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I love this stuff and it works great but one of mine exploded in the box during shipping.  Maybe try not to put heavy items of top of these tubes when packing.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I bought this due to my past acne regime not working. I’ve always had normal skin, which gave me the ability to pretty much use any product without breaking me out or causing irritation. However, after having my son I noticed a change in my skin. A lot of my acne is along my jawline, which could be due to hormonal changes. Once I bought this cleanser and paired it with the moisturizer, my skin was seeing results. These photos are within a few days of using the products. I’m glad I switched up my routine and gave these products a chance. My acne is slowly but surely clearing up!!

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: It lasts FOREVER! My pimples and blackheads are at a MINIMUM. I haven't seen any pimples on my face in weeks. It is unscented so its perfect for sensitive skin.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: To make the long story short, this is great for dry, sensitive skin, and it really helps clear acne!Full review:I've had acne since I was 10, and back in the summer of 2016, I was prescribed birth control and a few months of Retin-A cream. Retin-A cream can be really harsh, so I initially only used it for my body acne and not my face. Eventually I started using a tiny amount a few times a week to help my remaining facial acne as the birth control continued to clear it and to help smooth some wrinkles and maybe fade my acne scars. However, I was still using St. Ives apricot scrub with salicylic acid and some roc retinol cream a few nights a week also. Add in some time in the sun with no sunblock, and I ended up with a terribly burned face. This, along with the dryness from a Colorado fall/early winter made my skin extremely dry and painful. I couldn't even apply moisturizer without it burning. Needless to say, I had to stop using any face wash. The dryness also started to make my skin break out, and I couldn't treat it with anything. After desperately googling remedies for my dry skin and forming acne, I started using a mixture of tea tree, argan, jojoba, rose hip, and sometimes castor oil on my face along with frequent honey masks. This fixed my dry skin, which store bought moisturizers for extremely dry skin couldn't do, but I still had terrible acne, like the worst I've ever had in my life. I started using a bar of Cerave moisturizing soap because it was on clearance at walmart for like $1 and I'd heard of people using it for acne. This helped to make my face feel cleaner, but it didn't really help my acne. I knew I needed something that could exfoliate my skin, but there was no way I was going to use something as harsh as the St. Ives scrub again. I decided to try this because I did like the Cerave bar soap even though it didn't help my acne, and this has at least some salycilic acid for exfoliation. When I first used it, I didn't think it was really going to help my acne because the consistency is so smooth and it doesn't seem like it could really exfoliate. However, after 1-2 weeks, I started to notice my skin clearing up. Slowly but surely, this face wash helped to almost completely clear my skin. I had also started taking my birth control more regularly, added a probiotic supplement, and started using vitamin c on my face, so I can't say this is the only thing that helped my acne, but it certainly contributed a lot. I also eventually started using an electric face brush to help exfoliate, and I think that could've helped. I still get acne around my period, and because I'm a college senior, so I'm always super stressed, don't get enough sleep, and don't always eat right. Also, you can't tell from the pictures, but I have quite a few blackheads on my nose. The face wash has helped clear some of those and make them smaller, but I have yet to find a product that actually completely gets rid of them, and I've tried many. Even with the blackheads, my skin is so much better now. This face wash saved my skin, and I think it's worth every penny!Pictures:Picture 1- The right side is a picture from February 14, 2017 without any makeup after starting my oil treatment. The left side is from April 7, 2017 with makeup, but you can still see how awful my skin was. I didn't start using the face wash until around the end of April.Picture 2- The left part is from July 7, 2017, and the two on the right are both from July 17, 2017. I am wearing makeup in all of these pictures, but you can tell that my skin had improved significantly. Few pimples, but lots of acne scars from the breakout.Picture 3- Both were taken August 21, 2017 with make up. Once again you can see I don't have many pimples, just terrible acne scars.Picture 4- The left part was taken December 12, 2017. I was testing a BB cream, so it is cover the bottom half of my face, but you can see that my skin looks pretty clear. The top right side was taken December 13 with the BB cream on my entire face. The bottom right picture was taken today with no makeup. As I said previously, I still get pimples from stress and periods, but they are usually small and mild instead of the giant lumps I was getting before, and they go away really quickly using cosrx pimple patches (definitely check those out) and vitamin c serum. Also, please note that I do have freckles, so most of the spots on my face are just freckles or dark marks from old acne I am still trying to get rid of. Sorry for the long review, and all the pictures with makeup (I didn't take many without makeup when my skin was that bad), but I hope it helped!

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I don’t know what happened but when I opened the package, the bottle was covered in some slimy residue. I’m not sure if it was from the bottle or not. It feels nasty and I don’t know where the red stuff came from either.UPDATE:They sent me a new one that was in perfect condition. I’ve been using it for months now and it has not caused any issues for me. I have sensitive, dry/combination and tend to get these white bumps all over my face. I think they’re due to my pores getting clogged. I’ve tried so many high end facial cleansers that promises “clear skin” but they have either broken me out or been ineffective. This product however, cleared up my skin and it’s budget friendly.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I received this product today and I was so excited! Unfortunately, after I rinsed my face I was shocked! My face was puffy and red. Disappointed to see my money go down the drain with a product I can’t use.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Really loving it so far, only been three days and my skins appearance is already improving ! If you don’t use a salicylic acid or BHA exfoliant currently, beware, it will cause an initial skin purge. But my skin feels so soft. First photo is my skin before using it, and second photo is TWO days of using the product. Truly combines everything you need in skincare; Vitamin D, Hylauronic acid, and a soft salicylic acid!

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I’ve been working to combat my T-zone acne for several of years now. This has been a game changer for me; As before my skin was inflamed (red and the pores left open and exposed to crap in the air) 24/7. And I’ve gone through a lot of other brands to try to treat it! It’s been 1 week since I’ve been using this: twice daily and using with the SA cream! I’m posting the “before and after” photo so the photo can speak for itself! Again, this is only 7 days between photos, so it’s still in progress but I already love it! From my experience, the SA wash and cream causes a *very mild* “burning” sensation or itch but I has to be patient. It wasn’t too bothersome and it became better over time for me. The results are paying off for me so I will continue using! There are no smell that I can pick up on this and it feels clean! The SA cream if you use after the wash is thick but I use it sparingly. Good luck to you guys. My skin was complicated and I hope it works for you guys like it did for me.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: It’s bugging me out on how well this product is working on my skin. I’m only one week into using it and my skin looks amazing. I have textured skin and always break out especially on my cheeks and recently ALL over my forehead with skin bumps. First time in a LONG time that it looks so clear. I’m shocked lol i know it has to be this product paired up with the SA lotion because once i started using it my skin cleared up. i don’t understand! I literally have been trying it all. I get nervous when i try new products because i never m ow how my skin reacts but this is BOMB. Worth a try.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: This is not what I expected but I do understand you do not make the product. It's to greasy or oily for me. I like a lotion that is smooth and not having to stand in once place until it dries after applying to my skin. I thought it was this lotion for Extremly Dry skin. If you have this type I would reorder, just send me the link, my dermatologist recommended that I get the one that's in the photo I sent. Thanks

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I purchased this after watching Dr Dray review this product on YouTube and I’m so happy I took her advice. This is great for acne prone skin and also combination/oily or oily skin. This works as a gentle exfoliant and it’s fragrance free which is great for sensitive skin.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I am VERY allergic to coconut and have very bad eczema and struggle to find products without coconut, I have to read labels very carefully. I found this product and the description mentions no ingredients with coconut, so I was very excited to try it. I received it and the second ingredient is “cocamidopropyl” which is coconut. So, another product I can’t use, more of my life I can’t get help with my skin.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I actually really like this cleanser, and love most all CeraVe products. It’s great for keeping acne at bay or treating breakouts and does not make your skin feel dry. Took one star away because it came significantly less full than expected for a new bottle. Not sure what that’s about. Disappointing

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Great product but I don’t recommend buying it from here. Just get it at your local store. They clearly don’t know how to ship skincare products. Mine came in the bubble envelope and when I opened it product was everywhere and the pump is defective. When I push down on the pump it doesn’t come back up, I have to pull it up.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I wasn't sure how to rate this product. It felt amazing, first a gel then foam, and I love that it's unscented, but it did nothing for my acne. I have extremely troubled hormonal skin.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I struggled with acne for years before using this product . I saw results within a week. I use it twice a day and it has worked wonders. my face is never tight or dry after washing my face with this cleanser . It’s fragrance free, gentle, and exfoliating. I would recommend to anyone with acne!  (Mine is halfway empty because I’ve used for about a month now)

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Love this facial cleanser, on my 3rd bottle. My review is based on the bad packaging. The top was not tight & dripped in the box, I lost about an inch of product. I’ve purchased face cleansers before but they were always secured around the neck with tape. Not this time, pretty disappointed. Next time I’ll just go to target.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Just as advertised.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I didn’t use this yet but it worked wonders for my friend. Packaged well and no damage

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Had a little spill in the box but overall great product!

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Was exited to try this cleanser but bottle arrived open. No protective seal on it.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The photos are of my 10 year old's hands after only 4 uses of Lipikar. He has eczema and I have spent so much time and money trying everything I could to treat his hands. I never got these kinds of results with any other products.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The old formula (top row in the picture) used to be my number one five star body lotion selling about $39.90. I kept all the old bottles just because one day I will cut it open and dig out the remaining ones that couldn’t get pumped out.I didn’t quite like the current formula but it costs 50% lesser ($19.90). It’s also 50% less effective. I used to buy three bottles of the old formula per year and now I have to buy 3 bottles in half year for the new formula.What can I say? I’m not so happy about the discontinue; but I haven’t found another replacement either. It does work for me but now I have to apply more of it to make up the inefficiency. My skin is quite demanding when it comes to body moisturizer.The price drop is good for new customer who wants to try it out and not have dramatic dry skin.But for old customer is a turn off. So giving it one star less.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: This bottle came without the top. It was not in the box either. So essentially it was shipped in this condition. So now I have to take time out of my day to return it and wait for the replacement.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: Great moisturizer! I’ve got dry skin patches on my face and hands that I use this for. It coats and protects. As someone with extremely sensitive skin this is one of very few that doesn’t cause a rash. It is a little heavy to wear under makeup so use it sparingly if you plan on wearing under makeup. Fragrance free.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: Perfect moisturizer for people with dry skin!! I have never found anything that matches this hydration level. It does take a while to soak in but I love that about this product. When I use it at night I wake up looking better than I did the day before. Wild.Got this because @whatsonvisface recommended it! Get the matching cleanser!!

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The bottom of the bottle is bulging out so much that it wouldn't stand on its own. I can't imagine what must have happened during the storage/shipment. But it's impossible to trust the product now and comfortably used and put it on my skin.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: Yes! THE lotion that works for my baby’s needs. We had been struggling with eczema and hadn’t found anything that worked until we started using this one.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The lotion I received is horrible! It does NOT sink into the skin and leaves it feeling GREASY and GROSS.. I've added pictures to show what it does. For being such a popular, high valued brand, I expected A LOT more than this. False advertising.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The dispensor was broken.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: Our family doctor recommended this. Really good moisturizer. It leaves a non-oily sheen on your skin. The texture is thick and a bit waxy. Other than that, it does a great job.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The product is a excellent, I use for my 18 month baby and is work very good for the eczema problem that he has, the problem is we the ship the bottle was broken when get to us, and now we cannot use and felted off to.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: Very dry skin, Recommended by my dermatologist it kept my skin very hydrated And smooth❤️

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: I have KP and ezcema and this is a life saver! It really hydrates and repairs my skin. It takes a few minutes to dry down but it keeps my skin hydrated for days. I took one star off because the seller didn’t package the bottle well and the top pump partially broke off (see photo).

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: It came without the dispenser top... So there's no way to take the cream out of the bottle. Unless you unscrew the whole lid...

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: Not sure if the actual product is good, but I received a bottle with a defective pump, and the bottle looks dirty.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: Let me start by saying I absolutely LOVED (past tense) this product. I have veryyyy dry skin and it evened my skin tone and texture tremendously without feeling greasy like other dry skin moisturizers. The best way I can describe it is it leaves your skin feeling “tightened” and youthful.HOWEVER, they changed the formula completely. The consistency, scent, and even COLOR changed. I’ve attached a side by side picture on the back of my hand to show the original product and the recent one. You can see that the original is a light yellow color, and the new one is pure white. I also violently shook my hand, and already you can see that the new consistency is runny and beginning to drip. When applied to the skin, the application felt like I was putting water on my face. It felt cheap and useless for dry skin, which was super disappointing because the original formula was thick, rich, and left your skin with a nice glow.I gave the new moisturizer a chance, but it did not do anywhere near the same job as the original. If the company brings back the old formula, I will repurchase. Until then, I am returning this and on the market for a new moisturizer.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I never write reviews and hate being asked to write them, but the Truskin moisturizer and the Vitamin C serum are incredible products. I've spent thousands over the years trying to get my skin under control. At 45, I feel as if I've finally found the products I'll use forever. Like another review mentioned, I am almost to the point where I just have to wear mascara and lipgloss only. Age spots have faded, dry patches are gone, and my skin hasn't one fine line or wrinkle.Makeup free selfie.My makeup goes on better when I wear it as well. My 15 year old daughter also uses the serum and has noticed her blemishes have all but disappeared.Worth every penny.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: This is terrific for me. Light, non-greasy, lasts through the day and provides both sun protection and a general Vitamin C boost that gives my skin a healthy glow. I used to buy the Vitamin C moisturizer from Body Shop but it was so expensive and not great bang for the buck. This is much better value and works as well for me I find. I have combination skin with an oily forehead and nose, and typically dry cheeks that break out on occasion with adult acne. This is a winner for me. Definitely will re-purchase. Photo is of me with no make up on at the beach.Update: Had an issue with the revised formula and the company sent me a fresh batch, no problem!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I really do love TruSkin products. I just reordered the eye cream and I’m almost out of the moisturizer. I love the C serum too!  Truskin will always be a part of my beauty routine!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: Made my skin breakout like crazy. So many red bumps appeared

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I love this moisturizer! Totally brightened up my skin! I use it along with super c serum and rose water toner. I started using tru skin naturals products in September of last year and haven't used anything else since. I see great results with the products, the prices are awesome, and they have the BEST customer service! I have also, in the past, used the retinol moisturizer and liked that one as well. The first picture is before and the second one is after, taken 3 weeks apart, in natural lighting in front of a window. I definitely have noticed a difference in my skin tone and the overall brightness of my skin and complexion. I also feel slightly more confident without makeup on. I love that you only need about a pea sized amount, so this bottle will last a long time, im sure!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I found TruSkin through Amazon and in combination with other products in their line (all in all: Vit C Daily facial cleanser, vitamin c serum, tree serum and daily facial moisturizer with vitamin c and B5)  I have seen quite an improvement in just a few days.  I use the cleanser in the morning and the evening. Rinse and pat dry. Then vitamin c serum. Give it two minutes then moisturize. Two times a week I do the tea tree serum in place of the vitamin c.Little back story: about a year ago I started noticing some adult acne. I went the natural route with homemade remedies and it worked a little bit. Then I went to the other extreme of purchasing a popular strong product- it made my skin hurt and the redness got worse so I returned it. So happy to have found TruSkin!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I don't like the smell of the moisturizer, but it seems to be working quite well, I'm using both the cleanser and moisturizer. I'm not even halfway through the bottles yet.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I'm a 59 year old grandmother with 3 children and 10 grandchildren.  As I started heading toward the higher end of my 50's I found my skin wasn't as bouncy as it used to be and the wrinkles stood out more than I had noticed before, especially on the forehead.  After a month of using this product along with the R serum, HA and C products of the same product line every day, I could not rave more!  I am astounded.  The picture of me and my daughter was taken two weeks ago, and the second photo was taken last year.  How many forehead wrinkles do you see before and after?? It takes time though so be patient.  As this product is a non-prescription product, it is powerful, but not to the point of burning your skin :).  I now use these three products as my regular daily regimine.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: Love the product, it delivers as promised.My skin looks gorgeous and no need to apply make up as the tone is even and has a natural matte finish with no feeling of greasiness and lasts all day!!!Thank you for a great product!I am going to keep buying.To share your experience, just go to the link below:https://www.amazon.com/review/create-review?ie=UTF8&asin=B0166W9GMI#Thanks so much, Ann! Keep me posted and feel free to reach out any time. :-)All the best,EricaTruSkin NaturalsDid this solve your problem?YesNoReport suspicious activityAmazon  facebook  twitter  pinterest  instagramCopyright 2020 Amazon, Inc, or its affiliates. review: I am loving all of my Truskin products! I have used Rodan & Fields for a couple of years but it was just too expensive so I decided to give your products a try…and I’m so glad I did!!! I have very sensitive skin and always fear the consequences of changing products but with TruSkin, I haven’t had any problems at all!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I Love everything I've ordered from TruSkin.  I have sensitive skin and have developed whelps a few times from products so I was leery and ordered just one product first- since then I've ordered the facial wash and the Vitamin C serum is on my Wish LIst!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: Bottle a bit smaller than expected for the price. But awesome product, along with black soap it makes my skin look almost flawless. And keeps it moisturized but not greasy. I use it after I wash my face with the soap bc the soap dries my face out. Perfect Mousturizer!! Even wear it under my foundation. 😊

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: This lotion is not all that its cracked up to be. My face feels tight and dry after using and it takes time to rub all the white in. PLUS, whoever packaged it taped it to the shipping tape so when opening I sliced right through my $27 bottle of "moisturizer".

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: DON’T BUY FROM AMAZON... This was my go to product line for a Very long time. I loved their vitamin C serum and this moisturizer was the BEST I’ve ever used... Until now. Sadly, when I received my new bottle today it is completely different then the bottles I’ve received before. Nothing about this product is the same (see side by side photos). The bottle label is different, type font is different, label color is different. The color, scent and texture of the lotion, everything is different. The quality is gone. This is clearly a knockoff! Not cool Amazon!!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: This is one of the lotions I found recently.  My esthetician recommended I get vitamin c for my skin. It was so dry, red, and just blah.  I have been using this and I have been getting so many compliments on my skin. I am even wearing less makeup in my early 50’s.  AwesomeProduct

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: It does not work for oily skin.  My neck burst into more acne than I had and burned my skin.  I do not recommend it.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: Thick lotion that goes on smoothly and dries quickly. Noticable results after just a week.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: So I am a redhead and breakout from everything. This product changed everything! I can now wear moisturizer all day and all night with no breakouts!!! Love this product !

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Firming, and Dark Circles. 1.7 Fl. Oz
review: I’ve been using Truskin Naturals retinol moisturizer in the evening along with their serums and I absolutely love them, but I’ve been hoping they would come out with a nice light lotion for the daytime too. This is exactly what I hoped for! It absorbs quickly and makes my skin so silky. On the days that I do wear foundation, it goes on and stays really smooth looking. Love it!Update: Love the new squeeze tubes!

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: I have psoriasis on my hands and foot.  I bought this after a coworker gave me a little to try one day and I saw an improvement right away.  I took before and after pictures to show just how amazing this stuff is.  In just 2 days you can see a drastic improvement.  I put lotion on right after the first pictures on the 10th then went to bed.  I didn't put any lotion on again until the morning of the 12th.  2 treatments of lotion thats it and you can clearly see the drastic changes. I am not using or taking anything else to treat this.  I have been using this for several weeks.  If I do not stay on top of applying my skin breaks back out but as long as I use the lotion they stay clear like I never had psoriasis.  This is better than anything else I have ever tried including prescription creams.I STRONGLY recommend this to anyone and everyone.  I will NEVER use anything else.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: This is my holy grail hand lotion! Every winter my skin gets so dry especially my hands, to the point where they crack and feel super raw and red. This year was the first winter I had extremely soft hands and skin. I’ve tried the O’Keefe’s green jar before but it didn’t do anything for my hands. This is my second bottle and I will continue buying it now that I know I can have soft skin and hands all year long. It is very creamy and doesn’t leave you feeling greasy at all, it drys fast too. A little goes a long way.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: Works Great, great scent not flowery, leaves skin soft but not oily!

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: I bought this lotion based on the reviews I read, but I was disappointed. The product was delivered messed up. One of the three was missing the top cover/dispenser, its content spilled. It was not properly packaged. The consistency of the lotion is kinda’ thick and can’t be smoothly applied on the skin. I have to combine it with my Shea based lotion for easy application.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: I am simply blown away by this lotion as I have dealt with wound care treatment on my skin that was always irritated.Nothing and I mean nothing worked and I have tried everything.  This lotion is magical!I am so thankful  to  finally have relief on my legs!!

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: I received 2 pump bottles of okeeffes body lotion today, neither one of the pumps works. The reason I gave it 3 stars is, I love their products.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: This is the first lotion I have purchased that has actually worked for my dry cracked hands. My hands chap so bad that they itch and burn. This lotion is amazing. My only complaint is the packaging the lid was not on all the way and lotion was everywhere.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: This is an amazing product this stuff works wonderful. I highly recommended this over anything

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: This stuff is really good and thicker then I expected. I thought it would be like the ordinary lotions that are more liquid but this is almost as thick and effective as the green hand cream.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: If I find a good thing I like to share!I don't get anything out of sharing this!Just hope it can help someone.It's Not just for bumpy skin or rashes but for eczema & psoriasis too!If you have any skin problems I would definitely try O'Keefe's!I have to say this is the best lotion ever!I went to a dermatologist a few years ago, before my daughter's wedding, for a rash I had on both of my legs that wouldn't go away, for about a year!I have pictures. 😩Well, I  didn't want a rash on my legs in her wedding pictures, (although my pix are hideous & the most terrible pix. )The Dr. prescribed me some expensive ointment, that didn't do anything, and gave me a cortisone shot, that helped a little.He did a skin biopsy and said the rash was something he had never seen before.It was an unusual rash, of course, that's my luck!Anyway, after using 2 tubes of the expensive ointment that didn't work.I bought the regular bottle of O'Keefe's lotion just because I wanted it for a lotion, and the rash went away, quickly too!!! BONUS!!My husband just had a rash last week, and decided he wanted to try it. So we went & bought more.IT WORKED FOR HIM TOO!So try it!Also, My advice, for regular bumpy skin, change soaps and use castille soap. I used to have bumps on the back of my arms and they are gone now since I switched to a castille soap. It's made from a vegetable fat,  not animal fat! 🤮

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: Best cream I've ever used.  It really takes away the dry skin.  I use it for my hands and legs.  It's just great.  My skin is actually very soft and zero dryness.  Thanks I finally found the right cream.  My husband loves it too.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: Eh. I purchased this because I'm using differin gel for my acne and my skin was getting pretty dried out. It says it's for dry skin, but I don't feel like it actually did anything. My skin soaked it up, it left no residue which is nice, but it felt no different than rubbing some water on my face. My skin was still dry. It's a good texture and it sinks in well, but I think this would suit oily skin more.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I decided to try this product because I consider Cetaphil as a really good brand. I’ve been using the body moisturizer and it’s really great but I didn’t like this face lotion at all. I have a very dry skin and even tough this is supposed to be for dry and extra dry skin it didn’t hydrate mine. When you apply it you can feel the watery complexion and it dries really fast so you never feel your face hydrated. The Scent is very light so you barely smell it and the good thing is that when I used it didn’t make my skin break out so it’s for sensitive skin. Maybe this lotion would be great for people who don’t have a very dry skin like me.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I’m literally arguing with myself because I didn’t know about this product before xDI am in love with it. And also, by mistake I’ve ordered two of them. I think that’s the best mistake I’ve done in my life. Totally recommended!

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: La estoy usado por recomendación de una amiga, llevo un mes usándola hasta ahora va bien mi piel aunq aveces me deja aceitosa no se si es mi tipo de piel  supongo

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: The product was delivered on time with several other products but the cetaphil night cream cream arrived unceiled, used and half empty.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I have received like this as someone used it, I was dispointed with amazon

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I love it. It's really good on my face and it gives that glowing effect.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I initially bought the moisturizing product… It was recommended to me by my daughter… It works very well then I saw this and thought I’d try it and I put it on my recently washed face with the other Cetaphil wash product and leave it on at night time when I sleep wake up in the morning use the Cetaphil wash and then moisturize with the Cetaphil cream so all three these products work in tandem… I love them and they’re way cheaper than some of the expensive stuff that’s out there… I recently had somebody/Pt asked me what do I use on my skin explain...I told her and she asked how old I was and said nearly 60 and she goes oh my god no way so yes the stuff is wonderful

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I’m not sure how I feel about this product. It’s very watery. I have to use several pumps to cover my neck and face. The pump comes out really fast and can splatter. There is no scent, so that checks out as advertised. I don’t think it caused me any worse breakouts than I already get so it does not clog pores. I think it does moisturize decently. I would wear this one at night since it has no SPF. I still plan to use it since I bought it. However, I think I will stick with Neutrogena in future purchases.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I use this following the Cetaphil face wash morning and night and my skin stays hydrated and looking smooth with no makeup. Lipgloss and hydrated skin is a win!

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: This is by far the best, most effective acne face wash. We had no issues with packaging like others mentioned, this was packaged very well and did not spill. I attached photos.

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: My skin got a really bad break out, itching, dryness.

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: So I got the 8oz bottle at the beauty store right after I spoke to a Dermatologist . I had contact dermatitis and I needed a new cleanser. This cleanser does have sodium laurel sulfate which is not a great ingredient for the skin but it does effectively clean my skin, never had any problems and with my medication my condition cleared up! I bought the 8oz bottle for $11 and because beauty stores are not open and I don’t want to go to Walmart it being too far away from home I found a 20oz for the same price! What a steal !

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: Overall I do like the product, but when I got it, the bottle cap had loosened or broken, leaking out a lot the product, which of course went to waste.

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: Received my product this morning and the pump was broke off I believe they should try and protect this a little better

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: NOT THE REAL PRODUCT! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY/ TIME YOU’LL SPEND RETURNING. IT WAS LIKE WASHING WITH GLUE!Wish I read ingredients in description and had done a search of ACTUAL Cetaphil ingredients. This CRAP product has far fewer ingredients, including parabens, and sodium lauryl phosphate. Do a little search and DON’T GIVE THESE DISHONEST PEOPLE YOUR $$!

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: Cap is missing!!!

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: good size and price , cetaphil first experience for me , i hope it will be my skin good  .

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: I've been using Cetaphil for years now. It is by far the best face wash I've tried. And ever since my teen years, I have tried A LOT of different brands! Cetaphil is super gentle, and it keeps my skin very clean and soft. I had my little sister try it and she loved it too. My teenage son uses it now as well.It's clear, as in my picture. And it hardly has a scent at all, which is nice. Don't need perfumes on our faces! Just wanted to share my experience and hope it encourages someone to buy it!

product_name: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser | 20 fl oz | Hydrating Face Wash & Body Wash | Ideal for Sensitive, Dry Skin | Non-Irritating | Won't Clog Pores | Fragrance-Free | Soap Free | Dermatologist Recommended
review: So the top photos are after using cetaphil. I'll just say this, it use to work for my skin, but seemingly I need something stronger. Something to actually get rid of bumps, pimples, and blackheads. For me, this isn't it. I been using this for almost a month, so about 3 weeks. And I really haven't  seen an improvement in my skin. It's gross, and I don't like looking in the mirror. I will also say that my diet has not been what it needs to be, a lot of sugar, almond milk, and cereals. So I have to change that too, hopefully it helps. Just remember a lot of times what we put in our mouthes, sometimes shows on our face. Tootles.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: Doesn’t do anything for hyper pigmentation but did help with red scarring and evening skin tone. Noticed a difference relatively quickly.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I like this hydroxy cream but for some reason, I still like the cream that is 10% solution and comes in a bottle. For one the 10% solution gives you more and it's less expensive.  This one is 12% and I do like it, I think it's a bit creamier than the 10% solution? I am not sure, I do know that I love all 5 products I have gotten from this company. I already used up the body lotion (went too fast - not enough in my opinion for the price).  The 10% solution in the bottle is my fav (I think they are out of stock as I write this so that's a sign), the eye cream which is nice and very soothing and then another solution that is I think around 15% that l keep in my make up bag and use sparingly.  My skin is definitely smoother than ever (see pictures). I just wish I could get a cream that helps sagging :-) I'm in my late 40's by the way and feel that this skin care line is really helping me look healthier and give me a glow.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: After using this product, my skin has begun to look so much better. My elbows are no longer rough, and my hands look much younger. I came back frm vacation  wiTh a tan which had dried out my skin, that dryness is completely gone now! I use it on my face with a strong sun block (SPF 30) and it works well. Can't put it on my face everyday bacause my face gets a bit red. I'll be 61 in October, and am so pleased with this product.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: This is an amazing lotion.  I’m turning 50 next month and since using this my hands feel like a babies behind...I’m not kidding.  Usually this time of the year my hands are so dry.  I literally cannot quit rubbing my hands to feel how soft they are.  I’ve recommended to all my friends.  I just started using on my legs.  I would not recommend if I did not completely love this product.  I will add my bottle came with a broken cap and some had leaked out.  They do need to work on that.  But the lotion is excellent.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I’m 49 years old with oily skin that’s not sensitive.  I’ve been using different brands of AHA for twenty years. I think a big reason why I get so many compliments on my skin is because of it. The maker of the last AHA brand I used for years was discontinued leaving me desperate for a replacement. I am so delighted I found this Serum. It does a great job of keeping my skin bright. It does sting until you get used to it but it’s worth it.  It is a mild acid that helps skin renew itself. The serum is the consistency of water but it’s potent, which it needs to be if you want results.  It also makes my skin more sensitive to sun burn. My dermatologist told me I have great skin and her nurse asked me to write down what I use because she wants to use it. My pic is unfiltered and I’ve had no work or injections.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: It actually got worse than it looks in the picture. My arms turned red and got extremely itchy. It took me a week to recover. I don’t think my skin is that sensitive. This is the first damage done by a cosmetic product.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I am turning 70 in January, this pic, taken by a uni student I was mentoring back in NOV 2019 is me just before turning 69.  It was in natural light, so think not bad for my age.FIRST time I purchased and used this was for my neck.  Didn't do it right and neck turned red, so tried on crepey skin on my hands and forearms, wow.  Crepey skin was diminished a LOT within a week.I had been using a derma roller for moderate scars on one cheek and the 11 lines you get between your eyebrows.  Not working quite as well as I would like.  Tried this.  WOW, BETTER than derma roller by a LOT!BUT HERE'S THE THING.....IT IS STRONG.  SO I use a VERY SMALL amount, wait a bit for it to dry and then put hyaluronic cream or lotion over areas I used this.  HELPS with any irritation.  I can even use a BIT on my neck now.SO PROS:IT FREAKING WORKS!CONS:CAN BE IRRITATING, but I find the hyaluronic cream or lotion I put over it helps a lot. AND REALLY USING LESS IS MORE WITH THIS ALPHA HYDROXY PRODUCT.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I am so expected to receive the lotion because many websites highly recommend this product. But I was so disappointed for the product that was used bottle with some dirt stains and there is NO SEALING! It also happened to other customers which I just saw the reviews. I was so regretful which I did not read the review first.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: Got an opened bottle.  The seal is broken.  Disappointed.TBH I really like this body lotion, so I buy a lot when they are on sale.  This is the third bottle that I brought on Amazon.  The first two bottles were fine and had seals on them, but this one...  Wish I check it before I put it on the shelf.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I was excited about this product when I placed my order. However I am extremely disappointed I haven’t notice much of a difference, and in fact has made my skin worse. I developed chemical burns around my neck and lip. Beside that when I ordered the product the box it came in was damaged and chose to reorder again and the box was still damaged. I was looking for a more affordable Version to the Neostrat Glycolic acid moisturizer but I will definitely  be going back to My previous moisturizer. It’s been two months since I used this product, I developed contact dermatitis around my eyes, lips, and Neck.Honestly the worst product ever.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I was super disappointed when I opened the box. This is definitely the worst product I brought. It looked like used lotions.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: My package came opened and unsealed. I don’t want to use the product after if looks like it has been used!

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: Was SUPER excited to receive this because of reviews I’ve seen on different websites for “best retexturizing cream.” Um, this bottle is USED for one; with letters kind of fading off and dust and grime on it. And also there is NO safety cap! So I’m supposed to believe this is what they say it is? This product could be anything. Honestly it’s probably a re-purposed bottle that one of the other reviewers returned.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I've only had this lotion about a week so I cant give a full review yet (once I finish it I'll add to my review because I find them incredibly helpful), it's a very thick lotion, spreads easily and has no smell. If you have any tiny cuts it will sting a little but that's normal because of the AHA. In fact it's good because then I know it's working.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: Bottle was slightly opened when I removed cap. I bought this for my boyfriend so I will update this later...

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: This is how it came!!

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: Came today with missing cap. Leaking a bit inside the box.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: When I received the product, I was disappointed that the cap was not tight, and a lot of it came out and solidified.  This is a poor online shopping experience.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: The bottle was leaking when I recevie it.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: There was no seal on the lid i want a new one or a credit

product_name: Clarifying Moisture Lotion 1 Clinique Lotion 13.5 oz Women
review: Clinique does not carry this lotion. Do not confuse it with the frosted bottle on the right that was purchased from Clinique directly. The bottle on the left from this website.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: First time trying this lotion. It came in great condition  and the size is perfect. Just tried it on my skin and it feels very moisturizing. I think I'm gonna enjoy this lotion. I have very ashy feet and just a little and they already look and feel so soft.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: It came with no spray top and was already been used...Very disappointed..

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: I discovered this lotion by receiving a sample in the mail.  I have been struggling for months with a dry, itchy and sometimes painful skin patch right underneath my nail cuticle on my right hand.  Nothing to that I tried seemed to bring relief or heal it. When I tried the sample of this lotion on my hands, I swear this lotion healed it!  Dry, itchy, painful skin patch be gone!!!  I am sold!  Needless to say, I am very happy with my purchase.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: It was broken. Smells like cocoa butter, nice and creamer.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: This is a great product, but I got a damaged container.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: Very disappointed this came already missing 1/5 of its contents

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: It’s was broken.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: I like the scent, but I find it too thick for me. It made my skin feel sticky like I needed to rinse off. Pass.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for Visibly Dry Skin, Family Size 20 oz.
review: I love this lotion!!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Daily Long Lasting Facial Moisturizer & Neck Cream with SPF 35 Sunscreen & Glycerin, Non-Greasy, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Face Moisturizer, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I'd been using Neutrogena's Men Sensitive Skin Oil-Free Moisture SPF 30 for more than a decade (see photo), but that product was discontinued a year or so ago, and it's become increasingly difficult to find for a reasonable price. So, after researching the active ingredients of N's other products on their website, I came across this, and it's probably the closest you can get to the formula used by the old SPF 30 product.In terms of active ingredients, only two numbers differ: the SPF-30 was 1.7% octocrylene and 3% oxybenzone, while this SPF-35 is 2.3% octocrylene and 6% oxybenzone.Like the Sensitive Skin product I used, this has little-to-no odor (sunscreen fumes normally knock me out).No fifth star due to the fact that it has the pump top (compared to the squeeze-type packaging), and it's difficult to get just the right amount out.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Daily Long Lasting Facial Moisturizer & Neck Cream with SPF 35 Sunscreen & Glycerin, Non-Greasy, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Face Moisturizer, 2.5 fl. oz

review: Don’t buy this!!! It contains oxybenzone with helps to protect the skin from the UV rays, however, it’s the most dangerous ingredient that is linked to cancer and development defects.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Daily Long Lasting Facial Moisturizer & Neck Cream with SPF 35 Sunscreen & Glycerin, Non-Greasy, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Face Moisturizer, 2.5 fl. oz
review: The only good thing I can say is that yes. It's light weight and absorbs well. But it does not work as it describes. It actually increased the burn from the sun and caused bumps and irritation to form on my daughter's face. It said it was non-comedogenic but it clogged her pores. Dermatologist recommended but caused a red rash to appear in her face. Absolutely worst product ever. To add to that, it is not refundable or returnable. I waited a few days to test the product and make sure it was in fact the product causing this before writing this review.

product_name: Jergens Ultra Healing Dry Skin Moisturizer, 32 Ounce Body Lotion, for Absorption into Extra Dry Skin, with HYDRALUCENCE blend, Vitamins C, E, and B5
review: I purchased this product because my department at work is donating supplies to an underfunding school in my home town.  When i received the box, all of the lotions were slippery because one of the bottles of lotion had a hole at the bottom of it.  I did wipe all of them off but I am now one short. I like Jergens lotion but I will be one short of the amount that I need to give every student in the class that we adopted.

review: Bought this and havent used it yet. I noticed from the lighting that the bottle is missing so much from the top! Shouldn't this be full? I tried to return or replace the lotion and it's not eligible to return. So I guess this is how I'm getting my satisfaction

product_name: Jergens Ultra Healing Dry Skin Moisturizer, 32 Ounce Body Lotion, for Absorption into Extra Dry Skin, with HYDRALUCENCE blend, Vitamins C, E, and B5
review: This is the first time I tried Jergens this body moisturizer. I bought it as it was very reasonably priced. I normally buy Vaseline body lotion but bought this for a change. It worked great. I was worried about the consistency and texture after reading lot of reviews. I am glad I took the chance. It is very thick in texture and rich in quality. Well nourishing and moisturizing. Gets absorbed in skin really fast. Good for daily use. I had only two concerns ... the scent is good on its own but doesn’t gel with my body scent very well (I am glad it fades off in sometime) It’s little milky kind of scent and other is I agree with other users that bottle in little empty on the top. May be it’s meant to be that quantity  but bottle doesn’t come sealed in a plastic pack so that can be worrisome to few. You can see pic .. the bottle is empty till by thumb mark and also I bought two lotions one come sealed and this one just directly in the box.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Rose Water, 6.7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: My daughter uses Thayer - Witch Hazel Toner-Rose Petal Alc.Fr, 12 fl oz liquid every night, so we thought this Facial Mist Spray would be good refresher during the day. Directions state: "Mist 12-15 inches from the face with eyes and mouth shut." It is very hydrating, has a nice rose-floral scent, and gives the skin a pretty, dewy glow. The small recycle plastic bottle fits easily in a purse or gym-bag, and the "continuous" spray dispenses an even, soft mist. I appreciate that it is Vegan-Safe, free of parabens, dyes, or silicones -- and it isn't processed, as the "99% naturally derived ingredients" retains the mineral benefits (the remaining 1% is to enhance the fragrance and preserve the formula.) My daughter has sensitive skin, and did not have any reaction. She loved this spray, complimenting the scent and "wake-up" sensation it gives. It really gives a refreshing, cool feeling without being sticky or drippy, and it doesn't cause make-up to run. Each squirt doesn't take much of the product, so this should last a long time. It is definitely worth the price!

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Rose Water, 6.7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I’ve used this product before but this time I am very disappointed. The look of the lotion alone disappoints me and what’s worse I just received it🤦🏾‍♀️

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Rose Water, 6.7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: This is a is a review of Garnier SkinActive Facial Mist Spray with Rose Water. There are several listings on the same page. This mist can be used as a primer, a makeup finisher, or a refresher when you need a little moisture. It sells like roses but not sickeningly so. It is free of a lot junk that we usually put on our faces and that is a plus. I find that the mist isn't a great primer and do not use it that way. But I do mist my face after to set my makeup and also throughout the day if my skin feels dry. I put the bottle in the fridge and it really helps to cool me off in the summer heat while not causing my makeup to drip or dissolve. I like it and have found a bunch of uses for this mist. I am no fan of rose scents though. I wish it had no scent at all but I will live with it. It is low priced and works good as a makeup finishing spray and as a midday jolt of dewiness if you have dry skin.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Shield Face Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 110, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Moisturizing Sunscreen to Prevent Signs of Aging, 3 fl. oz
review: This is a must-have for anyone. It isn't too thick, so it smooths and absorbs over my face well.Keep in mind, the rating of the SPF tells you how long you're able to stay in the sun after the time you'd burn (or even if there are clouds). The instructions on the bottle state to reapply after 2 hours, but I think that's a bit cautious and wait a little longer. I've used an Neutrogena sunscreen with an SPF of 100 or above for a couple of years.  That, combined with a 2.5% Retinol serum (I got it here on Amazon. If you'd like to know which one, I've left a review on my profile) and a leading brand "regeneration" face cream. I'm putting up my pictures so you can see my results. The first is from almost a year ago and the second is now (and I did NOT use a filter). I'd also like to add that I've had one heck of a year.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Shield Face Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 110, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Moisturizing Sunscreen to Prevent Signs of Aging, 3 fl. oz
review: I love this spf. It's a broadspectrum spf and works wond we fully. It moisturizes , but it also seems to work as a blurring/primer. It gives a polished look to the skin if you're going without makeup. I'm really enjoying it.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Shield Face Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 110, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Moisturizing Sunscreen to Prevent Signs of Aging, 3 fl. oz
review: Here is a pic of me in NOV 2019 one of the students I was mentoring took.  I turn 70 in Jan. 2021.  It was taken in natural light, and if you look closely, yep, have some lines.  I certainly don't look like I did in my 20's, but think I'm doing pretty well for being so close to 70.  AGE SHIELD HELPS by both keeping me from burning (FYI FOR ALL YOU OTHER LIGHT SKINNED PEEPS, I also take 6 mg of astaxanthin daily, REALLY HELPS re burning) and smooths out my skin.______________________________________________________________________Before I started using this, I had basal cell skin cancer removed from my nose (luckily just a small dot as I caught it fast, but still not good).PROS:GOES ON SMOOTHLYPROTECTS MY VERY FAIR, SENSITIVE SKIN WITHOUT ANY IRRITATIONGREAT for a "BASE" for my foundation -  I don't need a separate moisturizer.LEAVES MY SKIN SOFTHELPS KEEP SKIN LOOKING YOUNGER (and for someone in their LATE sixties, that's a plus!)GOOD PRICE - I TRY TO GRAB TWO WHEN THEY'RE ON SALE

product_name: Neutrogena Age Shield Face Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 110, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Moisturizing Sunscreen to Prevent Signs of Aging, 3 fl. oz
review: I did not use sunscreen for fear of my acne coming back. I started using very expensive brands that generated a lot of expenses, but this Neutrogena sunscreen is excellent, I apply it in the morning after washing my face and at noon, it leaves a white finish on my face if I apply a lot, but the protection is very Well, it doesn't cover my pores and doesn't produce acne. I have used it for 8 months. Recommended for people who suffer from acne and do not want to spend much on a sunscreen. Very good price.The bad thing that contains 6% oxybenzone.No usé protector solar por temor a que mi acné regrese. Comencé a usar marcas muy caras que me generó muchos gastos , pero este protector solar Neutrogena es excelente, lo aplico por la mañana después de lavarme la cara y al mediodía, deja un acabado blanco en mi cara si aplico mucho, pero la protección es muy buena, no cubre mis poros y no produce acné. Recomendado para personas que sufren de acné y no quieren gastar mucho en un protector solar. Muy buen precio.Lo malo que contiene oxibenzona 6%.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Shield Face Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 110, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Moisturizing Sunscreen to Prevent Signs of Aging, 3 fl. oz
review: Pros: I wear this everyday, rain or shine as a moisturizer. This protects my face from the sun even if I'm in the sun for 8+ hours. I've tried many sunscreens but this is by far the best.Cons: None

product_name: Neutrogena Age Shield Face Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 110, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Moisturizing Sunscreen to Prevent Signs of Aging, 3 fl. oz
review: Excellent product. My face got red all the times I went to the sun with the sun protector, but it didn’t look like it’s burned! My skin didn’t look dry. But comparing to other similar and more expensive products, it’s great! After this one, I’ll defenitly get another one!

This one feels like a hydrating non greasy moisterizer, super nice and fresh.
