review: I don't like this formula as much as Neutrogena's dry touch face sunscreen. It did keep me sunburn free but once I put it on I could feel it on my face all day. It didn't break me out but it did make my skin very oily.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Shield Face Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 110, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic Moisturizing Sunscreen to Prevent Signs of Aging, 3 fl. oz
review: Me lo puse en 2 ocaciones y mi cara se sentia cn granitos despues tuve enrojecimiento no lo recomiendo!

product_name: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Lotion with Vitamins E and B5, Deep Hydration for Extra Dry Skin, Non-Greasy Formula, 16 fl. oz (Pack of 2)
review: I have very sensitive skin and mostly use Cetaphyl or lubriderm on my super dry skin. I thought I would stock up before the cold winters here in NY.  This is nice and thick and very hydrating. It has a nice light scent and is not over powering. I apply this once a day (if I remember) to keep my aging skin moisturized.  This is a good value for 2, 16 ounce pump bottles.

product_name: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Lotion with Vitamins E and B5, Deep Hydration for Extra Dry Skin, Non-Greasy Formula, 16 fl. oz (Pack of 2)
review: I am disappointed because I only received one lotion and the product states it is a pack of two. I am wondering what happened to the other one..? I would have never paid this amount if I was only going to receive one lotion. If the seller sends me the other lotion, then I will modify my rating.

product_name: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Lotion with Vitamins E and B5, Deep Hydration for Extra Dry Skin, Non-Greasy Formula, 16 fl. oz (Pack of 2)
review: Nice price for two items. Recommened to me by my. Dermatologist.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: So I've been using bio oil for about a month now and It seems to be working. My newest scars have definitely been improving but my old scars still seem to be pretty dark. My face does feel alot smoother and more moisturized. It hasn't been irritating my skin and it's a great moisturizer. I use a very little bit just to get a thin layer over my face then I apply my lotion on top. I've also been using African black soap and witch hazel so the combination of these things may have resulted in this outcome but overall I'd say it's a pretty good product as adding it to my routine has seemed to help.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I have used bio oil for years. Love it, when its not counterfeit of course. This time I ordered it thru Amazon. The box was ripped and it appeared to be used, as there was no seal on the bottle. The consistency is watery and the color is a salmon pink instead of a more translucent orange color like the authentic version. Buy instead from target's offical website or an authorized retailer. Shame on amazon for giving such a large platform to counterfeit goods!

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: This product is a fake, do not buy it.The color, logo and consistency is different than the one I bought at the store

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I really like this stuff. I'm not sure how well it works on past stretch marks, but it works wonders on scars. I got bit by a dog last summer and nothing was working to get rid of the scar. I also had a scar from a scratch on my knee, as well as chicken pock scars, and scars from a wrist surgery. This oil seems to be fading them all!I put it on once a day after the shower (if that), and I've noticed the progress, even without photos. I also think that it helps to spread/lengthen the life of other lotions as well (given that it is an oil, if you put lotion on your legs, less will go longer than without the oil), so it helps you save money in the lotion department.First pictures are when I first got bit, second is when I was trying products to fade the mark, and last is now.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I use this for 1 month and it getting better.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I first purchased this product in late 2017 by recommendation.  I have systemic lupus and cutaneous lupus  of the skin. When my skin is flared I get bullous sores and open lesions mostly on my neck, arms and face. In 2017 I had one of the worst flares I have ever had. I did not think my skin would ever completely recover and look 'normal' again. I used 7 large bottles between 2017 and 2019. I also use natural non commercial toiletry products that I make myself.  I cannot say that my skin cleared solely  by just using this product,  however the fading of scars for me was definitely noticable (see photos)  The oil does help with new scars. Not too much for old scars. To me this worked better than 100 percent cocoa butter.  It took about a year of using this to see a difference. And I will be honest I did not use it every day. The time span between the photos is about a year and a half. The bio oil worked well on my chest, arms and face but not so much on the thighs and buttocks. I didn't find it very moisturizing at all but I purchased it for scars so wasnt too disappointed with that part. Overall I'm glad I tried it. The only negative is the fragrance. I do not use fragrance of any kind as it irritates my skin. The fragrance in the oil however didn't irritate my skin but I wish it wasnt there. If the manufacturer is reading please create a fragrance free version.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: This stuff is awesome. I get dry patches on my face in the winter and since using this, no more dry patches! I have pretty sensitive skin and I can't use most creamy moisturizers because I'll break out, Bio-Oil adds the moisture I need without breaking me out. It also helps to reduce old acne scars and evens out my skin tone. As an added benefit, the smell is light and clean!

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: So I was a little skeptical about purchasing after seeing reviews but decided to give it a try. Obviously, you can tell it was a success!! I ordered the 4oz and received just that. The box is the most updated version which is a plus (checked other retailers aka Target). After giving birth I had numerous issues this has helped me with including discoloration, stretch marks (new and old) plus my surgical scar. Well, FOR ME ( everyone’s body is different) within the 1st wk the discoloration started clearing up and I have also noticed my scar was looking so much better!!! still working on the stretch marks 2 times a day faithfully!!

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I wasn't sure about buying this at first, but took the risk based off of all the good results I've read about. I tend to be heavy handed with products and thankfully after a month of using this, the bottle is still basically full. I have normal type skin, but wanted to use this for my uneven skin tones and skin tags. After a month of using it, my skin looks a lot more even! It looks more youthful and has really helped with the bags under my eyes. Didn't really help with my skin tags, but overall I really like it and have noticed a difference in my skin.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: Someone told me once I started showing that they utilized this brand to keep their skin integrity intact. I have used it once or twice a day daily and am currently 28 weeks pregnant and do not have any stretch marks. I’ve also gained about 30 pounds and it’s all in my belly so I’m huge. Even though stretch marks are genetic, I have stretch marks all over my inner And outer thighs as well as up the sides of my hips from being overweight in junior high. So I’m prone to getting stretch marks but haven’t received any from this pregnancy, kind of a sweet deal!

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I Read many positive reviews and some negative reviews saying that the product wasn’t original that it was fake so I went to target and I purchased a small one it’s Identical and smells exactly the same. I will post pictures of my results when I start using it.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: So I’ve been using this oil daily on my breasts and my belly during my pregnancy. On those areas I have not even ONE stretch mark. My skin looks great. But on the side/back of my hips I have a few little ones, though I know I haven’t applied it at all there as I didn’t think of it. My conclusion is that this product has prevented a lot of stretch marks on my skin! Love it! Bought it more to see now if it will do anything to the ones i got where i didn’t apply before and update this review in the future.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: Um, wow. I don’t even know where to begin. I originally got this as part of my skincare routine for my face, but then saw that it could be used on scars as well, so I figured I’d give it a try - couldn’t make things worse, right? I’ve been using this twice a day on the scar on my wrist for 3 weeks, and it has made a HUGE difference. The color is lighter, it’s less raised overall, and it seems to have actually gotten smaller. As a disclaimer, the “before” picture was more than 3 weeks before the “after” picture because I didn’t have a more recent one, but it’s an accurate representation of how my scar looked before starting in with the Bio-Oil. I’m excited to continue using it to see if it helps even more, but if it doesn’t, this is a huge improvement, and I’m so happy with how it’s performed!

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: Love this oil and it came perfectly

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I used Bio-Oil from my second trimester onward in both of my pregnancies, and it really helps with itching from skin stretching. I did not have stretch marks either time, but I have no idea how much of that is genetic and how much is product. Either way, it’s easy to apply, absorbs pretty quickly, the scent is mild and when I rub the excess onto my knuckles it helps prevent cracks and tears from winter skin—a little goes a long way! This is not a product you need to slather on to get the benefits. I will continue to use Bio-Oil at least during pregnancies and winter. One thing to note, the packaging has changed and with other products that can indicate a quality change, not so with Bio-Oil, the quality is consistently high.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E

review: 39 weeks pregnant and amazing results! Absolutely recommend.Update pictures 6 weeks pregnant and 38, my pregnancy ended at almost 41.All the women of my family have a ton of stretch marks ( I mean A LOT) and I was trying to fight the genetic 😁.3 weeks POSTPARTUM  AND NO STRETCH MARKS AT ALL!!!!!I used BIO OIL every morning since I find out I was pregnant ( a gooood amount) and at night-Organic Shea Butter by Sky Organics-. And drinking a lot of water.After delivery I continued doing it and I will until my body goes back 100%.So happy with the results

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: Currently 6 weeks postpartum. I enjoyed the scent, my husband hated the smell. Used it on off throughout my first (only) pregnancy, delivered my baby, never had any stretch marks. Pretty sure it’s not because of this since I didn’t use it consistently but who knows. As for stretch marks I had on my inner thighs, I was also applying... they didn’t disappear but are very unnoticeable to others.

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: This product is amazing, with the twice daily use I can notice a decrease in color of my stretch marks. I am 36 weeks pregnant and I plan to use this for awhile to help battle my stretch marks! Top picture is after two weeks of use bottom is the first day of use

product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 2 Ounce,   Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
review: I bought this for my wife while she was pregnant. (Obviousy genetics play a role)She would apply it twice, but not the 30 seconds(did not realize it said that for awhile) and still got results. Make sure you buy the right bottle, not the copy cat that's why there is a mix of reviews. This does not smell much and she feels it helping. It is oil so let it absorbed before putting clothes over. Try doing this after a bath and towel dry. Even the bumps are diminishing. Just keep being persistent. It's been a couple of months and they are looking lighter and smoother! I would recommend!

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream: for Face, Neck & Décolleté with 2.5% Retinol and Hyaluronic Acid. Best Day and Night Anti Wrinkle Cream for Men and Women - Results in 5 Weeks
review: I have been using this in conjunction with ORGANIC Vitamin C Serum for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti Aging, Age Spots, Acne & Neck Firming - BEST Anti Wrinkle Facial Treatment Serum with Natural Ingredients to Restore & Boost Collagen - 1 oz https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00KOUALMS/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_api_i_-rmYDb1G2C51RFor about 1.5 months for mu sun damaged face. First pics are before then after. I see a difference. My face is also smoother/softer. I have sensitive skin and have had no reaction to this.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream: for Face, Neck & Décolleté with 2.5% Retinol and Hyaluronic Acid. Best Day and Night Anti Wrinkle Cream for Men and Women - Results in 5 Weeks
review: Im 34 and starting to notice the laugh lines and under eye wrinkles getting deeper.  I had previously been using not bad, but not the best moisturizer from the drug store.  It was not anti aging or anything.Let me tell you- this stuff is awesome!  My face is sooooo smooth and my eyes are already loosing the wrinkles! The right eye looks "puffy" but that's mainly because I have more and deeper wrinkles on that side.  I just put it on so it seems to be like that for a few hours then go down a bit.  However, the left eye is remarkably different.  I think the right will need time to catch up.  Not the creams fault- just my face composition.  I used it twice a day for two days- with tumeric soap to wash.  Can't wait to see 30 days results!  This is like half the price of the drug store or other brands and seems to be working amazingly! definitely work a try for 22 bucks. idk if it works on sensitive skin or not because my skin hasn't really had a reaction or broken out to anything ever.  I will say it does have a strong but very pleasant scent so that might irritate some people.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream: for Face, Neck & Décolleté with 2.5% Retinol and Hyaluronic Acid. Best Day and Night Anti Wrinkle Cream for Men and Women - Results in 5 Weeks
review: I honestly have never written a review before, but this product was just so great i felt like I should.  This product surpassed my expectations. I'm 22 and still suffer from acne. My acne is not bad compared to my family, and I don't break out often, but when I do it's all anyone notices. I usually get 1-3 huge zits on my cheeks that leave horrible acne scars. The first picture I attached is from about three months ago. The second is from one week ago, the same day i began the product, and the last two are from today. Also, I do realize the scars are still noticeable, but I am just in awe as to how much my skin has improved in one week. Not just the fading of the acne scars, but my skin also is more vibrant and lively than it has been since i was a sophomore in high school.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream: for Face, Neck & Décolleté with 2.5% Retinol and Hyaluronic Acid. Best Day and Night Anti Wrinkle Cream for Men and Women - Results in 5 Weeks
review: Using this product 3,5 months, and almost done with 50ml/1.7oz (mornings only, and other night cream or masks).Not sure yet if it works good for face line, but love everyday feeling with its light texture. I’m picky with cosmetics aromas, but this one smells nice, very light.

review: A heads up: The tube of product that I received must have undergone a re-design. The box notes "new" and the tube does *not* look the same as the one shown in the product photo. The part about "3 essential.... B5" is not on my tube. It is on the box the tube comes in. I have emailed Cerave and am waiting for an answer as to if there is any difference in formulation, but I don't believe there is. I thought I had gotten the wrong product until I check around online.I have combo skin: lightly oily in t-zone but dry everywhere else on the face - which is why I needed this.My skin is sensitive to anything harsh and it has not reacted badly to this.I would suggest doing a spot test by applying to a small area for a week or two before using all over.  I also suggest making sure to wear a good sunscreen while using this and going out into the daylight.I like the applicator tip because it allows me to dispense the product in small increments.The way I use this is to moisten my face so that it's a bit damp & then applying this by patting small dots of it around the dry areas of my face. I let this dry and then I apply my regular moisturizer.Someone once suggested to always apply face serums & moisturizers in the order of thinnest  to thickest.I also find that using my fingers to apply by lightly pat or tap the face treatments help them absorb better. That's just something that works for me.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: I used this a few times, maybe twice and the metal top began to rust and discolor the serum.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: I use it at morning following with a spf 50 sunscreen. At night, I use retinol. This combination can contribute to anti- aging, and anti- oxident. Also very gentle product with a non-greasy formula. Good quality with affordable price. Really love Cerave brand.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: The serum itself is ok, non-irritating, although it turns parts of my face a bit orange...for some reason. I used it every two days for a week and saw no particular difference. Nevertheless, the packaging itself leaks for some reason, which is bad for a vit c serum as it shouldn’t be exposed to light and air.Although it may just be just my tube.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: I bought this product hoping to even out my skin tone. I had some mild acne scars and sun spots. As you can see  from my before and after photos, after two weeks of use it has dramatically lightened my dark spots. I couldn’t be happier with this product. I recommend it to everyone.I’m someone who has facial psoriasis/eczema and I’m always wary about adding anything new to my facial routine. But I took a leap of faith considering CeraVe is so gentle on the skin. I’m so glad I did. I’ll be buying this for the rest of time. HIGHLY recommend.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: It's too late to return this product since it's been over a month that purchased through Amazon.  But I can't use it anymore.. I don't understand why it's turning red on the outside of the applicator.  From first using the product it the serum was a white color and not it turned a yellow orange color. For this reason I've stopped using it.  I'm disapointed because I like most  of the CeraVe product.  I wish I could get my money back.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: Cerave is one of the VC products affordable to me as I am a graduate student living paycheck by paycheck. I bought it a month ago. It is not harmful to me and also improves my skin.First of all, it does not cause any side reaction on my face (I did do a patch test before applying to the whole face though). I guess 10% is on the lower end. I use my fingertips to massage it on my face. It absorbs really fast and also moisturizes my skin.I also noticed my skin tone become a bit more even, not very much though. My skin is still yellow, which becomes brighter and firmer. Especially the T zone is less oily.Well I don’t know if it is really the vitamin c in it or the hydronic acid that is working. But it is at least not harmful.That said, I do have one complaint.I really like the airtight tube and the cream inside it has not discolored so far. But the serum does change a little once you squeeze it out. You can see from my pic that the edge of the cream becomes orange, different from the original white to yellow, indicating the oxidation of vitamin C (it is within half a minute after I pump it out). It is even more so if my palm is wet.  I know vitamin c is very reductive, which is exactly the reason it can be an anti-oxidant. But I did not know it gets oxidized so easily.  Even though the part oxidized is small and I don’t know about other brands, I still hope this formula may be improved.Overall,  I will make a second purchase to see the effect in the long run and will definitely keep vitamin c in my skincare routine.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: Vitamin C applications to the skin are becoming more popular. I have tried several. One web site says "Vitamin C boosts your skin's collagen production to give you firmer, more plump skin and smooth out fine lines and wrinkles. The antioxidant properties of vitamin C help fight free radicals and damage caused by UV radiation. The result is anti-aging action for younger-looking skin!" CeraVe Vitamin C Serum goes on smoothly. It is non-greasy and fragrance free. It does leave my skin feeling smooth.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: So far so good, dont nee any major change but I trust this brand so will be using them for long time.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: I didn’t see any results, the consistency was sticky which made it hard for me to use. Every time I used it I put it on before bed so the feel of it on my face won’t annoy me. And it OXIDIZED!! I haven’t even had it that long.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: Peels right off of skin after it dries. Makes you look like a zombie unfortunately. I love their other products but I’ll be returning this one.

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: The containers and content are different.The bottle on the left side is the recent one I ordered,while the latter is the old one I ordered in December.There is so much difference on the bottle labeling and I am doubting the authenticity of the lotion.The lotion texture in the new bottle is lighter compare to the old one I was using.I think the original one is the one on the right side in this picture.This is not a good act at all! Don't sell diluted or fake products to people.I might trash the new one because I don't know what was used to dilute it.

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: This comment might get deleted since comments I write are usually deleted if they are not positive.I ordered eucerin advanced repair lotion. I currently am struggling with having eczema all over the right side of my trunk. I really needed this lotion because I don't have much of it left. My rash has been really bad this week, and I am using a lot of this lotion.Instead I got something else as shown in the picture I submitted with this review. I got some type of advanced cleansing body and face cleanser, which will not provide me with relief from the burning and itching of my eczema throughout the day. The rash is really very painful, and the lotion I ordered has been working for me all month, and I can use it throughout the day.I really don't like that. I think Amazon should be careful to send people what they order because people need exactly what they order. I am sorry to write a negative review. I am sorry if any review that isn't positive is viewed as offensive. This review is not meant to harass or bully the seller or Amazon. This review contains no profanity or any language that offends anybody based on who they are. This review is meant to be a suggestion that people order stuff because they need it, and it is important for any seller whether they are from Amazon or not to send the right item that a customer orders and not something else. What was sent to me shown in the picture won't provide me any relief from my eczema symptoms throughout the day like the item I actually ordered. This is very frustrating. I am really low on the stuff I actually need, the eucerin advanced repair lotion that is meant to be used throughout the day.

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: It works for my dry skin very well.  I felt itchy sometime when my skin get really dry but I don't feel itchy anymore after I've applied this Eucerin lotion. BUT it is little sticky.

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: It works great on my dry skin. Stops it from itching. I have sensitive skin so it's great.

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: Unbelievable great product

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz

review: Yego antes de tiempo ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

review: Comes bundled. I like how the caps are different able to distinguish one from the other if have them close to each other, seeing the same color schemeDoes not work well as a body wash. Best to use other body wash first, rinse, then use moisturizer, let it soak it a bit and wash off. More like in-shower lotion.As facial cleanser can use standaloneLotion is sticky and very thin. consistency is like finely blended mayonnaise.  takes a while to soak in skin. Very Good after-effects. Definitely the better out of the twoOverall, application is not ideal, but the results are good

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: I bought this thinking that I would 4 boxes of 500 (2000 tips), but I only got 2. I don't know if I need to say it or if it's not obvious enough, but since I only got half, I want back half the money or to be shipped the remaining 2 (I don't care how inexpensive it was or how great a deal). When you advertise something for sale make sure that it's what it is.

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: I tried just the prescription for eczema, never went away used for a yearI then tried about 5 top reviewed lotions,  this one seemed to help,  I then started putting the prescription cream on them this over top and it forms a barrier to seal in the prescription cream,  eczema gone after 3 weeks! Highly recommend. I tried wrapping my leg every day,  didn't work,  put this eculara over top of cream and it worked amazing

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: I have very dry skin and this lotion keeps my skin moisturized very wellWould buy again

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturizing Skin Therapy Oil for Face with Vitamin E, Rosehip Fragrance ,1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I’ve been using this for 4-5 weeks now and I’m wondering why I’ve been spending so much money on all those other face oils and creams for so long? Palmer’s Cocoa Butter Formula works as well and better than everything else I’ve been using for years. Not only is it providing amazing moisture for my skin, it’s working wonders on redness and the couple of age spots I’ve been fighting with for years are already looking better.I’m seriously not kidding you! I have two age spots, that in my mind are huge. In reality,  they are about the size of a pencil eraser. For years I’ve tried all kinds of creams and lotions with zero results. In just over a month I am finally seeing a difference! I’m using this oil twice a day and nothing else. I am not a make up wearer. So there is literally nothing other than Cetaphil and Palmer’s on my 60 year old skin daily.I’ve wasted so much time and money over the years and this as been sitting on the drug store shelf all that time. Wow! I sure hope Amazon doesn’t sell out of it like Target has been lately.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturizing Skin Therapy Oil for Face with Vitamin E, Rosehip Fragrance ,1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I know someone who sells Roden and Fields and they swear that this Palmers face oil is just as good, if not better, than the many of the products they sell. This stuff is the real deal, and you can get it for a fraction of the price of most beauty vitamin E oils. It’s moisturizing, gives you a nice glow, feels so soft, and really helps with fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven skin tones. I have some acne scarring from my teen years and since using this product, I see a NOTICABLE difference. It’s not magic, guys. It’s not going to eliminate your skin imperfections entirely… but it’s a GREAT product and so much more affordable than other options out there. I would absolutely recommend it to others. I think it’s fantastic and a necessity for every woman’s beauty bag. I took a photo of the oil next to a standard tube of toothpaste just to offer a reference to the product size… It is small but it does last a long time. Hope that helps!

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturizing Skin Therapy Oil for Face with Vitamin E, Rosehip Fragrance ,1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Firstly, the smell is not as strong as some make it out to be. It has a somewhat artificial floral smell. Its not needed but also not offensive.I have not had a pimple in a couple months now (have had maybe 1 or two ones that dissapear in a day). 3 days into using this product, BOOM a HUGE and DEEP pimple arose. The redness takes up half my cheek and it hurts to move my face. Ive dealt with acne for so long and finally got my skin in order but it seems that this oil irritated my acne prone skin. ALTHOUGH, it made my skin texture very nice! I actually wish i could keep using this because it leaves my skin moisturized and its a soothing feeling.Maybe in the future, my skin won't be so acne prone and i would actually use this.Sorry for the nasty picture but its reality :)

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturizing Skin Therapy Oil for Face with Vitamin E, Rosehip Fragrance ,1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I purchased it because I heard people on social media rave about it and how it cured their redness and faded scars. I am a 25 years old asian-indian woman. I don't have that many wrinkles or fine lines on my skin but I am trying to prevent future ones. I have few tiny bumps on my skin and few scars from previous acne. I purchased the small sized bottle and used up almost all of it. I used the oil in conjunction with toner and essence. The oil isn't too thick on the skin but I have tried to wear it under my makeup and had disastrous results. Its a NO NO for under the makeup facial oil usage. I have also tried to use it nighttime but I didn't feel like my skin was moisturized and overtime I feared that it was starting to look dull. I have almost finished the bottle but I highly doubt that I'll repurchase.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturizing Skin Therapy Oil for Face with Vitamin E, Rosehip Fragrance ,1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I love this stuff. My skin is dry & few drops of this & it soaks right up. It IS oil, so I let it set for a few minutes. I use it mostly at night. It spreads fast & evenly. The scent is very mild, but pleasantly enjoyable. I will definitely be buying this again.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturizing Skin Therapy Oil for Face with Vitamin E, Rosehip Fragrance ,1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I use it more as a spot treatment for hyperpigmentation. I have oily skin to I'm not a fan of using oil all over.

review: So my face started burning immediately after applying this cream. Also the label states that it is for “all skin types” which is clearly not since I had a reaction after using it. As well as sensitive skin, I also have dry skin, and my face did not feel hydrated nor moisturized after using this cream (and following the instructions on it) either. Pump to apply cream was broken/ useless and the top of the bottle says “get free cream” which is in exchange for good reviews (which I am assuming is why this cream has so many good reviews in the first place) I definitely would not recommend this  cream for individuals with sensitive skin.

So far I like it.  Cream goes on smooth.  I will update if I notice any changes is my skin.Update: cream is great.  Feels great on my skin. Pump mechanism keeps cream freah without a lid.

product_name: MARYANN Organics Collagen Cream - Anti Aging Face Moisturizer - Day & Night - Made in USA - Natural Formula with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C - Cleanse, Moisturize, and Protect Your Skin
review: Came to my mail early. I had to test on my skin if allergies occurs. So far no reaction. The cream is very smooth. I use it right after i wash my face in the morning and right after i shower at night. Only been days of using i can feel it really hydrates my dry skin, my skin looks glowing.I been diagnosed with hyperthyroidism so my big problem on my skin was dryness , my skin fine lines and dullness, also since i been expose to sun lately due to hiking and i'll be camping most of the summer days,This cream helps really well and alleviates my skin problems. The puffiness under my eyes was reduce. This cream perfect for the summer weather. Pump is really an advantage too.

product_name: MARYANN Organics Collagen Cream - Anti Aging Face Moisturizer - Day & Night - Made in USA - Natural Formula with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C - Cleanse, Moisturize, and Protect Your Skin
review: Before purchasing, I read the ingredients, which are fabulous; pure and organic, and ideal for sensitive skin, like mine. Another plus was that the cream gives protection from the sun! When I opened the jar and realized that it had a built-in pump, I was ecstatic. No more dipping my fingers into the product...The cap can be opened, like a regular jar, if that's what floats your boat! The cream, itself, is unscented, silky, and glides into my skin, without feeling sticky. I'm hoping for a youthful glow and flawless skin...Hey, at 71, I need all the help I can get!

product_name: MARYANN Organics Collagen Cream - Anti Aging Face Moisturizer - Day & Night - Made in USA - Natural Formula with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C - Cleanse, Moisturize, and Protect Your Skin
review: I have "mature" skin and live in a dry "desert"  in SoCal where the day time temperature reaches 115 degrees plus from July through October and the night time temperatures dip to 40 degrees or lower during the winter.  The moisturizer I had used for over ten years, Olay's Regenerist, was no longer working for me so I went to the beauty aisle of my usual virtual shopping mall in search of a new moisturizer.  The reviews for MaryAnne Organics Collagen Day & Night Moisturizer not only sounded like exactly what I was looking for they also sounded legit.  All of these great reviews are not over hyped, this moisturizer is even better.  It is super moisturizing without being greasy and it has no scent.  To top it off, the dispenser is hands down the second best thing about this moisturizer 😁😁😁

product_name: MARYANN Organics Collagen Cream - Anti Aging Face Moisturizer - Day & Night - Made in USA - Natural Formula with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C - Cleanse, Moisturize, and Protect Your Skin
review: I like this product for several reasons.  1) It is not scented(which usually will irritate my eyes) 2) It is not overly greasy and won't make your skin shiney 3) The push top distribution is convenient so you don't use too much and you don't have to  put your finger inside the cream each time. It also gives enough with one push to do your neck which is a must. 4) It's labeled organic 5)It is made in the USA!As if five reason wasnt enough it works well too!  It has the perfect mixture to make your skin look and feel beautiful.  I feel that my skin looks smoother with less lines in just a few applications.  I will say that I tend to apply it twice because I have drier skin.  I will apply it after the shower and then before doing my hair about twenty minutes later.  Trying is believing!

product_name: MARYANN Organics Collagen Cream - Anti Aging Face Moisturizer - Day & Night - Made in USA - Natural Formula with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C - Cleanse, Moisturize, and Protect Your Skin
review: I have been using this product for two weeks, now.  So far so good!  I have a combination skin with hand eczema so it is important for me that whatever I use on my face also does not irritate my hands.  This cream is gentle on my face and hands.  The cream is rich but it blends smoothly and gets absorbed quickly.  It does not leave the greasy feel, which I like!  I also like the it does not have any smell, cream with fragrance usually irritate my skin.  I also like the dispenser.  You don't stick your finger in the jar so I think it is more sanitary!

product_name: MARYANN Organics Collagen Cream - Anti Aging Face Moisturizer - Day & Night - Made in USA - Natural Formula with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C - Cleanse, Moisturize, and Protect Your Skin
review: 6 days of use and I'm already loving this cream! I apply it to my face just before bed and after my morning shower. Blemishes are lightening and it makes my makeup look smooth.There is no scent. The pump makes it easy to get it out quickly with no mess. A little goes a long way.

product_name: MARYANN Organics Collagen Cream - Anti Aging Face Moisturizer - Day & Night - Made in USA - Natural Formula with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C - Cleanse, Moisturize, and Protect Your Skin
review: The cream is light weight and easily spreadable. I cannot say that it is not easily absorbable, it is, but I still have time to spread it and massage it on my face until it gets fully absorbed. My face had this dewy appearance after applying it to my face which I absolutely love. It did not give me anybreakouts too ( im dry- combination). In the morning I can still feel that my skin is moisturized which is what I was really looking for in a product.

product_name: e.l.f.   Daily Hydration Moisturizer, Lightweight Formula, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: So far I really like it. The packaging was in pristine condition, it smells really nice, and the consistency does not feel heavy and yet it doesn’t feel like I’m putting water on my face. I really think it is a nice light moisturizer you can wear before putting on your makeup.

product_name: e.l.f.   Daily Hydration Moisturizer, Lightweight Formula, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: I actually really like this moisturizer so far. However, If you're looking for a moisturizer with any type of matte finish, this is 100% not the moisturizer for you. I have oily skin so I usually use a translucent matte powder anyway so it's not a big deal to me. I'm just happy with how hydrating it is because it helps with these super dry cold winters in upstate NY. I'm here for school and the air can be really harsh on my skin (even with it being oily). This moisturizer is also an excellent makeup primer. It's better than my actual makeup primer lol. It's rather sticky after you first put it on and works great. It doesn't stay sticking and as it dries it doesn't feel all stiff.I posted that picture cause Idk why they sent it without any cushioning in the package but it came all beat up. luckily the product was unharmed lol.

product_name: e.l.f.   Daily Hydration Moisturizer, Lightweight Formula, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: The price is great this is a good value.  I’m not amazed by the moisturizing but it’s a trade off for being non greasy and very light.  The fragrance is barely there and disappears after a few minutes which is another plus.  I was surprised at the quantity you receive because it does seem like they are very generous with the amount they give you.  I will keep using.

product_name: e.l.f.   Daily Hydration Moisturizer, Lightweight Formula, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: My facial technician told me to get this product. Moisturize twice daily! This is a must have in your facial care routine.

product_name: e.l.f.   Daily Hydration Moisturizer, Lightweight Formula, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: This product isass in China who knows under what health regulations or quality standards (if any).  I don’t recall “made in China” being disclosed anywhere in the amazon product description. Will be returning. It is worth it to pay a few & more and get a French (or at least) US made face creme.

product_name: Mario Badescu Special Mask for Oily Skin, 2 oz
review: This is an amazing oil control mask. I really only need to use it in the summer as my skin gets incredibly oily normally, but living in the north I actually get much dryer in the winter so I definitely don't use it as often. I've been using this for 6 months or so now and still have plenty left as you can see. I've read most of these reviews to see what others thought about it and the negative ones while true, they give the product the ability to do its work.Yes, the mask is watery as you can tell and can get quite messy. It's easy to clean up with a wet washcloth though...the liquidiness is due to the product settling. It's got a clay like substance that sinks to the bottom, so if you don't feel all the way down it will seem like straight water. I actually vigorously shake it up for a second and everything is well mixed. When I remove the cap, it's got a coating for the mask and what's in that cap is ALL I NEED for my whole face.As for the smell..no it isn't like frolicking in a freshly rained upon meadow of tulips and Poppys but if you don't use any product unless it smells good you're not giving your skin the best it deserves. GOOD SKINCARE SHOULD NOT SMELL GOOD! If it doesn't, it's generally a good indicator that the product is all natural and not too harsh for your skin. Fragrances are a lot of the time not natural, they can cause allergic reactions, and can be too harsh or strip the skin. Once you can warp your brain to understand all that stuff you'll never want to go a few hundred dollar Chanel product that smells like roses. (Not saying they have products that don't work at all! I'm just way more turned off by those synthetic scents now!) for the price, this is worth a try!

product_name: Mario Badescu Special Mask for Oily Skin, 2 oz
review: ✅clears blackheads✅moisturizes skin✅soft🆗scent is awkward, but not bad

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing Skin Firming Body Lotion w/ Q10 and Vitamin C - 48 Hour Moisture for Dry to Very Dry Skin -  16.9  Fl. Oz. Pump Bottle
review: Just received it and it came broken can not use the pump at all.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing Skin Firming Body Lotion w/ Q10 and Vitamin C - 48 Hour Moisture for Dry to Very Dry Skin -  16.9  Fl. Oz. Pump Bottle
review: The shipping box was alright but the cap broke :// I still can use it but what a waste of money.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: If I can give a zero rating for this batch, I would!!! First of all, I've been using Olay for more than 15years and never had any issue........ until now!!! I've only used this product two times (just a pea size portion each time) and both times I had inflammation! The first time I had that problem, I was shocked since I've been using Olay for a very long time. When I went to see my doctor, we couldn't figure out what causes my inflammation. He said could it be from the cream or the food I ate. Yet still he advised me to stop using this product. But because I really like what product does to my face, I decided to buy new one from the pharmacy(not on sale). And just like I thought, I'm not allergic to Olay!!!😊 Because I've been using the new one  from the pharmacy for more than a month now and never had any inflammation. Since I was convinced that the inflammation I had was from something I ate, I decided to give this batch a try again. Look what happened (see attached photo), another inflammation!!!!😡😡😡 This item i received is definitely is a bad batch!!! I only wish I could return it!!!

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: Not sure if this is a fake product or not, probably just go pick it up from your local walmart if you want it. I went with olay because it's a typically reputable brand that I've used in the past but whatever this was really burned my skin. I only used it twice, and on the second day (today) my skin BURNED terribly when I applied it. I never have this problem. Now, only 12 hours after the 2nd application, my skin is extremely red and flaking in patches. Just dont trust buying this online. :(

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: I put this on and within 10 minutes I felt a little itchy so I ran to the bathroom and washed my face but it was too later, I had a horrible allergic reaction.  My face swelled up, my throat started itching and my eyes as well. I can't believe I'm going to be in this condition for at least 1 week during Christmas holiday.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: Really doesn't do anything.  It does peel if thick enough but not really thick or strong enough to pull anything. It separates and doesn't cover evenly.Really doesn't do anything.  It does peel if thick enough but not really thick or strong enough to pull anything. It separates and doesn't cover evenly.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: I was so excited to try this out because of all the positive reviews. Nope! (please see picture). One week of using this it made my skin breakout and I'm 40 yrs old! I haven't had acne for 15 yrs. My face is always itchy too. $25 gone to waste!

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: No spf30 protection. Be careful

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: My skin was sore and burned and started peeling .

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: I had high hopes for this as it was recommended by some friends. Unfortunately I had a bad allergic reaction. This has never happened to me with other face creams.

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: What did I just put on my face?!?This is NOT Olay! As you see in the pictures, the freaking label isn’t even the same or the logo! They are two different consiscies.. this can’t be legal!

product_name: Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30 by Olay Total Effects, 7 Benefits , Anti-Aging , 1.7 oz (Packaging May vary)
review: In the description of this item it clearly shows that it is SPF30, but when I got this item today I found it is SPF 15, see the attached pic. SFP 30 is what I want and it's supposed to be a bit more expensive than SPF 15. Not sure who should be responsible for this. Not happy about this at all!!

product_name: Clinique 3 Step Travel Size Set For Combination Oily To Oily Skin, Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin, Clarifying Lotion Skin Type 3, Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel
review: Good buy for the price. Good way to test to see if I like it.Didn't do anything for my acne and the toner smells like alcohol.

product_name: Clinique 3 Step Travel Size Set For Combination Oily To Oily Skin, Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin, Clarifying Lotion Skin Type 3, Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel
review: This product is old

product_name: Clinique 3 Step Travel Size Set For Combination Oily To Oily Skin, Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin, Clarifying Lotion Skin Type 3, Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel
review: The moisturizer I received was .5 fl oz.. The fact that it says on the bottle "not for sale" is a red flag for me.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Pump broken on one of three bottles. I read the review of cancer causing products and am now concerned about that. I have been using this for a few years now and it is the only spf moisturizer I like for my face.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Es un muy bien producto, me encanta deja la piel suve, hidratada, y la proteje de los rayos ultravioleta.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Do not buy from here. The bottle was so defective it was unusable. What a rip-off. Quite disappointed. I paid $14 for nothing. I want a refund. Bad way to do business.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: My customers complain this product entering their eyes every time they wear it. They also complain after driness of skin after using it. It is not good do not buy it.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I recently got free samples from bzzagent! I received 3 trial samples. I started using them. Within a few days I noticed a difference in my skin! I will continue to use it! It is on my shopping list for my next trip,to the store...

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Before buying the cream in the States, I tested the product on my wrist at the store and it was fine. So I bought an unopened bottle and travel home to Vietnam with it. When I opened the bottle, it was horrendous. Cream and oil were separated. I naively thought that the cream just came out wrong because of the pump so I went ahead and applied it to my face and neck. After a few minutes, the whole face burned. I washed off the cream right away but my face and neck still have red rashes. It's also itchy and very uncomfortable. I told a friend about it and she said the same thing happened with the night cream she bought from the same product line. She did not bother to file a complain because she doesn't leave in the States. This is not supposed to happen. I have purchased many cosmetic products, including those from other Aveeno's product lines, and traveled internationally with them but none of this malfunction has happened before.The worst part about my experience is Aveeno's customer service line. Will, the product specialist, insisted that all they can do about my damage is giving me a refund in a check. I asked him to deposit the amount to my US bank account since I cannot cash out the check in Vietnam and he said he's unable to do so. After being so useless, he asked me to answer a very personal survey that would last up to 15 minutes. I stopped the survey when he asked me my date of birth as I knew it's going to get very personal. I offered to answer the survey over mail and again he said no, it has to be done over the phone.Aveeno really needs to reform their customer service policies if they want to keep their international customers. This is the most rigid and unhelpful customer service line I have ever come across in the States. What I paid for the product was not much (about 15 bucks including tax) but the least they could do is being flexible about the refund to compensate the clients' damage. That's what store credits, cash back, and other refund types are for! Instead, they choose to harass the customers with personal questions and cut corners by rounding down the retail price of the product. The customer service specialist said he will put a check of $13 in the mail for me, as it is the average retail price. The $2 difference does not make me any richer, but it does make me angrier about the way this company treats its customers. I will now stop using Aveeno altogether and tell everyone I know to boycott it.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I am a crowdtap member and received several samples as part of a mission to try and review. I was so happy with the AVEENO® POSITIVELY RADIANT® Daily Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30, I wear minimal make-up, so this was a fabulous daily lotion for me! It is natural with soy, and it goes on light no greasy. It absorbed well and was easy to apply and blend. I like that is is SPF 30 as I want more SPF protection. I trust Aveeno as their products have always been gentle on my skin and this was no exception. Gentle and all day moisture! Love it!

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: I know what you're thinking- at this price point, how great can a moisturizer be? As far as I'm concerned, it's my holy grail of moisturizers, and I've tried Clinique, SKII, La Prairie, La Mer, La Roche Posay, Avene...the amount I've spent trying to find a good antiaging moisturizer is almost obscene, considering the modest price tag on this simple little orange jar.Don't let the packaging fool you- the jar is pretty but it IS plastic, and it feels a little like kid's toy (it has that soft plastic feel and weight). It comes with a spatula and, depending on the length of your fingernails/how fussy you are about getting bacteria into the jar from your fingers, you will definitely want to use the spatula, because the moisturizer is a little goopy.To me, the smell is reminiscent of that classic St. Ives collagen moisturizer, with a hint of citrus added. It's a little strong, but frankly it could smell like wet dog and I would still use it, for how well it works. That being said, if you're sensitive to fragrances you'll want to keep this in mind- it does NOT have a mild smell, but it will go away quickly.I use this essentially every single day, sometimes twice a day. Always in the morning under my Shiseido sunscreen (followed by makeup), and sometimes at night over my tretinoin. It absorbs fairly fast, and it is really, really soothing in the winter, if your skin gets dry. In the winter my skin will reach the point where only avocado oil doesn't make it sting, but of all the moisturizers I've used, this one stings the least and for the shortest amount of time. I've used it on hot days as well, and on my dry skin it's perfect, though I'm not sure how well it would work for normal/oily skin. It might be a bit heavy.I'm on my second jar, and my only regret is that it doesn't come in a giant economy size, so that I could literally cover myself in it during the cold months. It's such a relief to have finally found a product that moisturizes, plumps up fine lines, and doesn't cost a small fortune!

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: ***2-2019 Update: I have been using this face lotion every day for more than a year after my initial review and I stand by my review. All of my reorders have been consistent in quality and I will continue to use as long as it does.***** 6- 2018 Update: I have now used this lotion for 4 1/2 months, every night and I am just now at the last of my supply! Reordering because I love this lotion so much. My face continues to feel the smoothest and most moisturized it has ever felt!**Buying skincare products online is tough, but I wanted to try this because of the reviews and price.I typically use Clinique Mositure Surge Intense and I have normal to dry skin. I knew this likely wouldn’t live up to what I was used to, but I also wanted to try it because the price is so much better!First off, the lotion is more than double the OZ size than Clinique. Mine arrived in a box with a little plastic applicator and the lotion had a plastic cover inside.I have used this face lotion for a week and counting and thus far, I am very satisfied with this. The first couple of days, I was hesitant to like it because it was different than what I’m used to, but I continued using and now love it! It’s important to let your skin adjust to a new lotion. Try it for at least a week before making your decision.This is NOT as thick as Clinique. It does absorb fast, but as I write this (30 min after applying), I don’t think my face has ever felt this smooth and soft.This DOES have a scent to it. Much stronger than Clinique, but I like the scent. To each their own on this.5 stars for me as a Clinique Replacement. If you’re wanting to save money and willing to try a new product, don’t mind scent and willing to try for at least a week, give this a go!

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: I'm on my second jar and it’s time for me to share my honest to goodness product review. First off, I switch to 10 Step Korean Skincare back in Feb 2018 by doing an extensive research for the best most affordable Korean Skincare without breaking the bank. Luckily,  I came across one of the beauty bloggers that highly recommend Etude House products. This moisturizer not only absorbs easily, it also feels light and leaves my skin fully moisturized. With constant use, the jar will last you about 2- 21/2  months if used regularly morning and night time. Being a 53 yr old woman of mixed Asian/ Latin heritage I follow a strict skincare regimen. And this one never disappoints. I'm a devotee!

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: Used for 5 months from August 2018 to now (January 2019).SUMMARY PROS/CONS (if you don’t want to read the whole review):PROS:- Did not clog pores (non-comedogenic).- Good for normal and combination skin.- Smells good.- Lasts approximately 4 months of using twice/day on a regular basis.- Shows results in as little as a week, or in as long as a month.- Keeps skin hydrated all day.- Light-weight on the face.- Proper hydration eventually turns skin plumper.- Did not cause acne or breakouts.- Did not irritate.- Fl oz Size is just small enough to pass through flight TSA (but I don’t bring the whole thing with me anyways).- Absorbs well.CONS:- Fragranced.- Some have said it smells too strong (but it was fine for me).- May not work for chronically dry skin.NEITHER PROS nor CONS:- Price: average $14 and lasts 4 months, so not too bad, but this was considered expensive for me when I first bought it.- Container is plastic: I thought product would be inferior to glass products, but this moisturizer works for me, so can’t complain how it’s packaged as long as it works.REVIEW:Did it cause anything negative to my face:This Etude House Moistfull Collagen Cream didn’t make my face look oily, didn’t clog my pores, didn’t get heavy on my face, hydrates well, and absorbs into my skin really adequately. Plus, it’s a smell that I do like.How good is the hydration:The cream goes on smooth, and absorbs into my skin pretty quickly. I didn’t have to wait very long to feel my skin hydrated. But I actually didn’t buy this product as a “moisturizer”. The only reason I bought it was because it said “Collagen”, and I had thought that’s what my lackluster and dull skin needed 5 months ago.  Anyways, a week later, my face felt so baby-butt soft, smooth, and bouncy that I couldn’t stop touching it. I was amazed! I was sold. It was a happy-accident! The hydration that it provides made my once flat and dull skin a bit plumper too! It keeps my skin hydrated all day.Does it smell:I do like the smell as well. It grew on me. To me, it isn’t strong, but it definitely leaves an Etude House impression (as others have said it smells very Etude House).Recommended to first-timers:But this was just my first Korean moisturizer (and luckily worked). So, I would recommend this as a good Korean moisturizer for first-timers and for people who are wondering which they should get and just overwhelmed on choosing one, especially for normal-skin-types. There are always better and more hydrating Korean moisturizers, ones that are pricier and ones that are cheaper. It just all depends on your skin type and your needs. I know I’m ready to try something new and better, because I know that if others fail, I will always have this to fall back on.CONCLUSION:It was just really nice to find something that I wasn’t even looking for, and it happens to do well with my skin type and made it silky smooth.  Yes, there are better ones at about the same price or more expensive, but this one DEFINITELY SHOWS RESULTS in as little as a week. The price is alright too, considering everything ($9 if you’re lucky but ships from Korea in 30 days, usually $14 but already at USA Amazon warehouses so ships in a couple days).This is the moisturizer that I started out with before I ventured out into more expensive Korean moisturizers, and I gotta say that I’m really glad I did because I realized more expensive does not always mean better! I would buy this again in a heartbeat (I already have).HOW OFTEN & HOW DO I USE IT:I used it religiously every day and night for the first month, then once a day at night afterwards. At first, my skincare routine was just wash my face with regular cleanser then slap this on, but I found that my skin was more accepting and hydrating with this cream with regular exfoliating. Exfoliating just once every 2 weeks really made a huge difference; it was like night and day with how this cream absorbed into and hydrated my skin. Plus, exfoliating kept my pores from clogging up with ANY of the products I’m now using. Now, I also use a toner (Son & Park Beauty Water) and a First Treatment Essence before I apply this Etude House Moistfull Collagen Cream.OTHER PRODUCTS I’VE USED AND REVIEWED:At around the same time as right now, I’ve also reviewed the following after using for 5-11 months, if you’re interested in checking out:- Etude House Moistfull Collagen Cream, 2.53 Fl Oz.- Etude House New Moistfull Collagen Eye Cream, 0.94 Ounce.- MIZON Black Snail All In One Cream, 2.40 Ounce.- MISSHA M Perfect Cover BB Cream No.23 Natural Beige SPF42 PA+++ (50ml) and No.21.- [MIZON] Snail Repair Intensive Ampoule Set + Snail Repairing Foam Cleanser 60ml.- [MIZON] All in One Snail Repair Cream (120ml).- MIZON Snail Repair Blemish Balm, 1.69 Ounce.Additional info about my SKIN, AGE, SEX, ACNE CONDITION, PORES, ETC if you’re interested:- Combination skin with both dry, normal, and oily skin in different areas, with the oiliness being at my t-zone. The dry skin is around the crevices of my nose near my nostrils and near the mouth.  But mostly, my skin is normal everywhere else.- 33 years old woman/female who never took care of her skin prior to 2018 (sad truth!), but I also rarely like to put makeup on either except for powder in the past (and BB cream nowadays).- Moderate amount of acne scars and some sun spots, but no major skin flaws. I’ve never had any huge problems with acne except during my youth before 20, and one or two pimples during my period.- My pores WERE only big on my t-zone, a small area on my chin, and facial pores near each side of my nose. They used to be a problem before 2018, but now only my nose has the largest pores, which isn’t even very big anymore after I’ve been taking care of my skin.- I exfoliate my skin at least twice a month.

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: It seems like the product I’ve received have been opened before. The side of the cap crease has cream on there and the bottle there are dried product on the bottle neck. I’ve bought this product before in store before, it should not be like that. I am totally scared to use now. I suggest buy it from Etude site instead.

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: This review is long overdue. I just noticed I've purchased this cream 7 times on Amazon. This is by far the longest I've stayed with a moisturizer or any skin care product. The translucent jelly is light, yet packs powerful hydrating ingredients. It beats the $150 department store French cream that feels like lard on the face. I'm 56 years old, have dry skin, and live in a known dry region of the country. I've used countless number of products that boast moisturizing and hydrating power, but none comes close to what this cream offers. I use this cream for both day and night. It's light enough to use in the day. It absorbs quickly and foundation goes on easily and stays on naturally. I do use a heavier serum at night before applying this cream and find it quite lasting. Best thing is, it comes filled to the rim, unlike most other products which are almost always full of air pockets. For the price, everyone should give it a try.

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: Great cream for daytime/nighttime use for my husband. I added some tree tea drops in, mixed it well (he has very oily skin) and it’s perfect for him. And yes, i did teach him to use the spatula, which is what I recommend to everyone using a cream in an open container like this one!

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: No wonder this product has such high reviews! Immediately upon opening I noticed the light and pleasant scent and it’s comparison to the Neutrogena Gel moisturizer. Korean skincare always has the US beat as far as I’m concerned. I love that it came with a spatula as well for hygiene reasons (something that US brands never seem to). I only applied it to the back of my hand to test for allergies and so far so good. I can’t wait to try this as my daytime moisturizer.

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: Moisturizing enough for normal to dry skin. But not enough during winter, at least for me. This is lightweight, fast to absorb and can use this under makeup.

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: I like how it has a light texture and it absorbs instantly

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: When I opened the box it’s like this 😩

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: Possibly my most favorite part of my skin care routine. It is super moisturizing but doesn’t turn your face into an oil slick. I live in a humid part of the US and have not had any issues with my face becoming shiny. I love it!Edit: I’ve been using it a few weeks now and still love it! It comes with a spatula that is east to sanitize (i use a small fine spray bottle with isopropyl alcohol and one scoop with the spatula is enough to apply to all of my face

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: This is definitely not a heavy moisturizer and it's very lightweight. It does have a scent but it's not overwhelming. I use it at night and find it to be moisturizing. I do like this product however I don't know if I'll purchase it again. Because even though I do think it's moisturizing I don't think it's crazy moisturizing.

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: I have very sensitive skin and this moisturizer keeps my skin moisturized, soft and not oily or greasy feelings at all. Lightly scent. Blended in nicely with other skin care products. So far so good, no break out, no itching, no irritate...

product_name: ETUDE HOUSE Moistfull Collagen Cream, Soft Moist Gel Type Moisturizing Facial Cream, 63.4% Super Collagen Water & Bobab Water Makes Skin Plumpy with Long Lasting Moist, 2.53 Fl Oz
review: I like the product, my only concern is that the bottle is unsealed so I’m wondering if it is legit or imitation, I’d like to know before I will start using...

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I found this product really improved both the look and feel of the skin on my thighs/calves. I have attached before and after pictures after going through one tub of the product over 1 month, December 5th through 06Jan. I'm in the midwest and humidity is very low. I haven't had success with exfoliating or other lotions, so I'm very happy with this product and will continue using it. The first four photos are before, and the latter 4 are after. Photos were taken with the same camera in the same room with the same lighting for science!Photos are right thigh, left thigh, left thigh, left calf - right thigh, left thigh, right calf, left calf.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: OMG. I had a serious psoriasis outbreak and I was beside myself with pain & itching.  I read that salicylic acid helps psoriasis. I searched on Amazon for different creams and purchased this while on travel.  The cream has a nice texture and it is not too greasy and does not stain. It did not burn or tingle after I applied it. Within 24 hours my psoriasis started to heal up & the itch subsided. I was shocked that all my red spots and plaques completely healed up within 48 hours. I will use this creme 4 for the rest of my life, I highly highly recommend trying this creme if you suffer from psoriasis. The results will astound you. And I have tried many creams including prescription creams that the mayo clinic prescribed for me. Unbelievable as it sounds this cream worked the best for me. Check out my before and after pictures. I just wish I had stock in this company or had an ownership interest because this cream is going to make them a fortune.  Also if you are a psoriasis sufferer no matter what cream you put on you, you must be careful not to scratch. Where ever you scratch you will spread the psoriasis. So wash your  hands  each time you apply cream  to a different area of your body. If you do not you will spread the psoriasis. I know because I’ve had it now for year ( mine was brought on by Exemestane (Aromasin)  and I have studied psoriasis extensively. I am a nurse and I understand the importance of contact and spreading of skin diseases. I hope that my review will help psoriasis sufferers everywhere because until I discovered that salicylic acid can help  psoriasis and then discovered this cream that has the perfect formulation, I was miserable. I was crying in pain and worried that it would spread to my face. And it had started on my face but this  wonderful cream cleared it up.  I just can’t say enough good things about this cream.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I have been suffering from KP bumps and ingrown hairs for a really long time ( over a decade now). I have tried so many things to get rid of these bumps. A little background into my personal situation is that I have a milk chocolate skin tone and it is generally very silky smooth. My skins main issue beside the KP is that my skin is very sensitive and prone to dryness ( I have read that KP and ingrown hairs are common in those who have sensitive skin since KP is a overproduction of keritin to protect the skin [is the guess] but it is genetic and usually rarely goes away for most [ contrary to popular belief]). So I have had these bumps for so long and I have tried exfoliates and moisturizers but in vain. My problem areas are the backs of my arms especially around the elbows,the front of my thighs and the most severe place is the bottom half of my legs around the knee area. My main issue was to smooth the bumpy texture of these bumps. I always used shower puffs and Aveeno ( as my general daily moisturizer I still use it) and most recently Goldbond for Rough and Bumpy Skin. The Goldbond moisterizer was a 6/10 because it really aided the bumps on my thighs and the back of my arm but did nothing for my most severe location by my knees. After I waxed again ingrown hairs arrived on my thighs and the Goldbond did nothing so I decided to find a new solution.  I always used Cerave products but the price on this lotion really had me holding back from trying it but I finally did and I am so glad I did. I have been using to for only a month now but within the first few days there was a noticeable change and the bumps are all smoothed out. Unlike other moisturizers like the Goldbond it does not peel off and for a thick lotion it absorbs quickly into the skin. I use it every day, after I shower I just stand for about 5 minutes to make sure it fully absorbs and I thought I would never feel my silky smooth skin on my legs again but I finally did! I paired the Cerave with exfoliation for maximum results  used Earth Therapeutics Hydro Exfoliating glove as well and Gigi no bumps body scrub and both of them left my skin sooooo soft after showering but the Cerave just got rid of the rest of the bumps. I strongly recommend this for anyone suffering from KP and ingrown hairs! Especially if you have a bump issue. I am dark skin so the appearance of KP bumps discoloration is not to noticeable on my skin but I did notice a little fade in discoloration but not a whole lot so far after 2 weeks or so all my bumps smoothed and only time will tell if the discoloration will go away signifcantly. Overall a 10/10! 5 stars! I can't believe it works! I recommend it to anyone but remember to exfoliate as well for best results. Hope this long review helps someone.UPDATE 2/6/2017: ( The picture is from the beginning of 2017. After using the product for a few months after purchasing it in 2015, this was my results and they have been consistant since [throughout the rest of 2015-2016 and now 2017].)
