After using this product for about almost two years now it has worked very well! I regret not taking before shots because I assumed like all the other products I tried that it would not work or do anything, so there was no point! Ugh! I regret it! This product still works for me and I am happy my skin has not adjusted to it. My routine is the same,an exfoliating glove, dove soap, my GiGi scrub and Aveeno lotion that is fragrance free. I was about once a month because I generally am not harry and I exfoliate before and after my waxes and I use this to moisturize for about a week after my wax. I also use it randomly, especially when cold even if it has been weeks since I waxed. My bumps are still visible, but has lightened only slightly. I have darker skin so they do not show up anyways. Like I said before my texture and the feel of the bumps was my concern and still is. This product has left my skin soooo smooth I feel like I never had KP bumps! My final verdict is that this is perfect for smoothing those bumps, but if you are concern with discoloration this will help but you will need something extra. However, this is still great for those with dry, KP and ingrown hair prone skin. Hope I helped :)

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I’ve been working to combat my T-zone acne for several of years now. This has been a game changer for me; As before my skin was inflamed (red and the pores left open and exposed to crap in the air) 24/7. And I’ve gone through a lot of other brands to try to treat it! It’s been 1 week since I’ve been using this: twice daily and using with the SA wash! I’m posting the “before and after” photo so the photo can speak for itself! Again, this is only 7 days between photos, so it’s still in progress but I already love it! From my experience, the SA wash and cream causes a *very mild* “burning” sensation or itch but I has to be patient. It wasn’t too bothersome and it became better over time for me. The results are paying off for me so I will continue using! There are no smell that I can pick up on this and it feels clean! The SA cream if you use after the wash is thick but I use it sparingly. Good luck to you guys. My skin was complicated and I hope it works for you guys like it did for me.OK UPDATE- I think it’s about 3 weeks now and as I’m using this (and my skin is continuing to clear up), and as I am starting to put a little dent into the jar... as I rub the cream into my face, I’m noticing sharp little shards of solid pieces!!! It almost looks like fiber glass. Not sure what it is and it does poke into my skin and I am wondering if that’s what I was feeling (mild burning, or even micro cuts... so the product can “exfoliate” that I mentioned on my first review during 1st week of use). Ok I don’t mind exfoliating HOWEVER what if I accidentally get some of the dried shards I to my eyes? That stuff doesn’t dissolve at all or quickly. I’ve been going alto us with my face moistened with shards sparkling on my face too. It’s noticeable when I’m in bright lighting. I don’t know if I like it anymore. :(

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I stumbled upon this product while I was trying to find something to help with the keratosis pilaris I had on my arms. I used this twice a day, once in the morning and once before bed, every day for two months. Pros: I instantly felt a difference with the moisture levels on my skin. I have constantly battled overly dry skin (in conjunction with keratosis pilaris) all my life and no other product has worked or lasts as long throughout the day as this. As a whole, the texture of my skin has shown significant and noticable improvement. I also really liked the smell. It isn't made with fragrance but the smell is nice and neutral, yet unique and pleasant. Cons: I was hoping this was going to help with the red dots on my skin. There is a slight difference in the amount/area of skin the dots span but I'm disappointed that the before and after of two months is not nearly as drastic or as noticable as I was hoping. I have also noticed that I have started to get tiny white heads on my arms. No big deal, but still not something I'm thrilled about. The two first pictures are before, the last two pictures are after I have been using this for two months. Would I buy this product again? Probably but only until I can find something else that takes care of the red dots. If you're looking for a moisturizer that WORKS buy this. If you are looking for a treatment for keratosis pilaris, save your money.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I have been using this for a month.  I wasn't super consistent with doing it twice a day but the results are amazing!  I've been diagnosed with psoriasis recently but my legs and arms have always felt bumpy.  I had no idea I could make my skin as smooth as it is now.  My arms and legs are silky even if I don't shave.  Those tiny bumps are gone and my skin affected by psoriasis is getting better.  So worth the buy!!!

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I’ve recently started getting bumps on my upper arms. I’ve tried regular lotions and they don’t help. I did a little research and heard about Cerave products and how they might do the trick. Well, I’ve used this lotion every day, twice a day for almost a month and NOTHING! My arms still look horrible as you can see and I hate wearing tank tops or tshirts because I’m embarrassed. Don’t waste your money on this lotion, it doesn't help with keratosis pilaris.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: So I’ve been struggling with KP for a long long long long long time and I’ve honestly gave up trying all of these products to make it “go away” until last summer my arms became very rough and the bumps became much more pigmented. Yeah. I know. I should’ve used sunscreen, but I didn’t. So I decided to give this a shot because the Internet said they highly recommend it. BOOOOOOOY, I’m shook. It didn’t happen over night, but after 3 months of consistently exfoliating every night and using this lotion twice a day, you can honestly see a significant difference. Peep the pictures. Especially with the texture of my skin. Now visually, it’s still there, but not as bad as before. I really recommend giving this a try. It works. Slowly, but surely. If you’re curious about the product it is a bit thick applying it on and a little sticky afterwards, but it eventually soaks into your skin and you can kind of feel it throughout the day on your skin, but don’t let that discourage your purchase. That’s just your skin letting you know it’s still moisturized and protected by this amazing lotion.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I have had problems with oily/dry, red and flaky skin since I was in middle school. This was only made worse by showering and traditional dermatologist prescription products. Over the years I have tried a plethora of expensive prescription strength dermatitis and psoriasis creams ointments etc etc. Any product that is standard fair I’ve likely tried it from steroid cream to elidel and so on. I was frequently insecure about my skin throughout those years. The photo that doesn’t show my forehead is me in 2013. The next photo is me 2/7/20. The last photo is one I took 20 minutes ago 2/26/20. They speak for themselves. Very greatful.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I usually don't write reviews esp when so many are already there, but for this I had to. Being a thick cream, I applied it at night after bath on areas that are really bumpy,  feel not so smooth, dry, due to hair removal, and in general prone to bumps and acne like , white head type formation. The next morning, the skin is soft, moisturized and feels softer.  In just 1 night so I'm sure regular use shall improve the texture further more. Totally buying this again. Really impressed.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: . I bought it as a moisturizer for my arms and legs. I should have read the whole product review. It says not for use on large areas of skin. It also leaves a residue on your skin.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: It came in busted. Aside from that, it should be fine. I assume it wasn’t busted for long. I will come back if it doesn’t seem to take effect.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: im not sure if this is authentic or not, picture that has the darker blue lid is the one that i got from walmart, the lighter one is from amazon plus the one that i ordered from has no inner lid, scared that it might be a return and someone had used it before. def returning this item

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I’m not sure if this product comes sealed or not but what it looks like to me, as I have just received and opened the jar it comes like this. I need answers on whether it’s supposed to come like this otherwise I’d like a FULL REFUND.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I buy this product a lot because it really helps with bumpy skin. This is the first time that I’ve been a little disappointed. I opened the jar and found a pretty decent amount missing from the jar. Like I said this product works really well, just upset about how much is missing from this one jar.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Jar arrived open.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: There was an air bubble on top and a whole section of the tub is empty. Would’ve expected better given the high price.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I’m looking forward to using this on the backs of my arms, hands, and feet. I’m also looking forward to how much softer my husbands hands will be after a month of using this before bed!Salicylic acid is an excellent chemical exfoliant, and you can see and feel the moisture in this cream (video). It’s not something I would use during the day because it tends to stay on the skin if you use a lot, which I do. Also, it has no scent which I really appreciate. I like to pick any scent separate from a lotion/cream I’ll be using a lot.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: My teenage daughter and I both use this. I use this on my elbows, where I tend to get rough and bumpy skin. I also use it on certain places on my legs, where I get ingrown hairs from shaving. My daughter uses this as a facial moisturizer. She has oily, acne prone skin. This product has helped both of us achieve clearer, more comfortable skin. It’s fragrance free and absorbs quickly.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Thick and creamy moisturizer that I am using on my dry feet. I like to run around barefoot in the summer and my feet can get dry and rough. This moisturizer has salicylic acid in it so it helps to exfoliate as well as moisturize. Really love this.

product_name: Beau Brummell for Men Matte Finish Face Moisturizer | Quickly Absorbing, Lightweight Face Lotion with Caffeine + Vitamin-E | Anti-aging Properties, For Dry or Oily Skin | Large 5 OZ Tube | Made In USA
review: While I haven't yet decided if I will continue using this regularly, as I only recently started using it, it has certainly made a good first impression. No skin irritation, and my skin does seem a bit smoother and isn't oily after applying, unlike some other products I've tried.

product_name: Beau Brummell for Men Matte Finish Face Moisturizer | Quickly Absorbing, Lightweight Face Lotion with Caffeine + Vitamin-E | Anti-aging Properties, For Dry or Oily Skin | Large 5 OZ Tube | Made In USA
review: I had purchased and had been using the charcoal face wash by the same company. I liked it, I felt like it got my face cleaned. I decided to try the lotion they sell as my face always felt rough or dry. I have been applying this lotion at night and sometimes in the morning and so far I feel like my face is softer and the smell is great, makes me smell more manly, wife-approved. The wife says it makes my face glow. I don't know if it will keep me looking more youthful (will find that out in the future) but for now it's keeping my face hydrated and I feel more confident.  No real negative, maybe the price could be a few dollars less to make if more affordable but this is definitely a nice treat for your skin.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Fighter Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Moisturizer for Men, Daily Oil-Free Anti-Aging Face Lotion with Retinol, Multi-Vitamins, and Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen, 1.4 oz
review: Paquete maltratado aunque el producto no se abrió creo ☆☆ es más que suficiente.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Fighter Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Moisturizer for Men, Daily Oil-Free Anti-Aging Face Lotion with Retinol, Multi-Vitamins, and Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen, 1.4 oz
review: I used several products in the past and this one is probably one of the best. I am not sure about results on the long run because its been only a week, but its very easy to use and leaves your skin smooth.

product_name: Neutrogena Age Fighter Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Moisturizer for Men, Daily Oil-Free Anti-Aging Face Lotion with Retinol, Multi-Vitamins, and Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen, 1.4 oz
review: I have to admit I didn't want to believe what some reviewers wrote about this product and the formula change it went through the last year. It is sad to say but this product is not what it used to be. Formula have changed drastically and every time I apply it to my skin, it feels way to different. Now I have to find a new product to replace this new Neutrogena formula EPIC FAIL.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: When I received this lotion I was able to use the pump to dispense the lotion, but after a  few weeks the lotion got so thick and has the consistency on Crisco lard. I can no loner use the pump, now I have to use my fingers to get to this hard mess.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: Been trying different lotions available in containers without a pump bc I’m so sick of struggling to get the lotion at the bottom!  I’ve bought products from a range of different prices and after trying this I decided to set it up in my monthly subscribe and save.  It absorbs quickly, the scent is very minimal and the price is great.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: The Solimo ultra moisturizing lotion works quite well especially during the dry months of the year. The lotion is so thick in texture that it comes out of the jar more like paste. When you apply the lotion, it takes a little more effort to rub in. But after you apply it, it absorbs pretty well and you don’t feel it on after 5 minutes. Though the lotion itself claims to be scentless, it does have a bit of artificial plastic-like smell to it. The lotion also leaves my hands relatively oily and since I have a sensitive face, I have to wash them right away.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: As soon as I put this stuff on it immediately burned and irritated my face and neck. Not sensitive or dry skin friendly.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: This brand of products competes easily with other name brand and more expensive products.  The quality and product is exceptional.  This product in particular is very moisture rich and will soothe any dry skin you might have.  I personally love to use this on my elbows, knees and for my kids to help with eczema.  This product comes in pretty large containers and lasts quite a while.  A little goes a long way.  This isn’t a greasy product and doesn’t have a scent.  It has a very buttery texture and soaks into the skin well.  SO happy with this product and we use daily in our house hold.✨ If you found this review helpful, please click the helpful button. ✨

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: I buy Cetaphil tubs by the boatload, or nearly. If someone has them on sale, I really stock up. All of us use it, especially during the winter. When an equivalent Amazon product came up, I grabbed it. At first I was put off by the fact that the Solimo moisturizer seems much waxier in the tub. It looks a bit bubbled and resists scooping with a definitely firm and waxy-seeming texture. The Cetaphil is much creamer and smoother. It takes several seconds longer for the Solimo to soak in, yet after both moisturizers sink in, neither is greasy and each seems to work just as well as the other.I’m assuming that the Solimo brand has more coconut oil, giving it the thicker consistency. I’m uploading pictures to show the Solimo just as you put it on, before it warms up and really starts to sink in, then pictures after showing that, even though it seems waxy, it actually leaves no greasy residue after it warms and is rubbed in.Having used Cetaphil cream for years, I believe the Solimo cream moisturizer is equivalent, even though it takes several seconds longer to soften and sink in.Let Amazon donate to your favorite charity! Use Amazon Smile (smile.amazon.com) when you order and Amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase. Check out how Amazon Smile works at https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/about/ref=smi_se_rspo_laas_aas. My shopping is donating to my favorite charity, Canines for Independence at no cost to me. Awesome!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: I'm very pleased with this Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, which is one of the better all-body moisturizing creams I have tried. This is a mid to heavier weight cream that comes in a large container, so I feel comfortable slathering this on my body like I would a lotion after a shower.  This works great on my calves/knees and my elbows, which get extremely dry and sensitive feeling, exp. after sun exposure. This has no added scent or color, and goes on smoothly and does not feel sticky or waxy at all. This has become my favorite go-to body cream for after showers, and I'd highly recommend.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: I have ridiculously dry and sensitive skin. Thankfully I've found certain skin products that are more skin sensitive conscious than others. This is one of those. I really like the consistency of this sensitive dry skin cream. It's very rich and thick. Gently fold the cream (before use) to make it fluffier, lighter, almost like a souffle whip. It's so easy to apply.This creamy cream is easily absorbed without leaving an oily residue. There is absolutely no fragrance either.This is a wonderful moisturizer that also happens to be sensitive to skin and fragrance free.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: Been using on my elbows for a week, and they are noticeably better.This is a heavy creme consistency, much thicker than lotion.  It is a little greasy upon application but is absorbed well.Very little scent.Used by a person with fairly sensitive skin and no reactions were observed.Because this is thick it is easy to transfer to small screw top container to bring with you.  A little goes a long way.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: As someone who lives in the midwest, I spend over half the year with disgustingly dry skin. So I'm always hunting for the next greatest moisturizer. This has its pros and cons. On the positive side, it is indeed incredibly moisturizing. There is no scent, and it doesn't irritate in the slightest. It is very thick and easy to apply. On the negative side, the consistency is like rubbery jello almost. Kind of weird. It absorbs quickly and well on dry areas, but I found that it didn't absorb as well in my hands - they were greasy for quite a long time after applying this. I was working at my home office desk when I first tried this, and had to go wash my hands as I was getting everything greasy!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: It's a bit "thick" and hard to get out which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.Once you have it though, it's not greasy, it has no scent, and seems to work well. I like to keep mine in the refrigerator, it makes it very refreshing at the end of the day!

product_name: Acne Treatment Cream With Secret TEA TREE OIL Formula - Perfect For Acne Scar Removal, Fighting Breakouts, Spots, Cystic Acne - See Results in Days Without Dry Skin (2oz)
review: After only one week of using this product my face has improved a great amount! The redness has gone down, the original acne have started to finally heal, and any new breakouts that started to resurface have been prevented from fully emerging by the next morning after putting this cream on overnight. The cream feels nice on your face and doesn’t sting like other acne fighting products often do.

product_name: Acne Treatment Cream With Secret TEA TREE OIL Formula - Perfect For Acne Scar Removal, Fighting Breakouts, Spots, Cystic Acne - See Results in Days Without Dry Skin (2oz)
review: Product causes an irritable tingling sensation the moment you put it on. It felt like it's working, but in reality it was irritating my skin and caused me to break out even worse on the applied areas. Just another useless acne product. Didn't even show signs of removing any blemishes after a week. If anything it made my blemishes even more red.

product_name: Acne Treatment Cream With Secret TEA TREE OIL Formula - Perfect For Acne Scar Removal, Fighting Breakouts, Spots, Cystic Acne - See Results in Days Without Dry Skin (2oz)
review: Best acne moisturizer I have ever used! It is very light weight and absorbs quickly into the skin. I have oily skin as it is and hate that heavy cream feeling that most moisturizers leave behind. This one doesn't do that. It helps control not only my adult acne but the redness & inflammation on my face. It even helps tone down acne scars. First purchase was for the 1oz jar and it lasted me a long time. A little tiny bit of cream goes a long way. I'm currently on my second jar, this time the 2oz jar, more product for the money. All in all very happy with this product!

product_name: Acne Treatment Cream With Secret TEA TREE OIL Formula - Perfect For Acne Scar Removal, Fighting Breakouts, Spots, Cystic Acne - See Results in Days Without Dry Skin (2oz)
review: I’m 26, and this is the BEST product I have ever issued! The pics I have are Just 2 weeks after using Keeva Acne Cream. I tried everything as a teenager, nothing worked. It just dried my skin out.Keeva not only smells good, and moisturizes, but it works so good!  I have acne scars and it has helped lighten them up, a lot!I highly recommend Keeva Organics to anyone.

product_name: Acne Treatment Cream With Secret TEA TREE OIL Formula - Perfect For Acne Scar Removal, Fighting Breakouts, Spots, Cystic Acne - See Results in Days Without Dry Skin (2oz)
review: It helps me very good. Love this product.

product_name: Acne Treatment Cream With Secret TEA TREE OIL Formula - Perfect For Acne Scar Removal, Fighting Breakouts, Spots, Cystic Acne - See Results in Days Without Dry Skin (2oz)
review: My skin turned against me around 2 years ago, but was it’s worst roughly 1 month ago. I have tried so much and researched until I came across Keeva and decided to take a leap of faith after reading reviews. I noticed improvement overnight, but when your skin is as bad as mine was, you notice every little thing. The first 24 hours I noticed that lesions were drying up and less inflamed. I started golden seal after 1 week of using Keeva and the two have cleared up my skin as well as healed scars. I still have a ways to go until I’m back to normal, but Keeva definitely helped me get there. The first two photos are before (obviously) and were hard to upload, but I told myself that someone needed to see just how bad my skin looked because theirs was just as bad or worse. I’ll be ordering again.

product_name: Acne Treatment Cream With Secret TEA TREE OIL Formula - Perfect For Acne Scar Removal, Fighting Breakouts, Spots, Cystic Acne - See Results in Days Without Dry Skin (2oz)
review: Short and sweet the only acne cream I've used that works for me! I have somewhat dry skin and acne its moisturizing enough clears my skin and feels tingly and relaxing ❤

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 3 Twice A Day Exfoliator Combination Oily, 16.5 Ounce
review: The best choice !!! I’m really happy with my purchase , bigger than I expected

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 3 Twice A Day Exfoliator Combination Oily, 16.5 Ounce
review: Update:: been using the product for couple of weeks already and my skin haven't been irritated or notice any bad difference. For sure the same and original product. THANKSJust open the bottle and it didnt have the peel off top which it's weird coming from a product like Clinique, went to grab my others toners from clinique as well to compare and the smell is very different!! Then i apply an amount on my hand of both products (the one I got from Amazon - the one I brought on the store) again the smell it's different very strong alcohol...!!Haven't try it on my face yet...Will give it a try and see what happens.Other than that it's a big bottle with the pump which it's great and easier.Will update review and starts if I see a difference :)

product_name: Yes To Tomatoes Daily Balancing Moisturizer for Clear Skin - Face Moisturizer Packed w/ Tomatoes, Watermelon Extract & Sweet Almond to Balance Skin | 1.7 fl ounce
review: I certainly have sensitive skin but I've never experienced a reaction like I experienced with this lotion today. I was excited for the lotion; I'd read good reviews, I stand being products that don't test on or use animals. However, within seconds my face burned and turned so red. I guess Yes ago Tomatoes turned me into a tomato... uploading pictures for examples.

product_name: Yes To Tomatoes Daily Balancing Moisturizer for Clear Skin - Face Moisturizer Packed w/ Tomatoes, Watermelon Extract & Sweet Almond to Balance Skin | 1.7 fl ounce
review: This moisturizer contains capsicum (red pepper) extract. It made my face red like a tomato and it burned as though I rubbed a hot pepper on my face. Web MD says that you shouldn't use capsicum on sensitive skin or near the eyes. This is unfortunately going in the garbage for me.

product_name: Yes To Tomatoes Daily Balancing Moisturizer for Clear Skin - Face Moisturizer Packed w/ Tomatoes, Watermelon Extract & Sweet Almond to Balance Skin | 1.7 fl ounce
review: Okay before I start this review. I use other products as well as this one. I will post pictures below as well as the other products I use. I really like this moisturizer, It doesn't leave my face oily like most do. It just helps with the dryness I have after I use acne washes or before I put on make up it helps with the dry skin before I put on foundation. It has a very light smell. It doesn't sink or smell good to me at least. A little goes a long way as well. I use it before bed time and my face is nice and soft. I really like this product and it will always be apart of my skin care regimen from now on. Granted, my skin isn't like bad acne. I have bad break outs from time to time, because the environment I work in is very dirty. I also get black heads and irritation. This moisturizer helps with all of that and the dryness I get. I have sensitive skin and doesn't irritate my skin at all. Hope this helps! :)I useSt Ives Coconut Oil scrubNoxema Deep clean cleanserSay Yes To Cotton Micellar waterSay Yes To Tomatoes clear skin moisturizer.

product_name: Yes To Tomatoes Daily Balancing Moisturizer for Clear Skin - Face Moisturizer Packed w/ Tomatoes, Watermelon Extract & Sweet Almond to Balance Skin | 1.7 fl ounce
review: Love this moisturizer , the first time I can say I found a moisturizer that isn’t greasy and still moisturizes my skin makes my face really soft and is easily absorbed will definitely purchase again .

product_name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Sheer Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Total Soy Complex and SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I tend to have naturally decent skin without breakouts. I do occasionally struggle with excess oily-ness. The picture included in this review is 100% unedited, bathroom lighting, no make-up, and no filters - to show my skin type.I am 28 years old and am starting to take an interest in anti-aging skin care. I routinely moisturize with this SPF 30 face cream in the mornings. This daily moisturizing lotion is light weight, applies easily, and adsorbs quickly. I have noticed less freckles and blotchy sun spots on my face since using this regularly.I will continue to use this product on a daily basis as part of my skin care routine. I will also continue to purchase it from Amazon as long as the pricing remains competitive to my local drug store.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Ultra Sensitive Skin Face Moisturizer Intense Soothing Care, Allergy Tested, 40ml
review: I received a broken empty bottled😒

product_name: Natural Organic Anti-Aging Face Cream Moisturizer, Vegan Non-Greasy Formula With Green Tea - The Sage Witch By Spirit Nest
review: I love my Sage Witch face cream! It's light, non-greasy formula is fast absorbing, and leaves my face and neck feeling tight and nourished, not to mention--  it smells wonderful! The natural fragrance is bright and fresh, and won't interfere with your make up, perfume or essential oils. This will be a regular buy! Thank you, Spirit Nest!

product_name: Natural Organic Anti-Aging Face Cream Moisturizer, Vegan Non-Greasy Formula With Green Tea - The Sage Witch By Spirit Nest
review: I love the way this product smells and feels. A little goes a long way and so far it has not irritated my skin. The company is very kind and responds quickly to questions.

product_name: Natural Organic Anti-Aging Face Cream Moisturizer, Vegan Non-Greasy Formula With Green Tea - The Sage Witch By Spirit Nest
review: My second time ordering.Overall great product! Nice consistency, good gentle odor, not too oily and absorb well.Have been using daily for a few weeks and order again.

product_name: Natural Organic Anti-Aging Face Cream Moisturizer, Vegan Non-Greasy Formula With Green Tea - The Sage Witch By Spirit Nest
review: This all natural face cream feels absolutely amazing on my skin. Smells great and is so refreshing. I love that it does not leave a greasy heavy feeling on my skin.

product_name: Natural Organic Anti-Aging Face Cream Moisturizer, Vegan Non-Greasy Formula With Green Tea - The Sage Witch By Spirit Nest
review: I am a huge fan of Spirit Nest and their products, specifically their soap.  Since my skin is so sensitive I have to be careful with the products I use.  So when they introduced this facial line I had to try it.  I’m so glad I did!  It truly feels amazing on my skin.  I will be ordering the eye cream as well.  At this time I have nothing negative to report about the face cream.  I’ve never had issues with their vegan soap so I don’t expect any with their facial products either.  (Their soap is wonderful with psoriasis!!!). Don’t second guess yourself just buy it!!!

product_name: Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion - Broad Spectrum SPF 30 - Moisturizes and Protects Sensitive, Dry Skin - 4 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: My product when I first got it was ruined ,but Amazon promptly send me a replacement and an apology. I'm happy for the great customer service.This face lotion is my favorite go-to. I found that it works best with my combination skin compared to more expensive brands. My skin has been noticeable more clear and soft with continued use of this moisturizer

product_name: Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion - Broad Spectrum SPF 30 - Moisturizes and Protects Sensitive, Dry Skin - 4 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Per FDA warning, avoid using this as it contains Ensulizole 2%, Octinoxate 7.5%, Octisalate 4.5%, besides the Titanium Oxide 2.4% and Zinc Oxide 4.8%.  You don’t see the other chemicals on the back, just (“UVA/UVB” sunscreens including zinc oxide and titanium oxide).  You have to peel the back sticker to see the full “Drug Fact information”.  See the picture taken.

product_name: Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion - Broad Spectrum SPF 30 - Moisturizes and Protects Sensitive, Dry Skin - 4 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: I really like this product, i have very sensitive skin and i had zero reaction to this sunscreen. But one thing you should take into consideration  is that it does leaves a white cast unless you really work it into your skin but other then that my skin feels very moisturized

product_name: Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion - Broad Spectrum SPF 30 - Moisturizes and Protects Sensitive, Dry Skin - 4 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Product works great. However, I was disappointed with how it arrived to me..look at pictures attached. I lost a lot of my product because somehow the pumper became loose and opened.

product_name: Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion - Broad Spectrum SPF 30 - Moisturizes and Protects Sensitive, Dry Skin - 4 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: I buy this religiously. Lightweight, keeps skin from drying out has spf 30.  Prime packaging was insufficient as container was dented - see pic - but no spillage - this time.

product_name: Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion - Broad Spectrum SPF 30 - Moisturizes and Protects Sensitive, Dry Skin - 4 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: The brush seems to work fine, but my issue is that upon opening the package for the first time I noticed everything was covered in bits of dark brown crumbs.. it's discomforting to imagine what they are and how they ended up inside of the packaging.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: Holy Batman!!!  I have been experiencing adult acne and signs of a little wear and tear ( being 40 years young and all) and I have found that this product is working amazingly well.  My skin is softer and most of my wrinkles have already softened in appearance and my acne scars are also completely faded. My skin tone  looks more even and the best part is that the product is Very lightweight and works well on my sensitive skin without any problems!!  Fragance is light and not heavy even during daytime wear and it does not worsen my oily "T"  zone.  I've been looking for a product like this for a very long time! I give it a complete 10. Completely pleased.  Thank you Jezzuuusss....

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I am 53 years old and I have NEVER worn a morning & night moisturizer. 🤷🏻‍♀️ I have been chronically ill for almost 7 years. I felt so horrible that I barely got out of bed, let along put moisturizer and makeup on.... then fix my hair. have been using this Retinol Cream for a while now. I love the way it gently wakes my skin wake up and leaves a shimmering face ready to put makeup on. This Retinol product not only has Retinol, but it also has a list of amazing products that help with firming, exfoliating, anti-aging, toning your skin, and fading dark spots from pregnancy or aging. I have dark spots and adult acne that I use this on. They are looking amazing.my goal is to try to love healthy again. Using good products, taking good supplements and work on your food. Keto is actually working for me without any exercise. I want to take 20 or maybe ten years off my face..

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I was so surprised by the amount of product I received for the price. Has a very thick, creamy texture that absorbs completely and leaves the skin feeling so soft. A little goes a long way.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: This Artulano Retinol Moisturizer Cream is wonderful! It feels nice on your skin, not greasy. It has a light fragrance. It definitely helps reduce lines and wrinkles. Also, so good for you hands! In the ad it shows a small bottle, the bottle is much larger. Great value for the money. Would definitely recommend!

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: Hello, today I start using this wonderful product that I have read a lot of news about and news always talking very well.  I am happy to start using it and hope that I have fantastic results as I have always seen. Thank you.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I was skeptical about this product but I was so surprised! It moisturizes my skin really well without making it feel greasy - which is a must with my oily skin. It absorbs super fast to. I also like using this on my hands and other areas in addition to my face - works great all over!

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I like this product.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: One of my friends from gymnastics  recommended this cream to me. She said, that's not expensive and she happy with it.I ordered too, and you know what...I failed in love with it. Cream moisturized ,bsorbed well in skin and feels soft and pleasant.  Definitely best for the price.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I just got this today so I’m not sure how it works for firming, I will update when I find out. The moisturizing is amazing! There is really no smell. I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: Loving it so far! It's a nice sized bottle! It's doesn't have a strong odor and I love that! It made my skin soft but not greasy feeling!!

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I’ve had this moisturizer for a week now and I’m already loving it. It’s not thick or greasy and has no scent. Can’t wait for the result.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: A fairly decent product but to pricey for the results

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: Love this product, leaves my face smooth, looking refreshed and healthy. No mess, no perfume, not greasy. It’s absorbed by your skin.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I really like the way this moisturizer feels on my skin. I love the dispenser. There's no mess. A lot of products are made but doesn't seem like enough thought is put into the product container. This has a nice dispenser. I haven't used it long enough to know if it's firming or not. But it does make my skin feel softer. And I have little dry spots that started on my face a few months ago that this has helped.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I’ve used this for about a week now. I like that it’s pretty scent free. It’s a nice I like the bottle and the dispenser, it lets out just a small amount at a time so there’s no wasting it. The texture is soft and smooth and it goes on the same. My skin feels soft without feeling greasy. I like it very much!

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: This cream feels very silky and smooth to the touch.  A tiny dab of this goes a long way.  This works well for moisturizing dry skin and is a great value due to the fact that you need very little.  I am unable to smell any scent in this. This came with a coupon to also get one free.

product_name: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream for Face - Eyes & Neck Area - Day & Night Facial Cream with 3% Active Retinol Hyaluronic Acid - Firming Anti Wrinkle Cream for Women and Men - 3.4 oz (3.4 FL OZ)
review: I bought this for my mom for Mother's Day. So far she's been really happy using this product more than her actual hundred plus dollar one's she's bought in the past.It came in on the day it was suppose to. It was covered by original packaging, bubble wrap, and the secure coverage plastic, ensuring that it has not been used.

product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer & Night Cream for Sunburn Relief Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure, Face Lotion, Eczema Cream, Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women 8 oz
review: Didn’t try the lotion, it might be good, but container arrived in what looked like used condition despite the seal on the jar. The threads of the lid and container were caked with discolored cream, looking very dirty, so I opted to return instead of trying it. It’s possible the lid rusted and caused this, but I wasn’t willing to chance it.

product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer & Night Cream for Sunburn Relief Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure, Face Lotion, Eczema Cream, Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women 8 oz
review: I like the lotion. It does moisturize well with minimal scent. It arrived quite banged up.... I had to transfer it to another container. Shipping must've been a bit rough.

product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer & Night Cream for Sunburn Relief Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure, Face Lotion, Eczema Cream, Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women 8 oz
review: I live in a part of Florida that has hard water so it used to dry out my face, but this Alie Butter keeps my face moisturized and has my skin looking great!!!

product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer & Night Cream for Sunburn Relief Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure, Face Lotion, Eczema Cream, Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women 8 oz
