product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer & Night Cream for Sunburn Relief Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure, Face Lotion, Eczema Cream, Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women 8 oz
review: Me agrado la textura lo hidrating de la crema.

product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer & Night Cream for Sunburn Relief Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure, Face Lotion, Eczema Cream, Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women 8 oz
review: When I noticed my husband's hands, arms, and elbows were drier than the desert in which we live here in Arizona, I decided to look for a cream for him that wouldn't make him grumble and complain that it made him feel greasy and "girlie." On faith, after reading the product info and noting that it had 100% organic aloe, I bought two large jars of this product. I immediately loved the cocoa butter scent when I opened it. I gave one jar to him, and I kept the other for myself. Wonder of wonders, he loves it! Even more amazing is that he's using it. I also love it, and  I'm using it under my makeup before I put on foundation. It's quite the wonderful product, and if the prices don't rise unfairly over time, I may have to permanently add this cream to my repertoire of beauty products. If you knew me, you'd know that means I will use it loyally for years to come if it continues to impress me and doesn't become cost-prohibitive. I do wish the labeling on the jar was easier to read, but all in all, Five stars!

product_name: Glo Skin Beauty Oil Free Moisturizer for Oily Skin , 1.7 Fl Oz
review: The tall skinny one with a push applicator ( on the right) is what I already had and was trying to order more of. The one on the left is what arrived though what was on the right was pictured. It may be the same product ( i hope) but the packaging is totally diff

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: Watch out for the ingredients in this product. They do not match what is on the website, nor do they match the photo another person posted of their box. I put this product on today after a shower and within an hour I was having an allergic reaction. After checking the box I found the list to be different and had an additive I’m allergic to. I believe this is the American formulation of the product as the chemical I can’t use is banned in Japan.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: This is NOT about the product itself - but about how it came. It looks like it was dug our if someone’s handbag after having been there for a couple of years banging around amidst keys, loose change, and the earth’s weathering forces. It was even taped up with poster tape. Come on!!! UPDATE: the replacement came to me and it’s in the same shape as the previous one! But this one has exactly 1/2 of its film on it. The box is banged up. Ridiculous!!!

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: My skin looks so beautiful after using this moisturizer and I stay moisturized all day. I’ve been using this plus other products to help my acne. Current picture is probably after a month of using it. Mind you I’m clearing up terrible acne from pregnancy +my already acne prone skin. I had  CLUSTERS of pimples all around my eyebrows, pimples spread out over my forehead, and new clusters of pimples spreading to my jawline and neck before using this product. It didn’t do all this work alone but it helps my skin look fabulous after my skin care routine.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: Nice feel, apply after cleanse with damp skin. A little goes a long way and skin looks plumped up!  I added pictures with all box information couldn't find the ingredients when I was buying Amazon.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: A picture can speak louder than words ....I have been using Hado Labo for the last decade ...I am presently 70 years old !!!I love it !!!

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: Love this to wear under moisturizer at night and sunscreen during the day. Love love love this. Cant wait to try other products. This was recommended by a dermatologist Youtuber i follow. Sadly after using this for a month i think in allergic to something in it. Ive gotten small sores around my neck and chest. My face is fine. They product is amazing. I dont want to stop using it but i have to.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: This is like gold to me! I’m 49 years old and use this right after I wash my face to lock in the water and boy does it do the job!! You need this! Buy it. You won’t be sorry.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: It is a good moisturizer and it plumps my skin. Using this makes my skin look healthy. It’s a bit sticky so you have to allow time for the product to be absorbed into your skin before you apply your next product.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I’ve been using this product for 2 weeks now, day and night. And This product didn’t work for me and it was highly recommended. 😔

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: The seal came broken. How to believe it’s an unused/untouched product? I do not live here and I cannot even return it as I cannot go to the post. Disappointed

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: Item delivered and the lid of the container was scratched, appeared that the item had previously opened and brown stains on the bottom of the box the item was in.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I have been using this cream/gel daily for a week now on my face under my moisturizer to give my skin some extra hydration as this winter has been very dry here in Colorado. I can say I definitely feel a difference in my skin when I use it vs. when I don't. The formula feels really nice on the skin. It is light yet a little does go a long way. My skin tends to hold onto moisture longer when I have this on but unfortunately it doesn't last 24 hours like it claims for me. About 8 or so hours after applying it I feel like I need to re-hydrate my skin, but for the climate I'm in and my skin type, I feel like it still is doing a lot for me. I have also experienced some very mild stinging after applying this, no redness or anything, but it was slightly irritating to me the first few times using it.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: The one I got from Amazon.com contains - water, hydroxyethyl urea, butylene glycol, glycerin, pentylene glycol, PEG/PPG/polybutylene glycol-8/5/3 glycerin, squalane, triethylhexanoin, ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP copolymer, agar, alpha-glucan, arginine, camellia sinensis leaf extract, chlorphenesin, citric acid, dimethicone, disodium EDTA, glucosyl ceramide, hydrolyzed collagen (marine), hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, phenoxyethanol, sodium acetylated hyaluronate, sodium citrate, sodium hyaluronate, triethyl citrateWhich is also fine, I just find it weird they don't update the ingredients list. However, this product is insanely amazing, It hydrates your skin extremely well. Definitely will be rebuying when I run out.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I will update on how I like the product. This is more for people concerned about the UREA. I wanted to get the cream with urea, because I read on simplyskincareaddiction that it’s good for melazzia (spelling) aka fungal acne. This product as of 10/17/2018 HAS urea. The ingredients in the amazon description does now have it listed but it does have it on the box I got.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I love this product... it is sticky at first but I do put on a small but of a daily cream on my face over it. It does well under my foundation. And my skin has never looked so good.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I really love this Hada Labo cream. It absorbs so nicely and doesn't feel greasy or oily. I've been using it for a few weeks with my regular routine and have noticed an improvement with the overall elasticity and firmness of my skin! I would definitely recommend.However, I was disappointed with the integrity of the brand box it arrived in. It was torn at the corners as if it had been opened, and taped back shut with basic scotch tape. Since the cream doesnt come with a plastic seal securing the lid to the jar, I skeptical about the authenticity of the cream.I did return the first one, and the second came quickly, but in the same condition- albeit slightly better. I decided to take my chances as I realize this product IS imported and shipping can be rough on packages, but torn is different from crushed, and taped back shut looks really sketchy.TL;DRProduct is great. Box was damaged enough (probably? from shipping) to question integrity of product. Took chance, Happy with results. Would buy again.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I started a daily regimin of CeraVe hydrating facial cleanser, naked squalane oil, this product, and CeraVe moisturizing cream, based on my dermatologists recommendation for my 33 year old acne-prone skin. Wow my complexion cleared up fast!!! I am not sure which one product can be credited, or if it was all of them working in harmony, but these photos are a week apart. A month later, my skin is still doing amazing.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I don't know if I've been using this long enough to know exactly how well it works. However, I definitely do notice my face feels smoother and moisturised. I'm not sure if I'll purchase it again because it's quite a small amount for a high price. However this brand is well-known and quite worth it. I definitely think it's a good gel cream moisturizer. It kind of has a sticky feel to it but it absorbs pretty quickly. I recommend people trying it at least once.

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: I was so excited to try this product, but when it arrived today I opened the box to find a dirty product box and dirty product. The product’s box not only felt grimy, but it was also torn. See picture. When I took out the bottle, there were black dirt stains on it, which actually might be skid/scratch marks because when I tried to wipe it off, it wouldn’t come off. See picture. THEN when I opened the bottle the inner lid popped out and it extremely messy. AND only about half the bottle was full. See pictures. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING!!! Definitely returning. I’m unsure if this was tampered with/used. Ugh!

product_name: Hada Labo Tokyo Skin Plumping Gel Cream 1.76 Fl Oz - with Super Hyaluronic Acid & Collagen - 24 Hour Moisture & visible Line Plumping Fragrance & Paraben Free Non-Comedogenic (Packaging May Vary)
review: Sorry the pic isn't better-just tried to show the smoothness,  but I am no Giselle!I am giving just 4 stars because I have just started using, and I don't really see a "magical" improvement in fine lines. I am 47 and live and die by my spf and moisturizer, so  if you grew up as a sun worshipper, you are probably screwed by my age anyway.I have pretty extensive training in makeup and airbrush from the best, so  this is what works for me.  I use a light application of oil-free  foundation...but, the trick is to mix it with everything first. Add a small dab of the gel cream on the back of your hand, mix with a good dab of a moisturizing, double duty sunscreen. I use the Olay Radiant Glow for moisture and a little of the Loreal Silky Sheer for the higher SPF and just because it really is silky. I also use a drop of foundation  to even my skin tone and a dab of primer (Elf works well because it is cheap and has a convenient pump). It sounds like a lot of product but... It is about the size of a nickel on the back of the hand.  Next swirl this around with your fingertip really well.  It will warm up and combine right there.  Once it combines it looks a little wet and like a LOT of liquid is going on your face, but remember, it is very little color and you are going to cover your neck, to your ears, and blend in to any exposed decolletage.  It take a good 30 seconds to absorb, but it is still faster, once you start doing this, than doing all these steps separately.  Once the initial application is completed, you will have a baby-smooth canvas to apply makeup to. You can apply additional foundation my fuller coverage without piling. You can apply additional sunscreen if you are worried about burning, or another application of moisturizer.  If you use a good spray setter this will also help hold the moisture in a little longer than just a powder, which will set your makeup but can be drying.  I hope this helps. I also experienced the "pilling" wgen I first got the gel and this is how I solved the problem.

product_name: Skinceuticals  Daily Moisturize Pore-minimizing Moisturizer For Normal Or Oily Skin, 60 ml / 2 fl oz
review: I have used this same moisturizer for a year.  I got this product on Amazon and my face started breaking out.  Also the paint on the lid to the jar is coming off.  Didnt happen with the other jars I have purchased from medical spa.  Last time I buy this type of product on amazon

product_name: Skinceuticals  Daily Moisturize Pore-minimizing Moisturizer For Normal Or Oily Skin, 60 ml / 2 fl oz
review: Love the cream.  I have used this cream for years and love it.  However, the order I just received from Express Health, Lexington KY is a little dicey.  The box had been obvioiusly cut open, and the package appeared to be sealed on the back side of the box instead of the front.  I don't trust it and will NEVER order from Express Health again.  Not sure what to do with the questionable product as it came with no invoice or other material in the packaging.

product_name: Simple Hydrating Light Moisturizer, 4.2 Ounce
review: Received it today and both moisturizers are torn open and squeezed in the box. Literally looks like it was done on purpose. What a joke

product_name: First Aid Beauty Skin Rescue Daily Face Cream, 2 oz
review: Received completely the wrong product!!! FAB has two daily face creams. I wanted the skin rescue version (in the red bottle) - thos one is the 'regular version' in the blue bottle. Returning.

product_name: First Aid Beauty Skin Rescue Daily Face Cream, 2 oz
review: While I have used this brand many times and many different products they make, this was the first red clay product I tried. I have really sensitive skin and have weird reactions to a lot of skincare products. I was hoping everything from this brand would help my skin without a reaction. Wrong! There is squalene in this product, which is what I am hypothesizing caused the reaction! I compared ingredient lists from other products that have not caused a reaction, squalene was the first difference and was contained in other brands that I had issues with. This moisturizer caused horrible pimples on my forehead and blood blisters behind my ear.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: By 3 in 1 I mean it moisturizes, tints, and protects your skin from the sun.Okay, so I’m on accutane currently and my skin is incredibly dry and sensitive. I want to make sure I’m protecting my skin but I don’t want to look greasy from classic looking sunscreen. I heard about this product from dr. dray on YouTube and my dermatologist. It has clean ingredients and will actually protect your skin for mild sun days.My bb cream hasn’t been working and spreading right because my skin is too dry but this stuff, let me tell you, works perfectly as a bb cream and moisturizer! Just make sure you powder it some after applying.It’s light coverage but it blends out my skin tone and smooths out small blemishes. It makes my skin not look as dead.I HIGHLY suggest trying this out if you’re looking for a good tinted moisturizing sunscreen.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I will be stocking up. It works great as a sunscreen as well as covering some redness that I usually have. I put it on after my moisturizer and for casual days or just doing errands I don't even put on foundation because this blurs those red imperfections I have. But doesn't mask my skin and make it so I have to put some color back into it with blush.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: When it comes to choosing a sunscreen, it is between mineral/physical blocks and chemical blocks. Each offer pros and cons, and it comes down to what works best for your life style, your skin and what other needs you are trying to gain from it.  I like mineral sunscreens, and most work well for me because I have fair skin tone and the white cast isn't too noticeable. Many of the tinted mineral sunscreens attempt to lessen the white cast but still leave a hint of a white cast- again mostly fine for me but it leaves out a lot of other skin tones. Usually ones needs a chemical sunscreen to avoid the white cast, and need a chemical sunscreen for more options in using an SPF that is hydrating and/or tinted. But not everyone tolerates chemical sunscreens. Conundrum!My sensitive skin (non acne rosacea) prefers a mineral sunscreen. I tend to keep my day time skin care simple, and since sunscreen is the most important thing no matter the season, I prefer to use one that can double as a moisturizer.  This light coverage tint makes me feel a little more polished. I can tell there is a little tint but it is super sheer.The CeraVe HYDRATING tinted mineral sunscreen has a broad spectrum SPF of 30. It has a sheer tint that initially appears a tad dark and orangey against my fair pink toned skin. I applied it both on my forearm as well as on my face. True to form, this formula blended seamlessly into my skin. Any off coloring dissipated shortly after application. It is most noticeable on my forearm so I included pics of it being applied, just as it was spread on, and then after it absorbed. Most importantly, I am not noticing ANY white cast. Not sure how dark of skin tone one can go before it appears too light, but if the seemingly darker color is absorbing into my skin, then perhaps it works similarly to those further along in color spectrum? My skin is super light, pink based, and this does add a touch of warm color but not so much that it looks too dark.Additionally, what I really like it that my skin feels hydrated and slightly dewy. Not greasy. Not covered in sunscreen. My skin leans dry, so I definitely like this. Love that it contains skin barrier protecting ceramides (helps hold skin together by forming a protective layer that limits moisture loss and protects against visible damage from pollution and other environmental stressors) as well as niacinamide (a water-soluble vitamin that works with the natural substances in your skin to help visibly improve enlarged pores, uneven skin tone, fine lines and wrinkles, dullness, and a weakened surface).  Allergy tested  Fragrance-free  Paraben-free  Oil-free  Non-comedogenic  Suitable for sensitive skin  Gentle on the skinI found that I can apply it after my typical skin care routine (hydrating toners, moisturizer, then this), OR just this as my only skin care. I have tried it under powder make up as well as a liquid. It plays well with both. No pilling on my end. I love CeraVe so I am stoked that this has been so good for me.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: Review of:  CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid OunceThere are really two aspects to this sunscreen that I think most people will be interested in reading about, the first is the actual sunscreen capabilities and the second is the ‘tint’ of the sunscreen.First things, first.A few years ago my skin no longer tolerated some (which one I don’t know)  of the chemicals that many of the big-box store sunscreens contained.  You know what I’m talking about, Avobenzone, Homosalate , Octisalate … all those ingredients.  So, I switched over to zinc/titanium products or, at least, as much as I could.  With Titanium dioxide at 5.5% and Zinc oxide at 10% the CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen (SPF 30) fits my sunscreen needs really well.I was surprised how well this sunscreen, especially compared to almost every other zinc oxide/titanium dioxide sunscreen, blended into my sky; and I’ve tried a few.  No more rubbing and rubbing and rubbing with CerVe, a few quick swirls and the screen had absorbed into my skin.  After being in the sun for a few hours while out walking, I can say that the SPF pieced of the product worked as well as any other, or better, than any other Zinc/Titanium I’ve used before.  Easy rub in, good protection … you can’t ask for much more.Now, moving on to the tinted portion of the sunscreen.  When I first opened the container and looked at the product I thought it might be a little too dark for my very light skin.  It turns out it really wasn’t overly dark for my skin tone.I then decided to do an experiment and let my beard stubble grow out a little bit.  Why?  Because with most Zinc/Titanium brands the whiteness of the sunscreen would make my stubble go from a greyish color to a ‘Santa Claus white beard’ look.  Look at my attached pictures and you, hopefully, will see what I mean.  With the CeraVe tinted sunscreen though, the added color of the tint helped the stubble look a little more natural.  Not a lot, mind you, but enough so the stubble blended in a did not stand out.I was pleased with the results.Keep in mind that a 1.7 fluid ounce bottle is really small and for roughly $16 (the price in late December as I write this review) you won’t get much product for the price.  Still, if the price isn’t a consideration, this is a really high-quality product that you would enjoy having and using.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I had trouble finding something that didn’t dry my face, coagulate with makeup or left a white mess. I was using the Neutrogena face spf but thought to try this moisturizing tinted one and glad I did!!!Pic 1) Cera Ve alone from tube 2) spread on skin 3) completely massages into skin 4) Cera Ve side by side with Glossier skin tint for my face 5) Cera Ve and Glossier mixed - great combo. It actually gives more coverage together, I’d say light to medium. The Cera Ve is thick and a lot goes a long way so you don’t need much and it’s just fine on its own and not drying. Holds up through the day pretty well. I’m thinking with most spf you might need to apply more depending on the activity of the day

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I have a pretty fair complexion and sensitive (dry) skin. Overall I like this product it adds a nice tint and makes me look a little tanner. I found this product a little oily. I think if you suffer from really oily skin it might make you look too shiny. It hasn’t broken me out, so I would say it is good for people with sensitive skin who actively break out. The thing I am most disappointed about is when I got it there was like BARELY any product in the bottle (mostly air). I already had to really squeeze hard to get the product out. Don’t know if I will repurchase this, it was good but not worth it for the amount of product given

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: Let me start by saying I LOVE CERAVE, almost every single piece of my skincare routine is cerave. Being at home more means i wanted something to blend my skintone without putting anything on it that could cause problems. This said sheer but it was a dark orange. It was extremely sticky and doesn't blend well unfortunately.  I am going back to the CeraVe AM like usual until i find the next product to try. This is so dark (see pic included) and so sticky it stays on my mind

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I am so pleased with sunscreen. It leaves no white cast and adds a nice glow if you don’t want to blend it well. It is NOT ORANGE, like the older formula which I didn’t like. It’s moisturizing and in my opinion one of the best sunscreens on the market. All Cerave products are fantastic for people with allergies or sensitivities to fragrance. I love the color of the tint which can look so nice on the skin. HURRAH!  for Cerave!👍👍

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I was kinda skeptical bc literally EVERYTHING Irritates my face. I have extremely dry sensitive skin. I even have eczema around the borders of my face. This sunscreen is great. I glowy and it gives you a really nice subtle fake tan. If you have oily skin I’m not sure you would like this bc it does have a bit of an oily feel at first but if you have dry skin like me this is amazing! Amazing ingredients, Doesn’t clog my pores and gives me a beautiful summery glow!

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: The bb cream/sunscreen was just the right rint for my shade of light skin.  It wears all day with no itch or patchiness.  Comes in 1.7 oz squeeze tube.  A little bit goes a long way.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I’m sure the sunscreen works great, I’m a fan of many cerave products, but it is EXTREMELY orange against my skin. I have a pale complexion and it looks ridiculous on me.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: Good product

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: It looks like someone opened it and used some, I don’t feel comfortable putting this on my face if it has been opened.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I have a medium skin tone with combo oily/dry and minimal texture.The color of this sunscreen is pretty nice, it's a medium tan shade that is very neutral. A lot of tinted sunscreens I've tried are sooo pink. This one is not too bad. If they came out with more yellow tinted shades that'd be awesome.Applies well, sinks in decently well after a bit of working it in. Leaves a slightly dewy look to the skin with a slight cast. The cast and dewyness goes away after a few minutes though and sets to a very natural finish. I think this could work with a variety of skin tones but would likely work *best* on light to medium/tan skin tones.  Deeper skin tones may still experience a bit of a cast.This sunscreen offers little coverage. It minimally evens out the skin but I wouldn't recommend it if you're someone that is looking for coverage. I don't normally wear foundation so it works well for me.It comes with about 50ml of product which I think is becoming pretty common for more cosmetic type of sunscreen. No detectable scent though! Super plus.Overall I think it's pretty nice, especially if you prefer mineral sunscreens. I think I still prefer my Korean sunscreens to this one, but I'd still consider this a solid pick if you're looking for a nice daily sunscreen!Hope this review has been helpful!:)

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: The tan color doesn't completely blend in with my skin tone, but the more I spread it out, the less obvious it becomes. Maybe CeraVe should offer more colors? It's actually not that bad and beats the typical white cream. This sunscreen doesn't feel too greasy or lumpy. It spreads across the skin well similar to lotions.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: When first applied there is a pinkish cast that goes away in about 20 minutes in my skin color.  It is a bit greasy, specially around my mouth but nothing I couldn’t deal with.  I live in Florida so this will 100% be my winter sunscreen because I would turn into an oily mess with this in the summer. I tried it under a matte foundation and that looked great (Fenty 310). First 2 pictures is in my bathroom, 3rd in natural light, 4th a hour later in natural light (only sunscreen on in all the pictures)

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I like how it feels on my skin. The formula is very hydrating. I don’t feel like it has adequate sun protection though. I applied the sunscreen and waited 15 minutes then I was outside for around an hour and I still got burned. Maybe I’ll save it for rainy days.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: I just applied this sunscreen and so far it seems easy to spread however I will comeback to update as how my skin react to this product. I didn’t like the fact that it came with no seal and seemed an open product it was pretty much empty. So sad

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: The texture of this sunscreen is incredibly smooth and there is no hint of oiliness. At the same time, it is not drying.For very fair skin, I have to disagree with the other reviewers who say that the tint blends away completely — hours later, there is definitely still a bronze tone left behind wherever I apply the sunscreen. This isn’t a terrible feature and I definitely want to try this out more on my legs when summer comes, but I have no interest in making my face look orange in the winter.

product_name: CeraVe Tinted Sunscreen with SPF 30 | Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen With Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide | Sheer Tint for Healthy Glow | 1.7 Fluid Ounce
review: This is a really good mineral sunscreen. I like how it feels when I put it on. It isn’t heavy at all. It’s lightweight and not greasy. It blends in well with my complexion and doesn’t make me look like a ghost like some sunscreens do. It also doesn’t show on your skin if you’ve been sweating. The only thing I will add is, I have friends with darker complexions and it was noticeable on their skin. It doesn’t blend in and become invisible.

product_name: Skin MD Natural Shielding Lotion  for Face and Body  - Relief for Eczema and Psoriasis Face moisturizer, Primer, Works on Rosacea Safe for Kids for all Skin Types (8oz -2 Pack)
review: I have used this lotion before. The pharmacy where I had previously bought it was sold and I was unable to find it to buy. I was excited to find it on Amazon especially at such a good price!!! I took before and after of just one use. The first photo was before the second was the after. You can already see a difference. Not only do I have sensitive skin I also have a very sensitive sense of smell. Which makes it very difficult to find a lotion that not only helps my dry skin but doesn't bother my sense of smell. I have Fibromyalgia which makes the feel of  most lotions bother me. Skin MD doesn't have a strong odor, it works great to heal my dry skin and best of all it soaks right into my skin it doesn't leave a heavy oily or sticky feeling the way most lotions do!!! I highly recommend this lotion!!!

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: First time using this product and I find that it is very light and not greasy. Little to no scent and easily absorbed into skin. So far I really like it and I will continue to use. As a 53 year old lady I am always looking for good quality  skin care at an Afordable price.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: The product goes on nicely and smells decent. Upon looking st the ingredients I noticed one thing was missing..... the hyaluronic acid...? Hmmm kinda dodgey.... the main reason I wanted the moisturizer was because of the HA ingredient but to my surprise it’s not even in the product formula? The false advertising makes me mad.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I love these products. I got a lot of compliments from my friends and family. Highly recommended...

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I use this moisturizer at night with my facial regime. There isn’t much of a scent to it. It is very moisturizing after I put on my serum. Its lightweight & soaks into my skin with the result of feeling smooth & soft. It enhances a feeling of freshness.  I have oily to combo skin & it works great. I love how it includes hyaluronic acid which is so beneficial to our skin. I’m very happy I choose to try this out. I believe you will feel the same!

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: This face cream is great. It has a nice light scent , applies on easily  with a non greasy feel . I'll have to try it more for a few weeks to see any results.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: My face feels amazing ! I apply this every nite before I go to bed I also use vitamin c during the day which I also purchased through tree life ...

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I use skin lotions and serums 4-6 times a day. I am pleased with this retinol . I am a retired Facial Plastic Surgeon.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I love this stuff. The oump is great. It is lightweight and absorbs really well.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: This facial moisturizer is lightweight and non-greasey. My skin is glowing! I plan to purchase more products from tree of life beauty.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I liked the lightness on the skin and no oily residue.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: Awesome moisturizer

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: 3 days only 3 days I can see my skin ton getting better more shiny and the fine line that help a lots! 5 stars and will be more and more 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: El producto es muy agradable al tacto y fácilmente dispersable. La humectación es muy buena.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: Super lightweight!

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I use it as a night cream

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I just got this today and the pump is missing! Part of it is stuck up in the cap. How disappointing. It was a gift  and it’s totally useless.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I have been using this product just shy of a month! I like to wait 30 day's too see how my skin will turn over(cell turn over, which takes normally 30 day's!) I love this product! My skin, neck and yes I use on my hands, look so nice and soft! My skin is very sensitive, I had no adviser reaction whatsoever! I have noticed a huge difference in using 2 of their products! I use this and their  Vitamin C Serum! Between the both of them I couldn't be happier with the look and feel of my skin! Next on my list is their scar product!I apply each product 2-3 times a day, depending on the heat(I wash my face when it's hot and stick out, too prevent any breakouts) ! I love that they actually print a 20% off coupon on my next order, right on my bottle! No more losing codes, or pressed for Time before the coupon expires ! They also enclosed a postcard size list of their products, so I can look and see what's on my list next! A huge plus is it is made in the USA!There is no sticky, thick or oily feel on my skin! I have noticed a HUGE difference in a few fine lines, that had drive me crazy! It's a good size bottle, compared too other's that are half the size and cost 2-3times as much!  It's for all skin types , which takes the guess work out! I really have nothing bad too say about This product! For some reason I felt like I needed to spend well into the $100.00 for a product that has basically the same ingredients! Main thing is the Retinol and the hyaluronic acid!  The picture is after I have applied!I may have received this product at a discount rather in exchange for my honest review!

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: Just opened the packaged... And.. pumped it for a very very long time.. opened up the bottle and turned out there's no straw for the pump. I don't want to have to keep digging in there with my pinky or shaking it out... Unfortunate. Was extremely excited to try this product.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: My skin has changed a lot over the last year and  i've gone through a dozen different products trying to find the best one. I found tree of life retinol moisturizer with hyaluronic acid  and decided to give it a try based on all of the positive reviews. I am completely in awe of this moisturizer. The package says to give it a month before you notice results but for me, within 72 hours I noticed a HUGE difference in the lines around my mouth. Tree  of life has definitely found a customer for life. I'm just sorry I didn't find them sooner.

product_name: Retinol Moisturizer Face Cream - Clinical Strength Anti Aging Cream
review: I've just started using this moisturizer and like it so far.  Haven't had redness that some others report but I don't use it every day.  I'm using it at night before going to bed and sometimes use it after I derma roll.

product_name: Paula's Choice RESIST Daily Hydrating Fluid Face Moisturizer SPF 50, UVA & UVB Protection, Chamomile & Vitamin E, Sunscreen for Oily Skin, 2 Ounce
review: Great product!!! I use this before I put in my foundation. It's a great sunscreen base does not dry out your skin and is perfect for sensitive skin. Would recommend!!

product_name: Ambi Skincare Soft & Even Creamy Oil Lotion, 12 Ounce
review: Not sure when they discontinued the moisturizer because I've been using all things Ambi for years but this is a good alternative. Its alot bigger and I only use it on my face and neck. Works well under makeup and doesn't bother my oily skin, it also smells great!

product_name: Ambi Skincare Soft & Even Creamy Oil Lotion, 12 Ounce
review: My lotion arrived damaged. The pumped was pushed in during delivery or packaging. Immediate refund issued. I still gave the lotion five stars because it is as described and I feel the delivery issue shouldn’t affect the sellers ratings.May 24, 2020 just received my second bottle of lotion. Arrived in perfect condition. Pump works just fine and the lotion is as described. My skin is soft and the moisture sticks. Love it..

product_name: Ambi Skincare Soft & Even Creamy Oil Lotion, 12 Ounce
review: I received this product opened

product_name: Ambi Skincare Soft & Even Creamy Oil Lotion, 12 Ounce
review: I bought this skin cream/lotion to compliment a fading cream made by the same company. Overall the product leaves my skin soft and smooth. The scent is a deal breaker for me. It is very strong and overly perfumey. If it came in an unscented version I would purchase it again. The only other complaint I have is that I had to order this twice (the second was a replacement) because the pump was broken off on BOTH bottles. The first package (shown) was a standard box with no bubble wrap or other packing material. The replacement came in a single padded envelope. The pump was broken off inside the envelope. Better packing could prevent this.

product_name: ProDNA Paris Hilton Skincare Face & Decolletage Cream - Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream with Aloe Vera Water for Face, Neck - Facial Lotion for Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Redness - Dry, Oily Skin
review: I really like the design of the container, wish more lotions and creams would come in something like this just for easy of use.Moisturizer is thicker in consistency compared to some of the other lotions I have. I use this one as a night cream even though the directions said it can be applied day or night. Did not irritate my fairly sensitive skin, so far, working pretty well. Final judgement will be how it works over time, after I finish the whole jar.While mostly fragrance free, it has a hint of a light smell that i can quite put my finger on. But it dissipates quickly so it didn’t bother me too much.

product_name: ProDNA Paris Hilton Skincare Face & Decolletage Cream - Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream with Aloe Vera Water for Face, Neck - Facial Lotion for Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Redness - Dry, Oily Skin
review: The cream comes in a nice little package, the way it goes is that there is disk where I press on it and cream dispenses up, so every time it will give a similar amount and so diminishing the wasting of product to me that is a genius idea.The cream is nice and watery and covers very well my face.the one thing I noticed and I do not like much is the smell, it has a strong black smell to it and it has me concerned as this is a clarifying cream, am I spreading bleach all over my face?I also started to breakout a bit since using it and I have been using it for about 5 days, I am a little worried at this point but I will keep using it, but at day 5 break outs have started happening.

product_name: ProDNA Paris Hilton Skincare Face & Decolletage Cream - Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream with Aloe Vera Water for Face, Neck - Facial Lotion for Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Redness - Dry, Oily Skin
review: I like the idea of the container not allowing oxygen into the product,  but I don't think this works as well as anything you could get at Ulta. The scent is pretty chemical.

product_name: ProDNA Paris Hilton Skincare Face & Decolletage Cream - Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream with Aloe Vera Water for Face, Neck - Facial Lotion for Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Redness - Dry, Oily Skin
review: This ProDNA Paris Hilton Skincare Face & Decolletage Cream works to make my skin feel less dry. The cream absorbs quickly and has a very light scent which dissipates quickly.At first this cream seemed very pricey to me.  However, it is in an airless jar which not only prevents contamination and oxidation spoilage but also dispenses a drop at a time.  This really makes it more economical since there is no waste.I am using this at night and like the fact that it moisturizes without feeling greasy.  It is a very good face and neck cream.

product_name: ProDNA Paris Hilton Skincare Face & Decolletage Cream - Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream with Aloe Vera Water for Face, Neck - Facial Lotion for Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Redness - Dry, Oily Skin
review: This thick lotion/ cream has a moderate amount of scent. It is a rich lotion which you can feel moisturize as you put it on. I absolutely love the dispensing method! You press down on the Jar’s lid and a small amount comes out in the center. I really like how it makes my skin feel soft and moisturized right after applying .

product_name: ProDNA Paris Hilton Skincare Face & Decolletage Cream - Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream with Aloe Vera Water for Face, Neck - Facial Lotion for Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Redness - Dry, Oily Skin
review: Just give the inside black disc a push - out comes your perfectly sized portion of lotion! The lotion itself is lovely. It blends in and disappears quickly into the skin -

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I was pleasantly surprised with the packaging (a earth friendly cloth drawstring bag). It included a pamphlet about their company and their "mission statement" and background of the product (it is cruelty free and vegan) pure in it's natural form. It came in a lovely pump bottle in which I immediately pumped and rubbed to the part of my arms that were beginning to look crepey. After I rubbed it onto my right arm, I compared it to my left arm and wow!...what a difference. I do use essential oils so I can also dilute with this product. For me it is a win, win, all the way around. I will be a repeat customer.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I am trying different oils. I’ve used Aragon oil which is expensive. Avocado oil smells to high heaven. I like this because it is USDA organic. It arrived very quickly. The pump is great. It has no smell at all. Is comparable to argan or avocado in consistency. I pat dry and then put on after shower!Good price and quality. I am pleased.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I loved the packaging! My friend had just arrived home from his drywall job; his hands were dry and cracked. I was opening my oil to get the feel of it and put some on his hands. His eyes lit up like a boy on Christmas morning! Our skin absorbed the oil quickly, and there was no greasy residue. My friend plays guitar and is sure the guitar is going to love it too.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I am giving this 4 stars because of the way it was packed.This oil smells nice and I mixed it with frankincense to spray on my face and body so its even better. I hear good things and I like the ways it feels and absorbs into my skin without making me feel oily or look greesy. Its organic and safe to apply to skin.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I was really looking forward to trying this almond oil due to all the positive reviews. Seemed ok at first but within a week of using, mostly on my fire arms, I started to break out in this rash. I haven’t been using anything else topically that could have caused this. I don’t have super sensitive skin, no but allergies, and I haven’t broken out from anything in many years. I noticed a couple of other reviews had this same issue.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: So I finally finished my old bottle coconut oil, and excitedly went to open my sweet almond oil, and this happened. I had thought I was going to receiving a bottle with a thick and study pump like in the picture, but received one with a tiny pump, that was just as cheap as it looked and broke off as I removed the plastic around it. I’d like to receive a new pump that’s the bigger and more sturdy like pump in the picture (which is actually part of the reason I choose this brand), but I can’t find anywhere to contact the company. I am VERY dissatisfied and disappointed.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I believe there is supposed to be a plunger on top, nothing in the box, just the broken off piece on top of the bottle-that’s handy, I’ll have to find a different container to put it in.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: Product bottle arrived with pump completely broken off and broken off piece was not even in the box.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I don’t know if I like the product or not. I received it today and the pump nozzle was broken off. It came in a box with no added packing. I don’t want to use it without the pump because there’s a hole in the cap and it will be open to the air. Disappointed.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: Package came very quickly and packaged well.  Pump is intact and no oil spilled.  I already tried one pump for both arms and legs...a little goes a long way!  I'll have this bottle for a while.  The oil does take time to absorb, so nighttime is ideal.  You don't want ruin any clothes.  There is very little to no smell.  The color is close to clear, has the slightest yellowish tint to it.I will update in a few weeks to see how my skin reacts to it.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I've used this product for some time now and have thoroughly enjoyed it and use it in making my homemade lotions and potions and what not. It is very moisturizing, a medium viscosity when poured but thin when applied and a little goes a long way. Neutral smell. Easily absorbs into skin but does leave a shine behind, it's an oil which is to be expected. It mixes well with Sunflower, Castor and Argan Oil, I haven't had any issues with it separating. And it takes well to infusing as well, I have infused dried roots, dried herbs, and dried flowers and had success with each time. Overall a well-balanced product. my only complaint would be this last order I placed I received a bottle with a broken pump though I'm not sure whose fault this is, but the broken piece of the pump was not in the box leading me to believe that I was sent a broken product.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I bought this product because I have grey hair, and it can be very dry and Flyaway.  I use a small amount after towel drying and my hair is smooth and silky, without feeling greasy.  It also darkens my hair a bit.  Sorry, image is sideways.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: What an amazing oil.  Goes on easy and is not greasy and hope to be usingthis for a long time.  Well worth the money.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: Product was neatly packaged and shrink wrapped. I also loved the drawstring back. Thanks for packaging in shrink wrap that won't slice my hands up. This oil is very light and is easily absorbed into the skin. It doesn't leave pores clogged or feel sticky. Great moisturizer for the entire body. Great value and quality for the price. I will keep purchasing this brand.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: Product is very good, a little on the thicker side but very moisturizing. It does live up to the reviews and the issue that some bring up about the pump is not that serious. Obviously it's not lotion so don't use a full pump if you don't need it. I'm giving less than a full rating for the packaging. This company sends the oil in a completely useless bag that will end up in the garbage for 90 percent of us. This is unnecessary for a product that is decent enough to stand on it's own, without this silly packaging ploy

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I received this product with lots of excitement, but when I got to the mail box I saw it in a clear bag from the post office. The product had not been screwed on all the way and about a quarter of the product had leaked out. I’m so disappointed.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: We use this oil topically for any and everything you can think of... it has no flavor and is SO silky. We are on our third bottle.... Love it!!!!!

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I love using this oil for my skin as its not greasy and it make my skin soft .I even put a little amount of this oil with my lotion and the result is really good ,my skin becomes very soft.

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: I must commend purad’or on the packaging! I love it. I live in Jamaica and I received it within 4 days.I love the smell and how it makes my skin feel and look healthy. It’s a great product and I’m glad I bought it!

product_name: PURA D'OR Organic Sweet Almond Oil (16oz) Certified Organic 100% Pure & Natural Hexane Free Soothing Vitamin E Oil for Skin & Face, Facial Polish, Full Body, Massages, DIY Base (Packaging may vary)
review: el previo y calidad son los mejores que encontré

product_name: Neutrogena Sensitive Skin Sunscreen Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 60+, Water-Resistant, Hypoallergenic & Oil-Free Gentle Sunscreen Formula, 3 fl. oz
review: Donot recommend, I just got this today but just after one use I just wash my face and I saw rashes all over my face😥I don't know what to do to get rid of this now.This is the first ever product that had reacted on my skin so bad just in one use..Total waste

product_name: Neutrogena Sensitive Skin Sunscreen Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 60+, Water-Resistant, Hypoallergenic & Oil-Free Gentle Sunscreen Formula, 3 fl. oz
review: There is NO mineral sunscreen that does not leave a white cast. So yes you will get a white caste unless you don't apply enough product to get true protection. You can apply a facial powder afterwards to help out with this whiteness. I really like this one though I cannot use it on my face. I'm a natural redhead and I used this to stay outside all day long on Memorial Day weekend in Texas. This does work if you apply it properly. I cannot use it on my face because of the methylisothiazolinone (preservative known to be a sensitizer: after a number of uses it then produces an allergic reaction.)  If it did not have this in it then I would use it on my face most days for workouts or swimming.  It is not thick and sticky feeling as most water resistant sunscreens are. It has more of a lotion feel to it. Yes it is thick but not like the water resistant mineral sunscreen feel cause it will absorb. This product is very durable under extreme conditions with sweating.

product_name: Neutrogena Sensitive Skin Sunscreen Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 60+, Water-Resistant, Hypoallergenic & Oil-Free Gentle Sunscreen Formula, 3 fl. oz
review: Great product but it came without a seal. I know most of these products come with a tamper seal.

product_name: Garnier Skin Skinactive Bb Cream Oil-Free Face Moisturizer, Light/Medium, 2 Count
review: Been using since I was 14, best multi purpose cover up/skin protection out there.Covers up acne, matte finish, applies amazing with whatever you want to use.I’ll never stop using it!Insta @kaitynicole97

product_name: Garnier Skin Skinactive Bb Cream Oil-Free Face Moisturizer, Light/Medium, 2 Count
review: It looks really bad on my skin and I have a bit of a problematic skin

product_name: Garnier Skin Skinactive Bb Cream Oil-Free Face Moisturizer, Light/Medium, 2 Count
review: Love it. Looked up best BB creams, since I tend to prefer that over a full coverage foundation. This one is beautiful !!! Very light !

product_name: Garnier Skin Skinactive Bb Cream Oil-Free Face Moisturizer, Light/Medium, 2 Count
review: Whenever you buy foundations online it's always a bit of a gamble if it will match your skin tone. In the picture I have the bb cream on my face, with none on my neck. You can see that the face and neck both match pretty well, so for me personally I'm very happy with this product.For those that are wondering, the skin on my face is definitely fair, but I also have warm/yellow undertones (I'm Mediterranean). I knocked a star off because this product clearly wouldn't match people that were a medium skin tone, and with the name fair/medium you think it would match both skin tones, which is misleading. I think what it means is fair but not pale (like a Kate Beckinsale instead of a Emma Stone), but that being said you could always mix in a few drops of darker foundation to get the shade you wanted!I like that it's oil-free because I use a moisturizer underneath (I have dry skin myself). I don't recommend using a bb cream without a moisturizer as it will get a bit clumpy.

product_name: Garnier Skin Skinactive Bb Cream Oil-Free Face Moisturizer, Light/Medium, 2 Count
review: I love this BB cream!  It goes on smoothly and melts into the skin.  I have also used IT Cosmetics CC cream and it is very similar, but far less expensive.  Because I have oily skin, I dust a little powder to set it, but I have read reviews that people with dry skin can use it also.  It has moisturizing benefits but does not leave my face like an oil slick and it lasts through the end of my work day.  The coverage is surprisingly good, almost full coverage.  I almost don't need a concealer with this product, unless I have a pimple or something.  I originally purchased this at Target but will be buying it here on Amazon because the price is better here.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I am so disappointed in Acure Organics. I have been using their day cream for years now. I always bought in bulk when I saw them on sale. However, as of recent, I've noticed huge changes that I am not happy about, especially since I was not informed as a loyal consumer. First they changed to a new formula. Usually when companies do this, they have the decency to inform its consumers. Acure gave me nothing. Not only is the formula sidfeeenr, they took out a lot of organic ingredients and replaced them with cheaper. WATER is now first and major ingredient.Next, not only did they change the packaging, they changed the size of the container. The old container reads "50 ml, 1.7 Fl Oz." The new containers read the same measurements but the container is actually smaller than the old one! So how is that possible. There is no way I'm believing I am still getting 50ml when they old vs new containers are different sizes.(View pictures)Therefore we have New Formula, Smaller Packaging, for the Same Price, and No Notification. I am not a fan and will be switching to a new natural skincare company when I am finish with this last bulk order (already spent my money and cannot get a refund).

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: Came back to update my review from 5 stars to 2... The formula changed and the moisturizer isnt as good as it used to be. Overall wouldnt recommend you spend your money on thus stuff, its just not good. Leaving my old review below in hopes the company sees this. SO disapointed they changed this moisturizer, back on the hunt again for a new one.Old review before they changed the product:I LOVE acure products. I haven't used one that I haven't fallen in love with. This is a wonderfully hydrating moisturizer and definitely does so without making your face super shiny like most. It has a really lovely scent to it too. Be aware though that this is a rather small tube of it, but I only need about half a dimes amount for my whole face, so it does go a somewhat long way. In the picture you can see the size comparison to a standard votive candle.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: The product is very good. It mattifies your skin in 1 min and seems moisturising also (which usually doesn’t happen with this type of cream, so it’s a big plus), but what botters me a little is that i don’t feel my skin light, with the cream absorbed, i feel it heavy and a bit clumpy, if i can describe it like this. Before reading the ingredients, i knew already it has salvia and spearmint, because the smell is so strong. Too bad you can’t smell the other ingredients too :) it would be much better. All in all, i recommend it and the price is very good comparing with the size. Also, very important, organic ingredients. You should try it. It comes sealed, in a cute box, in 2 days with amazon prime membership.Extra tip: i know it went viral a non-sense that if the cream tube has a black square on the back, is pure chemical. Actually it is used just for packaging process, so this cream is more natural than big brands.Extra tip 2: in the last pic is the quantity that i use for face, neck and decolletage.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I dont know if all of yours were like this but the ingredients seem to be separated and dont rub in. When I put it on my face it was white and splotchy and nearly impossible to rub in my face without being overly rough on my skin. I dont know how well the spf works but I think this just wasnt for me.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: It's not in the list of ingredients on Amazon, but this contains coconut oil, which -- for me and those prone to breakouts/clogged pores --- is a no-no. (I've used coconut oil in the past, and while I initially  liked the results - the longer term outcome was a mess; my dermatologist said to avoid.)  Darn shame!

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I've been using this product for quite some time. I like that it doesn't clog my pores and makeup lays well on it. However I dont like the inconsistent packaging/labeling cause I worry if I got the right item.. nevertheless the true bummer here is the seal broke on the top of my most recent bottle purchased. So the moisturizer squirted out on top and the bottom and since this stuff isn't cheap well I'm hesitant to get another bottle.. I don't like wasting money

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I have extremely dry, eczema-prone skin. This winter in Colorado has been brutal on my skin. My face was red and flaky, with dry patches that wouldn’t heal around my cracked mouth. I received the cloud cream, asking with the argan oil and eczema lotion yesterday. I started using all three immediately, and again when getting out off the shower last night. I used the eczema cream on my lower face and neck before bed because I was itchy. I woke up this morning and my skin is buttery smooth, with very few remnants of redness and dryness. This stuff is amazing! Love all three products!

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: Hmmm I don’t know how I should feel about that. It’s smells good nothing crazy but I feel like it’s not as moisturizing as I wish it would be. After applying the Creme (2-3mins later) it feels like my face is hard like non strechty. I really don’t know how to describe it. But I guess everyone should see if it works for them.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I bought this face cream with the expectation of a high quality product as presented. After I used it a couple of times, it started to irritate my skin and to red spots  appeared all over the face. From the ingredients described as contained it should have an exactly opposite result after use. I wish O could return it but unfortunately the return window is closed.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: The wrong item was delivered. I didn’t order the brightening day cream (which you see in the picture), I’ve ordered the one for sensitive skin with Aegean oil and sunflower amino acid which comes in a pink and white box. I’m very dissatisfied, I have rosacea I can’t just use any cream. VERY Disappointing.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I have been in love with Acure products for a while now. I am 38, African American and I have what seems to be hormonal acne. Anyone who suffers from acne for any reason know that is tough. But I can honestly say I tried Acure not expecting because a lot of stuff hardly does what it claims. I used their sensitive facial cleanser , brightening scrub and moisturizer was their Marula oil said to be good for acne skin. I noticed my face clear beautifully! I fell off using it on a regular basis but I went back to it. I also eat organic, juice and do green smoothies as well as use all natural body care... You've gotta start from the inside! This product seems good as far as its moisturizing abilities and my skin is extra dry because I had a peel done. BUT yes the smell is funky! As one person said , I also use earth friendly and " green" products but not all of them smell this way. This reminded me of baby spit up .. Sorry Acure!!UPDATE::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::I want to take back what i said about the smell lol, it really isn't that bad or i am use to it. There is no denying that this works wonderfully! I switched to another moisturizer in their line and didn't like it as much so i went back. I have been sing their combo skin cleanser ( i use to use the one for sensitive skin, but notice a great diff now that i switched!), the green scrub they make for hyper pigmentation, eye cream, resurfacing cream and then this moisturizer ( sorry i can't remember all the names!). I use their new scrub that has red clay in it every other day. This i alternate with the green scrub. I know some people may say that's too much exfoliation but this has been what works for MY skin! The dark marks and spots i had are diminished GREATLY! My skin breakouts almost not at all now and people think i am wearing makeup when i'm not! These products are wonderful and i will use them forever LOL!

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I first got this product in 2017 as a sample and my sensitive skin was in love! I just purchased the new version. 15 mins After applying a some extra dabs under my eyes and brows for some extra moisture, I checked the mirror and have red burns in the exact spots I placed it. I was to love this product, but this is bad.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I typically love this product and have ordered it before. However, the last bottle I received had an odd smell and looks different. I did not bother reading the current reviews because I had ordered before and did not have a problem. Also, I noticed that the packaging is different. The bottle on the right is an older bottle and the smell is fine, the one on the left is the new bottle and missing some of the text. Also, the color and text thickness is different. I am not sure if its because the brand had a refresh or if I received a knock off. Unfortunately amazon will not allow me to return this.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I'M IN LOVE! This is one of the ONLY face lotions I trust. I have extremely sensitive skin, everything makes me breakout if I don't do my research on ingredients. If it has coconut oil or coconut anything in there I don't buy it. I use a comedogenic rating for all ingredients to check, just to be safe. I  use pure shea butter in my hair and on my body and that seems fine, but I couldn't find anything for my face! I went to whole foods and asked the beauty worker what product she would recommend and this is what she said. I was reluctant to buy it for weeks. Along iwth diet changes...I've been paleo but had soy lethinin in my chocolate and gum (i've eliminated this), my skin is 100% better. I was so sad washing my face a few weeks ago and I felt so ugly! I know this product is working, because it's only been two weeks and no irritation and my skin is getting clearer. I can't attribute the lotion for clearing my skin, but i'm sure it helped heal it and the most important part is that it DOES NOT cause me any breakouts when pretty much everything does. A little goes such a long way, i'm sure i'll have the bottle for at least 2 -3 , months! Worth the price! I actually like the smell, I don't know what people are talking about, maybe it's cause I already use earthy funky smelling things, plus the smell fades fast. I also LOVE that it has probiotics! GREAT GREAT product! I hope they never change the formula! I hope these embarassing pictures of my skin before and after help! From left to right the dates of my skin progress are7/22/157/23/15I purchased the lotion and began using it all over my face on the 27th (I had patch tested a sample of it prior for a week)7/30/158/5/158/5/158/8/15

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I buy a lot from Amazon which is probably the reason why I don’t do reviews because it’s very time consuming. As a dark skinned woman with I had really bad acne that would leave dark pigmentation I use a combination of accure cleanser day and night cream for two months now I have smooth non-existing pigmentations all I can say the difference in my skin is priceless. I switched to all accure products. Even the bright serum is awesome. I use the day and night cream Faithfully  and let me tell you my skin is flawless. Even toned with smooth complexion. I get mistake for wearing makeup. Definitely worth it. It does work regardless if your white or women of color

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I adore Acure products, finally something that works for me.This, however, is a FAKE rip-off version of Acure, imposing as their brand (i dont believe this is legal????? To be reported.....)The original color is supposed to be yellow abd smells like a super fresh citrus-y pomegranate. It originally has a very smooth texture, non-oily, and never drying.This one, however, is completely white, has a very sticky texture, is VERY oily, and barely any scent at all. The ingredients are 85% different, the packaging doesnt match at all how the original one does (its not new packaging... They tried to match it accurately, but their font sizes, logo, color, words, etc are way off). Again.... THEIR INGREDIENTS ARE ALMOST COMPLETELT DIFFERENT.THIS IS NOT THE REAL ACURE!!!!! DONT BUY!!!!!!! In all of these photos, the REAL one is either on the left side of the pocture or the bottom of the picture. The FAKE one is either on the right side of the picture, or the top of the picture.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: I have been buying this cream for years. I guess this year they decided to change the formula because the cream looks completely white and is not as moisturizing as before. Unfortunately, this cream now stings a little and feels drying. I'm glad other reviews are expressing this. I hope Acure will go back to the original formula.

product_name: ACURE Incredibly Clear Mattifying Moisturizer | 100% Vegan | For Oily to Normal & Acne Prone Skin | Lilac Extract & Chlorella - Hydrates & Balances | 1.7 Fl Oz
review: Certain this is a fake. The packaging is worlds away from the real one I bought in stores. The moisturizer in the fake becomes separated so that u have to shake it to use. It smells similar to the real one, but there are too many discrepancies to feel comfortable continuing use with this counterfeit.
