product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: My Dermatologist recommended Cetaphil Daily Advance Lotion with Shea Butter because I have very dry skin sensitive skin.  When I apply this lotion there is an immediate feeling of relief.  I apply it all over my body right after the shower in the morning and reapply later in the day when needed.  There is no greasy feeling but my skin feels moisturized for 24 hours.  There is no Fragrance but it does have a really nice faint smell when you first apply it.The Combo pack with 2 bottles of the Daily Advance Lotion and the bonus travel size Gentle Skin Cleanser is great for my family.  We keep one bottle in each bathroom.

review: Not sure what's up with this batch or formulation but I had an absolutely horrible allergic reaction. My face broke out in a bright red, burning rash. My 5 year old daughter screamed when I put it on her hands: "It burns! It burns!". Something has either changed with the ingredients or the lotion itself has been sourced from an under-evaluated/regulated/monitored producer or SOMETHING has gone grossly awry as I've used this product for years with my family and never have I ever had any issues. Returning the 2pk/ 8oz'ers pronto!

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: A good, heavier body moisturizer. Cetaphil's current packaging shows it is the "middle" of their lineup.Here in the mid-Atlantic (with our humid summers), I use it mostly during winter cold snaps, and use Cetaphil's lighter "All Skin Types" most of the time. Those of you living in dry climates might find it useful year around. The ingredient list is similar to that lighter lotion, but swaps the avocado oil for macadamia nut oil, and adds shea butter.The lotion is moderately heavy, you can feel it on your skin (likely the shea butter), and if you wash your hands too soon, you'll notice the slickness. I'm not a fan of this weight of lotion normally since it gets on things, and I don't want to pet my cats with it on my hands. But if you're suffering from dry skin or chapping, this is the way to go. And it's not particularly heavy or greasy compared to other heavier lotions I've tried.The odorless is worth extra praise. Manufacturers today seem to fill most products with cloying, overwhelming scents. As a typical male, I'm not really interested in my lotion (or me) smelling like cheap perfume. Worse, many synthetic scent compounds are implicated as health hazards. So an unscented lotion is the only way to go for me. Kudos for Cetaphil doing that across their product line.The packaging changes occasionally (including since last year), but the ingredients seem to stay the same. The current product photo here isn't the new packaging, so I've included a pic of it here.This is my go-to lotion during excessively dry spells. Recommended.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: This is marketed for sensitive skin, but I would not recommend. I broke out in hives all over my neck and face.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)

product_name: Olay Complete Lotion Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 Normal, 6.0 Fluid Ounce, 3 Count
review: We just got this in the middle of January 2020 and the expiration date is June 2020!.  By the time the second and third bottle are opened, they will be expired!  Very disappointed. We were expecting much fresher product and these were sold by Amazon.com Services LLC.The Olay's consumer support website states:* Our research shows that if stored properly, the ingredients are stable until the expiration date.* After the expiration date the product may not be effective.* We don’t recommend using skin care products after their expiration date.Attached is the photo of the 3-pack with their expiration dates. We are returning them and buying them locally where we can check the expiration date.

product_name: Olay Complete Lotion Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 Normal, 6.0 Fluid Ounce, 3 Count
review: The pictures show my face on Day 1 and Day two after using this product.  Face is hot, and itchy, and swollen - quite a terrible happening to endure, no sleep and exhausting.  Proctor and Gamble should have a warning label on it and recommend testing!!!  The cream was also thin and runny, not creamy.

product_name: Olay Complete Lotion Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 Normal, 6.0 Fluid Ounce, 3 Count
review: As far as I caN tell DO NOT BUY, Scam!! On the left a REAL Olay product on the right most likely NOT!!

product_name: Olay Complete Lotion Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 15 Normal, 6.0 Fluid Ounce, 3 Count
review: Very sketchy product. The legit looking product is what I purchased at target for much cheaper. Product label looks suspicious and advertisement appears as if you are buying two, 4 oz bottles for almost $14 instead on one small bottle for $14. I won't use it and will be requesting a refund.

product_name: Cetaphil Fragrance Free Moisturizing Lotion, 16 Fluid Ounce
review: I have sensitive skin, thought this was a lotion for sensitive skin! I was also recommended this lotion for healing tattoos. biggest mistake ever. I had a healing tattoo on my forearm...thought I was having a reaction to the ink. Not likely, because I've been going to the same guy for years, he used the same ink for years. I am also covered in tattoos, my chest and my arms. The only difference was I used Cetaphil lotion instead of tattoo goo. It immediately gave me a rash, and felt like somebody threw lighter fluid on my arm and set it on fire. In the picture you can see the hives. I was between sessions for a cover-up / and waiting to get the color added. Thankfully, antihistamines and cortisone cream calmed it down (took 2 weeks to go away completely)Come to find out, Cetaphil has avocado oil in it! I'm allergic to avocados! Usually people who are allergic to avocados, have a birch pollen allergy (Myself). I advise people with sensitive skin to be careful, there are some ingredients and these supposedly hypoallergenic lotions that still cause reactions. Coconut oil, avocado oil shea butter all of those can be allergens.

review: I’m taking the time to stop and write a review for something I love that works on my dry patchy skin.Even if you use nothing else.  Use this.  I’m bad about doing face regiments.  I don’t take the time for it.  I am 50yrs old and dry patchy skin on face.  I have through the years tried so many products.  Very pricey ones.  As far as improving my SKIN TEXTURE, none of my expensive products do what this did in 4 days I saw and felt a difference in bumps or patches.I’mThankful they keep the price down.BTW this is not one of those that leaves any greasy feel to it after.  It’s nice moisturizer that soaks in. I’ve been telling all my friends about it.

product_name: Pond's Rejuveness Anti-Wrinkle Cream Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer With Alpha Hydroxy Acid and Collagen 14.1 oz
review: Pond's, as a beauty brand, has a proven track record of positive results for millions of women.  This added anti-aging product just makes the line of products better.  Pond's Cold Cream was the very first skin care product my mother insisted I use 60 years ago (I just had my 79th birthday) and it is still my favorite makeup remover.  Mom insisted I massage a moderate amount into my skin for about 90 seconds, then wet my hand with warm water and continue to massage the cream into an emulsion, and remove with a warm wet cloth.  Now I follow that with Rejuvenesse.  In the morning I cleanse with a light cleanser and reapply the Rejuvenesse, using only enough to put a very thin coating on my skin.  My makeup goes on beautifully.  Most people don't believe I am nearly 80 years old.  Good consistent skin care with proven quality products will always make the difference.Update, Dec 2018:  continue to see improvement in my skin.  No such thing as overnight results, but consistency pays off.  After reading other reviews, I emphasize that a little goes a long way.  Too heavy?  Maybe using too much.  During the winter I put a very light layer of Ponds Dry Skin Cream on my neck and chest over the Juvenesse Cream.  Soooooo soft!!!!!Update: Its 2020, and I am now 80 years old and still convinced that this product is worth far more than what anyone ever pays for it.  I originally bought two small travel sizes and keep them handy in each of my bathrooms.  I refill from my huge jar which I keep tightly closed.  Ponds continues to perform above and beyond.  We just returned from a family visit in Oklahoma, where the winter winds are brutal!!  Thankfully I had my Rejuveness and Nourishing Creme S with me and came through the experience just fine.  I do wear a CC cream with a sunscreen as well.  Those of us who love this cream know why Pond's has continued to make skin beautiful since 1846!

product_name: Pond's Rejuveness Anti-Wrinkle Cream Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer With Alpha Hydroxy Acid and Collagen 14.1 oz
review: I am 62 with fine lines which I noticed this past year began to deepen.  After 4 weeks of using Pond's Rejuveness Anti Aging Face Cream my skin firmed and lines began to smooth out.  I am a nature photographer and this has made my squint lines created by my camera nearly invisible. My lips are plumper and age spots from sun exposure have faded too.  Best of all my husband said I look radiant.  Highly recommended!

product_name: Pond's Rejuveness Anti-Wrinkle Cream Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer With Alpha Hydroxy Acid and Collagen 14.1 oz
review: Everytime I use this product it balls up when I rub my face a few minutes later. I can't apply makeup over it. Absolutely terrible product.

product_name: OGX Extra Creamy + Coconut Miracle Oil Ultra Moisture Lotion, 19.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I have very dry, ash skin (always have).  Winters in the tundra have always been rough.  Originally this body wash was purchased accidentally  (someone didnt close the Amazon app before letting little fingers play on my phone).  We happen to be low so I thought, "Why Not?"This wash didn't miraculously transformed my old ashiness into the supple skin of a 20-yo, but i did find that after a few days my skin would soak in more moisturizer  (same brand I always use), and after a week that dry itchy feeling had gone.  After a month there is a slight but noticeable change to the look of my skin.  My husband has noticed a dramatic change to the way my skin feels.If you are in the market for a moisturizing wash that changes your skin for the better after each wash--- I strongly recommend this OEX Body wash.If you like this review--dont hesitate to hit the "like" button.

product_name: OGX Extra Creamy + Coconut Miracle Oil Ultra Moisture Lotion, 19.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: LOVE this OGX lotion!Very moisturizing (I apply it in the Morning after my shower and my skin is moisturized all day) and I love the Scent. I also really like how much you get for the price, one will easily last me 4 months!

product_name: OGX Extra Creamy + Coconut Miracle Oil Ultra Moisture Lotion, 19.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)

product_name: NIVEA Men Maximum Hydration 3-in-1 Nourishing Lotion - Body, Face, Hands - 16.9 oz. Pump Bottle
review: Thank you

product_name: NIVEA Men Maximum Hydration 3-in-1 Nourishing Lotion - Body, Face, Hands - 16.9 oz. Pump Bottle
review: I bought this cream because in the winter months, I found that after getting home, the skin on my face would be very dry and scaley. So I decided to get some cream to help with that. I've had this cream for about 2 weeks now and I really love it. I am a college student so i'm constantly running around outside from building to building and living in new york it gets pretty cold.For a man such as myself, I've undermined the importance of daily skin care for a long time but recently I've gone further to protect my skin, because why not keep your skin healthy and lively. Whether you think so or not, having healthy skin will improve your daily quality of life. People are sure to notice the difference, and will definitely improve your self esteem. Bright, Soft, Healthy skin is good all year round!.This cream smells amazing!. Me and my mother both use this, and we both love it. just a small dab of it is enough for both my arms, hands and my face. I have definitely felt the difference on my skin after using this the past two weeks. My face feels much softer and looks better. It lasts all day and has become part of my daily routine before leaving the house. The bottle is bigger than i expected so i'm sure it will last me a couple months of use. I will be sure to update this review when it has run out and how my skin is doing after a couple of months.Overall I would definitely recommend this cream to anyone, man or woman, to include in your daily skin care, or even as a gift to a friend. The smell is not too strong but does smell good when i put it on in the morning, and keeps my face nice and hydrated all day.

product_name: NIVEA Men Maximum Hydration 3-in-1 Nourishing Lotion - Body, Face, Hands - 16.9 oz. Pump Bottle
review: Pros: Came quick with prime membership 2 day shipping. Odor is not too strong have used this product in the past. A good moisturizer for the low price.Cons: None! Keep up the good product.

product_name: NIVEA Men Maximum Hydration 3-in-1 Nourishing Lotion - Body, Face, Hands - 16.9 oz. Pump Bottle
review: package arrived on time but the cap is completely broken making the lotion very difficult to get out, rather disappointing.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I received a sample of this via the Loreal website and instantly fell in love with it! Perfect timing cause I was looking to switch to a lighter weight moisturizer for summer and couldn't decide on one. This is like a hybrid of Cream and water. It's pumps out as a runny, Thin cream that speaks so effortlessly into your face leaving it plumper glowing, so soft, and more youthful looking. It did come with a coupon but it's even more expensive at retail stores. Amazon is by the far the cheapest I found it for. A little of this (one pump), goes a LONG way so this size bottle will last a significant amount of time. Will definitely get my money's worth. I highly recommend this!

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Upon receiving the items I have read a geek reviews stating it was running and was the original product. But to my surprise I received the product in a box and the consistency of the moisturizer was thick when pumped. After smoothing the product all over it became transparent and also gave it a little manly smell, but not too over powering, the scent is quite pleasant. After the application my skin felt cool, hydrated and glowy. It didn’t give my skin a tacky or sticky feeing.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Amazing at this price!

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I love this product! First of all the bottle is just pretty and looks fancy and makes me smile when I see it on my bathroom counter. I usually keep things out of sight but this I leave out. I have normal to dry skin but lately with spending more time outside and in the pool my skin has been drier. I was shocked that one little pump actually covered my whole face. It is completely clear and is effortlessly and quickly absorbed into my skin. It has a light fragrance that reminds me of the ocean which I think is perfect but it goes away pretty quickly if you don't like fragrances. It immediately makes my skin glow and that luminous look lasts all day. I've been using it about two weeks now and my skin is hydrated, looks great and I think my pores even look smaller. It's wonderful not having to rub in moisturizer to have it absorb into my skin or end up with too much that won't rub in or white marks that don't blend in. I only wish it had an SPF. I will definitely be buying more! I received a free sample through BzzAgent.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: This product is amazing, the bottle is a little bigger than expected but it's not huge. My skin is a combination of oily and dry and this works great. I was using the Clinique moisture surge for a long time but that got pricey. This gives me really similar results. The only down side is that the bottle is made of glass and that makes me a little nervous to travel with it

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Texture-wise not too different from most drugstore gel moisturizers, and the scent is pretty strong but not unpleasant. Hopefully just my luck, but I'm curious how this bottle passed quality control with this speck of what looks like goldfish poop in the bottle.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Just received today. Have purchased before. As it is Winter, needed the dry skin formula ASAP.  I love this product & would/will buy again.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Product I received on the left, sample of the product in the right. They don't look or smell the same. I'm disappointed in this purchase.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Hydra "Genious"...one would think that this gel is so smart that it would know how to and how much to moisturize the skin, okay perhaps not the gel itself but the makers of it when they made the formulation...no, not the genius in any way.This gel is just terrible. It resembles a sticky water and it feels the same way when it dries. It does not moisturize in any way and I have oily T-zone and really just need the moderate moisture on my cheeks. My nose was peeling from dryness and regardless how much of this gel I used it made no difference whatsoever. I have not tried the Dry Skin version of this so maybe that one would have worked better for me, but this one is just awful.I really liked the glass packaging and the pump dispenser on this gel. It's a generous size as well and I wouldn't mind paying the store price had it actually been effective. Unless your face is extremely oily it may work for you, but even oily faces need some degree of moisture to keep it balanced. This is just plain water. I would not recommended this gel, especially not to people with any degree of dryness.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: NO FILTER ON PICS, I have semi oily skin/non sensitive skin, product broke me out first time I tried (took 3 days to get use to it, i never moisturized because i thought I’d get more oily), product feels like ur rubbing hand sanitizer ( without burn),  I’ve been using for 4 months 2x a Day bottle half way empty ( one pump goes a longs way) I really like it gives me smooth skin and a nice skin glow/shine, also smooths out crows feet, light scent of citrus, will continue to use. I DO NOT RECOMEND TO PPL WITH DRY SKIN!

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: This product is for 🌝morning and 🌚night time use, it absorbs really fast in the skin so it doesn't leave it greasy or wet. I bought the normal to dry skin, they also have two other ones for oily skin and super dry skin. I really recommend this as a primer before using your makeup because I find that it leaves my makeup looking more smoother & flawless it doesn't feel sticky at all.🙂👍🏼 Wonderful product smells really fresh and the skin feel smooth,,,I recommend this,give it a try. ❤️I love L'Oreal products they always giving us something new &  fresh.🙌🏼Happy  Amazon carrying  this new product awesome.⭐️

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: I have every skin issue you can think of. Rosacea, acne (hormonal, cycstic, Whiteheads, blackheads), dehydration, excessive oiliness, redness, all of it. I’ve spent probably thousands on a multitude of different products, trying to find one that would at least make a dent. I’ve had many procedures, many trips to the dermatologist. Nothing I’ve ever used, nothing I’ve ever done, has made such a profound difference in the appearance of my skin. Having rosacea, my face often felt hot, bumpy, and burned. While my conplexion is naturally fair and pink, this has seriously covered all my bases in a gentle and effective way. I’ve been trying to turn my skin around for YEARS!! this was the product that did it. If I could give it 100 stars i would. It has seriously changed my life!!! Also sorry for the nasty pictures haha

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: This stuff is amazing I used it just for a week n I see so much of a difference in my skin it literally is a solution for all ur skin problems please give it a try and you will thank me later. I love how it makes your own skin look so filtered like a camera filter skin

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: Wow. This product is incredible. I have never had any product work its magic in so little time. The first roll of photos was taken 4 days before the second roll (where my hair is tied).It reduced the number and size of the blackheads on my cheek, forehead, and jawline. Apart from a bad diet, this product has noticeably cleared up my skin, no doubt.

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: So, I read all the reviews on this product, good and bad. I watched several videos of people who use it and love it. I was so excited to love it. But my breakouts have gotten worse in the 4 weeks I’ve used it. The pictures attached are a week apart.. and I haven’t taken any in the last week because I’m actually embarrassed. I cleanse and moisturize with Cetaphil and love those products. My skin is very soft and looks healthy side from the breakouts. I got a toner from Clinique today so I’ll try that but this is a no for me. :/

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: I get cystic acne on my chin every month with my periods like clockwork. I’ve beeb using this for a month and have not had the slightest pimple whatsoever! Of course I’m very happy with that, but you can get this product for much cheaper. It’s a medication and like all meds you can buy a generic version that’s the same thing.

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: Although this product had great reviews, I was still skeptical about purchasing it. I have very sensitive skin so I was afraid it may cause a reaction. After the first use, I could already tell a difference with my skin. After almost two weeks of use, my pores are smaller, my acne scars are faded, and my skin is glowing. As suggested, I use it twice a day. Once in the morning and once at night, and I've had no problems with it, besides some mild peeling on my nose. In the morning I use it with a vitamin C serum and an SPF moisturizer. This is a new must-have in my skincare routine. I would 100% recommend this product, and I will definitely be purchasing it again.

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: This has forever changed my life I suffered with extreme hives and acne because I have really sensitive skin and I must say that I was scared to give this a try but I am so glad that it decided to give this a shot this has improved my skin in so many ways my acne over all has improved as you can see in the pictures provided

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: Well this is a golden liquid. It’s perfect works like a miracle in a bottle. I have subscribed and I will never be without, but this month came in a different bottle color but with the same description. I assumed that they changed the bottle for a better quality one, 😐 but us (subscribes) should be informed of any changes.

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: Be warned. This product is VERY drying and will throw your moisture barrier off completely. I had a huge itchy, red, inflamed reaction/breakout to this exfoliator. Make sure to patch test this because some people’s skin can tolerate it, some others cant. I wish i patch tested. Although my skin was so soft and clear the day after. Havoc wreaked on day 3. Patch test and use a couple times a week if you have sensitive acne prone skin, or DONT USE IT AT ALL.

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: It worked so fast and so well.It was both affective in getting rid of present acne but also fading acne scars.Photos are a month a part

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: After using this product for the first time I put the cap back and and it completely broke. Considering Paula’s choice is adamant on products remaining air tight so they don’t lose effectiveness I would say they need to re-evaluate their packaging.

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: ITS A MIRACLE IN A BOTTLE!! This stuff does exactly what it says it does! The pictures attached are exactly 4 weeks apart. My skin got extremely textured and congested after getting pregnant and having my daughter and this product is the only thing that helped!!

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: This stuff works! I dont know though if i should have just avoided my neck area (although instructions on here said to include the neck). But this stuff is POTENT.

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: I’m on week 4 of using this product, and I think it’s really helping me. The first week I started using it, it broke me out really badly, but I stuck with it and now my skin looks sooooo much better! If you try this product, I recommend giving it at least a month to work it’s magic... it gets worse before it gets better!

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: not bad

product_name: Paulas Choice--SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant--Facial Exfoliant for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, 4 oz Bottle
review: Wonder productCured my adult hormonal acne. It is liquid gold! Couldn't be happier!! I hardly ever post reviews but this is the one product I just can't stop raving about. This is now a staple in my skin care regimen. My skin is sooo soft and smooth. It is drying but use a good moisturizer and you're golden. I use it twice a day and within 7-10 days I started noticing drastic changes!! Will def continue to purchase :)

product_name: Image Skincare Prevention+ Daily Ultimate Protection SPF 50 Moisturizer, 3.2 Ounce
review: It’s my favorite sunscreen and went to re-order to find the price has doubled since I last ordered it!!!

product_name: Image Skincare Prevention+ Daily Ultimate Protection SPF 50 Moisturizer, 3.2 Ounce
review: Best sunscreen i have ever used.  My doctor introduced me to it, and the price here is much lower than at his office.  Also is a good moisturizer.

product_name: Image Skincare Prevention+ Daily Ultimate Protection SPF 50 Moisturizer, 3.2 Ounce
review: So disappointed! I love this brand and have been using it forever. I’ve never had a problem with quality or shipping before today. I opened my shipment up and the box of sunscreen was opened and if you look closely you can has been used. It’s more than half gone!  Now I have to go through  the return process... bummer!!

product_name: Image Skincare Prevention+ Daily Ultimate Protection SPF 50 Moisturizer, 3.2 Ounce
review: Has anyone else received a tube that has a sticker on the back with different ingredients covering what was originally printed on the tube?  Wondering if this is a real product or counterfeit

product_name: Image Skincare Prevention+ Daily Ultimate Protection SPF 50 Moisturizer, 3.2 Ounce
review: Love this product

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: I had a terrible experience with this product unfortunately. With heat blasting in upstate NY recently, the dry air takes its toll on my skin. So I bought this to use after cleansing as a natural moisturizer, but my skin reacted horribly. It soaked in well, I only used a small pea size amount for my face, but by the time I got dressed and put on clothes and light makeup, it felt like my face was on fire. Wasn't long before I was bumpy and all red; I posted a picture with this review, taken about an hour after application. I don't have a drop of foundation or coverup on my face. I wish I had a better experience but will be trying something different.

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: i've read reviews for this product for almost a month trying to make up my mind to buy it! my skins fluctuates with being super oily, then can get little dry patches! after researching the organic ingredients, i have a great feeling this cream will do my bipolar skin be at ease and help w/ my redness!BTW: it came a tad melty when i received it (im from texas.. it's been over 100 degrees!) so i put it in the fridge for over an hour and stirred it and tested it on my neck and hands. it feels amazing!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: Love this product and the company is Awesome!!! They actually emailed me to see how I liked product and due to some problems with the product freezing in some areas, they shipped me a brand new product, without me even requesting one. And my product was perfect but they decided to make sure their customers are taken care of. I am huge on customer service and they exceeded in that department. Also for those who left comments regarding product looking moldy, one of the ingredients listed is bee propolis which gives the product some dark spots so maybe this is being mistaken for mold? Also comments regarding separation of the oil, this is normal. Just give it a good stir and you will truly enjoy the product. Great coverage, deep conditioning. Thank you BeeFriendly for an Awesome product and awesome customer service!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: I'd started using this company's night cream ("Best Night Cream ") last February & had started running low on the *last* all natural day cream I'd found on Amazon (Face and Body Cream Moisturizer - Nourishing Aloe Vera) which has a great ingredient list but actually made my face feel dryer after application.The BeeFriendly night cream leaves you of oily and shiny but that is ok in a NIGHT cream. This day cream unfortunately leaves me just as reflective. This is ok right now as I'm working from home, but it wouldn't be cool if I couldn't sit around and work for an hour or two, letting as much of it soak in as it will, before applying make-up. If I had to get out the door early this wouldn't work at all for me. I'd just use it evenings only. But I don't need another night cream!THAT PACKAGING THO! It's pretty goopy and soft, which might be why the packaging was so annoyingly "death star force field". The entire jar was contained in a kind of shrink wrapped plastic for which there was no apparent pull tab. I got my mat knife to cut that off & then the top inside was further sealed with a metallic paper cover that also had no tab. I had to cut that off & all the messy little edges were impossible to remove, even with tweezers. That schizz was attached with industrial grade super glue! There was a last inner layer of transparent plastic which you see inside the lid on the left. I didn't want to deal with it so my first application was off the top of that & then I tossed the still heavily smeared plastic.

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: I bought this many times, it was good in the beginning. Then it started to get worse. This is second time it has been bad. I took the cream to my local Rite Aid and a  pharmacist took one look at the cream and said it was a broken emulsion, thats when the oil separates. If you make the photo bigger you will see that a great deal of the emulsion has separated. Not very good for a cream!!!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: Container arrived with protective seal gone and product partially used..disgusting....please send replacement appropriately sealed and not usedPam Mitchell

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: I really like this product, but it molded after a while

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: For about a year now I have been struggling with dry, acne prone skin, and now the game has changed! I can not believe the difference just 1 week using this has made. I have my face back to normal! I highly recommend, and will be buying more once I finish this jar! Couldn't be happier!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: The PERFECT face and neck cream. Whatever you did to change up the consistency while keeping the NATURAL ingredients the same works great. No separation with oil on top to mix in anymore. The perfect balance. Great texture, the fragrance is fresh and light. Keeps my sensitive skin wonderfully moisturized. I’m a repeat customer and look forward to using your product for as long as it’s a available!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: At first the product was great,I work night and it really seem to help me look more alive.After a month I noticed black mildew grewing from the sides of the bottle. I was mortified that I had been using this product, it totally gross me out!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: I tend to have dry skin and the reason why I love these products (face and eye and night cream) is  because I feel my face hydrated and protected all the time, my skin feels smooth and looks healthy. The first one was a gift from my husband and I loved it, it was the night cream. For the face and eye cream  I was hesitant to buy it because of some yucky pictures in the reviews, but I gave it a shot since I really liked the one I was using already. I’ve had have one since May this year and it’s in perfect condition.

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: Unfortunately, I did not like this product. The minute I put it on, my face broke out. I didn't returned it because I threw away the box.

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: Very rich moisturizer. You only need very little amount to moisturize your skin.

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: This product arrived with mold growing in it! So awful!!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: This moisturizer leaves my skin so so soft! It is a denser moisturizer than I am used to using so my first thought was that I wouldn't love it..... but I do and a little goes a long way! It has a wonderful light natural honey scent that I love! I have very sensitive skin and I'm also a contact lens wearer so sometimes harsh strong perfumes and chemicals can bother me but this has worked great. It does go on a bit greasy at first but it quickly absorbs and has left my skin soft and brighter, my eyes less puffy and reduced the fine lines around my eyes and forehead!  I have not had any breakouts and have been really happy with the condition of my skin since I started using it. I use it two times a day- morning and night. I love the natural ingredients, I love the smell, and I love how my skin looks- this is a great cream! I did purchase this item for a discount in exchange for my honest review and I would honestly but it again! Highly highly recommend!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: I like to use products to make sure I'm giving an accurate review.  I'm glad I waited with this one because as you can see from the pictures it's developed mold.  Buy and use at your own risk.

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: First of all the fact that the cream will expire in 6 month I like it!It means it really natural,without chemicals.When first time applying on a face seems a liitle oily,but it quickly absorbs.Smells like honey.Love it!!

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: The certified organic ingredients and the glowing reviews on Amazon motivated me to purchase this product. I used it for a month to give a fair review. Sadly, the moisturizer was very disappointing. The first thing noticeable when opening the jar is the smell which one of heavy oil, not honey which I was expecting because that's one of the ingredients. There was a layer of olive oil floating on the top which does separate frequently and needs to be stirred back into the cream. The cream is greasy and did not soak into my skin so using it as a night cream was out of the question. It did not work as a day cream either since it just created a greasy film over my face that had to be wiped off. It is mild, did not sting or burn and can be used on the eye area with no problem. The downside, beside my disappointment, is because I waited a month to write a fair review, the cream is no longer eligible for return.

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: Just bought this item and it’s going to expire in less than 2 months

product_name: BeeFriendly Face and Eye Cream All Natural USDA Certified Organic Moisturizer, All In One Face, Eye, Neck, Decollete Cream, 2 oz
review: This item is causing me to break out. Is this normal?

product_name: Garnier SkinActive 24H Moisture Cream with Rose Water and Hyaluronic Acid, Face Moisturizer, For Normal to Dry Skin, 1.7 Fl Oz
review: El products estaba quebrado...

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: Let me start by saying I absolutely LOVED (past tense) this product. I have veryyyy dry skin and it evened my skin tone and texture tremendously without feeling greasy like other dry skin moisturizers. The best way I can describe it is it leaves your skin feeling “tightened” and youthful.HOWEVER, they changed the formula completely. The consistency, scent, and even COLOR changed. I’ve attached a side by side picture on the back of my hand to show the original product and the recent one. You can see that the original is a light yellow color, and the new one is pure white. I also violently shook my hand, and already you can see that the new consistency is runny and beginning to drip. When applied to the skin, the application felt like I was putting water on my face. It felt cheap and useless for dry skin, which was super disappointing because the original formula was thick, rich, and left your skin with a nice glow.I gave the new moisturizer a chance, but it did not do anywhere near the same job as the original. If the company brings back the old formula, I will repurchase. Until then, I am returning this and on the market for a new moisturizer.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I never write reviews and hate being asked to write them, but the Truskin moisturizer and the Vitamin C serum are incredible products. I've spent thousands over the years trying to get my skin under control. At 45, I feel as if I've finally found the products I'll use forever. Like another review mentioned, I am almost to the point where I just have to wear mascara and lipgloss only. Age spots have faded, dry patches are gone, and my skin hasn't one fine line or wrinkle.Makeup free selfie.My makeup goes on better when I wear it as well. My 15 year old daughter also uses the serum and has noticed her blemishes have all but disappeared.Worth every penny.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: This is terrific for me. Light, non-greasy, lasts through the day and provides both sun protection and a general Vitamin C boost that gives my skin a healthy glow. I used to buy the Vitamin C moisturizer from Body Shop but it was so expensive and not great bang for the buck. This is much better value and works as well for me I find. I have combination skin with an oily forehead and nose, and typically dry cheeks that break out on occasion with adult acne. This is a winner for me. Definitely will re-purchase. Photo is of me with no make up on at the beach.Update: Had an issue with the revised formula and the company sent me a fresh batch, no problem!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I really do love TruSkin products. I just reordered the eye cream and I’m almost out of the moisturizer. I love the C serum too!  Truskin will always be a part of my beauty routine!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: Made my skin breakout like crazy. So many red bumps appeared

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I love this moisturizer! Totally brightened up my skin! I use it along with super c serum and rose water toner. I started using tru skin naturals products in September of last year and haven't used anything else since. I see great results with the products, the prices are awesome, and they have the BEST customer service! I have also, in the past, used the retinol moisturizer and liked that one as well. The first picture is before and the second one is after, taken 3 weeks apart, in natural lighting in front of a window. I definitely have noticed a difference in my skin tone and the overall brightness of my skin and complexion. I also feel slightly more confident without makeup on. I love that you only need about a pea sized amount, so this bottle will last a long time, im sure!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I found TruSkin through Amazon and in combination with other products in their line (all in all: Vit C Daily facial cleanser, vitamin c serum, tree serum and daily facial moisturizer with vitamin c and B5)  I have seen quite an improvement in just a few days.  I use the cleanser in the morning and the evening. Rinse and pat dry. Then vitamin c serum. Give it two minutes then moisturize. Two times a week I do the tea tree serum in place of the vitamin c.Little back story: about a year ago I started noticing some adult acne. I went the natural route with homemade remedies and it worked a little bit. Then I went to the other extreme of purchasing a popular strong product- it made my skin hurt and the redness got worse so I returned it. So happy to have found TruSkin!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I don't like the smell of the moisturizer, but it seems to be working quite well, I'm using both the cleanser and moisturizer. I'm not even halfway through the bottles yet.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I'm a 59 year old grandmother with 3 children and 10 grandchildren.  As I started heading toward the higher end of my 50's I found my skin wasn't as bouncy as it used to be and the wrinkles stood out more than I had noticed before, especially on the forehead.  After a month of using this product along with the R serum, HA and C products of the same product line every day, I could not rave more!  I am astounded.  The picture of me and my daughter was taken two weeks ago, and the second photo was taken last year.  How many forehead wrinkles do you see before and after?? It takes time though so be patient.  As this product is a non-prescription product, it is powerful, but not to the point of burning your skin :).  I now use these three products as my regular daily regimine.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: Love the product, it delivers as promised.My skin looks gorgeous and no need to apply make up as the tone is even and has a natural matte finish with no feeling of greasiness and lasts all day!!!Thank you for a great product!I am going to keep buying.To share your experience, just go to the link below:https://www.amazon.com/review/create-review?ie=UTF8&asin=B0166W9GMI#Thanks so much, Ann! Keep me posted and feel free to reach out any time. :-)All the best,EricaTruSkin NaturalsDid this solve your problem?YesNoReport suspicious activityAmazon  facebook  twitter  pinterest  instagramCopyright 2020 Amazon, Inc, or its affiliates. product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I am loving all of my Truskin products! I have used Rodan & Fields for a couple of years but it was just too expensive so I decided to give your products a try…and I’m so glad I did!!! I have very sensitive skin and always fear the consequences of changing products but with TruSkin, I haven’t had any problems at all!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I Love everything I've ordered from TruSkin.  I have sensitive skin and have developed whelps a few times from products so I was leery and ordered just one product first- since then I've ordered the facial wash and the Vitamin C serum is on my Wish LIst!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: Bottle a bit smaller than expected for the price. But awesome product, along with black soap it makes my skin look almost flawless. And keeps it moisturized but not greasy. I use it after I wash my face with the soap bc the soap dries my face out. Perfect Mousturizer!! Even wear it under my foundation. 😊

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: This lotion is not all that its cracked up to be. My face feels tight and dry after using and it takes time to rub all the white in. PLUS, whoever packaged it taped it to the shipping tape so when opening I sliced right through my $27 bottle of "moisturizer".

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: DON’T BUY FROM AMAZON... This was my go to product line for a Very long time. I loved their vitamin C serum and this moisturizer was the BEST I’ve ever used... Until now. Sadly, when I received my new bottle today it is completely different then the bottles I’ve received before. Nothing about this product is the same (see side by side photos). The bottle label is different, type font is different, label color is different. The color, scent and texture of the lotion, everything is different. The quality is gone. This is clearly a knockoff! Not cool Amazon!!

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: This is one of the lotions I found recently.  My esthetician recommended I get vitamin c for my skin. It was so dry, red, and just blah.  I have been using this and I have been getting so many compliments on my skin. I am even wearing less makeup in my early 50’s.  AwesomeProduct

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: It does not work for oily skin.  My neck burst into more acne than I had and burned my skin.  I do not recommend it.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: Thick lotion that goes on smoothly and dries quickly. Noticable results after just a week.

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: So I am a redhead and breakout from everything. This product changed everything! I can now wear moisturizer all day and all night with no breakouts!!! Love this product !

product_name: BEST Vitamin C Moisturizer Cream for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti-Aging, Wrinkles, Age Spots, Skin Tone, Neck Firming, and Dark Circles. 2 Fl. Oz
review: I’ve been using Truskin Naturals retinol moisturizer in the evening along with their serums and I absolutely love them, but I’ve been hoping they would come out with a nice light lotion for the daytime too. This is exactly what I hoped for! It absorbs quickly and makes my skin so silky. On the days that I do wear foundation, it goes on and stays really smooth looking. Love it!Update: Love the new squeeze tubes!

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: Es perfecto

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: This product should have more of a warning. I washed my face with a mild cleanser and then applied a tiny amount of serum all over after I towel dried my face before bed. The next day I washed my face with water and applied sunscreen spf 30 and spent the day in the sun. 2 days later I get this awful rash that still hasn't gotten better after 4 days. I am applying a mild hydrocortisone which is really not something I wanted to do.  Apparently rashes are common but upon further reading - if I ever use it again - I would wash my face, apply toner and a mild moisturizer, let that dry for 30 minutes, THEN apply a tiny tiny amount just to my forehead to see if I react like this again. It's really awful and uncomfortable as you can see from the picture. :(

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: What I received looks different than what is advertised. It is called “Skin Renewing Cream Serum.” Anyone else have this problem?

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: I am willing to try just about any product for my face that "claims" it will improve my skin. Mostly I use Hyaluronic Acid Serum. I, in fact, have the CeraVe Hyaluronic product. I though this Retinol product would be the same stuff, but it is NOT. It comes in the same type of dispenser, but the cream is different. I applied both serums at night, one cheek one, the other cheek the other. When I washed in the morning the Hyaluronic product had a creamy residue that felt like I was applying it again, the Retinol product did not. I really didn't see a difference on my face after only one use. Anti-Aging products all make claims, but you don't know if you are picking what's best for you. Retinol claims to improve fine lines and wrinkles. They don't say this can only be accomplished over time. My one use didn't show to much change. On the plus side, I had no adverse effects. It was a very nice cream, and proved not to be too harsh on my face. Hyaluronic Acid claims it absorbs moisture. I know it dries into my skin after applying it, so I'd say that claim is true. I have decided that although these two products come packaged similarly, they are not the same product. I think a person can use both, not either/or. I am going to continue with the Hyaluronic product because I already know it works, but I am going to start putting on this Retinol once a week because if there is any benefit to be gotten from long term use, I am going to try to get it.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: I have been using this serum for about a week now. Retinols are best used at night while sleeping. They are supposed to plump up wrinkles. I can definitely see the effects of less lines and wrinkles in my face. The serum doesn’t irritate my skin and there is no scent.  Watch my review video for more details. Retinols can be very expensive. I think this one is worth the price and I would purchase this in the future.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: I apply this to my face in the morning and at night. In the morning, I apply it under my makeup. It absorbs quickly into my skin and does not cause my foundation to cake up over it. This serum moisturizes my skin and leaves it feeling smoother. Because it absorbs so quickly, I sometimes follow with another moisturizer on top of it at night. I like that it is fragrance free and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: I haven't noticed any scent with this product which is nice.  I also have very sensitive skin and have had issues with some other products in the past.  However, no reactions to this product.  The only thing that threw me off is the product is yellowish.  I guess I'm just used to seeing white creams.  Does it's job,  haven't seen any rapid changes but that takes weeks to months of using a product.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: I’m becoming a big fan of CeraVe products. I’d always ignored them before—the packaging is plain and rather boring and looks like something that would be offered in a hospital room, nothing like what you receive with pretty packaging like with L’oreal, Olay, Vichy, or Erno Laszlo, but I suspect that helps keep their cost down so they can provide a good product and not charge a big price. And that packaging was what kept me from using CeraVe—it looked uninviting. But don’t let the packaging fool you! The product inside is amazing.This serum goes on super smooth. My skin can be sensitive, but I have absolutely no problems with this retinol serum.It’s thick but still creamy so it goes easily on and absorbs quickly, an off-white or almost light  yellow in color. There is no fragrance at all, which I love for mornings when I don’t want to smell a scent while drinking my coffee after cleansing my skin.The pump action dispenser works great—the only thing I don’t like about pump dispensers is I often wonder how much product is left inside once it stops pumping (and that’s with any pump dispenser).My skin isn’t red, itchy, no burning or stinging — just really soft smooth feeling skin.The price is a bargain—it’s difficult to find good serums under $17 or $18.I have several other CeraVe skin-care products and I find I turn to them more and more for affordable skin-care options.I hope my review helped you today.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: The products from this brand have completely changed the character of the skin on my face.  They are absolutely remarkable.I’m getting older, unfortunately, and when I asked my dermatology what I could do to help things out, she suggested retinol.  I’ve used several other formulas, but this is my favorite by far.  It is smooth and absorbs very easily.  I’ve had others that felt as if they were a mix of oily and gritty.I cannot recommend this brand enough.  What’s more amazing is the price point!  You’ll get a great product in a great quantity at a great price.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free
review: I'm liking this CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum because it's gentle on my skin, and doesn't sting or burn. A small amount really goes a long way. I can't wait to see the outcome in the long run.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Retinol Serum | 1 Ounce | Cream Serum for Smoothing Fine Lines and Skin Brightening | Fragrance Free

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: This has just become my favorite body and hand cream. I have very dry and sensitive skin. In the winter, when I take off my skinny jeans, I can actually see tiny skin flakes all over the inside of my jeans - this is how dry my skin is. I have tried many body creams and I do like a few. The one that helped me get rid of all the comedones on my thigh is The Body Shop vitamin E body cream (I can't use any acid peel because of my sensitive skin). The one that helps instantly with cracking/peeling heels is L'occitane almond body lotion, but neither really stopped flaking of my leg skin. I have used Eucerin Intensive Repair and it does help, but I really hate the sticky texture and the smell is weird..it's not strong, but enough to repel me. This Curel hydra therapy not only stopped flaking of my leg skin, it also makes my skin feels so smooth. It is a lot lighter compared to the Eucerin Intensive Repair and rubs in very quickly. It is supposed to be applied when skin is still wet, but it takes longer to absorb if applied wet. I usually apply it after towel dry, and it still does the job. It has a very subtle orange smell (from orange peel I believe) which is delightful. I even decanted it into small bottles so I can carry it around to use as a hand cream. The bottle is smaller than what I expected. I use it every day after shower for my legs and arms (I apply quite generously), and it lasted about 1 month. I have just placed an order for the bigger size.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: I love this lotion.  Its not scented, which is an issue for some people but not me, I don't need it to be scented.  My skin gets super itchy in the winter (and I live in the upper midwest so its winter alot) and this almost gets rid of it completely.  Major noticeable difference.  Skin is more moisturized, much less itchy, and it doesn't feel greasy at all.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: This is second time I purchased this lotion. But when I received it, it broke

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: This is good stuff! No heavy scent or thick hard to rub in goopey feel to it.  A lotion created to be put on when your skin is wet, it glides on easily and is absorbed fairly quickly without much of a sticky residue. It can be used on dry skin as well of course, but it really is best used when you are damp out of the shower when your skin's pores are open and ready to accept the lotion.This package contains (4) 12 ounce bottles, making each one around six dollars.  Initially that price seemed a tad spendy to me, until I saw how well it worked.The lotion left my skin feeling smooth and hydrated, and this lasted for several hours post shower. **Pat yourself dry after applying for the best results versus rubbing with a towel.** Certain areas (elbows and knees) appeared drier sooner than other areas, but a reapplication to dry skin took care of that problem. The lotion is very concentrated, so whether using it wet or dry I needed very little to get the desired effect.  I did avoid putting this on my face during the day as it appeared somewhat greasy and wasn't the look I was going for with my mineral based matte make-up.I did use it at night after washing my face in place of my usual nightly moisturizer and it worked well. Wherever it is used it seems to create a moisturizing layer to the skin that acts as a barrier of sorts. I noticed it most on my hands when after applying the lotion hours later washing my hands and having them feel moisturized while washing instead of dry afterwards. Definitely seems to work best with continued use, but even with one application it's noticable.Overall, I think this is an excellent product for the whole family. It's not too greasy or sticky going on, and it is absorbed quickly without being sucked up and forever gone as with some lotions. It left my skin looking healthier (see before and after photo on my hand) and had no icky scent. Definitely recommend it to everyone!

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: I have used other in shower moisturizers, but this here is my first time using Curel hydratherapy. I got a tube as a sample from Crowdtap and so I wanted to give it a try and see how it worked compared to others that I have used. The moisturizer does not really have to much of a smell at all. Actually I do not think it has any smell at all. Even though there is no scent it worked extremely better than I thought, and that is fine with me. I do have really dry skin, so finding a good moisturizer is hard for me. So when I find a good one I try to stick with it! I have eczema so my skin changes with the season so I was really happy when getting a chance to try this out. Curel has some really great products so I just knew that this wet skin moisturizer would be nothing less then the best.I have been using for about a week now  everyday and I have noticed a difference in my skin and the way it feels. Fall is here and well going into winter and my skin changes almost for the worst. It gets very dry sometimes no matter how much moisturizer I use. It really just depends on the day and the heat. I use other great body washes that have kept my skin feeling wonderful after a shower but then I'd have to put on an additional moisturizer. When using this I noticed that it didn't take long to soak into my skin at all. Another major plus is that my  skin did'nt feel all extra sticky once dried which is AMAZING! My skin didn't feel heavy at all afterwards, I really like this and it has marked its spot in my skin care routine!➽➽I RECEIVED THIS CUREL SAMPLE COMPLIMENTARY OF CROWDTAP TO TRY FOR TESTING PURPOSES AT A DISCOUNT, THIS DOES NOT IN ANYWAY AFFECT MY OPINION OF THE PRODUCT, ALL OPINIONS ABOVE ARE THAT OF MY OWN➽➽

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: Applying lotion on wet skin is something I have done for years although the in-shower lotions, the ones that are to be applied and then rinsed off in the shower have largely left me unimpressed and often with a greasy shower to clean.But this product is simply to be used after showering while skin is still damp. Pat dry with a towel after applying. I found the lotion is quickly absorbed and the water promptly evaporated so there was very limited need to use the towel.A little goes a long way, so only a small amount is needed to adequately moisturize. And another attribute is the lack of detectable fragrance. What a relief not to juggle soap, shampoo and conditioner along with lotion. This also makes the product suitable for either gender.The product did not leave a greasy film or feel. Instead what remained was the impression of a slightly powdery finish and skin that looked noticeably hydrated. I kept a bottle on my desk and reapplied it to my hands periodically and that method was effective, as well.Note that the product has a long list of ingredients and since sensitivities to particular items are not uncommon it might be worth checking the specifics to at least eliminate known problem components.The pump mechanism has a large platform to depress which is more comfortable to use than the skinny spigots, and another user-friendly design, the bottle has ridges on either side to help create a sure-grip when hands are wet. Impressed.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: We have a toddler that has eczema and lotion normally only aggravates the situation. This lotion is the only lotion that I found that does not aggravate the situation. I apply this lotion immediately after the bath and then use an anti-itch powder with menthol and eucalyptus. He does not itch after application and it also soothes the skin.  Itching is a big part of why his skin would not heal. His skin is clear and it seems to work well. The lotion is unscented and absorbs quickly and easily.  It was not the only thing I have done but it did not hurt like other products.  Since this is the case, I would recommend giving this lotion a try.

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I’ve been suffering from “Perioral Dermatitis” for a full year now, and its been horrible! I did everything, and anything to figure out the cure for this. It started out on my chin, and made its way to my forehead, cheeks, and neck within the year! Luckily it’s seems to be migrating only on my cheeks, and neck!I’ve seen two dermatologists that put me on antibiotics which helped temporarily but after three months the condition came back with a vengeance! Since then, I realized I had to take matters into my own hands! I began researching blogs, YouTube videos, and different websites that addressed holistic healing and natural remedies.  After all of my trial and error I finally stumbled upon two things that really worked for me! 1. Turmeric supplements and 2. Puriya! (I’m also trying out Grapefruit seed extract supplements).This cream is truly God sent. After just one night I noticed my scars faded and the breakouts minimized!  I’ve tried many creams that barely made a difference in a week!The picture above is after 4 months of using Puriya!After 4 months, I’ve noticed that I don’t breakout as much, and the scars are continuing to fade!  I usually keep this jar in the fridge as much as possible because I love the cooling sensation when I apply it!  I put it on twice a day (morning and night) after rinsing my face with warm water! I’ve also applied it on minor acne breakouts and bug bites!Overall, I’m truly impressed with this product, and I highly recommend it to those struggling with dermatitis!  The company also offers an extended return policy, and they seem very compassionate!

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I developed an odd patch of contact dermatitis on the top of my right forearm and hand about 2.5 months ago.  At first I thought it was insect bites, but it was not.  The bumps would flatten out at times, but then get intensely itchy again.  When I would scratch, everything got inflamed and bumpy all over again.  This went on for 8 weeks.  I finally received a prescription strength cortisone cream from my dermatologist and tried that for a few weeks, but it made absolutely no difference.  When the cortisone cream did not work, I was very surprised and began to stress out about this ugly itchy rash.  I began googling contact dermatitis/eczema, and I happened to find a reference to this cream.  I was skeptical, but I immediately purchased a jar from Amazon -- I had nothing to lose at this point.  After 2 weeks, the rash almost completely disappeared -- see picture.  I could not believe it.  I kept the jar in my refrigerator as suggested, and every time my arm started to itch, I applied some.  The coolness felt good, but it also tingled a tiny bit and somehow stopped the itching.  Looking at the natural ingredients, I do not understand how the cream works.  I just know that it does.  I waited a few weeks before writing this review.  During that time, the rash healed over, but then started up again in just one small penny-sized area -- again on my right forearm.  I started using the cream again, and once again, the rash is healing.  It is a miracle cream -- thanks Puriya!

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: Visible results on scabby eczema in one use! The picture attached is after 3 over 5 days!! This stuff is magic. It’s not heavy or nasty & greasy like many creams because of its natural recipe it absorbs, soothes, lathers, & softens eczema skin beautifully and FAST without needing thick coats like normal creams. The cream goes a long way, & I suspect that people who use it up so quickly are probably using more than they actually need because they are so used to lathering on thick layers of lotion with previous creams. I have stubborn eczema & refuse to get my skin hooked on a steroid cream so this was my last chance, now I’m a customer for life.GREAT FOR METAL ALLERGIES: My neck & torso are also allergic to metal, & I used this on some welts/inflammation/scarring I had on my neck from wearing a necklace twice over the holiday, & it’s making the burning, itch, redness, AND PREVIOUS SCARRING go alway!!! NOTHING has EVER helped my metal allergy so well and FAST before!! I’m truly amazed & happy I can wear an occasional metal necklace now,  because now I can fix the damage in one week with this cream- where as normally it would take over a month to truly heal AND I would still have visible scarring around my neck!!

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: So i have Dyshidratic Eczema. Ive had it all my life or as far as i can remember. It used to come just every summer very mild but 5 months ago it went crazy on me and i didnt know what to do. product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: My 10 yr old daughter has developed a stubborn case of perioral dermatitis around her nose. She was prescribed 2 prescription strength medicated ointments for topical treatment of the skin but it did not get any better/less red after weeks of trying. I started to research what other options we might have before putting her on an oral antibiotics for clearing up her skin. I came across the name of this cream and decided to give it a try despite the high cost. Let me tell you, this stuff is a godsend miraculous concoction!!! After one night of applying the cream to the affected area the redness was much less, and the bumps shrunk in size. After the 2nd night of treatment the itchy bumps started to completely disappear. Finally we started to see a light at the and of the tunnel after months of unsuccessful treatment!!! After the 3 night the skin of the affected area looked 95% back to normal, no bumps, no flaming red skin just a pink-ish patch the size of a dime. Tonight marks the 4th night I applied the cream to my daughter's face/nose and I can't wait to see her skin in the morning! I am super excited for her!! This was the BEST $30 I have ever spent. No more perioral dermatitis for us!! Thank you Puriya!!!!Update: I have added 2 photos for reference.
