product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I am Queen Skeptic when it comes to anything marketed for eczema. This product worked for me. I have suffered from eczema since childhood. It comes and goes, and I have yet to determine a trigger. This last round has been particularly a nuisance and has stuck around about a year now. The rash runs up my forearms and hands. I find myself waking in the middle of the night scratching, often breaking the skin, making it painful in the morning. I finally got fed up and searched "eczema cure." This gem caught my eye. After reading the reviews, I made the purchase! What a good move on my part. I saw relief in a day and less than a week later I'm nearly completely healed. I had been using steroids (prescription Fluocinonide) that didn't even help as quickly as this Puriya cream! Now, I HATE the sticky oily feel of any lotions. This cream does not leave that feeling. It also smells like a mixture of peppermint and oatmeal, which my children around me commented they liked. I am a week out and totally impressed! I have never before (in 30 years) found a natural relief as this. Pics included were day 1, day 3, and day 6.

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I was looking for something to help with some eczema patches I have, and I had  been using it about a week when I thought I would give it a try on some rosacea I have on my cheeks.  My eczema patches improved and were  less itchy, and I noticed a brown patch on my face had changed.  I’d had the brown spot for over four years – a dermatologist had looked at it and said it was no concern – just part of aging as I am 54. (Thanks a lot, Doc) I applied the cream about twice a day for about two weeks and that brown spot just kind of flaked off. See the pictures – first one taken November 14 before I started using the cream, and the second one was taken today, December 17.  I promise you, I am going to keep using this stuff!

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I’m not the type to leave reviews, but I feel like I had to for this. For every purchase I make, I go based off reviews and I hope that my review will help someone that wants an honest answer that might be having troublesome skin problems. Over the past 2 years, I started to develop some type of rashes around my mouth and now along the folds of my nose. My doctor kept prescribing me hydrocortisone cream, nystatin, and a lot of other steroid creams that all it did was make the area burn so much and not diminish. The “rashes” kept getting bigger and bigger. I had to stop using my face moisturizers or anything that had retinol. Face masks were a no because it really burned those areas and make them worse. On some days the area would appear flaky and started to peel. My doctor just gave up on me and didn’t do anything else so I decided to research other creams or causes of what could it possibly be. I found this cream across amazon, and I read someone else’s review which stated she suffered from perioral dermatitis. She provided pictures and the exact same flare ups she had, I had as well. I decided to give it a try and even more because the company has a 180-day get your money back if you’re not satisfied with the product. I mentioned the perioral dermatitis to my doctor, and he prescribed doxycycline hyclate. I have been using the medication and cream for 16 days and I’ve already seen a significant difference! I am really happy with the results I am getting and this cream did not cause me to break out or burn my face at all. It is a bit more on the pricey side but the jar it comes in has a lot of product and you don’t really need a lot. You get your money’s worth! My sister suffers from eczema on her face and I gave her some to try out and it has also helped her a lot! In no way am I trying to promote this product or anything, I just want to help people that may be suffering from some type of skin condition and are looking for something that really works. Again, everyone is different so not everything may work the same way for everyone but it did for me. I will provide some before and after photos along with this review hoping it will help someone in need!

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: Five stars is not enough-this product will be at my house, work, and in my purse for the rest of my life. Total game changer for someone dealing with skin issues for their whole life with little to no results. Had almost instant results on the dry patches of psoriasis on my hands. Went from a decade long problem to nearly completely in JUST 2 DAYS OF USE!! My “before” wasn’t just neglected skin-that’s as good as it got from using a prescription steroid ointment and a topical chapped skin cream 3-4 times a day. I stopped everything but this cream and in 2 DAYS this was the result-nothing short of a miracle to me!

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I have psoriasis, and I have what they call severe....it affects 35%of my body....I have tried just about every lotion out there...and because cancer is prevalent in my family history, injections and prescription medications are a no-no. My condition is hereditary, (the things we get from our parents aren’t always gifts), and like eczema mine is incurable, the best I can hope for is an itch free, flake free day...One of the best product I use, and there are only a few, is Mother of All Creams. First I love the scent, which, as a rule when dealing with psoriasis, is no perfumes or dyes or alcohol...second the fact that you put it in the refrigerator and it gets cold...nothing more soothing than this on a flaming flare up. Not only does it calm the fire of burning cracking skin, but it helps calm the redness and allows the skin to gently fall off on its own...I know that sounds a bit gross, okay, a lot gross, but the truth in the matter is that if it doesn’t fall off, it will build up and become almost cystic. I don’t think I can say enough on how much this product has helped me, I truly count my lucky stars that someone made it and I found it.If there is one thing that I would change, is that it comes in a bigger tub...I use every last ounce I can, even taking a swab to make sure none goes to waste.Thank you for this wonderful gift and all the precious time, energy and effort you have put into it!Felicia Knigjtstep

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: Mind blown!! I have guttate psoriasis which causes painful bumps that are almost like blisters on my legs and it usually takes months to clear up which causes me to barely be able to wear shorts all summer. I order this cream and received free standard shipping but I received my package in 2 days. I used this cream last night and woke up this morning and my leg was almost completely cleared up. The bumps that are left are way less red and painful! I am so glad I ordered this cream!Just a heads up if you are ordering this in the summer time I opened this up when I got home and it was really liquified and I spilled it all over myself so be careful opening until it gets back to room temp and thickens back up

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: So I want to preface this by saying that I hardly ever write reviews (and I DEFINITELY was not paid to do so either), but I felt compelled to because I myself rely heavily on them before purchasing anything. I was recently diagnosed with rosacea. At first I was like whatever. But it started getting pretty bad and it was taking a mental toll on me to the point that I cried several times. I was prescribed a $500 cream from my dermatologist. $500!!!! Well I certainly wasn't going to pay that so I did research online and came across this cream. $30 seemed steep for such a small amount but let me tell you...a little goes a LONG way. I literally use a dab and it spreads pretty well so I think it's going to last me a very long time so I don't mind the price. I have included a picture of my left side of my face which has been affected the most. The first picture is the day before I started using the cream and the second picture is today, 7 days later. (P.s. Excuse the spot on the bottom of my cheek. That is a regular blemish and unrelated to my rosacea.)

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I tried several other products to calm a dermatitis flair up to no avail. In just 3 days this cream almost completely cleared up a troublesome spot on my neck that had been itchy, res and sore for MONTHS. It has worked better than even the Rx cream the Dr. Gave me! Today I used it on my child who shares my condition and in the last 24 hours she has had a huge improvement on her trouble areas! I have included pics of my neck, the first is day one, the second is day 3. I will warn that the 1st and second day of the healing process the itching definitely went up a notch, by the 3rd day the itching subsided to reveal smooth, healthy skin where it was previously rough, red and painful.

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: This stuff works. I have been dealing with eczema on my hand for the last 2-3 months that never cleared up. The first time I applied this cream I could feel that something was happening. It is in the second day about 90% cleared up. Might be the essential oils which added a mild tingling sensation. This is after trying multiple antibiotic, Hydrocortisone (irritating) and other creams which helped but it never fully went away.  I am satisfied.

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: UPDATE: I received a very kind and lengthy handwritten note from one of the co-owners of the company, along with a free body wash. I'm incredibly impressed with their customer service, and slightly adjusted my star rating to reflect that. I absolutely recommend giving this company a shot, but at the same time I don't want to leave a dishonest review about what this did to my skin.I have extremely sensitive skin, so most products don't work for me. Pregnancy has given me severe eczema all around my eyes, nose, and chin. Literally everything except for Aquaphor healing ointment feels like acid on my skin, and this was no exception. It burns SO badly. I still think it's worth a shot for people, but if you have notoriously sensitive skin...skip this one.I'm attaching two not-so-pretty photos of what I'm dealing with. The second photo was after using the product for several weeks and seeing my eczema get more and more inflamed.

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I have a light eczema that is bad enough to crack and bleed.  For the past 4 winters this has not been the case, because Mother of All Creams keeps my hands not just healthy, but soft!  An application in the morning will last all day through several hand washings while working with dogs. A second application after a shower is crucial in establishing a healthy base oil level. All without any greasy feeling, and it smells wonderful. Please never change 🥰PS. I am a 45 yr old redhead, but my hands haven't looked better in years.

product_name: Puriya Intensive Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive and Irritated Skin, Dermatologist Reviewed, Clinically Tested Plant Rich Formula, Soothes Rough, Dry, Scaly Patches, Trusted by 300,000 Families
review: I'm an artist. I use gloves when working, but years of chemicals coupled with constant hand washing left my hands chapped and sensitive. I've been using this for about a month now, after every hand wash and whenever I need a bit of relief, and it's working. It has a light peppermint scent that reminds me of a Spa treatment. The formula absorbs fully after about a minute of rubbing it in- so I'm able to put nitrile gloves on and go back to work right away. I see some improvement in the texture of my skin starting to happen. Going into month 2 and my 2nd jar. I will continue to update with photos.

product_name: Vitamin C Skin Clearing Face Moisturizer - Anti Aging Formula with Salicylic Acid - Natural & Organic - Acne, Wrinkles, Fine Lines & Hyperpigmentation Defying Product - InstaNatural - 1.5 oz
review: One of my favorite moisturizers. It’s light weight, soaks into the skin beautifully and after almost a month of use has made a visible difference. I’m very impressed

product_name: Brightening Lotion, Facial moisturizer for Face and Eye Area with Shea Butter, Vitamin e, Fullerene Antioxidant, Best lightweight anti aging cream for sensitive or oily skin, 2.0 fl oz
review: Super nice product! Have been used it repeatedly for a couple of years. It’s light and hydrated, gives skin smooth feeling before put on foundation and other makeup products. Highly recommended this product

product_name: PCA Skin Clearskin Facial Moisturizer, 1.7 oz
review: I used this for two days and it gave me a red itchy rash on my face . I’ve bought it before in a local store and this never happened

product_name: PCA Skin Clearskin Facial Moisturizer, 1.7 oz
review: I just finished a whole jar. My acne didn't improve but didn't get worse either. I think to truly test I should've tried their whole set! However, from the cream alone, I like it. Its consistency is between a gel and a cream, more on a heavy side. I have oily skin, this stuff won't help with the oiliness, I always woke up with a shiny face when using this cream, but as I learned not being too obsessed with the oil on my face, I can see that my skin is well hydrated even after a face wash. It did tingle when I applied over my pimples (new or popped) so I guess something was working (or irritating!)For some reason this stuff went really fast for me. It didn't glide too well on my skin. I may repurchase this in the future, but now I'm still looking for a better product that is more suited for my skin and my budget. I can imagine this cream can work for many other people

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: Neutrogena recently changed the formulation of this once great product. (Probably around May 2017). It was a very affordable great Retinol product with Vitamin E & Provitamin B5 and Green Tea Extract. Retinol was the 8th ingredient in the ingredients list. That was superb because products at the 60USD+ price range does include only that much Retinol. It had also an impressive amount of Green Tea Extract. Green Tea was listed even before the Retinol. They are now listed EVEN AFTER THE PRESERVATIVES! Retinol is the last ingredient. So it actually does not have any! Green Tea,too is listed after 1 of the preservative. So it will not have any effect.It still has Vit.E and Panthenol but that does not make this a Retinol product as claimed!This product is still rated positively at Beautypedia. They probably are not aware of the recent formulation change because their ingredients list shows the previous formula.I bought 2 of this product (I bought the pack of 2 listing but will include this review to every listing of this product so people are aware of this change) and they were delivered today. I was shocked to see the changed formulation. I had been using this product for about 10 years. Will not buy anymore. I can't use a "RETINOL" cream which has about 2X parabens than the Retinol! ( I am sorry for the seller btw but I had to write this ) !

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: As a previous review stated, the image showing the ingredients is not the item received.  As you can see from the picture the item I received has Retinol listed last.  Very disappointed and returning.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: This product absorbs well. I use it at bedtime.I have a smooth face. It is maintaining my skin at this point.  I would suggest buying a silk pillow case for the pillow that touches your face and hair. They are sold on Amazon.  I get many compliments from women about my skin being pretty. I’m a 62 year old Caucasian woman and all compliments are rare at this age.  Our culture doesn’t value the beauty of aging.  Sad.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: falsely advertised. I ordered this because I saw the ingredient list with retinol listed as about the 9th ingredient. The box I received has retinol dead last. Neutrogena has changed the formula and the retinol in this no longer works.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: This product worked a great deal on me! I’ve been suffering from acne for a few years now and though it has cleared up a bit from orally taking natural made Vitamin A my face was left with discoloration and uneven tones. I initially purchased this product for wrinkles but instead it has provided my skin with moisture and a brighter complexion. I really love this and do recommend it. After reading more about this product the diminishing of wrinkles is probably around a 3 out of 10. I personally give it a 0/10 because I haven’t seen any difference in that aspect. Moisture I give it a 5/5 and toning the skin i give it a 7/10. I have received a lot of compliments and even my makeup looks better when I apply it. The first week I used it I noticed my skin felt extremely smooth. About  two weeks and a half I noticed the even tones and brighter complexion as well as the moisture on my face. There is a tingle when you first start using it, I personally don’t have sensitive skin so this is a heads up to those whom do. Overall I will definitely be buying this again.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz

Cake-like texture, 2. The emulsion separates like water. The other two textures are like making cake syrup. I hope to get a positive response.

review: I like it very much!

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: This isn’t what’s pictured or described, the active ingredient Retinol, is shown middle of ingredients list, what was delivered is last!!!!

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: I wasn't sure if this formula included retinol at the time of purchase - but pleased to discovery the label clearly discloses this.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: I see a lot of reviews on here that there is barely any retinol in this. I have used this on and off since my late twenties, I guess. Nothing will ever compare to the correction night serum they discontinued. That used to make my skin glow! Anyway, I feel like I never really saw results with this. That is until now. I don't have wrinkles (knocks on virtual wood), but I use it for a few fine lines on my forehead. I feel like I have gotten fast & noticeable results using this on my face and neck in the last two weeks. I ran out of my Alpha Hydrox lotion (which is literally the best you will ever find), and had this laying around. The results in two weeks have been AHmazing! Not that my face was bad to begin with, but my neck was getting gross looking (yeah tanning in your 20's and 30's). I kid you not I was getting really self conscious about this "ring lines?" I guess you call them on your neck & this literally made my neck look normal again. Like 90% better in two weeks. I wasn't even looking for results using this. I was just using it without even paying attention. Then I caught myself in the mirror on a few different days & I absolutely cannot believe how much better I look. I never realized how important the care of your neck area was, as well as your face. I wouldn't ever use a higher retinol on my neck area because it tends to be sensitive. This stuff has been a god send. I ordered more on here Bc it's soooo much cheaper on amazon than in the store. I just turned 42. Weird for me to say that, but seriously a miracle when I didn't even know I needed it. Yikes. 5 stars. Does recommend. It's under $12. You really don't have anything to lose. Ps. I attached images and I'm still traumatized lol but it's only been two weeks. Imo, big improvement.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: YAAAS! Neutrogena recently renewed their formula for this cream, but amazon sent me the old one (SCORE). The older version is much more rich and effective. I'm 27, no wrinkles, and skin so great I go makeup free every day. I have been using this cream as a preventative measure for wrinkles and it seems to be working out great. After extended, daily use I can even see some of my faint smile lines start to disappear. I will forever be re-ordering from this seller because they seem to be the only ones who carry the original formula.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: The produce was fine however it was crushed upon arrival. The box and product.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer Cream with Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Glycerin, 1.4 oz
review: This cream didn't do absolutely anything for my skin, not even moisturizing it. After 3 months of use it ended up in the garbage. I save 1 star reviews for products that have negative effects, but the best thing I can say about this product is that it didn't cause any skin issues.I contacted Neutrogena to ask about the retinol concentration. The firm refused to disclose it (see photo), but after a lot of googling I learned the retinol percentage is 0.025%, one if the lowest ones on the market. The other ingredients are mostly synthetic emolients (fatty alcohols), silicones and parabens, so this cream might cause breakouts if you're acne-prone.If you never used a retinoid before and want to get an inexpensive product to see how your skin reacts, there are better choices out there. The trick is to get a cream that lists its retinol concentration and mixing it with a bland moisturizer (preferably with ceramides). I got RETIN by Skin by POM with .5% retinol and the Phyisiogel Daily Moisture Therapy Cream, and love the results. Decant the mix into a dark/opaque container with an airless pump and start slow. If you're tolerating the ingredient well you can increase the frequency and then move on to a mix with a higher retinol concentration.Rating system:* product damaged my skin** product had no positive or negative effects and ended up in the trash*** product will be used but not repurchased**** product will be repurchased unless I find a better alternative***** product will be definitely repurchased

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: Just unbox the package and found that its 2.5 OZ when I paid for 5 fl oz. Maybe other people don’t check the price. I was not even checking the price, I was about to give a nice review to all products that I received but all of sudden I happened to check the size/qty.

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: See my other review of the spray version.  This is the best sunscreen on the market today.

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: Love this !!! I Pleasantly surprised when three came in the mail. I must’ve not read the product all the way. Great value for the price

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: The cream doesn't absorbed into the skin.Look terrible on the face

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: My face looks so white, I don’t any irritation or something like that but when I used it, I don’t like the texture, but I never burned

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: Good insulation effect, high spf. I used this sunscreen directly after the painted eyebrows out more good-looking, beautiful eyebrow color.

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: Left my face soooo white. I spent minutes trying to smear it in and get it working. Gave up and put a dark foundation and powder on top, and it was still obvious. Tried again the second day to no avail. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS if you want to look normal. If you don't care, then go for it.

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: I need all year sun protection so I am always on the lookout for a great sunscreen.  The smell of a sunscreen is important to me and the CeraVe sunscreen is somewhat off-putting when I put it on my face.  It has a sort of chemical or oxy based cleaner type of smell. The formula is thick as to be expected with a sunscreen at 50 but it does not rub in very well even with a thin coat.  It leaves my skin feeling a little bit greasy and white.  My face would look like a mime if I put on an appropriate layer. I was at first really eager to put this on my skin because it has niacinamide and ceramides and that is awesome to have included in a daily lotion.  Then I learned that some of the ingredients can be a bit hazardous.  I did not know what the ingredients were and why there was a cause for concern but I looked up a few.  It confuses me a little bit that vitamin A is in this because I thought this caused sun sensitivity.  Methylisothiazolinone is a preservative but has been found to cause allergic reactions and has been found to be neurotoxic in mammals. The other ingredients have concern but are mild. My recommendation for improvement would be to change the preservative if possible.  The formula does not smell right and after I used it the first time I did not find myself wanting to use it again or continue to use it.  I looked up the ingredients and dug a little deeper into the formula.  I have not tossed the container but am hesitant to apply it and that is not ideal for a sunscreen.  I will still wear this for sun protection but for the future, I will look for another formula.

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: 20/Mar/2020PROS+ It's mositurizing.+ You can feel the protection!!+ Grade of protection is great.+ Used it for pool, did not get burnt from the sun.+ It does not feel greasy.CONS- Not easy to spread, it's very thick, really.- Leaves a bit of white cast behind (But not too bad).I am giving this one 4/5!* I will update this review if something changes as I keep using the product.* If you found this review helpful, please click below! This will help other users like you to make informed decisions before spending their money!

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: This  50 SPF sunscreen is really a great product. I have to agree with a previous poster that  I believe the "ghostface" is due to applying too much. I attached a photo of it applied to my hand. I took the photo immediately after application. No white at all. It goes on very smooth and dries almost instantly with out an oily mess left behind. Water resistant for 40 min so be sure to reapply frequently. It is a small bottle  but very little is required per application. I only minus 1 star because although I really like the product, $10+ for a 2oz bottle may deter many people from purchase.

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: I'll admit, when I was younger I only ever put sunscreen on my face when I went to the pool. Now that I'm getting older I'm starting to regret that.  I can't magically fix the damage that's already been done but I can work towards better skin from now on and I think this CereVe will help. It's got good protection as a sunscreen, goes on smooth and doesn't feel oily or anything, and my face feels soft all day.

product_name: Cerave 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 | Face Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide for Sensitive Skin | 2.5 oz, 1 Pack
review: I am so happy with this CeraVe  products! I haven’t been able to test out the sun protection qualities as it’s still winter where I live. However, given the history of these products I am sure it’s going to be amazing! The moisturizer it’s self is great it’s easy to spread and it goes on smooth. It leaves your skin feeling really moisturized and healthy.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I've been trying to avoid writing a review bc these types of product need time to notice change (I was going to wait 4-6 weeks). I honestly didn't notice any change (about 3 weeks) until my aunt mentioned how great my skin looked. I did a side by side photo with the same time of day and lighting (sunlight) to show you the difference.Although subtle, I can start seeing the difference already.  My skin is brighter, softer, and fine lines are starting to disappear. I have lived with PCOS for most of my life and been dealing with the horrible acne it. I did break out initially but concluded it was just adjusting.  My skin has cleared up tremendously now and during "that time" I can honestly say it wasn't as bad as it usually is.I place a dropper full into my cupped hand and use my fingers to dab it around my eyes (including my hoods) and btn my brows, the rest I spread btn two hands and pat onto my neck. I use another dropper full to pat onto the rest of my face. There is a slight odor when you first put it on but goes away as soon as it dries. Three weeks and I still have plenty of product left. I use this along with their Retinol Moisturizer.I couldn't be happier and am a lifetime user now. I highly recommend this product. I know everyone has different skin, but for the price why not give it a try. Even my mom bought some immediately after seeing my results.I hope this review has been helpful. I know how hard it is to buy beauty products without knowing true results. Just make sure you give this product time to do its magic!

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I have been using this product for three years! I received a new bottle today and noticed the consistency is different and immediately went to read the ingredients! They have changed everything and added terrible chemicals (ex. Carrageenan, methylsulfonymethane and many more!) shame on you Radha Beauty! The original ingredients were all simple and organic and I loved the original product so much! Will not be buying any products from this brand again.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I received my new order of the serum today and this bottle was just totally wrong (2nd in the picture). I've been buying this serum for quite a lot times and never had this problem before. This bottle is way much thicker, whiter and it smells really weird, almost like plastic or rubber.I've no idea what happened to this product, but I just can't risk to put this new bottle on my face. So disappointing this time.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: Okay, first things first. Let's really talk here. I received my product about a week and a half ago. I do not appreciate quick reviews saying just how the product feels and all. We purchase these products because we want to see a difference, real results and without a review discussing that, it's worthless. So I am almost in my second week of using the product and I can only comment on my current experience and, as I often do in my reviews, I will return in several weeks with an update on how the product actually WORKS.So, for now I can say I like the texture. It's thin but not really *watery* in that you can tell it has some substance to it. As you pat it on, you can feel a slight silicone-like glide to the product. I like that. I experienced a tiny bit of stinging the first time I used it but that's because I put it on right after washing my face. Now, I wait a few minutes until my face has dried a bit and then apply. No stinging or problems at all. I will be posting some photos of me currently and then several weeks later on my "problem areas" - cheeks mostly from teenage acne many years ago. I am 48 years old and have no wrinkles to speak of so not expecting anything there. But I have used vitamin C serums before, most notably the one by Avon many years ago before they discontinued it and I loved it. Skin gets more dewy and even toned and I am expecting the same with this product.So far, so good.To be fair (because I like to see before and after photos) here are a few pics of my face CLOSE UP today. I'm really already seeing improvement. I am also using this on my neck so I want you to see that as well. A couple months I will return with updated photos to see what's really going on. I've already set up a reminder in Wunderlist so yes, I really will be back. And keep in mind, closeup photos suck because we get to see ourselves the way the general public doesn't. In the supermarket, for instance, you'd never be this close. So I had to include one cute photo just so you see that I'm not hideous in general - LOL!UPDATE 3/24/2016The review above was on February 13, 2016 and I'm back. See photos in white shirt below. While I'm not sure yet how much improvement there is on my face, I do see results on my neck. I tried to get a photo in sunlight but shadow kept interfering so there are 2 new photos with the white shirt. Hope you can see it well enough compared to the first picture of my neck (that came out sideways) where you can see the bottom of my phone case. Now in fairness, the improvement may be simply because in addition to applying twice a day, I'm also paying more attention and massaging in moisturizer after each application of the Vitamin C serum. Still, not bad for just over 30 days. I'm about 1/3 through the bottle so it lasts well and I really think I use a bit more than I probably need to. I don't so much rub it in as I put about 5 drops in my palm then pat it directly onto my forehead, 3 more drops for each cheek, 6 or more for neck (all the way around), and then I dot some on bridge of my nose and chin. Pretty much my whole face, avoiding eyes as Vitamin C can be drying.Will be back with updates and more photos, too. That's how I review products. As Othello said, I give you the ocular proof!

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I had ordered this before and it was a clear serum. I ordered it a 2nd time around because i really liked it and it was like a creamy liquid that wouldnt even come out from the dropper. I don't know if it is expired? I am very disappointed!

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: This should be labeled LOTION, it is not a serum. Very dissapointed. I dont understand why they changed the product when it was perfect before. It sits on your skin and does not absorb and leaves a sticky feeling on your face. Amazon does not let me return it, why? Read the RECENT reviews if youre thinking about buying this product.  Its going straight to the trash, :(

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: Wow. This product really does something amazing to my skin. I use it daily, just after washing with their vitamin C face wash. I then wait till my skin gets almost dry, then apply a 1/4 dropper to my forehead, cheeks, under eye areas. I don't fully rub it in. Just let it sit and as it starts to dry, you will feel your face tightening. Then apply their retinol moisturizer. Literally look 3-4 years younger. Lines on face have demisinshed. Eyes are not droopy. Amazing for the price!

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: Bought it because of acne! Am using it with 100% tea tree oil, for almost a week, twice a day. Used to have three to five new acne per day, now it stopped apearing every day, but still have some new acne on my women days. At least the acne isn't active for a month or more. It helps to dry it very quickly.  The skin is lighter. Will add new photos after using all bottle.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: Ii'VE JUST RECENTLY STARTED USING THIS PRODUCT AND IT TRULY HAS HELPED MY SKIN FEEL MORE FIRM AND LOOK BRIGHTER. IT SMELLS AMAZING! I USE IT AFTER A SHOWER AND IN THE MORNING BEFORE APPLYING MY MAKE-UP.I ALSO USE IT AFTER DERMA-BLADING OR WITH MY JADE ROLLER AT HOME.I LOVE THAT IT SMELLS JUST LIKE FRESH SQUEEZED ORANGE JUICE AND IT HAS HELPED HYDRATE MY DRY SKIN SO MUCH! DEFINITELY WILL BE BUYING AGAIN AND AGAIN!

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: Beware!! Fraudulent product received. Before using the first time, I remembered some of the other reviews here and decided to compare the bottle and packaging to the actual product website. There are clear mistakes in the text on the bottle—but the big giveaway was the ingredient list. I am so glad I didn’t put this garbage on my face. Buying direct from Radha Beauty is safest bet for your skin! Yikes

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I buy several Radha products and really like the quality. I've purchased this serum several times; however, the last order the serum was not like past orders. I don't know if it was a bad batch or a different formula, but instead of being a very thin almost watery formula, it was a thick lotion-like yellow substance. The bottle it the past was clear liquid, this time it was a cloudy thick serum.I am unable to return, but curious if anyone else had this issue... Not sure I want to buy again until this is figured out.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: Bought this initially for the serum and wash, but the lotion is amazing too.  Not greasy, and absorbs well into the skin.  I use the serum after Microneedling as well and have noticed a huge difference.  I actually had a breakout when this product arrived and it healed very quickly!  Will buy again!  Also love the pump top on the lotion!!

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I liked this product at first, confident in it after quite a bit of research and comparing of ingredients. I thought I even saw an improvement, but in the span of a few weeks the serum turned progressively more yellow and didn't seem to do much. I still use it in hopes that the hyaluronic acid will do some good, even if the vitamin C is old/ unstable/ ineffective.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: My last order was bad! I have been buying the serum for a very long time and I have been liking it because it works for me but this last bottle I received was a total water too watery and doesn’t have that fruity smell. It doesn’t stay on the faceI hate that is too water

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: Nice product, at first I got a bottle of serum that had a bad odor like rotten oranges, but they send me a new one and it was much better, my skin looks and feels better,

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I love it this product and really recommend, I’ve only used it for 3 days and it makes my sling super moisturized, hydrated, and glowing, it also really helped lighten dark spots on my face.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: This serum came as a creamy yellowish serum. It smells citrusy. I haven't purchased this before but its not what's pictured. I'm afraid to put this stuff on my face. I shouldve just listened to the current reviews on this product. I also cant return it so I've lost out on $15 :(

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: I don't really know how to feel about this product, I've been using it ever since I've received it and haven't really noticed a change in my face but I'll give it time it's still early. I use it with an aveeno lotion cause my face is sensitive to pretty much everything. I bought the serum to use with a Derma roller I recently purchased.

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: First time i bought it, it was a liquid yellow clear serum. This time, i received a cloudy yellow thick serum. See pics. This is extremely different consistency than before. It is scary to put in my face. Did they change the recipe?

product_name: Radha Beauty Glow Boosting Vitamin C Moisturizer, 1.7 fl oz. for Face, Neck, Decollete - Super Moisturizing Facial Lightweight Cream, Anti-Aging & Brightening - Daily for Dry, Sensitive & Oily Skin
review: This was so terrible. I had purchased this product before and got amazing results so I decided to purchase another one. I loved the serum after doing the dermaroller because it left my skin soft and feeling hydrated the next day. I bought this serum by the same company and when I opened it, it was not the same serum. It looked like lotion or some nasty white mixture instead of the yellowed tiny serum. It didn't even smell nice. I don't know what went wrong during the making of this bottle, but they need to do a better job checking their batches.

product_name: Vaseline Men Healing Moisture Body Lotion For Dry Skin Fast Absorbing Absorbs in Just 15 Skin For Moisturized Skin 20.3 oz 3 count
review: Their product is fine, but Vaseline touts a “smart pump” that is one of the dumbest industrial designs I’ve seen. The pump is shaped like a “T”, so it’s very easy to mistake which side the dispenser is on. So you hold your hand out, push down...and moisturizer squirts out the opposite direction.

product_name: Vaseline Men Healing Moisture Body Lotion For Dry Skin Fast Absorbing Absorbs in Just 15 Skin For Moisturized Skin 20.3 oz 3 count
review: Originally bought this lotion because it smelled really good. The smell lasts a solid 4-6 hrs depending on what your getting into. I happen to have dry skin and this lotion works really well. The fast drying non greasy qualities are great. The bottle is huge for the price and lasts me 2-3 months. I've bought this one about 6-7 times in a row now, Its def my go to. Would highly recommend. I'm glad I found this lotion.

product_name: Vaseline Men Healing Moisture Body Lotion For Dry Skin Fast Absorbing Absorbs in Just 15 Skin For Moisturized Skin 20.3 oz 3 count
review: Love the Vaseline brand of lotions. This one has a great scent, that my wife really loves. Feels great on my skin and it's not very oily.

product_name: Desert Essence Thoroughly Clean Face Wash - Original - 32 Fl Oz - Pack of 2 -Tea Tree Oil -For Soft Radiant Skin - Gentle Cleanser - Extracts Of Goldenseal, Awapuhi, & Chamomile Essential Oils
review: I continue to love this product. If you haven't used a tea tree product before, be open minded. Learn where you can use it and where you can't. You will have that figured out for your own tolerability and desire after about 3-5 uses. I feel like this is one of the best products in keeping my skin clear. It is lightweight but mighty. The product is thin like water but I still use it like a soap, without a wash cloth. It helps with excessive body odor, like being worked out in the yard for hours. To me, it seems to clean as well as antibacterial, though not as invasive or intrusive. That is a lot for me to say when I am a golden Dial lover.
